Teke ˜nareng-taa utau kapang-kooning ntong-po'ning te' otoko' taramu-pina' basi pankaing-pina', Ju'nupoonge temurii'keta ntong nke'aama amutemurii' kapoo' duu'paako'ning biikaang toomo siompai.
Ee'noko Jiisuu'ke teing taamang banto'nuka aa'puru', “Aing utauning maanto'eriaing ntonge.” Ee'noko teinge maanto'ama koonto' a'dei'ke karange basiau'.
Ee'noko maanto'aio' Jiisuu'ke nauvurima aa'puru', “Enang tee-koo ntong-koo nii'naru' nke'erira tavo'eriaing tee-anko paroro okovenung-anko.” Ee'noko tee-anko tavo'au'.

Ee'noko ntong avaio' mantompuu', koonto' uaini deempario'. Teie noru'uaruu' aung uaini okora'noo'. Teinge nainge taamang banto'nankai ntong nke'au'ninge noru'au'. Ee'noko teie paroro okovenunge mantompura tee naning nampeesiarako'nung bokuvura aa'puu',

“Nii'ke ookarai uaini tampara masikung tutung avorompimaung, ee'noko nantoonge tee opaako dama'ke tamunsi'nung uaini avorompikoo'. Ee'noko dake tampara uaini pinka'eing bera enang dama'ke amerimaang.”

Aung Jiisuu' bakaning taa'ni'antananka-koo tutuna'nung. Tee nkovuu'nung Kana-navuntu'koo, Kaaleli'nameng-koonoo'ke. Teke ee'noo'ke bakaang meenasi sira'paru' ee'noko nii'ke bakaning barevare-nupoonge masika'antavampiru'.
Ee'noko teketa Jiisuu' ee'noko bauko ee'noko baara'mainkaang ee'noko nii' bakaning barevare-nupoong nanampiru' Kapaneume'navuntu'aape. Ee'noko temono-koo nii'ning doong o'noru'.
Tenang Ju'nupoong biikaang Taamang Baari'koong˜ due'uio' Jiisuu' Jerusalema'aape nanuu'.

Ee'noko Jiisuu'ke nantoong oovuru' parang-koo dootuu'nava pankava-koong-koo kuunge baaveveeko boromaka' dovang, sipisipi' dovang, kuukuu' dovang parekanumpo'. Ee'noko napo' nantoong mooni' aampari'aako'ning oovuru' biikaang ba'nava'nang-koo ba'namparirio'.

Ee'noko Jiisuu'ke mo'ming nerivura nipo'urima ookara kau' karenaumo bata'uru' dootuu'nava pankava-ita, sipisipi' dovang, boromaka' dovang. Ee'noko Jiisuu'ke batanang-nanka pe'dempuru' mooni' aampari'aako'ning biikaning, ee'noko biikaang mooni' purarinka'evuru'.
Ee'noko teing nantoong kuukuu' baaveaako'ning Jiisuu'ke nauvurima aa'puru', “Te'nemperiaing anketa. Mma' bakaang pava baaveroma deeng-antaveriauka'.”
Ee'noko nii'ke bakaning barevare-nupoonge noru'ampiru' Daari Meekunge minkuvuu'na', aa'puu'na',
“Nkaang domang-eta pia aa'na' o'nong dakaang pava meekung otoi oto'koo.”
Teketa tee Ju'koong ovontunge maku'aama tuu'ai nia'aama aa'pau', “Da' pankaing deeko', tee' nkovepeu'nung, taa'ni'anta naumeriaing.”
Jiisuu'ke maku'urima aa'puru', “Aung pava dootuu'nava turamperiko beenang doong-koo napo' daa'ampaing.”
Teketa napo' teinge nia'aama aa'pau', “Beenang doong-koo masika' kaniepeu'? Makotua'. Ava dootuu'nava pankava pankaroonge kaniampiru'nava karenaumo kivora-ita ˜namare'taa-koo.”
Tee dootuu'nava tampuko'nung miru'noo' tee ee'nara Jiisuu'nung mono.
Dama'ke boo'keta daa'ario' nii'ke bakaning barevare-nupoonge napo' noru'ampiru' tee' minkuvuu'na'. Ee'noko Daari Meekung masika'antavampiru' ee'noko tee kara Jiisuu'ke minkuvuu'nung.
Teketa tee Jiisuu' otou' Jerusalema' Taamang Baari'koong-koo˜. Ee'noko te' otoko mmau'ke masika'antavau' taa'ni'antananka nkovuu'ning ooaama te' otoroitaa'.
Nka Jiisuu'ke tee masika'antavuriaruko' ookara biikaang aarumo noru'uitaa'.
Bane naninge kapoo' nauvuaruko tampa' noru'uko' nantoong-koo tunsi-koo otoing.
Enang tee naning narung otoko' miring Nikodemasi. Tee Ju'nupoong-koong pankaing, Boto Keperuu'navitu-koong˜.

Ee'noko nii'na'mung muunga Jiisuu'anko pora aa'puu', “Nau-anta Pankaing ee, da' nii'ke noru'dampiri otong. Da' nau-anta Kumponinge botoruu'nung. Aing taa'ni'antananka nkovemaing naninge baka nkovuarupeu' Kumponing ninka nari' otorea' dei.”
Jiisuu'ke maku'uma aa'puu', “Masika' nauramaang, naning napo' ponto'aravarui dei, Kumponing bakaang muu' oovuarupeu'.”
Nikodemasie aa'puu', “Arekee' napo' naning pankara ponto'arapeu'? Bauko-koong-koo manong-koo napo' tumparavarupeu' kemu'kana' napo' ponto'araa'naang.”
Ee'noko Jiisuu'ke maku'uma aa'puu', “Masika' nauramaang, naning Kumponing bakaang muu'koo tumparavarupeu' ponto'aravarui dei ntong-eta ee'noko Tanuaang Meekung-eta.
Mono-koong ponto' mono-pina' ooampimaung, ee'noko Tanuaang Meekung-koong ponto' domaang-pina' ooampiarupeu' dutai.
Ta'niniauka' aa'pansing-koo, ‘Dii' nau'ka napo' ponto'dariaing.’

Doving piavomana' duparama eevumaunge. Dake tamung bakaang kara taaravepeu' ee'noko dake noru'earupeu' areketa pomaang ai' are'aape nanumang. Tee' nari', dake tasi'pearupeu' nantoong Tanuaang Meekung-eta ponto'arimana'.”
Nikodemasie aa'puu', “Arekee' tee' nkoarapeu'?”
Jiisuu'ke maku'uma aa'puu', “Arekee' dake aung noru'ea' otong bane pankainge, kake'ii-anta Isireeli-nupoong biikaange?
Masika' nauramaang, nii'ke tampa' noru'ampiritaa' karompimaung, ee'noko kapoo' ooampiritaa' minkuampimaunge. Ee'noko dii' aung niikaang kara taara-koo piaroriaung.
Dii'ke masika'antameriaung kapoo'koo kansi'koong-koo naurampiko arekee' masika'antameripeu' ninge kapoo' paning-kooning naurampiko?
Ee'noko nii'nung naning paning-koo nanuu'nung otoa', ning narung, ning Tee Naning-naumpo' Paning-eta mou'nung.
Tee' Moosesie boru' koopa'koong intampuu'na' tuuku-koo mee'bora' sirakamaa'koo tee' nari' nau'ka ning Tee Naning-naumpo' intamaavaing.
Kumponinge tee' nkoaraa'naang miru'uu'nung taung daare'uu'naang nantoong domaang isikung okovuriaing-koong, teing ookara ning masika'antamaavaining.” Jiisuu'ke tee'puu'.

Ee', Kumponinge nii' ookara kansi'nupoong aa'na' piaamurikotaa' tee Bauring narung masikung kirokai taura'puu'nung tee boo'paraa'naang nii' paku-koo; bera tee naning tee masika'antavuaing paa'aravauka'nung, teka domaang oparavaung oto'evuaing.
Kumponinge Bauring botovuu' domang-antanung deemparaa'naang, tuumpinung deea'.

Baa tee Kumponing Bauring masika'antavumaung tee kiimata nkavuauka'nung, ee'noko baa tee Kumponing Bauring masika'antavuaung tee kiimata-numpo', Kumponing Bauring narung masikung kirokai masika'antavuaruko.
Tee kiimata nka-koong okora'noo' ee': Araka a' kansi'koo poko nantoong kontevorou', mutaanang narung piavoroi biikaang orara-nko daka'koo.
Naning tee kapoo' orara nkovumaung bakei aa'na' piavoaung araka-koo ee'noko kupi'omaung araka-anko po'koo bakaning orara nko-nko sira'para'neeng-koo.
Ee'noko naning tee kapoo' masikung siompuitaa' nkoaramaung tee araka-anko pomaung, ookara kapoo' nkovuining sira'paraa'naang Kumponing dotu-anta-koo nkonii' deemparako.
Aung aa' tee teketa nii' bakaning barevare-nupoong tee Jiisuu' ninka nanampiru' Judia'nameng-koo. Nii'ning doong teke tee ninka o'noru' nantoong ntong-koo minkivurima meeka'antavurima.

Tenang napo' Joonie nantoong nii'ning ntong-koo minkivurima meeka'antavuriko' Iinong-a, Sielima'navuntu'koo due'ka, te' ntong mmau'po'noo' deemparako. Nantoong mmau' te' beroko' Joonie minkivurira meeka'anta-koo.
Tenang ee'nang mme' Jooni kiimatavarava'.
Ee'noko nii'ning Jooni bakaning barevare-nupoong-kooning tata'eeko' Ju'nupoong-koong narung pankaing ninka kiiroraa'anta aarumo meekung-koong.

Aung aa' tee, Jooni bakaning Jooni-anko berou' nauaava'naang. Aa'pau', “Nau-anta Pankaing, tee ee dake naning noru'emaang ntong-koo aveteka'koo otoresieeng Joo'dani-nari-koo tee ee'nara naning dake minkueu'nung? Tee ee'nara naninge enang nantoong ntong-koo minkivurima meeka'antavurimaang, ee'noko ookara tee-anko nanaamaang.”
Joonie maku'urima aa'puru', “Naning otoa' kapoo' oto'evupeu'nung Kumponinge avuaruko.
Dii'ke tero taaraveru' tee kara ninge minkuama aa'pantu'nung, ‘Ning tee Pako'pari'nii' tavo'aravaing-koong deea', teka Kumponinge botomuu' tee-koo ee'nara-koo uro'kanoo' nanama'naang.’

Nampeesi-koong paroro-koo, teni manikuma teni tee nampeesinara ba'aang. Ee'noko tee ba'maiko' tamung due'ke donkonui nempari taaravuma doturotuarapeu' tee nampeesinara karoko. Tee' ee'na' teing nantoong Jiisuu' ninka otoroko ooaransi nkaang doturotu dupenii' otoi otong.
Tee nau'ka pankaimparavaing ning oki'na'marako.”
Naning a'dei'keta pou'nung ookara-koo dau basi. Naning kansi'koo otoi tee kansi'nung ee'nara, kansi'kooning kapoo' minkuvumaung. Ee'noko tee naning paning-eta pou'nung ookara-koo deu basi.
Teie ee'narai naumurimaung oovuu'ning ee'noko taaravuu'ning. Nka nantoonge bakaang kara masika'antavaavaung.
Ee'noko naning tee bakaang kara masika'antavumaung tee ee'narai sira'pui aa'pumaung, “Kumponing bakaang kara bakei kara masikung.”
Tee ee'nara Kumponinge botovuu'nung Kumponing-koong kara koonto' taa'ni'poio' minkuvumaung, Tanuaang Meekung Kumponinge ootukuario' avuu'nung ninka.
Baumai Bauring piaavura ookara kapoo'nanka avuu' kompuu'naang.

Ee'noko naning Kumponing Bauring masika'antavumaung domaang oparavauka'nung oto'evumaung. Ee'noko naning tee Kumponinge Bauring bakaang kara taaravuaung domaang oparavauka'nung oto'evuauka'nung koonto'. Kumponing bakaang iira tora'puaing teie doong kante.
Ee'noko teinge Boto Keperuu'navitu˜ taaravau' Jiisuu'ke mmau' barevare-nupoong bokuvurima ntong-koo minkivurima meeka'antavuriko Jooni-koo dau basinoo'.
A'noo' Jiisuu'ke baka nantoong ntong-koo minkie meeka'antavuria'; nii'ke bakaninge barevare-nupoonge nainge deeko' minkiarampima meeka'antavarampiko'.
Teketa Jiisuu'ke tee kara taaravurai'nange Judia'nameng-eta toroaru' Kaaleli'aape.
Ee'noko maroita tevung taung-navunge Sameria'namenge tankinui-navunge siong-antamuru', nii'ke Ju'nupoonge baari'ampimanavunge.
Ee'noko Sameria'nameng-koo tumarira osi tavo'mariru' miring Saikaa'. Te' ee'noo' baru' isipo' deea' Jeekopi'ke bauring Josepa' avuu'nau-koo.
Te' ee'noo' Jeekopi' bakaang dinkung ntong-po'nung otoko'noo'. Ee'noko Jiisuu' nanu'koo takaa'ora te' ba'namparu' tee-anko dinkung-anko. Tenang ee'nang muung-aapenang.

Jiisuu' te' ba'nampari otoko nii' bakaning barevare-nupoong osi nanampiru' taamang moo'ampii'naang. Ee'noko tee, Jiisuu' sipampirio' nani Sameria'koonani te' ntong nke'koo dinkung-koo pou'. Ee'noko Jiisuu'ke aa'puu', “Ntong-koo ameai.”

Teketa Sameria'nanie aa'puu', “Da' Ju'koong, ee'noko ning Sameria'nani. Arekee' ning dake nia'memaang ntong-koo aroma'naang?” (Ju'nupoonge kompaavaung kapoo' Sameria'nupoonge taamanaama kompaamaing. Tee'koo tenie tee' minkuvuu'.)

Ee'noko Jiisuu'ke maku'uma aa'puu', “Ee baka', dake noru'ei dei Kumponing-nung bauta' ee'noko ning baa ee'nara nia'damaang ntong-koo, ning ee'nara nia'mepeu'. Nia'meko ninge arompeu' ntong domaang-po'nung.”
Ee'noko tenie manikumai maku'uma aa'puu', “Ee aung, nna' da' baakete oto'derua', ee'noko aung dinkung baru' isikung masikung. Arekee' nkavepeu' tee ntong domaang-po'nung?

Niikaakai Jeekopi'ke aung dinkung ntong-po'nung amuru'. Tee ee'nara ee'noko baurukaa' ee'noko bakaning boromaka' dovang sipisipi' ookara aru'koo naikau'. Emu' da' ee Jeekopi'koo dau basi tantaramaang?”
Jiisuu'ke kara maku'uma aa'puu', “Nantoong aung-koo dinkung-koonaru'koo naikaara napo' nukaa'oropeu'.

Nantoong teing ninge ntong avorompaining napo' nukaa'oroauka'nung. Teru' avorompainaru' teing-koo kuunge puunta-po'naru' deemparavaing ntong domaang-po'nung doong kante tavo'aramatoaina' teing-koo, domaang oparavauka'nung oto'evuriaina'.”
Ee'noko tenie manikumai maku'uma aa'puu', “Ee', ameaing tee ee'nara ntong. Ning tee' nari' oto'koo piamomaang, napo' ntong-koo nukaa'moauka', napo' kemu'kana' moauka'na' ntong nke'koo.”
Enang tee Jiisuu'ke botovuma aa'puu', “Bera da'ung bokuera a' poreaing.”
Tenie manikumai aa'puu', “A, ning aa' inung o'noai.” Jiisuu'ke maku'uma aa'puu', “Ee'. Daang deea'. Masika' minkuemaang tee' aa'pema, ‘Ning aa' inung o'noai.’
Da' pa'noko'ke nantoonge nantau'nani, ee'noko tee naning enang da' ninka otoresing da'ung masikung deea'. Masika' naumeing.”
Ee'noko tee, tenie aa'puu', “Ee aung, da' masika'dario' ninge nakaronung-pina' noru'damaang.
Niikakatauroi Sameria'nupoonge amii-koo Kumponing boontuaako', dootuu' nkoaama; ee'noko dii'ke Ju'nupoonge aa'perimaung, ‘Jerusalema' naro'ke Kumponing boontuampimaatoaing.’”
Jiisuu'ke aa'puu' teni manikuma, “Masika'antameaing, ee ani, batei tavo'aravaing amii-koo ee'noko Jerusalema'ke nantoonge Tee Niuma dootuu'aama boontuaavauka'nung.

Dii'ke Sameria'nupoonge baru' noru'eria' tee dootuu'erimaung. Nii'ke Ju'nupoonge tampa' noru'ampiri otong tee dootuu'ampimaung. Kumponinge tee Domang-antanung Ju-nupoong-koong tavo'araa'naang tampuu'nung-koo.
Tee batei pomaang, aung aa' otong, tenang Tee Niuma dootuu'arimainge masikenge tanuaang-aapena' domange aroo'ariri masika' dootuu'aavainang. Teing temurii'na' dootuu'nupoong Tee Niuma piavomaung.
Kumponing tee Tanuaang. Tee'koo Kumponinge maromurimaung tanuaang-aapena' dootuu'ampii'naang domaang-eta, aroo'mariri masika'.”
Manikumai aa'puu', “Ninge noru'ansi o'nong tee Kumponinge urikamu'keta Pako'pari'nii', Karistoo' tampaamaung poo'naang. Tee ee'nara pora ookara kapoo' naumuriaing.”
Jiisuu'ke maku'uma aa'puu', “Ning tee ee'nara da' ninka karompemaang.”

Ee'noko tenang ee'nang nii' bakaning barevare-nupoong toromarima bakei aa'na' ta'ninampiru' manikuma ninka minkuareko, nka nia'ampima aa'pampiaruu', “Aming piaromaang?” nii'na' “Aming-koo minkuraremang teni ninka?”
Ee'noko tenie manikumai tee utau te' sipura nanuu' osi-aape. Ee'noko osi-nupoong nauvurima aa'puru',
“Porira naning ooveriaing kapoo' ookara ninge tero nkoanko'ning naumuinung. Aung ee'nara dee'ma tee Pako'pari'nii'.”
Ee'noko teing osi-eta porou' Jiisuu'anko.
Tee aa' nkoario' nii'ke bakaninge barevare-nupoonge Jiisuu' aa'na' nia'ampiru' aa'pampima, “Nau-anta Pankaing, taamang-koo naikiaing.”
Jiisuu'ke kara maku'memurima aa'muru', “Ning nkaang taamang oto'memuing dii'ke noru'eria'.”
Ee'noko teketa nii' nii'ka niania' nia'meerima aa'meeriko', “Ai' nii'ninge aung taamang tavo'evainge?”
Jiisuu'ke aa'muru', “Ning-koo taamang baru' kapoo' masikung deea'. Nka tee Kumponing bakaang nko-nko kapoo' masikung. Teie botomuu'na' tampa' nkoansi dupeampaing.
“Dii'ke ee' minkuerimaung, ‘Keempampimanoo'keta karekuri kaara makosi tankinuko taamang nkavampipeu'.’ Nka dii'ke ooveriaing mintoonanka. Enang namu'ke petaa'oing, taamang kavu'noo' makotuing.

Nii'ke taamang nkavampima doturotumarimaung. Tee'pina' nantoong oosiarampimang domaang oparavauka'nung oto'evurii'naang, nii' sinang tanka-nupoong ee'noko taamang nka-nupoong naro'mariri doturotumariaina'.
Aung kara teinge minkuaamaung masikung, ‘Narunge keempuko nii'nunge taamang kavumaung.’
Ninge dii' botorampiring taamang nkaverii'naang mintoong-koo dii' pakurariaruu'nau-koo. Aung tee nii'ning mintoong-koo iri'opariring-koo dii' tamung kavu' narung-koo pakurarimang.”
Ee'noko mmau'ke Sameria'nupoonge temono-nupoonge Jiisuu' masika'antavau', tenie ee'nani manikumai tee' minkuvuma aa'puio', “Teie kapoo' ookara naumuing tero nkoanko'ning.”
Ee'noko teing Sameria'nupoong Jiisuu'anko porora aa'na' nia'au' te' otoroo'naang teing ninka. Ee'noko tee Jiisuu' temono-koo ke'munta doong otou'.
Ee'noko mmau'ke napo' masika'antavau' Jiisuu' bakaang-koo kara-koo.

Ee'noko teinge teni manikuma nauaama aa'pau', “Nii'ke enang masika'antavampiring tee-koo dake naumering-koo deea', tee nii'ke koonto' taaravampirai'nange. Tee ee'nara koonto' noru'ampiring tee Domang-antanung ookara kansi'nupoong.”
Ee'noko tee, ke'munta doong te' otorai'nange Jiisuu'ke temono sipura Kaaleli'aape napo' nanuu'.
Jiisuu'ke aa'puko', “Naning tee ning-pina' nakaronara bakanoo'nupoonge nainge deeko' masika'antavaavaung.”

Tee' nari' Jiisuu'ke bakanoo' osi Jerusalema' sipurai'nange Kaaleli'nameng-koo tumpario' tevora'nupoonge onkeonke'au'. Aming-koo, nna' teing ee'ning nanau' Jerusalema'aape Baari'koong Paroro naiaava'naang, ee'noko te' otoroitaa' ookara kapoo' Jiisuu'ke tenang nkovuu'ning ooau' paroro-koo meu'ke.

Ee'noko Jiisuu' napo' toroaru' Kana-namono-koo Kaaleli'nameng-koonoo', ntong uaini deeng-antavuu'noo'. Ee'noko tee daurarong bakanaving-koong narung pankaing te' otoko', bauring Kapaneume'namono-koo otoi siipavou'.
Ee'noko teie Jiisuu' Kaaleli'aape pou'nung Judia'keta taaravuu'. Taaravura tee, Jiisuu'anko bera, nia'uu' Kapaneume'aape nanuu'naang bauring taare-anta-koo, boo'ke due'uko.
Jiisuu'ke tee ee'nara aa'puu', “Dii'koo naning otoa' masika'antamepeu'nung tutung aa'na' iirakuta nko-nko oovuarura, taa'ni'anta ta'nimpaarii'nanka.”
Ee'noko tee daurarong bakanaving-koonunge aa'puu', “Ni'ninka poaing nnuring mme' boo'paravaruko.”
Jiisuu'ke maku'uma aa'puu', “Bera naniaing. Dauring domamparavaing.” Ee'noko teie naninge Jiisuu' bakaang kara masika'antavura nanuu'.
Ee'noko taunga toroarama bakaning-koong botovotonaa'nanka-koo nii'ning kune'uru'. Ee'noko teinge aa'pau', “Dauring domamparaa'naang.”
Ee'noko teie maku'urima aa'puru', “Arenang tee ee'nang nnuring tampatampa' dee'oinge?” Ee'noko teinge aa'pau', “Ke'maaki' mme' mutaanampuko uipaarii' boimpuieeng.”
Ee'noko baumai noru'uu' tenang ee'nang batei basiarako Jiisuu'ke nauvuma aa'puu'nung, “Dauring domamparavaing.” Tee'koo ee'narai ee'noko baurukaa'ke Jiisuu' masika'antavau'.
Ee'noko teketa tee Ju'nupoong biikaang paroro meekung nkoau'. Ee'noko Jiisuu' Jerusalema' nanuu'.

Ee'noko Jerusalema'koong karanaang sipisipi' duparimanoo'keta due'ke kankonaru' poonii'naru' otoko', pa'noko' bare pankeng koroai kaniau'ning ninka, ee'noko teru' miring Betesira tampaako' Ju' biikaang kara-koo.
Ee'noko nantoong mmau' siipa-po'nupoong teke teing-koo bare-koo nempariri otoroko', aa'noko mutuunanka, kaikuu'nanka, ee'noko dootananka, nempaama ntong eemaaru'araa'naang.
Koosinung˜ Kumponing-etaing namu'na' teru'koo bema ntong eemaaru'antavuko', ee'noko tenang tee ntong eemaaru'arako baa tee tutuna'nung teru'koo du'mumparama taarevoko', bane aremurii' siipa-po'nunge.
Ee'noko narung naning te' bempari otoko' beenaumo kivora-ita ˜beenaumo-taa [38] masiraani siipavou'nung.
Ee'noko Jiisuu'ke tee oovura noru'uu' tee naning pankaroong siipavou'nung, ee'noko aa'puu', “Da' ee taareroo'naang piaromaang?”
Ee'noko teie siipa-po'nunge kara maku'uma aa'puu', “Ning aa' naning oto'memuaung tee ntong eemaaru'arako si'mupeu'nung. Ning ninka te' nanu'koo paaramarako teka nii'nung divu'mui bemaung.”
Ee'noko Jiisuu'ke aa'puu' tee, “Daa'daravaing. Tani' poru'era naniaing.”
Ee'noko tee naning namu'ke taarevora bakaang tani' poru'ura beu'. Te'mung ee'na'mung Doong Uaana'mung.
Ee'noko Ju'koong ovontunge tee naning Jiisuu'ke tamparu'ntavuu'nung tautauaama, aa'pau', “E'mung Doong Uaana'mung; niikaang boto toto'pei tani' poru'dari nanimang.”
Ee'noko teie kara maku'uma aa'puu', “Teie naninge ning taare-antamuinge naumuma aa'muing, ‘Dakaang tani' nkavera naniai.’”
Ee'noko teinge nia'aama aa'pau', “Baa ee'nara tee naning da' botoruing tani' nkavei nanii'naang?”
Ee'noko teie naninge Jiisuu'ke taare-antavuu'nunge Jiisuu' miring noru'ua' Jiisuu' namu'ke tenkenuu'nung-koo, karika' baru' temono-koo otoroko.
Ee'noko dama'ke tee Jiisuu'ke dootuu'nava pankava-koo kune'ura aa'puu', “Ee aung, da' enang taareroing. Dakaang orara aarumo sipeaing kapoo' tee-koo siipa-koo dau basi tavo'ku'neeng da'koo.”
Ee'noko tee naning teketa tenkenura Ju'koong ovontung nauvurima aa'puru', “Tee aa' ning Jiisuu'ke tamparu'antamuing.”
Tee'koo ee'na'koo Ju'koong ovontunge Jiisuu' turang tutumpau' teie Doong Uaana'mung-koo naning taare-antavuio'.
Ee'noko Jiisuu'ke maku'urima aa'puru', “Mma' doong kante mintoompari otong, tee'koo ning napo' nau'ka mintoomari o'nong.

Tee' minkuvuio' Ju'koong ovontung bakei oraka' dee'orou'. Jiisuu' tavaava'naang enang bakei aa'na' mau'au' Jiisuu'ke Doong Uaana'mung-koong boto toto'puu'nung-koo, ee'noko teie Kumponing bauma masikung tampuu'nung-koo, tee' minkuvuma Kumponing-pina' basi tamparu'nung-koo.”

Jiisuu'ke teing kara maku'urima aa'puru', “Masika' naurampimang, ninge Bauringe kapoo' ninge ninka nkoampaung. Ninge Mma'ke nkovuko ooamana' nari' nkoamaung. Kapoo' Mma'ke nkovumaung ninge Bauringe nkoamaung.
Mma'ke ning Bauring piaamui ookara kapoo' nkovumaing naumumaung, ee'noko dama'ke kapoo' aung nkoansing-koo dau basi naumuko nkoama'naang dii' dooroi taruriaing.
Mma'ke boo'nuka daa'urima domang-antavurimana' tee' nari' ninge Bauringe domang-antavaramaung teing ning piamomaing.
Ee'noko Mma'ke nantoong-simpe' nkovua', tee ning-koo Bauring-koo sipuu'nung nantoong simpe'nko˜, ookarai ning Bauring daangang-koo, Mma' daangampaamana';
Nantoong ning daangamaavauka'ning tee Mma' daangampaavauka'nunge ning botomuu'nung.

“Masika' naurampimang, nantoong teing nkaang kara taaravaamaing, ee'noko teing masika'antavaamaing tee botomuu'nung domaang oparavauka'nung oto'evurimaing. Teing teing kiimatavuriauka'ning, tero boo'nameng-eta domaang-aape tankinaing-koo.
Masika' naurampimang, enang-eta deto tee boo'nukai nkaang kara taaramaavainang ning Kumponing Bauring. Ee'noko teing nkaang kara taaramaavaining domampariaing.
Mma' baka domaang okovenung otomana' ning Bauring domaang okovenung deeng-antamuu'.
Ee'noko Mma'ke ning bauring makosi-antamuu'nung nantoong simpe'koo ning Tee Naning-naumpo' Paning-etaing deemari o'noing-koo.
Ta'niniriauka' aung-koo: bateinang pomaang ookara boorou'ning dako'domanoo' otoromainge nkaang kara taaramaavainang.
Ee'noko taaramaarai'nange tavo'ariaing dako'doma-ita. Teing nantoong tampa' otoroko'ning daa'arampaing koonto' domamparii'naang, ee'noko teing oraka' otoroko'ning daa'arampainge kiimata nka-koo.”

“Kapoo' ninge ninka nkoamparupeu'. Ninge kara simpe'amaung Kumponinge narunge naumumana' nari'. Tee'koo ning to'biimari karomaung, ning ninka piamomana' nkoampa' tee ning botomuu'nung narung piavomana' nkoamaung-koo.
Ee'noko nkaang kapoo'koo ning ninka kara minkuamaung dei, tee kara minkuamaung makotua' masikung-pina' noru'koo.
Nka nii'nung naning otong nkaang kara puring-antavumaung, ee'noko ninge noru'ansi o'nong kapoo' teie minkuvumaung ning-koo masikung.
Dii' diikaning kara nka-nupoong Jooni-anko botovererio' teinge teing bakaang kara nauraaru'nung ning masika'anta-koong.
Nka ninge nantoong-koo naning bakaang kara-koo aroo'marava' otong. Teeo ninge Jooni bakaang karai noru' daa'antarampiring dii'ke masika'antamerira domantarii'naang.
Jooni daamu-pina' urumpari arakavarako dii' oki'noo' batei-koo siomperima doturariko'.

Teka ning kapoo' pakumui sira'antamumaung oto'memung aa'na' pankaing masikung Jooni-nung sirasira'koo dau basi. Teinge kapoo'ke Mma'ke botomuio' nkoamainge naururi otong sira'antavui ning tee Mma'ke botomuu'nung.
Ee'noko napo' Mma'ke ee'narai nkaang kara puring-antamemumaunge. Dii'ke bakaang kara teroita taaraveria', ee'noko bakaang oing ooveria'.
Ee', dii'koo bakaang kara otoa'. Tee'koo dii'ke ning masika'antameria' ning Kumponinge botomuu'nung.
Dii'ke doong kante Daari Meekung aa'na' pukeveri deeruerimaung ee' noru'erima, ‘Nii'ke domaang oparavaung okomuriaina';’
Nka teie ee'narai Daari Meekunge ning moaing-koong minkunaa naururiko aroo'eria' ning-anko po'koo domaang isikung oto'derurii'naang.
“Ning nantoonge pankaing-antamaava'naang piamoa', Kumponinge deeko' makosi.
Nka ninge dii' noru'dampiri otong, dii' diikaang domang-eta Kumponing-koo piaroria' bakei.
Ning Mma'ke botomuio' moio' dii'ke onkeonke'meria'; nka tee nii'nung bakamai' poko tee onkeonke'erikoo'.
Dii' Kumponing taaraveri dotu-anta-koo kasieria' dii'ka daangang-koo kei'dorima. Tee'koo ning masika'antameria'.
Ning Mma'ankoi tuumpi nkonara deea' tee' dii'ke noru'merimana'; teeo teie Moosesie dii' tuumpiruriaing, daang aroo'erimaunge.
Dii'ke Moosesi koonto' masika'antaveri dei ning masika'antameripeu', teie daarivuma ning naururu'nung-koo.
Ee'noko dii'ke Moosesi bakaang kara deerueri masika'antaveriaruma arekee' dii'ke nkaang kara masika'antameripeu'? Makotua'.”
Teketa nii'ning batei tankinuio' Jiisuu' toroarama Kaaleli'naru'koo pako'aru' nii'noo' miring Taiberiasi-naru'koo.
Ee'noko mmau' nantoonge siompau' taa'ni'antananka nkovuko ooaama. Siipananka unaa-antavuriko'.
Ee'noko Jiisuu' miinani-koo koinura ba'namparu' nii' bakaning barevare-nupoong ninka,
Paroro Baari'koong˜ Ju'nupoong biikaang due'ui otoko.
Ee'noko Jiisuu' oo'oopaavarama mmau' nantoong oovuru' tee-anko poroko. Oovurira Pilipi' aa'puu', “Are'ka taamang moo'ampipeu' aing nantoong bau'arampii'naang?”
Tamung tee'puu' Pilipi' paara-antavuma baka noru'uitaa' nkovuaina'.
Pilipi'ke kara maku'uma aa'puu', “Kenaanka kivora nopa'koo makotua' ainge nantoonge oki'noo'na' berete' naiaava'naang.”
Ee'noko nii'nunge bakaning barevare-nupoong-koonge, Aanduru'ke, Saimoni' Piita baara'ma'nunge aa'puu',
“Nemaka a' otong pa'noko' berete' oto'evuinung, ee'noko tavi'ning keura. Nka arekee' makotupeu' aing-koo ookara-koo?”

Jiisuu'ke aa'puru', “Ba'nang-antavereriaing ookara nantoong.” Te' otoroko'noo' karaasi' mmau'po'noo', ee'noko ookara nantoong te' ba'nampariru'. Teing-koong nantoong-koong donkaang deerunoo' pa'noko' kokorei'.
Jiisuu'ke berete' kompura Kumponing tampa' tampuu', ee'noko teing nantoong tankee'uru' ba'nampariru'ning. Ee'noko tavi' tee' siong-antavuu'. Ee'noko ookara taamanaara poovorou'.
Ee'noko teing poovoroio' Jiisuu'ke nii' bakaning barevare-nupoong aa'muru', “Tee ookara kakita'nanka oosieriaing, tamung kera'para'neeng oki'nairu.”
Ee'noko oosiampira peku' kivora-ita keveku'ka maanto'ampiru' kakita'nankai pa'noko' berete'koo taamanaama sipau'ning.
Ee'noko teinge nantoonge Jiisuu' bakaang taa'ni'anta ooaara aa'pau', “Aung ee'nara tee nakaronung masikung kansi'koo teroita poo'naang Kumponinge barevuu'nung.”
Jiisuu'ke noru'uu' teinge moo'aara daurarong˜ deeng-antavaava'naang mau'aako. Tee' minkuaako Jiisuu' tenkenura napo' baka mii-koo koinuu' teka kunsiaraa'naang.
Ee'noko muung-aapevuio' nii' bakaning barevare-nupoong ee'danto nanampiru' teru'koo.
Bakaasi-koo aa'emarira tankinampii'naang Kapaneume'aape toromarima. Ee'noko muumpuu' Jiisuu' mme' nii'anko poaruko.
Ee'noko napo' doving pankaing duparu', boo'a pankaing ninka.
Ee'noko tee nii' boo'emariru' beenaumo kivora daaku' daanga'pina'
Ee'noko amorompiko Jiisuu'ke aa'muru', “Aroreriauka'. Tee ning ee' nanamang.”
Tee' minkuvuio' nii' piamoru' nii'ke bakaasi-koo nkavampii'naang. Ee'noko tee namu'ke da'denga tee bakaasi te' basiaru' piamori nanampiko'noo'.

Teketa dauna'mung nantoonge karingai amenka'koo otoroko'ninge ooau' nareng bakaasi-nareng te' mme' otoko. Teinge ee' noru'au': Jiisuu' nanua' bakaning barevare-nupoong ninka, ai' teinge Jiisuu' sipaara tenkenaieeng.
Teketa bakaasinanka Taiberiasi-eta porora duumiau' te' karingai berete' naiau'noo' Ovoringe tampara minkuvuio'.
Ee'noko tee karika'ke ooaava' Jiisuu' te' otoaruko. Nii' bakaning oomaaria'. Enang tee nantoong bakaasinanka-koo aa'earira Kapaneume'aape toroariru' Jiisuu' besi'aama.
Teketa teinge Jiisuu' kune'au' teru'koo amenka'aape otoko ee'noko aa'pau', “Nau-anta Pankaing ee, da' arenang a' poing?”
Jiisuu'ke aa'puru', “Masikung naurampimang, dii'ke ning besi'merimang teie berete'ke poorurieeng-koo. Dii'ke besi'meria' nkaang taa'ni'anta tasi'peri masika'antamering-koo.

Iri' o'dariauka' taamang dera'omaung besi'koo. Teka kavi'eritaa' besi'eriai temurii' taamang domaang oparavauka'nung. Temurii' dera'oarupeu'. Tee taamang ninge, teie Naning-naumpo' Paning-etainge arompiaing, Mma'ke Kumponinge tee' nkoama'naang botomuu'nung-koo.”
Teinge nia'aama aa'pau', “Aming nkoampiainge Kumponing bakaang pia siompampii'naang?”
Jiisuu'ke maku'urima aa'puru', “Aung ee'nara tee nko-nko Kumponinge maroruri otoing: Tee naning botovuu'nung masika'antaveriaing.”
Teinge kara maku'aama aa'pau', “Arera taa'ni'anta nkoveaing nii'ke oorampira masika'anta-koo? Aming nkovee'naang?
Diikakatauroi paning-koong taamang naiau' mee'bora' sirakamaa'koo tee' ee'na' Daari Meekunge minkuvuma aa'pui otoina', ‘Kumponinge paning-eta taamang avuru' naiaava'naang.’”
Jiisuu'ke maku'urima aa'puru', “Masika' naurampimang, Moosesi deea' tee taamang paninung arurimaung. Mma' ee'nara tee, taamang masikung paning-etaing arurimaung.
Tee taamang Kumponinge arurimaung tee naning ee'nara paning-eta pora dii' kansi'nupoong domang-antaruriaing.”
Ee'noko teinge nia'aama aa'pau', “Ee aung pankaing, tee ee'nara temuriau taamang doong kante ameriaing.”
Jiisuu'ke aa'puru', “Nka ning ee'nara tee taamang domang-anta-koong. Naning tee ning-anko poaing peeravoauka'nung, ee'noko naning tee ning masika'antamuaing nukaa'oauka'nunge.
“Ninge tero naurampiring, aa'dampima, bane dii'ke oomerira masika'antameria'.
Ookara nantoong Mma'ke amuko ning-anko poromaing. Ninge bata'aramparupeu' ning-anko poroko.
Ning paning-eta simaru' teie botomuio' bakaang pia nkoama'naang, nkaang pia deea'.
Tee botomuu'nung bakaang pia aung: teing amuu'ning tare-koo, nii'nung paa'aravaroo'naang, ee'noko ookara daa'arampaing doong asi'noo'na'mung.
Tee Mma' piavomana' ee': ookara ning-koo Bauring-koo ookaama masika'antamaavaining domaang oparavaung nkavaavaing. Ee'noko ninge daa'arampaing doong asi'noo'na'mung.”
Teketa tee, teinge Ju'koong ovontunge makenge minkuminkuau', bakaang kara orara tampaama aa'puu'noo'koo, “Ning ee'nara taamang paning-eta pou'nung.”
Ee'noko aa'pau', “Aung naning Jiisuu', Josepa' bauring ai' baa? Nii'ke baumararing noru'arampiri otong. Arekee' paning-eta pou'nung tamparamaung?”
Jiisuu'ke maku'urima aa'puru', “Dii' oraka' minkuminkururariauka'.
Naning otoa' ning-anko baka popeu'nung, Mma'ke ning botomuu'nunge bokuvuaruko. Ee'noko boo'keta daa'antavampaing doong asi'noo'na'mung.
Teinge nakaro-nupoonge urikupoonge Daari Meekung-koo ee' daariau',
‘Ookara nantoong Kumponinge bare-antanii'nuka otoroi otoroaing.’
Ookara Mma' taaravaamaing ee'noko tee-koo noru' nkavaamaing ning-anko poroaing.
Nka naning Mma' oovuu'nung otoa'. Ninge Kumponing-ankoita mou'nunge narunge Mma' ooantu'.
“Masika' naurampimang, naning tee ning masika'antamuing domaang oparavaung oto'evung.
Ning tee taamang domang-anta.
Diikakatauroi nii'namurii' taamang mee'bora' sirakamaa'koo naiau'ning, teka teing boorou'.
Ee'noko tee aung taamang paning-eta pomaung naninge naivura booauka'nung.

Ning ee'nara domang-anta-koong taamang paning-eta mou'nung. Naninge aung taamang naivura doong kante domampari otomatoaing, ee'noko tee taamang arompiainung tee nkaang mono, ookara nantoong kansi'nupoong domang-anta-koo.”
Tee' minkuvuio' Ju'koong ovontung iiravoroitaa' bii'ka tata'eema aa'pau', “Arekee' bakaang mono amuripeu' nii'ke maa'koo?”
Jiisuu'ke aa'puru', “Masika' naurampimang, dii'ke ning Tee Naning-naumpo' Paning-etaing nkaang mono maa'meriarui dei, nkaang ereng naimeriarui dei, dii' domaang okoruriarupeu' dii'ka.
Naning tee nkaang mono maa'muaing, nkaang ereng naimuaing domaang oparavauka'nung oto'evuaing, ee'noko boo'keta daa'antavampaing doong asi'noo'na'mung.
Aming-koo, nkaang mono tee taamang masikung, nkaang ereng teie nainai masikung.
Baa tee nkaang mono maa'uaing ee'noko nkaang ereng naivuaing, ning-koo otoaing ee'noko ning tee-koo o'noai.
Mma'ke domampari otomaunge botomuio' ning domamari o'nomana' tee' nari' naning tee maa'muaing domamparavaing ning-koo.
Aung tee naurampiring taamang paning-eta pou'nung. Tee taamang-pina' deea' diikakatauroi naiaakotaa' boorou'nung-pina'. Naning tee aung taamang naivuaing doong kante domampari otomatoaing.”
Jiisuu'ke aung kara nauvuru' dootuu'nava-koo Kapaneume'navuntu'koo.
Aung aa' tee, mmau'ke bakaning barevare-nupoonge taaravaara aa'pau', “Tee kara aa'na' manki'. Baie aroo'upeu'?”
Ee'noko teing bakaning barevare-nupoong tee' minkuminkuruariko Jiisuu'ke baka noru'urai'nange aa'puru', “Aung kara minkuansing orara-pina' noru'erima tenkenirii'naang?
Ee'noko dii'ke ning Tee Naning-naumpo' Paning-etaing toromarako nkanoo' tero o'noko'noo' arekee' noru'dariaing?

Tee ee'nara Tanuaang Meekung domaang avu'koong. Naninge baka mono narunge Tanuaang Meekung otoaruko domaang masikung nkavuarupeu'. Nka aung kara ninge naurampiring dii'koo makosi tanuaang-koong domaang avu'koo.

Ee'noko dii'koo narionge masika'antameria'.” Jiisuu'ke tee' minkuvuu' tee tutuntoma-ita noru'uru'nung-koo, aa'ning: teing masika'antavaavauka'ning ee'noko tee naning tooka kompui sivuainung tavaava'naang.
Ee'noko Jiisuu'ke napo' aa'puru'nung, “Tee'koo ee'na'koo naurampiring naning ning-anko poarupeu' Mma'ke makosi-antavuaruko.”
Teketa emu' tee' minkuvuio' bakaning barevare-nupoong-koo mmau' toroariru', siong-koo kasiaavarura.
Ee'noko Jiisuu'ke nii' bakaning nanai'keta kenaanka aa'muru', “Ee'noko dii' arekee', si'merii'naang?”
Saimoni' Piitai aa'puu', “Ovoring ee, baa-anko nanampipeu'? Da' narung oto'derung kara domaang oparavauka'nung-koong.
Ee'noko nii'ke enang tasi'dampira masika'antarampiring, da' Kumponing-etaing Naning Meekung.”
Jiisuu'ke aa'puru', “Bane ninge marorampiru' nkaning deentarii'naang, teka dii'koong narung ma'naang.”
Tee'puma Judasi minkuvuko'nung, Saimoni' Kerio'nung bauring. Tee, bane Jiisuu' bakaning nanai'keta kenaanka-koonunge, nka tee Jiisuu' kare-nupoong-koo sivuainung.
Teketa tee dama'ke Jiisuu' Kaaleli'namenge nanuko'nung. Judia'namenge nanu'koo piavoaruu' Ju'koong ovontunge te' otoroko'ninge tavaava'naang piavoroko.
Ju'nupoong biikaang Paroro Bare-koo Oto'koong due'uio' Jiisuu' baara'mainkaange aa'pau', “Ameng sipera Judia'nameng-koo naniaing dakaning barevare-nupoonge dakaang nko-nko ooaavaina' nkovemaung.
Naning kapoo' nkovumaing ookarai oo-koo piavoi baku'uarupeu'. Tee'koo aing kapoo' ookara nkovemaung deeko' sirapo' si'daravaing ookarai ooraara masika'antaraavaina'.”
Teinge bane baara'mainkaange masika' antavaava' tee'pau'.
Ee'noko Jiisuu'ke teing aa'puru', “Nkaang doong mme' makotua'. Ookara doonanka dii'koo makosi. Kapoo' otoa' dii' avo'duripeu'nung.
Kansi'nupoonge dii' munte'koo makosi deea', nka ning munte'maamaung doong kante ninge biikaang aarumo orara sira'pamaung-koo.
Berira naniriaing paroro-koo. Ning mme' nanamparoo'naang tee-koo paroro-koo, ai' ning nkaang doong mme' makotua'.”
Ee'noko tee' nauvurirai'nange tee, Kaaleli'nameng-koo teke otou'.
Teketa baara'mainkaang paroro-koo ureai beroio' Jiisuu'ke dama'keta sira'parava' baku'aritaa' siompuru'.
Ee'noko Ju'koong ovontunge besi'aako' tee-koo paroro-koo, aa'paama, “Tee are' otong?”
Ee'noko tee karika' iaampeema nii'ninge aa'paako', “Tee naning tampara.” Ee'noko nii'ninge aa'paako', “A, teie nantoong tosivurima orari-antavurimaung.”
Nka baru' sirapo'ke minkuaavaruko' avoreaitaa' biikaang ovontung-koo.
Ee'noko paroro-koo navaro opario' Jiisuu' dootuu'nava pankava-koo kuung tumparara kara nau tutumpuru'.
Ee'noko Ju'koong ovontung ta'ninaama aa'pau', “Keei. Aung naning sikuru'aravaruu'nunge arekee' kapoo' avutevu' noru'ui otong?”
Jiisuu'ke aa'puru', “Ninge kara naurampimaung ning ninka nkaang deea', Kumponing-eta pomaung, ning botomuu'nung-eta.
Teinge Kumponing bakaang pia nko-koo okovuriainge ning nkaang kara tasi'paavaing Kumponing-etaing deeko' nii'noo' tamung nkaang noru'keta karomaung deeko'.
Naning baka bakaang noru'keta karomaung baka daangang piavoma, ee'noko naning tee botovuu'nung bakaang miring pankaing deemparaa'naang piavomaung tee, tee naning koonto', daang minkuvuaung.
Moosesie ee boto aruria'? Ee'noko dii'koo narung otoa' doma tee boto siompumaung. Aming-koo dii'ke dupisi'merii'naang piarorimang?”
Ee'noko karingai maku'aama aa'pau', “Da' ma'naang orara-po'nung. Baie da' taruu'naang tantumang?”
Jiisuu'ke maku'urima aa'puru', “Ninge narung nko-nko pankaing nkoanko ta'niniru'.

Moosesie naururu' diurukaa'koong dopa' napu'erii'naang. Tee ee'nara aarumo Moosesie koonto' tutumpua', dii' diikakatauroi tutumpau'nung, ee'noko tooto' donkaani-koong dopa' toto'perimaung bane Uaana'mung.
Dii'ke tooto'nung dopa' napu'erimaung Doong Uaana'mung Moosesi-nung boto siomperitaa'. Enang aming-koo dii' iirarorimaang ninge naning mono ookutunung taare-antavansio' Doong Uaana'mung-koo?
Tamung daunaa'keta tuumpimeriauka'. Tampa' mataueri aarumo simpe'eriai.”
Nii'ninge Jerusalema'nupoonge aa'pau', “Ee', masika', aung tee ee'nara naning tavaava'naang mau'aamang, ape'?
Ooveriaing, aung ee'nara tee sirapo'ke karoko naninge karavua'. Niikaning pankainankai pa tee Kumponinge Pako'pari'nii' tasi'pai otong, ai' arekee'?
Nka tee Pako'pari'nii' poaina'mung naninge noru'uauka'nung areketa poainge, ee'noko nii'ke noru'ampiri otong aung pou'noo'.”

Teketa Jiisuu'ke dootuu'nava pankava-koo kara nauvurima aa'na' karoma aa'puu', “Ee', dii'ke noru'meri otong, ee'noko mou'noo' noru'eri otong. Ning a' ninka moa'. Nka tee ning botomuu'nung tee masikung dii'ke noru'eria'.
Teka ninge noru'ansi o'nong tee, teie botomuio' ning tee-ankoita mou'nung.”
Ee'noko teinge tee moo'koo kariaama moo'aavaruko'. Naninge tanka' pante'ua' tee-koo, bakaang batei mme' makotuaruko.

Ee'noko karingai nantoonge tee masika'antavaama aa'paako', “Tee Kumponinge uripo'keta Pako'pari'nii' nii' domamuri taremuriainoo'koo porai'nange arekee' taa'ni'anta nkovuaing aung naning bakaang-koo dau basinoo'? Makotua'.”
Karingai tee' minkuminkuaako teinge Boto Keperuu'navitue taaravau'. Taaravaara tee teinge ee'noko piristi'koong ovontunankai nii'ning Piatooronanka botoaaru' Jiisuu' moo'aava'naang.
Jiisuu'ke aa'puru', “Ning dii' ninka oki'noo' mme' o'noriaing, teketa napo' toromaravaing ning botomuu'nung-anko.
Dii'ke ning besi'meriaing ee'noko oomeriauka'nung, ai' ning o'noainoo' dii' beriarupeu'.”

Ju'koong ovontunge bii'ka kareaama aa'pau', “Are' nanuko nii'ke ooampiauka'nunge? Ai' Kiriki'nupoong biikanameensi'aape nanuu'naang nii'koong nii'ning ninka otoroo'naang, ee'noko teing akopo'nupoong Kiriki'nupoong kara nauvurii'naang dee'ma.
Teie aa'muring, ‘Dii'ke ning besi'meriaing ee'noko oomeriauka'nung.’ Ee'noko napo' aa'muri, ‘Dii' beriarupeu' ning o'noainoo'.’ Tee miru'noo' aming tee' minkuvuing?”
Paroro-koong asirana'mung bakei aa'na' meeka'na'mung. Te'mung ee'na'mung Jiisuu'ke donkonura aa'na' karoma aa'puru', “Dii'koong naning tee nukaa'doma ning-anko pora naikiaing.
Daari Meekung-koo daariari otoina' aa'pumana',
‘Naning tee ning masika'antamumaung ntonari domaang-po'nari tunsi-eta koo'uaing.’”

Jiisuu'ke tee' minkuvuu' Tanuaang Meekung minkuvuma. Tee ee'nara Tanuaang Meekung teinge Jiisuu' masika'antavaako'ninge due'ka nkavaava'naang. Te'mung ee'na'mung tee' minkuvuko Kumponinge Tanuaang Meekung avuria', Jiisuu' meenasi-koo mme' daa'aravaruko.
Jiisuu'ke tee'puio' mmau' nantoonge karika'ke otoroko'ninge taaravaara aa'pau', “Aung naning masika' tee ee'nara nakaronung Kumponing-etaing.”
Ee'noko napo' nii'narionge aa'pau', “A, tee Pako'pari'nii' Kaaleli'keta poauka'nung.
Daari Meekunge ee' minkuvumaang: Tee Pako'pari'nii' Deevita' bakanamuiaang-koo tavo'kuaing, ee'noko Beeteleema'navuntu'koo ponto'aravaing, te' ee'noo' osi Deevita' otoko'navuntu'koo.”
Teketa tee, ookara teing nantoong paroro-koo poru'ning pokapoka'ariru' Jiisuu'nung minkunaa tata'eema.
Nii'ninge moo'aara dai'aava'naang piavorou', nka naninge birenge kompua'.
Teketa tee Piatooronuka toroariru' piristi'koong ovontung-anko Boto Keperuu'navitu-anko. Toroariko nia'aarima aa'paaru', “Aming-koo dii'ke tee bokueri poria'?”
Ee'noko piatooronukai kara maku'aarima aa'paaru', “Naning tee' karoaung tee karomana'.”
Ee'noko teinge Boto Keperuu'nukai maku'aarima aa'paaru', “Dii' ee napo' teie papaara-antarurining?
Nii' nantoong pankainanka-koo ee'noko Boto Keperuu'navitu-koo naninge baitoaring tee-koo? Otoa'.
Teka aing karika' Moosesi-nung boto noru'aava' Jiisuu' siompaama barakosi'nii' otorong.”
Nikodemasi teing-koong narung otoko, tee ee'nara tero Jiisuu' beero'uu'nung. Enang teie aa'puru',
“Niikaange botoi taura'muria' naning boo'koo tang-koo tutung kara bakaang taaravampia' ee'noko noru'ampia' aming kapoo' nkovuing.”
Ee'noko teinge maku'aama aa'pau', “Ekee, da' doma Kaaleli'nung! Daari Meekung tampa' deerueaing noru'eaina' nakaro-nupoong poroaung Kaaleli'keta.”
Teketa ookara biikanoo' tenkenau', ee'noko Jiisuu' iu'koo nanuu' Olive'po'namii-koo.
Ee'noko maatanang tero mme' tane'puko Jiisuu' napo' Olive'po'namii-eta dootuu'nava pankava-koo toroaru'.
Ee'noko mmau' karinga tee-anko oosiaririo' tee ba'namparara kara nau tutumpuru'.

Enang tee boto naunuka ee'noko Boto Keperuu'navitue nani manikuma tavo'au' tee-anko. Teinge teni nampeesi orarivuio' ooaarai'nange tavo'au'. Ee'noko teinge teni donkong-antavau' uro'kanoo' teing-koo ookara-koo.
Ee'noko teinge aa'pau' Jiisuu', “Nau-anta, ani nampeesi orarivuio' ooampiring.
Moosesi-nung Boto-koong daarie ee' minkuvumaang,
‘Nani tee' nkoaravainani kapange tavampiainang booaing.’
Ee'noko dake arekee' minkuemaang?”
Aavavaama tee'pau', tuumpiaavainoo' dau'paava'naang, teka Jiisuu' kinkinuitaa' kansi'koo daarikuko' tanka'ke.
Donkonai mmau' niania' nia'aako', ee'noko nia'aamatoko Jiisuu' kinkinuu'noo'keta koomparara aa'puru', “Dii'koong naninge tero orara aarumo nkovuaruu'nunge tutuna'nare'ke kapanare'ke ani too'puai.”
Tee' minkuvurai'nange napo' kinkinura kansi'koo daarikuko'.
Ee'noko biikang domang tee' too'purio' tee tenkenau' teing-koo pankeu'ke tutumpaara naruna' naruna'. Ee'noko Jiisuu' narung sipau', ee'noko teni manikuma te' donkonuio'.
Ee'noko Jiisuu'ke napo' koomparara aa'puu', “Ee ani, teing are'ke berong? Naning ee otoa' da' tuutunantuing?”
Tenie aa'puu', “Ee', pankaing, otoa'.” Jiisuu'ke aa'puu', “Nna' ninge da' tuutunantamparoo'naang. Bera naniaing. Ee'noko napo' orara aarumo nkoveauka'.”
Jiisuu'ke napo' aa'puru', “Ning tee araka ookara kansi'koo. Naning tee ning siomuaing mutaananoo'ke nanuauka'nung, domaang isikung kompuinge ookara otooto' siraka'antavuio'.”
Boto Keperuu'nukai aa'pau', “Da' daka minkuema tantaramaang, tee'koo nau'ka masika'antarampiauka'nung.”

Jiisuu'ke maku'urima aa'puru', “A, bane ninge ninka kara minkuama tammaramaunge, kapoo' minkuamaung masikung. Aming-koo, nna' ninge noru'ansi o'nong ning mou'noo' ee'noko ning memaatomanoo'. Dii'ke ning noru'meria' mou'noo' ee'noko are' ning memaatomanoo'.
Dii'ke ning simpe'merima kansi'koong aarumo narung siomperimaung. Ninge naning simpe'ampa' o'nong.
Nka ninge simpe'dampiri dei nkaang kara masikung deemparapeu'. Ning ninka o'noi nkoampa', tee'koo Mma', ning botomuu'nung ni'ninka otomaung-koo.
Diikaang boto-koo ee' otong,
‘Kenaankarai nari' karorema kara sira'pureko noru'eripeu' tee tee masikung kara.’
Ninge ninka kara minkuama tammaramaung ee'noko napo' Mma'ke botomuu'nunge kara tee' napo' siong-antamemumaunge.”
Teinge aa'pau', “Dauma are' otong?” Ee'noko Jiisuu'ke maku'urima aa'puru', “Dii'ke aa' ning noru'meria', Mma' noru'eria'. Dii'ke ning noru'meri dei, Mma' napo' noru'eripeu'.”
Jiisuu'ke aung kara ookara dootuu'nava pankava-koo nauvuru' mooni' bauta'koong sipaako'navaro-koo. Ee'noko naninge Jiisuu' kiimata-nava-koo sipuaruu' bakaang bateinang mme' makotuaruko.
Teketa Jiisuu'ke napo' aa'puru', “Ning nanampaing ee'noko nananko dii'ke ning besi'meriaing, ee'noko dii' dooriaing diikaning oreng aarumo ninka. Dii' naniriarupeu' ning nanamatomanoo'.”
Ju'koong ovontunge aa'pau', “Aunge aa'pumaang, ‘Dii' naniriarupeu' ning nanampainoo'.’ Kara-koong miru'noo' ee' oro': tee baka tavaraa'naang dee'ma.”
Jiisuu'ke kara maku'urima aa'puru', “Dii' paning-koo boong-nupoong ee'noko ning paning-nung. Dii' kansi'nupoong ee'noko ning kansi'nung deea'.
Tee'koo naurampiring dii' diikaning oreng aarumo ninka dooriaing. Ee', masika', dii'ke ning ee'nara naning tammaramaung masika'antameriarura deeko' dii' oreng aarumo ninka dooriaing.”
Teinge nia'aama aa'pau', “Naumeriaing, da' teing-koo pankenuka poroaining-koo Daari Meekunge minkuvurimaing-koo baa ee'nung?”

Ninge amutemurii' kapoo' minkuamira diikaang orara aarumo sira'pampeu'. Nka tee naning ning botomuu'nung bakaang aarumo bakei koonto' masikung, orara aarumo otoaunge. Teie naumumana' nari' minkuamaung.”
Jiisuu'ke Bauma-koong kara minkuvuko noru'aavaruio' teie napo' aa'puru',

“Dii'ke ning Tee Naning-naumpo' Paning-etaing intamerirai'nange dii'ke noru'meriaing ning ee'nara baa. Tenang dii'ke noru'meriaing ninge kapoo' nkoampaung maroita, ninge kapoo' minkuamaing Mma'ke naumumaing naing.
Ee'noko tee botomuu'nung ni'ninka nari' o'noremaung. Ning si'muaung ninka, ninge doong kante kapoo'nanka dotu-antavumaung nkoamaing-koo.”
Ee'noko tee' minkuvuko mmau'ke Jiisuu' masika'antavau'.
Ee'noko Jiisuu'ke teing Ju'nupoong masika'antavau'ning aa'puru', “Dii' nkaang kara nari' pinka'erimatoaing deeko' dii' nkaning barevare-nupoong masikeng otoriaing.
Ee'noko Kumponing bakaang kara masika'pari otoina' noru'eriko teie karai masikai simpiri'antaruriaing dai'dariri otorimanoo'keta.”

Teinge maku'aama aa'pau', “Nii' teing Eebaraami' ba'dompenku. Naninge teroita dai'murira bakaning botovoto-koo-nupoong deeng-antamuriaruko'. Enang arekee' tee' minkumerimang dai'mariri o'norimanoo'keta simpiri'antamarii'naang?”
Jiisuu'ke aa'puru', “Masika' naurampimang, nantoong teing oreng aarumo nkoaamaing botovotonaa'nupoong ee'ning, orara aarumoi dai'uri botovurimaing.
Naning botovotonaa' tee tamung tankinumaung, teka teing osikaiaang biurukaa' teing te' nari' otoroi otoromaing.
Tee'koo ninge Pankaing Bauringe botovoto-koong otooto'keta simpiri'antarampiaing deeko', bakei tampa' simpiri'dariri otoriaing!
Ninge dii' noru'dampiri o'nong dii' Eebaraami' ba'dompenku, ee'noko dii' ning tavu'koo piarorimaung nkaang kara taaraveriaruma.
Ninge kara minkuamaung Mma'ke naumumana', ee'noko dii'ke nkoverimaung diumai naururimana'.”
Teinge maku'aama aa'pau', “Niuma Eebaraami'.” Jiisuu'ke maku'urima aa'puru', “A, dii' masika' Eebaraami' baurukaa' dei tee' nari' nkovuko'na' nkoveripeu'.
Eebaraami'ke temurii' kapoo' nkovuaruu'.
Dii'ke tee kapoo' diumai nkovuko'na' nkoverimang.”
Ee'noko teinge maku'aama aa'pau', “Nii' aa' auning-koonanka deea'. Nii'ke Niuma narung otong. Kumponing ee'nara.”
Jiisuu'ke aa'puru', “Kumponing diuma masikung dei dii'ke ning navumeripeu', ning aa' Kumponing-ankoita mou'nung-koo. Ning maroita ninka moa', teie botomuu'nung.
Arekee' dii'ke noru'eria' otong kapoo' minkuamaa'nomaung? Dii'ke kara naurampimaung koonto' taara-koo piaroria'.

Dii' koonto' Sietani' baurukaa' ee'noko tee diuma, ee'noko diuma piavomana' siong-koo piarorimaung. Tutuntoma-ita dupisi' nkovuko'. Kara masikung siompuaung. Kara masikung-koo oki'noo' okovuaunge. Tee tosi-bauko, ookara tosi-koo okora'. Bakaang aarumo narung siompuma tosi nkovumaung.
Kara masikung naurampimang, tee'koo dii'ke masika'antameria' o'nong.
Dii'koo baie ninge orara aarumo nkoantu'nung minkuvupeu'? Ee'noko ninge masika' naurampiko dii'ke aming-koo ning masika'antameria' o'nong?
Naning Kumponing-eta pou'nung Kumponing bakaang kara taaravumaung, ee'noko dii' Kumponing-ankoita poria'. Tee'koo dii'ke ning taarameria'.”
Teketa Ju'koong ovontunge karai maku'au' Jiisuu'. Aa'pau', “Bakei tampa' minkuampiring, da' Sameria'nung, ee'noko da' ma'naang-po'nung.”
Jiisuu'ke maku'urima aa'puru', “A, ning ma'naang o'noaung. Ninge Mma' daangampamaung ee'noko dii'ke ning daang-antamerimaung.
Ninge daangang ninka-koo besi'ampa', teeo Mma'ke tee' nkovumaung ninge daangang kong-koo, ee'noko teie simpe'muriaing.
Masika' naurampimang, naning tee nkaang kara siompumaung booauka'nung.”

Ju'koong ovontunge Jiisuu' aa'pau', “Enang koonto' noru'dampiring da' ma'naang-po'nung. Eebaraami' boo'paru', ee'noko Kumponing bakaning nakaro-nupoong boo'pariru'nunge, ee'noko aa'merimang, ‘Naning ning nkaang kara taaravuaing booauka'nung.’
Niuma Eebaraami' boo'paru', ai' Eebaraami'koo dau basi tantaramaunge ee? Ee'noko nakaro-nupoong boorou'. Ee'noko baa tantaramaung?”

Jiisuu'ke maku'urima aa'puru', “Ning ninka daangamari dei, nkaang daangang tamunsi'nung. Tee daangamumaung Mma'ke ee'narai, nkaang meenasi naururima. Tee ee'nara dii'ke diikaang Kumponing tamperimaung.

Dii'ke teroita noru'eriaruu', ee'noko ninge noru'ansi o'nong. Ee'noko ninge aa'pamira, ‘Ninge noru'ampa',’ ning tosimarapeu' dii'pina'. Nka masika' ninge tee noru'ansi o'nong, ee'noko bakaang kara siompamaunge.
Diuma Eebaraami' dotuaru' nkaang doong oovuu'naang noru'uitaa'. Teie oovuu' ee'noko oovurai'nange doturotuaru'.”
Ee'noko Ju'koong ovontunge Jiisuu' aa'pau'. “Da' mme' pa'noko' kivora masiraani oto'derua', arekee' Eebaraami', teronung masikung ooveu' ee?”
Jiisuu'ke maku'urima aa'puru', “Masika' naurampimang, tero Eebaraami' mme' ponto'aravaruko ning o'noi o'nomaung
Tee' minkuvuio' tee kapananka ukuau' tee too'paava'naang, teka Jiisuu' baku'arara tenkenuu' dootuu'nava pankava-ita.
Aung aa' tee, Jiisuu'ke nanuma naning oovuu' duta mutuu ponto'aru'nung.
Nii'ke bakaninge barevare-nupoonge nia'ampima aa'pampiru', “Nau-anta Pankaing ee, baie orara aarumo nkovuio' aung duta mutuu ponto'aru'nunge? Baka ai' baumararinge?”
Jiisuu'ke maku'murima aa'muru', “Bakaang mutuu bakaang aarumo-koong deea'; baumararing beekaang aarumo-koong deea'. Tee mutuu otomaung Kumponinge bakaang iri' sira'antavuu'naang tee-koo naning-koo.
Nii'ke nau'ka ning botomuu'nung bakaang nko-nko nkoampiaing doong tankinuaruko. Muumurii'naang. Naning mintoomparavarupeu' muunganang.
Ning kansi'koo o'noi ning kansi'nupoong araka-antanung.”
Tee' minkuvurai'nange Jiisuu' kansi'koo tutupaa'kura tutupaa'ke meto' nkovura duta sisi'uu', ee'noko aa'puu',
“Bera duu'daravaing poonaru'koo Siloam tampampimanaru'koo.” Aung Siloam miru'noo' “Boto-nisi”. Ee'noko tee naning nanurai'nange duu'parara ookuitaa' toroaru'.
Ee'noko ba'marange ee'noko teinge tero tee ooaako'ninge ba'nampari mooni' eentavuriko, aa'pau', “Aung ee tee deea' ba'nampari mooni' eentamuriko'nung?”
Narionge aa'pau', “Ee', tee ee'nara.” Nii'ninge aa'pau', “A, tee deea'. Tee tee-pina' oro'.” Ee'noko tee baka aa'puru', “Ning ee'nara.”
Aa'pau', “Nka dakaang duta arekee' banteing?”

Teie maku'urima aa'puru', “Teie naninge miring Jiisuu'ke meto' nkovura nkaang duta-koo si'muing. Si'mura naumuma aa'muing, ‘Siloam-aape nanira duu'daravaing.’ Ee'noko nanamira duu'marara namu'ke ookansing.”
Ee'noko teinge nia'aama aa'pau', “Are' otong tee ee'nara?” Ee'noko teie maku'urima aa'puru', “Noru'ampaung.”
Tee'puriko tee, teinge nkavau' Boto Keperuu'navitu-anko tee naning.
Te'mung ee'na'mung Jiisuu'ke meto' nkovura naning mutuu oo-antavuu'na'mung Doong Uaana'mung.

Ee'noko teing Boto Keperuu'nukai napo' tee tana'aama aa'pau', “Arekee' nkorura tamparu'antaruinge?” Ee'noko teie nauvurima aa'puru', “Teie aa' kansi'koong meto' nkovura duta-koo si'muio' oing duu'marara tampa' ookansing.”

Ee'noko Boto Keperuu'navitu-koonarioonge aa'pau', “Tee naning temurii' nkovuinung Kumponing-etaing deea', ai' Doong Uaana'mung tampa' tarevua' tee' nkovuing.” Ee'noko nii'narionge aa'pau', “Arekee' orara aarumo nkovumaunge temurii' taa'ni'anta iirakuta nkovupeu'?” Ee'noko teie karai pokapoka'antavuru'.
Teketa tee Boto Keperuu'nukai napo' nia'aama aa'pau', “Teie oo-antaruing deentarako nia'dampimang: Dake tee are'pepeu'?” Teie aa'puru', “Tee aa' nakaronung.”
Nka tee, tee naning enang ookuu'nung tero naning mutuu ponto'aru'nung Ju'koong ovontunge masika'antavaavaruko' bera baumararing bokuaaretu'.
Ee'noko teinge aa'paaretu', “Aung ee dee'ke deuring? Aung ee tee duta mutuu ponto'aru'nung tamperemaung? Nka arekee' nkoarara enang ookuing?”
Baumararinge maku'urema aa'puretu', “Nee'ke noru'ampesi otong tee neuring ee'nara duta mutuu ponto'aru'nung.
Ee'noko nee'ke noru'ampea' arekee' nkoarara enang ookuinge. Ee'noko napo' noru'ampea' baie duta oo-antavuinge. Teie baka naururipeu', tee matarama.”
Baumararinge tee' minkuvuretu' tero ee' mau'aario': Naninge Jiisuu' tee Pako'pari'nii' tampuaing deeko' bata'aavaing dootuu'nava-ita.
Tee'koo ee'na'koo tee' baumararinge aa'puretu', “Nia'eriaing, baka naururipeu', tee matarama.”

Ee'noko napo' kemu'kana' bokuaara tee ee'nara naning mutuu ponto'aru'nung aa'pau', “Bameriaing Kumponinge taararuio' kara masikung narung naumeriaing. Nii'ke noru'ampiri otong tee naning orara aarumo nkovumaung.”
Ee'noko teie naninge maku'urima aa'puru', “Tee orara aarumo nkovumaung ai' tampara, ning noru'ampa'. Narung kapoo' noru'ansi o'nong, ning tero mutuu ee'noko enang ning tampa' ookamaang.”
Teinge nia'aama aa'pau', “Aming kapoo' nkovuinge da'koo? Arekee' dakaang duta oo-antaruinge?”
Teie maku'urima aa'puru', “Tero naurampiko ee'noko dii'ke ee taarameria'? Aming-koo napo' taara-koo piarorimang? Ai' dii' bakaning barevare-nupoong deentarii'naang piarorimang?”
Teinge barakosi'aama aa'pau', “Da' ee'nara bakaning-koong. Nii' teing Moosesi bakaning barevare-nupoong.
Nii'ke noru'ampiri otong Kumponinge Moosesi karavuko'na', ee'noko aung naning noru'ampia' are' pou'noo'.”
Ee'noko teie naninge maku'urima aa'puru', “Akokamurii' kara minkuering doma. Dii'ke noru'eria' areketa pou', nka ee'narai ning tamparu'antamuing duta.
Nii'ke noru'ampiri otong Kumponinge orara aarumo nkoaamaing taaravuriaung, ee'noko teing nantoong masika'antavaamaing ee'noko marovurimana' nkoaamaing taaravurimaung.
Kansi' pupu'aru'noo'keta minkunaa otoa' naning duta mutuu ponto'aru'nung oo-antavuu'nung-koong.
Aung naning Kumponing-eta poarui dei kapoo' nkovuarupeu' bakei.”
Teinge kara maku'aama aa'pau', “Dii'daang orara aarumo-koo kuunge otori oraka' ponto'daru'nung da'. Arekee' nii' tautau-koo piaromaang?” Ee'noko dootuu'nava pankava-ita bata'au'.
Jiisuu'ke tee taaravura dootuu'nava-ita bata'aio' besi'uu', ee'noko besi'ukotaa' oovura aa'puu', “Dake ee tee Naning-naumpo' Paning-etaing masika'antavemang?”
Ee'noko teie aa'puu', “Ee pankaing, naumeaing masika'antavampaina'.”
Jiisuu'ke aa'puu', “Tee aa' dake tero ooveing ee'noko tee ee'nara naning enang kareremaang.”
Teie naninge maku'uma aa'puu', “Ovoring ee, masika'antaransing.” Tee'pura kinkinuu' Jiisuu'anko, pankaing-antavuma.
Jiisuu'ke aa'puu', “Ning kansi'koo ee' simpe'koo mou'nung: mutuunanka bantang-anta-koo ee'noko teing banteai otoroining tamparimaing kaputu'anta-koo.”
Tee'puio' enang Boto Keperuu'navitu-koo-narionge Jiisuu' ninka otoroko'ninge taaravaara nia'aama aa'pau', “Dake arekee' minkuemaang? Nii' mutuunanka ee?”
Jiisuu'ke maku'urima aa'puru', “Dii' mutuu sira'rariri tantariko dei tuumpi dii'koo otoarupeu'. Nka ee'noko ‘Nii' ookirining!’ tantariko enang tuumpi dii'koo mme' otong.”
“Masika' naurampimang, naning tee karanaange tumparavarura sipisipi' biikaang-koo parang-koo nii'noo'ke tumparapeu'nung tee ee'nara naning bakisipung, tatusi' bauko.
Ee'noko tee naning tee karanaange tumparamaung parang-koo sipisipi' biikaang-koo tee ee'nara sipisipi' okovenung.

Ee'noko okovenung poko teie naninge karanaang tarevumaunge ku'nung bere'evumaung. Ee'noko sipisipi'nankai okovenung bakaang kara tasi'paamaung bakaning bokuvuriko sipisipi'koong mirinanka, barampurima dama'du-aape.
Ee'noko dama'du sipurima teing-koo uro'ke nanumaung. Ee'noko bakaninge sipisipi'ke siompaamaung, bakaang kara tasi'pai.
Nii'nung naning teinge siompaavarupeu'. Nii'nung-ankoita koo'aripeu' bakaang kara tasi'paavarura.”
Jiisuu'ke aung kara mirumiru' nauvuru' Boto Keperuu'nuka, ee'noko teinge noru'aavaruu' tee kapoo' minkuvuko'nung.
Tee'koo napo' Jiisuu'ke nauvurima aa'puru', “Masika' naurampimang, ning ee'nara karanaang sipisipi' biikaang parang-koong.
Ookara tero porou'ning karanaang tamparima bakisipunanka ee'noko tatusi' baukonanka. Sipisipi'nankai taaravaariaruko' teing.
Nka tee, ning ee'nara karanaang parang-koong. Baa tee ning-anko pora tumparavainung domang moo'aravaing. Napo' teie tumparama ee'noko siarama taamang oovumatoaing.
Bakisipunanka poromaung bakiaa'aarii'naang, tavaarii'naang, kera'paarii'naang. Ee'noko ning mou'nung domaang oto'evurii'naang, domaang tampa' otoi-oto'ke maanto'nisi.
Ning tampara tarenara. Tampara tarenara bakaning-koo sipisipi'koo boo'parapeu'nung makosi.

Ee'noko tee naning moo' nka-koo tanata nkovumaung tampara tarenara deea' ee'noko sipisipi' okovenung deea'. Teie nkau poko oovuma sipisipi' sipurima koo'aramaung. Ee'noko nkau poma sipisipi'nanka tavuriko purarinka'arimaung.
Naning moo'koo tanata nkovumaung koo'aramaung moo'koo narung-koo tanatavumaung deemparama. Sipisipi'nanka-koo tara'oaunge.
Ning tee tampara tarenara;
Mma'ke tasi'mui o'noina' ee'noko ninge Mma' tasi'pansi o'nong, tee' nari' ninge tasi'paransi o'nong nkaning sipisipi'nanka ee'noko teinge tasi'mai o'nong. Teing-koo ning moompaing makosi.
Ee'noko nii'ning sipisipi' oto'memung aung-koo parang-koo kuung otoroaing. Teing siomparamira bokuaranko naro' otoroi nkaang kara taaramaako ning biikaang tarenara narung o'noai.
“Ning Mma'ke ning piaamumaung tee ninge nakaang domaang sipampaing-koo; ee'noko napo' nkavampai.

Nantoonge nkaang domaang pari'maavauka'nung. Ninge ninka maroita sipampaing. Ning iri' oto'memung nkaang domaang sipampeu'nung-koo, ee'noko napo' iri' oto'memung ninge napo' domaang nkavampeu'nung-koo. Mma'ke tee' nko-koo botomuu'.”
Aung aa' tee napo' Ju'koong ovontung pokapoka'ariru' teing kara taaravaara.
Mmau'ke teing-koo narionge aa'paako', “Aung-koo ma'naang orara otong. Kanu'aramang. Taaraveriauka'nung.”
Ee'noko napo' nii'narionge napo' aa'paako', “Naning ma'naang orara-po'nung tee' karoarupeu'. Ee'noko naning ma'naang orara-po'nunge arekee' naning duta mutuu tamparu'antavupeu'?”
Nii'na'mung Jerusalema'navuntu'koo doong meekung tavo'kuu', te'mung ee'na'mung dootuu'nava pankava bere'au'na'mung-koong paroro nkoaako'na'mung. Tenang kamaari bakanang.
Te'mung ee'na'mung Jiisuu' nanu'nanuu' dootuu'nava pankava-koo bansing-navaro-koo miring Solomoni'navaro-koo.
Ee'noko Ju'koong ovontunge teka koroai aa'pau', “Dake nii' are' basinoo' papaara-antamerii'naang? Koonto' sira'dari naumeriaing. Da' ee tee Domang-anta Pako'pari'nii' tavo'aravaing-koong?”
Jiisuu'ke maku'urima aa'puru', “Tero naurampiru', teka dii'ke ning masika'antameria'. Teing nko-nkonanka Mma'ke botomuio' nkoamaa'nomaing teing taa'ni'antananka ning-koo.
Dii' nkaning sipisipi'nanka deea', tee'koo dii'ke ning masika'antameriaung.
Nkaninge sipisipi'nankai nkaang kara taaravaamaung, ninge noru'aransi o'nong, ee'noko teinge ning siomaamaung.
Domaang oparavauka'nung avoromaung, ee'noko teing booroauka'nunge, ee'noko naninge tatusi'uriauka'nunge nkaang bireng-eta.
Mma'ke ookara-koo dau basie teing amuu'. Naninge tatusi'uriarupeu' Mma'keta, bakaang bireng-eta.
Mma' ee'noko ning narung.”
Ee'noko Ju'koong ovontunge napo' kapang ukuau' tee too'paava'naang.
Teka Jiisuu'ke aa'puru', “Dii'ke oomerio' nko-nkonanka tamparananka nkoamaung Mma'ke pakumuio'. Teing-koo orara arera nkoansing-koo kapange too'merii'naang piarorimang?”

Ju'koong ovontunge napo' Jiisuu' maku'aama aa'pau', “Nii'ke da' kapang na'nang-koo piamoria' dakaang nko-nko tampara-koo, nka dake Kumponing akapeu'emaung-koo, da' tamunsi'nung naning daka Kumponing tantaramaung-koo.”
Jiisuu'ke maku'urima aa'puru', “Tee aa' diikaang-koo boto-koo nane'koo ee' daariari otong, Kumponinge tero-nupoong-kooning pankainuka aa'puru',
‘Dii' teing kumponinanka.’

Tee kara tee Daari Meekung-koong, dii'ke tonta'koo makosi deea'. Ee'noko teie teing bakaang kara taaravaama pare'aako'ning kumponinanka tang-koo makosi deeko' ning tee Baumai meeka'antamura a' kansi'koo moo'naang botomuu'nung dau basina' makosi tee miring nka-koo;
Tee'koo arekee'koo ninge Kumponing akapeu'amaa'nomaung tammerimaunge ning Kumponing Bauring tammarako?
Makosi, masika'antameriauka'nung ninge Mma' bakaang nko-nko nkoamparuko dei.

Nka bane dii'ke nau-antarampiko tamung masika'antameriaung, teing nko-nkonanka nkoamaing Kumponing bakaning tasi'peri masika'antaveriaing, koonto' noru'meriaina' Mma' ning-koo otong ee'noko ning Mma'koo o'nong.”
Ee'noko teketa napo' Ju'koong ovontunge moo'aava'naang mau'au', teka teing divu'uri tenkenuu'.
Ee'noko Jiisuu' napo' toroaru' Joo'dani-nari tankimpui Joonie tero nantoong ntong-koo minkivurima meeka'antavuriko'noo'aape. Ee'noko Jiisuu' te' otou'.
Mmau' nantoong tee-anko poroma aa'pau', “Joonie ta'nimpaarii'na' taa'ni'anta nkovuaruu', teka ookara kapoo' aung naning-koo minkuvuu'nung kara masikung.”
Ee'noko mmau' nantoonge te' otoroko'ninge Jiisuu' masika'antavau'.
Nii'na'mung tee, naning Lasarusi tampaako'nung, Beetani-navuntu'koo otoko'nung siipavou'. Te' ee'noo' Beetani Maaria-namainta otoreko'noo' Maata'.
Teni ee'nani Meeri' Jiisuu'koo tampa' nuuraa' kau'koo duuni dakovuu'nani ee'noko napo' dapoi piu'uu' aa'nani. Lasarusi teni ba'mari siipavou'nung.
Ee'noko ba'mari-kaarai Jiisuu'anko kara nanu'antavurema aa'puretu', “Ovoring, tee da'maiko' siipavomang.”

Jiisuu'ke taaravurai'nange aa'puru', “Lasarusi siipavomang, nka booauka'nung. Siipa tavo'aringe Kumponing-nung meenasi tavo'antavuu'naang. Ee'noko aung siipa kompui Kumponinge ning Bauring meenasi amuu'naang.”
Maata'namaia' ee'noko Lasarusi Jiisuu'ke aa'na' piaavuriko'.
Ee'noko Lasarusi siipavoko Jiisuu'ke taaravura tamung ke'munta doong otou'.
Ke'munta doong tankinuio' tee, teie nii' bakaning barevare-nupoong aa'muru', “Meriaing; nanampiaing; Judia'nameng-aape toromariaing.”
Ee'noko nii'ke bakaning barevare-nupoonge maku'ampima aa'pampiru', “Nau-anta Pankaing ee, te'mung Ju'koong ovontunge da' daping kapange too'daieeng. Arekee' mau'emaang te'aape tororaraa'naang?”
Jiisuu'ke aa'muru', “Tee batei narung doong-koong nii'koo siraka'pari otong. Nantoong doonganang nanaama pu'ariaung arakai kansi'koonge siraka'pui otoko.
Teka muunga deeko' nanaama pu'aripeu', aming-koo, nna' tee araka otoa'.”
Jiisuu'ke tee'pura napo' aa'muru', “Niikaang naning Lasarusi aatui otong, nka nanamira daa'ampaing.”
Ee'noko nii'ke bakaninge aa'pampiru', “Ovoring, tee aatura tampa' dee'oo'naang.”
Nka Jiisuu'ke Lasarusi boo'paru'nung naumuriko nii'ke noru'ampia', tamung aatuu'nung pina' minkuvuko tampampima.
Teketa tee tenang Jiisuu'ke koonto' naumurima aa'muru', “Lasarusi aa' boo'paring.
Nka tee ninka o'norearuing-koo dotumaring dii'ke masika'antamerii'naang noru'amira. Aia', tee-anko nanamping.”
Toomasi, nii'noo' miring Pauroong tampampimaunge, nii' ba'marang aa'muru', “Aia' meriaing Nau-anta ninka, nii' ookara tee ninka nari' moompiaina'.”
Ee'noko Jiisuu'ke pora oovuu' Lasarusi karenaumo doong kuvi dako'domanoo' otoio'.
Beetani-namono Jerusalema'keta narung kokorei' daanga'pina' basinoo'.
Ee'noko mmau' Ju'nupoong poroko' Maata'namainta Meeri' dunsirunsi-antavaarema˜ bee'mari boo'paru'nung-koo.
Ee'noko Maata'ke Jiisuu' poko'nung taaravurai'nange taung nanuu' kune'uu'naang, ee'noko Meeri' pava-koo otoko.
Maata'ke aa'puu' Jiisuu', “Ovoring, da' a' otoieeng dei mmari booarupeu'.
Nka ninge noru'ansi o'nong Kumponinge arupeu' kapoo' nia'epeu'nung.”
Jiisuu'ke aa'puu', “Da'mari domamparaa'naang.”
Tenie maku'uma aa'puu', “Noru'ansi o'nong tee daa'aravaing doong asi'noo'na'mung.”
Jiisuu'ke teni aa'puu', “Ning aa' naning boo'keta daa'nunge, domang-antai. Baa tee ning masika'antamumaung domamparavaing bane boo'paravainge.
Ee'noko baa tee domampari ning masika'antamumaung boo'paravauka'nung. Dake ee masika'antavemang aung?”
Tenie aa'puu', “Ee', ee Ovoring, masika'antavamang da' tee Karistoo', Kumponing Bauring, tee Kumponinge teroita Pako'pari'nii' a' kansi'koo pora nii' domamuriaing-koo.”
Ee'noko tee' minkuvura Maata' baara'ma'naang-anko Meeri'anko toroarara baka aa'puu', “Nau-anta anka' otong, da' nia'dumaang.”
Ee'noko Meeri'ke tee kara taaravurai'nange daa'arara kua'pari nanuu' kune'uu'naang.
Jiisuu' mme' tavo'aravaruko osi, te' Maata'ke kune'uu'noo' naro' otoko.

Ee'noko nii'ning Ju'nupoong teva-koo kuung otoroko'nung Meeri' ninka teni dunsirunsi-antavaama. Teketa teni iri'narung daa'arara tenkenuko siompau', ee' noru'aama, “Teni dee'ma kuvi dako'doma-aape nanumang teke biromparaa'naang.”
Ee'noko Meeri' tavo'aru' Jiisuu' otoko'noo'. Ee'noko tenie oovurai'nange kau'kanoo' dua'aru' aa'puma, “Ovoring, da' otoieeng dei mmari boo'paravarupeu'.”
Ee'noko Jiisuu'ke teni biromparako oovura ee'noko Ju'nupoong teni ninka porou'ning birompariko oovurira bakaang domang aa'na' orarunsie manki'ou'.
Ee'noko Jiisuu'ke nia'urima, aa'puru', “Are' dako'erieenge?” Ee'noko teinge bokuaama aa'pau', “Ovoring, pora ooveaing.”
Ee'noko Jiisuu' biromparu'.
Ee'noko Ju'nupoonge aa'pau', “Ooveriaing aa'na' piaavumana'.”
Ee'noko nii'ninge aa'pau', “Teie tee temu' naning duta mutuu tamparu'antavuu', ape'? Arekee' a'mung Lasarusi boo'paravaroo'naang kapoo' nkovuaruiee?”
Napo' aa'na' oraka' dee'oitaa' Jiisuu' nanuu' kuvi dako'doma-aape. Tee kuvi kapange da'pau'nung.
Jiisuu'ke botovurima aa'puru', “Tee kapang diiri'eriai.”
Ee'noko Maata'ke, tee naning boo'paru'nung ba'marie aa'puu', “Ee Ovoring, oraka' ka'mi'mori'neeng. Tee karenang doong tankinuieeng boo'pario'.”
Jiisuu'ke aa'puu', “Ninge nauransing da' ning masika'antameaing deeko' Kumponing bakaang meenasi ooveaing. Ai' da' ampa'doinge?”
Ee'noko tee boia' diiri'au' kuvi dako'doma karanaang-eta. Diiri'aio' Jiisuu'ke ankamparara aa'puu', “Mma' ee, tampara tantamang dake nkaang eenta taaramemaung-koo.
Ninge noru'ansi o'nong dake doong kante taaramemaung. Ninge tee' nauransing nantoonge taaramaara masika'antamaava'naang dake botomeu'nung ning.”
Ee'noko tee' minkuvurai'nange aa'na' bokuma aa'puu', “Lasarusi, sirapo' poai!”
Ee'noko tee boo'paru'nung sirapo' pou' bakaang bireng ee'noko kau' dai'aritaa'nange baaronge, bakaang oing baaronge dai'aritaa'. Ee'noko Jiisuu'ke botovurima aa'puru', “Dapa'eriaing nanuaina'.”
Mmau' Ju'nupoong Meeri' siompau'ning Jiisuu'ke kapoo' nkovuu'nung ooaarai'nange masika'antavau'.
Ee'noko narionge Boto Keperuu'navitu-anko toroarirai'nange nauaaru' kapoo' Jiisuu'ke nkovuu'nung.

Teketa tee, taaravaarai'nange Boto Keperuu'navitue ee'noko piristi'nuka-koo ovontunankai koompaara'navitu ninka mumunsinang nkoaama aa'pau', “Arekee' nkoampii'naang? Aung naning baru' mmau' taa'ni'anta nkovumaatoing.
Nii'ke tamung ooampiaing deeko' aung mmau'ke daurarong˜pina' masika'antavaara Rooma'nupoong bei'bei'aariko teinge nii' ookara piniraaku'maariaing dootuu'nava pankava nari' pesi'aama.”
Narunge naninge miring Kaiapasie Piristi'koo Ovoring deempari otoko'nunge aa'puru', “Dii'ke kapoo' noru'eria'.
Dii'ke ee tasi'peria' otong tampa'na' tee' naning narung boi dei nii' ookara domang moo'maripeu'.”
Nka teie baka tee' minkuvua', tee Piristi'koong Ovoring deemparitaa' tee' tarampeearu' Jiisuu' boo'paraa'naang nii'koo Ju'nupoong-koo.
Ee'noko nii' naing-koo deea', ookara Kumponing baurukaa' amutemuu'keta oosimurii'naang narung mono-pina' o'norii'naang.
Te'mung-eta tutumpau' Jiisuu' tavaava'naang mumunsi-koo.

Ee'noko tee'koo Jiisuu' baru' sirapo'ke nanuaruko' Judia'nameng-koo. Teketa tenkenurai'nange nii'noo' osi nanuu' miring Eparaim, mee'bora' sirakamaa'koo due'. Ee'noko te' o'noriko' nii' bakaning barevare-nupoong ninka.
Tenang Ju'nupoong biikaang Paroro Baari'koong˜ due'uu'nang. Mmau' nantoong avuntevuntu'keta Jerusalema'aape nanaako' neriarima kiiroraa'antavaria'naang tee-koo paroro-koo makosina'.
Ee'noko teinge Jiisuu' besi'aako' teke, ee'noko dootuu'nava pankava-koo oosiarima nia'eema aa'peeko', “Dake arekee' noru'emaang? Tee paroro-koo pa poaroo'naang dee'ma.”

Tero piristi'koong ovontunge ee'noko Boto Keperuu'navitue boto nauaarima aa'paaru', “Naninge tee Jiisuu' otomanoo' noru'urai'nange teie nau'ka naumuriaing, teinge Jiisuu' moo'aara kiimata-nava-koo sipaava'naang.”
Teketa tee, ˜na'mung-taa doong otoko Taamang Baari'koong˜ nkoaava'naang Jiisuu' Beetani-namono-aape nanuu'. Temono ee'namono Lasarusi bakanamono, tee Jiisuu'ke tero daa'antavuu'nung bakanamono.
Jiisuu' te' poio' taamang pankaing nkoau'. Maata'ke Jiisuu' ee'noko teing tee oo-koo porou'ning bau'uru', ee'noko Lasarusi Jiisuu' ninka ba'namparesio'.

Ee'noko Meeri'ke mou-koong-pina' ntong-pina' basi duuni nkavui pou', tampa' nuuraa' naru', naarada' narunge nkonii', moo' pankaing-koonaru'. Ee'noko Jiisuu'koong-koo kau'koo koo'uu' ee'noko bakaange dapoi napo' kau' piu'uu'. Ee'noko teie tampa' nuuraa'ke teva nari' nuuraa'aru'.
Ee'noko nii'koong Jiisuu' bakaning barevare-nupoong-koonarunge, Judasi Kerio'nunge, teie Jiisuu' dama'ke kare-nupoong-koo sivuainunge aa'puu',
“Aming-koo anie aru' duuninaru' tampa' nuuraa'naru' kera'puing? Baavevura dei beenaumo daaku' namikuri nkavupeu' ee'noko ata'oi'nuka pakuvuripeu'.”
Teie ata'oi'nanka-koo tara'oa', tamung tee' minkuvuu' tee baka bakisipung deemparama, teie mooni' sipaako'nara' bakura kompui bakiaa'uriko'noo'koo.
Ee'noko Jiisuu'ke aa'puu', “Teni sipeai. Aung tee ning dako'maavaina'mung-koo makosi kore'memuu'nung, tee' nkovuing.
Dii' ata'oi'nuka ninka doong kante otorimaung ee'noko ning doong kante dii' ninka o'noriauka'nung.”

Ee'noko Ju'nupoong karika'ke taaravau' Jiisuu' Beetani-navuntu'koo otoko'nung. Ee'noko te' nanau', Jiisuu' narung oo-koo deea', napo' tee Lasarusi oo-koo berou', tee Jiisuu'ke boo'keta daa'antavuu'nung.
Tee'koo piristi'koong ovontunankai matauau' Lasarusi tavaava'naang, tee Lasarusi ooaarai'nange mmau' Ju'nupoonge biikaning pankainanka sipaaru'nung-koo, Jiisuu' masika'antavaama.
Teketa dauna'mung tee karika'ke taaravau' Baari'koong Paroro-koo poroko'ninge Jiisuu' Jerusalema'aape poo'naang.

Taaravaara uurung tovang nkavai osi-eta tenkenau' kune'aava'naang. Ee'noko euravaama bokiaama aa'pau', “Biraanke! Biraanke-po'nung tee aung Kumponing bakaang miring-koo pomaang; aung tee daurarong nii' Isireeli-nupoong niikaang!”
Jiisuu'ke doonkii'navoro' nkavura, doonkii'koo dau ba'nanui nanuko, tee' Daari Meekunge minkuvumana', aa'pumana',
“Aroreriauka' dii' Saioni-nupoong, diikaang daurarong dii'anko pomaang doonkii'nu kampianu-koo dau ba'nanui.”

Nii'ke bakaning barevare-nupoonge tasi'pampiaruko' tee kapoo' nkoaru'nung. Jiisuu' daa'aru'nang bakaang meenasi ninka deeko' nii'koo sira'paru' tee Daari Meekunge tutung minkuvuu'nung tee' nkoaraa'naang ee'noko tee' nari' nkoaru' Jiisuu'koo.
Teing karinga Jiisuu'ke bokuma Lasarusi boo'pario' kuvi dako'au'noo'keta domang-antavuio' ooau'ninge dooreaaru'.
Teing ookara Jerusalema' porou'ning ta'ninai taaravaara berora onkeonke'au', Jiisuu' tee' taa'ni'poi poko.
Ee'noko tee' nari' dooreai otoroko teinge Boto Keperuu'navitue bii'ka kareaama aa'pau', “Ooveriaing, nii'ke matauampimana' nkoarava' otong. Ookara nantoonge tee narung siompaamang.”
Ee'noko teing-kooninge dootuu'arii'naang ee'deto Jerusalema'aape nanaako'ninge nii'ning Kiriki' otoroko' tenang paroro nkoaako'na'mung.
Ee'noko teing Pilipi'anko porou'. Pilipi' Besaida-namono-nung, Kaaleli'nameng-koonoo'nung. Ee'noko teinge aa'pau', “Ee pankaing, nii' Jiisuu' ooampii'naang piamorimang.”
Ee'noko Pilipi' Aanduru'anko nanura nauvuu', ee'noko tenaanka Jiisuu'anko nanureta nauvuretu'.
Jiisuu'ke maku'urema aa'puretu', “Tee bateinang enang tavo'aring Kumponinge meenasi pankaing amuainang ning tee Naning-naumpo' Paning-etaing.
Masika' naurampemang sinang-koo, uite'nu˜ nau kansi'koo dua'aravarura ee'noko booarura, teu nau deempari otopeu', nka boora deeko' mmau' sinang tavo'antavupeu'.

Tee tee' nari' baa tee naning bakaang domaang baka kirokaiaramaung bakaang domaang tee paa'aravaing, teketa baa tee naning anke kansi'koo otoi bakaang domaang si'koo taura'pari otoing tee bakaang domaang pinka'aravaing. Teie tee domaang oparavaung kompuaing.

Baa tee naning nkaang pakupakunung deemparaa'naang piavora deeko' ning siomuaing. Tee'koo nkaning pakupaku-nupoong ni'ninka o'noriaing ning o'noainoo'. Mma'ke daangampuainge naning tee ning-koo pakunara deemparavaing.”

Jiisuu'ke aa'puu', “Nkaang domang oraka' dee'moing. Aming minkuampainge? Ee' pa minkuama'naang, ‘Mma', aung bateinang ning-anko poauka' poteveaing?’ Nka tee' deea'. Ning mou'nung enang-koong sisikeera tora'pama'naang.
Ee Mma', nerantaravai dakaang miring pankaing-antararavaina'.” Tee' minkuvuko narung aurong paning-eta karoma aa'puu', “Ning neramari o'noma'noing, ee'noko napo' tee' nkomaraa'naang.”
Teinge karingai te' donkonaako'ninge tee kara taaravaara aa'pau', “Kurunkurung-pina' taaravampiring.” Ee'noko nii'ninge aa'pau', “Tee aa' koosinung˜ tee-anko karoing.”
Ee'noko Jiisuu'ke aa'puru', “Aung kara ninge taaravama'naang karoa', dii'ke taaraverii'naang.
Enang bateinang tenang Kumponinge ookara kansi'nupoong koosinang nkovuma koompuriainang. Enang ee'nang Kumponinge teing kansi'nupoong biikaang pankaing turampura bata'uaing.
Nantoonge ning taakamaara kansi'keta intamaako ookara nantoong baramparampaing ning-anko.”
Tee' minkuvuma nauvuru' aremurii' boo' tora'puu'naang otoing.

Ee'noko teinge karingai maku'aama aa'pau', “Niikaang boto-koo dariraarie ee' naumurimaung: tee Pako'pari'nii' doong kante otoaing. Arekee' dake enang minkuepeu' da' nau'ka enang intantaavaing? Da' aming-koo ‘Tee Naning-naumpo' Paning-etaing’ tantaramaung”?

Jiisuu'ke maku'urima aa'puru', “Ning dii' ninka okioki'noo' o'noritaa' araka-antarampimaang. Ninge mme' araka-antarampirio' ooveritaa' otoriaing mutaananturi'neeng. Aming-koo, nna' naning tee mutaananoo' otomaung noru'uaung are'aape nanumang.
Tee'koo ninge araka-antarampirio' masika'antameriaing mme' taaramerima, dii' sirapo'nupoong deentariaina'.” Ee'noko Jiisuu'ke tee' minkuvura baka nanuu' baku'aritaa'.
Bane aing ookara taa'ni'anta nkovuko ookara-koo dutakanoo'ke, nka masika'antavaavaruko'.
Tee' teronunge nakaronunge Aisaia'ke Daari Meekung-koo daarivuu'na' masika' deemparu', aa'puu'na',
“Ovoring ee, kapoo' nkoaravaing-koong karantamemaung˜ nantoonge masika'antavaavauka', ee'noko dakaang tanka'ke iirakutai dupe-antaveko ooaara tasi'koo makosiaavauka' bakei!”
Tee' ee'na' teinge masika'antavaavaruko'nung. Aisaia'ke temurii' aarumo-koo napo' minkuvuu'nunge, aa'puu',
“Kumponinge biikaang duta mutuu-antavurira biikaang domang iveka'antavuru' aa'no'neeng-koo: dutai ooaama domange tasi'paara ning-koo toroariko ninge tamparu'antavarami'neeng-koo.”
Aisaia'ke tee kara minkuvuu'nung Jiisuu' bakaang meenasi oovurai'nange. Tee'koo tee' minkuvuu' Jiisuu'koo.
Tenang ee'nang mmau' Ju'koong Ovontung Jiisuu' masika'antavaako', ee'noko Boto Keperuu'navitu-koo avoreaama sirapo'ke minkuaavaruko' tevitue dootuu'nava-ita bata'aari'neeng-koo.
Nantoonge daangang-koo piavoroma, Kumponinge daangang-koo piavoroa'.
Jiisuu'ke aa'na' karoma aa'puru', “Baa tee ning masika'antamumaunge ning narung masika'antamuaung, teie tee ning botomuu'nung nari' masika'antavumaunge.
Baa tee ning oomumaung tee ning botomuu'nung napo' oovumaunge.
Ning kansi'koo mou' araka-pina'. Ee'noko ookara nantoong ning masika'antamaamaing mutaanang-koo otoroauka'nunge.
Baa tee nkaang kara taaravuma masika'antavuaung ninge tuumpiampauka'nung. Ning mou'nung tuumpiaramparoo'naang, teka domang-antavarama'naang.
Baa tee ning tonta'mumaung ee'noko nkaang kara masika'antavuaung, tee naning bakaang tuutunang˜ oto'evung-tee kara ninge minkuansing bakaang tuutunang-nko otoaing te'mung doong asi'noo'na'mung.
Tee'koo ee'na'koo ninge ninka tamung minkuampa', teie Mma'ke ning botomuu'nunge moo'naang napo' botomuu' naurampii'naang tee' naurampirina'.
Ee'noko noru'ansi o'nong bakaang botoi domaang oparavauka'nung tavo'umaung. Ninge kapoo' minkuamaung tee ee'naa Mma'ke naumuu'nung minkuamaung.”

Aung aa' tee enang kore'noo'na'mung Baari'koong˜ Paroro-koo. Jiisuu'ke noru'uu' bakaang doong makotuio' aung-eta kansi'keta tenkenuainoo' Bauma-anko nanuu'naang. Teie kansi'koo otoitaa' bakaning doong kante piaavuriko' bera bou'na'mung-koo basinoo'.
Ee'noko Jiisuu' nii' bakaning barevare-nupoong ninka taamang-koo ba'namariru'. Ee'noko Sietani'ke Judasi Kerio'nung, Saimoni' bauring, tero maamu-antavuu' Jiisuu' sivuu'naang kare-nupoong-koo.
Jiisuu'ke koonto' noru'uu' Baumai iirakuta ookara kapoo'koo makosina' avuu'nung, ee'noko noru'uu' Kumponing-eta pou'nung, ee'noko napo' Kumponing-anko toroaraa'naang.
Ee'noko tee, Jiisuu'ke taamang banto'nii' sipura daa'aru', ee'noko bakaang mononopa' kiru'arara tauro meu'ke kapeto tokoaru'.
Ee'noko ntong diisi-koo koo'urai'nange nii' niikaang kau' duu' tutumuru'. Ee'noko napo' teie tauroi tokoaru'nunge piu'muru'.
Ee'noko tee Jiisuu' Saimoni' Piita-anko basiarako Piitai aa'puu', “Ovoring, nkaang ee kau' duu'mee'naang?”
Ee'noko Jiisuu'ke maku'uma aa'puu', “Dake enang kapoo' noru'ea' nkoamaa'nomaung. Dama'ke noru'eaing.”
Ee'noko Piitai aa'puu', “Dake nkaang kau' koonto' duu'meauka'nung.” Ee'noko Jiisuu'ke maku'uma aa'puu', “Da' ninge duu'damparuko deeko' nkaning-koong barevare-nupoong-koong deentaravauka'nung.”
Ee'noko Saimoni' Piitai aa'puu', “Ovoring, nkaang kau' narung duu'meauka'nung, bireng duu'meainge; bore' duu'meainge.”
Jiisuu'ke aa'puu', “Naning tee mono duu'parinung ookara mono kiiroraa'aring. Napo' duu'paravaung. Bakaang kau' narung duu'paravaing. Dii' ku'mi'doria', nka ookara deea'.”
Jiisuu'ke tero noru'uu' tee naning kare-nupoong-koo sivuainung. Tee'koo ee'na'koo aa'puu', “Dii' ookara kiiroraa'dariri otoria'.”

Ee'noko Jiisuu'ke kau' duu' bakemurirai'nange Jiisuu' mononopa' napo' siparara bakanoo' taamantoma toroaru'. Teka Jiisuu'ke nia'murima aa'muru', “Dii'ke ee noru'eri otong tee kapoo' nkorampiring? Tasi'peringe?
Dii'ke ning Nau-anta ee'noko Ovoring tammerimaung. Ning tee ee'nara. Tampa' miring tammerimaung.
Ning diikaang Ovoring, ee'noko Nau-anta ee'noko ninge ee'narai kau' duu'dampiring. Dii' tee' napo' boonko noru'dariri pakureeriainge.
Aung dii' nau-anta-koo tee' nkorampiring dii' pakureerii'naang pakurampirina'.
Masika' naurampimang, naning botovotonaa' bakaang pankaing-koo dau basi deea', ee'noko naning kara-okovui-nka tee botovuu'nung-koo dau basi deea'.
Aung kara taaraverirai'nange tee' nkoverima biraanke-nupoong otoriaing.
“Ninge dii' ookara koonto' naurampia'. Ninge barearantu'ning noru'aransi o'nong. Ee'noko aung Daari Meekung nau'ka masikung deemparaa'naang aa'pumaung,
‘Teie naninge nari' taamanampemaunge tamaava'naang simuu'.’
Enang naurampimang mme' nkoaravaruko dii'ke masika'antamerii'naang ning tee ee'nara pankaing tenang nkoaravainang.
Masika' naurampimang, baa tee ninge botoampainung onkeonke'uaing tee ning napo' onkeonke'muaing. Ee'noko naning tee ning onkeonke'muaing tee ning botomuu'nung onkeonke'uainge.”
Teketa Jiisuu'ke tee' minkuvurai'nange domang oraka' dee'ou', ee'noko sira'pui naumurima aa'muru', “Ninge masika' naurampimang dii', narunge dii'koonge tooka kompui ning kare-nupoong-koo simuaing.”
Jiisuu'ke tee' minkuvuio' nii' nii'ka oo'oomeeru' avitoitoi noru'ampima, miru'noo' besi'ampima.
Ning˜ Jiisuu'koo due' ba'namarako' ba'maiko' deemaritaa'.
Ee'noko Saimoni' Piitai birenge pinka'muma aa'muu', “Nia'eai tee baa tee' minkuvumaang.”
Tee' nia'muko Jiisuu'anko diiri'marara nia'antu', aa'pama, “Ovoring, tee baa ee'nara?”
Jiisuu'ke maku'muma aa'muu', “Ninge navio' duuni-koo iimpamira tee avompainung, tee ee'nara tee naning.” Enang tee' minkuvura navio' nkavura iimpura Judasi avuu', Saimoni' Kerio'nung bauring.
Ee'noko Judasie tevio' kompuko Sietani' namu'ke tumparu' Judasi-koo kuung. Ee'noko Jiisuu'ke aa'puu', “Kapoo' nkoveainung iri'narung nkoveaing.”
Tee' minkuvuu'nung-koong miru'noo' nii'ke taamantomai ba'namariri o'noriko'ninge noru'ampiaruu'.

Nii'ninge aa'pau', “Tee Judasie kapoo' moo'uu'naang paroro-koo makosi Jiisuu'ke tee' minkuvumaang,” Judasie mooni'koonara' bakura-nara' tarevuko'nung-koo. Ee'noko nii'ninge ee' noru'au', “Tee Jiisuu'ke botovuing sitovuru'nuka kapoo' avurii'naang.”
Judasie tevio' nkavura namu'ke siaru', tenang muunga.
Teketa Judasi tenkenuio' Jiisuu'ke aa'muru', “Enang ning Tee Naning-naumpo' Paning-etaing nkaang meenasi sira'pari otong, ee'noko Kumponing bakaang meenasi ning-koo sira'pari otong.
Ninge Kumponinge pankaing-antavansio' teie ning napo' bakaang meenasi amura pankaing-antamuu'naang. Ee', emu' due'ka tee' nkomuaing.
Nnurukaa' ee, ning dii' ninka baru' pankaroong o'noriauka'nung. Dii'ke dama'ke besi'meriaing, ee'noko Ju'koong ovontung nauarantu'na' enang naurampimang, ning nanampainoo' dii' poriarupeu'.
Nerakung boto arompimaang: Piaareeriaing dii'ka. Tee' ninge dii' piaarampimana' dii'ka piaareeriaing.
Dii'ke dii'ka tee' piaareeriko ookara nantoonge tasi'daaripeu' dii' nkaning barevare-nupoong.”
Teketa Piitai aa'puu', “Ovoring, are'aape nanimang?” Jiisuu'ke maku'uma aa'puu', “Dake ning siomearupeu' enang nanamatomanoo', nka dama' nii'nang siomeriaing.”
Piitai nia'uma aa'puu', “Aming-koo ninge siontamparupeu' enang? Ning da' ninka boo'koo makotunsi o'nong.”
Jiisuu'ke maku'uma aa'puu', “Da' ee koonto' ning-koo boo'koo makosi? Bakei koonto' masika' nauramaang, kokoree' mme' koo'kuaruko da' beemu'pie penkentaravaing ni'ninka nari' o'noremaung-koo.”
Jiisuu'ke aa'muru', “Domang oraka' dee'doriauka'. Kumponing masika'antaveriaing, ee'noko ning masika'antameriainge.
Mma' bakanava-koo avatevaro otong. Ninge otoriainoo' neriampaing. Tee' naurampiarupeu' tosi dei.
Dii' otoriainoo' osi neri bakeamira napo' toromaravaing, ee'noko ning-anko po'antarampiaing te' ning o'noainoo' dii' otoriaina'.
Dii'ke noru'eri otong nanampainoo' ee'noko te' basiraripeu'na' noru'eri otong.”
Toomasie aa'puu', “Ovoring, nii'ke noru'ampia' te' da' naniainoo'. Arekee' noru'ampipeu' taung te' tavo'maripeu'navung?”
Jiisuu'ke aa'puu', “Ning tee ee'nara taung masikung, kara masikung okovenung ee'noko domaang okovenunge ning ee'nara. Naning Mma'anko bearupeu' baka. Ninge deeko' tavo'antavampeu'.
Dii'ke ning noru'meri dei Mma' noru'eripeu'; enang-eta noru'ering, ee'noko ooveringe.”
Pilipi'ke aa'puu', “Ovoring, Dauma naumeriaing ooampiaina'. Tee narung oo-koo piamorimang.”
