Ee'noko aa'na' domang kuaa'oroi teinge tee nemaka bakanoo' be'antavau' domantoo'.
Teketa tee Paula' kau'ke Aasos-aape nanu'koo piavoko nii' aarerie urompiri meru'.
Ee'noko teie teka kune'murira nari' aarerie Mitilini-namono-aape meru'.

Dauna'mung aareri-koo aa'emarira Kaios-namui'ke deto tankinampira danto nari' nanampiru' bera te'munga dauna'mung napo' Semos-namui'koo duumemariru'˜. Teketa napo' te'munga dauna'mung Torokilian-navuntu'koo aatumpiru'noo'keta tankinampira Melita'navuntu'koo basimariru'.

Paula' tee Epeses-navuntu' divu'koo piavou' tee' Eesia-nameensi'koo baru' pankaroong otoaroo'naang, ai' tee tee iri'narumparama Jerusalema' be'koo makotuko deeko' Pentekos-na'mung nari' nkoaava'naang.
Tee'koo Paula' Melita'keta Epeses-aape botoaru' dootuu'koo urantanuka porora Paula' kune'aava'naang teka Melita'ka.
Ee'noko tenang teing poroio' teie aa'puru', “Dii'ke dii'ka noru'meri o'nong ning dii'koo meu'ke o'noko'na' ookara batei-koo tutuna'na'mung-eta aa' Eesia-nameensi' basimaru'na'mung-eta.
Ovoring tampa' siompamaung boonko o'noitaa', kontevoroma paa'ariaining-koo biromarama, ee'noko aroo'maritaa' parapaara kune'ankoo'.
Ju'nupoonge oraka' nkomaako teie kontemoa' dii'koo sira'pamaung kara sinang tampara nkavumaing nau-antarampima, sirakura', nii'noo' diikaning pava kanteama.
Ookavitura-koo Ju'nupoong ee'noko Ju'deeaing daankiama teing Kumponing-aape bere'arira Ovoring Jiisuu' baitoaava'naang tee domamuri taremuriainoo'koo tero Pako'pari'nii'.
Ee'noko enang ee aing Jerusalema'aape memaang Tanuaang Meekunge aa'na' botomuio', nka noru'ampa' aming kapoo' ning-koo tavo'kuainge teka.
A'noo' tee osi kante beero'anko Tanuaang Meekunge naumumaung nantoonge ning kiimatamaava'naang ee'noko baike kune'ampaina'.
Teka domamari o'noaina' baru' aa'na' noru'marava', Ovoring Jiisuu' bakaang nko-nko nkoama deeko' dupe-antavama'naang botomuu'na' tee tampara doorenang Kumponing bakaang piaa-koong daankiama.
“Ee'noko enang tee dii'ke ninge tee Kumponing bakaang muu'koong kara koromarama daankirampimainge napo' oing oomeriauka'nung noru'ansi o'nong.
Tee'koo ninge ee' naurampimang dii', ning tee tuumpi o'noa' dii'koo narung Kumponing bakaang muu'koo tumparavauka'nung deeko'. Dii'ka arisirariaing.
Ai' ning tee kontemoaung dii'koo sira'pama tee ookara Kumponing bakaang pia.
Tanatarariai dii'ka ee'noko ookara Kumponing bakanamanto Tanuaang Meekunge tare-koo botorurining. Pakuereriai teing dootuu'nupoong Karistoo' bakaning, baka bakaang erenge moo'uru'ning.
Ai' ninge noru'ansi o'nong ninge si'dampiko tee oreng nau-antanuka nkaunanka avorokesi'nanka-pina' dii'koo meu' poroaing opaarii'naang temanto.
Ee'noko napo' tevitu-eta dii'ke tarevererimanavitu-eta nii'ning nantoong donkonaavainge kara mare'ai minkuaavaining teing Jiisuu' bakaning barevarenuka barampaarii'naang.
Tee'koo tanatarariaing dii', ai' ning tee noru'meri otong beenaumo mare'koo muung ee'noko doong uatepa tautaurampiru'nung ta'du ninka, dii'koo nii'ning dua'ariaina' noru'ansi biromarama.

“Ee'noko enang tee ninge Kumponing bakaang bireng-koo si'dampimaang bakaang kara piaae tarerurii'naang, tee ee'nara deto dii' panka'anta-koo makosi, ee'noko tee barenku domang-anta tee dii' oko-antaruriaing ookara Karistoo' bakaning deempuru'ning ninka nari'.
Naning bakaning mooni' dovang baarong kevi'ampa'.
Dii'ke dii'ka noru'meri o'nong aing nkaning birenge taremaramaung, ee'noko teing nii'ning o'norimaing nari' pakuaramaunge.

Ookara kapoo' ninge nkoanko'ning teing ninge dii' barerampiru'ning dii'ke tee' nari' kake'iirarira teing aruaru'nuka pakuererii'naang tee Ovoring Jiisuu' bakaang kara ee' minkuvuu'naare noru'eri, ‘Naning avu'nko biraankearavaing puru'uitaa' tee naning nkavuaing.’”
Ee'noko tenang tee' minkuvura tee doonko kinkinura teing ninka nari' kunsiariru'.
Ee'noko teinge ookarai biromparima Paula' boko'aama si'noora'au' orarunsiarima baru' ee' minkuvuu'na'koo, “Dii'ke napo' oing oomeriauka'nung.”
Ee'noko teinge berora aareri-koo koing-antavaara sipau'.
Tenang teing ninka si'noora'meerira pirunge danto tenkenampira Koosi-namui'aape tankinampiru', ee'noko dauna'mung Roodes-namui'aape, teketa napo' kato Patara'navuntu'aape.
Ee'noko teka nii'nareng aareri-nareng ooampiru' Ponisia-navaro Siiria-koonoo'aape pare'araa'naang otoko, ee'noko tereng-koo koinampira nari' meru'.
Tenang Saiparasi-namui' oro'parako mare'aanameng-koo otoi Siiria-nameensi'aape tankinampiru', ee'noko Taia'navuntu'koo daanto duumemariru' kavonanka be'antavuko'noo' terenge.
Ee'noko teka Jiisuu' bakaning barevarenuka daa'arampira teke o'noru' ˜ke'munta-taa doong. Ee'noko Tanuaang Meekunge Paula' kiimatavaavaina' nauvurio' teinge Paula' poteau' Jerusalema' be'koo.

Ee'noko tenang niikaning doong teke oto'kooning tankinuio' nii' teketa' teing ninka nari' danto tenkenampiru'. Teing ookara bii'ankaampi ninka ee'noko biurukaa' aareri-koo si'maarii'naang porou' osi pankamono-koo dama'dua, ee'noko piisi'koo teke kinkinampira kunsimarira teke naruna' naruna' si'noora'meeru'.
Teketa nii' aareri-koo koinampiko teing osi-aape toroariru'.
Aareri-koo koinampira Taia'keta bera Tolemes basimariru' ee'noko nii'ke te'nupoong baito-nupoong ooarampira tampara tampampima teke na'mung doong o'noru' teing ninka.
Teketa dauna'mung tenkenampira Sisaria'navuntu'koo duumemariru', ee'noko teka tee Pilipi',
Ee'noko, tee ee'nara Pilipi' baurukaa' maniku' karenaumo nampeesiariaing oto'evuko' Kumponing-etaning tarampeeariko'ning.
Tenang nii' teke nii'ning doong o'noriko narung nakaronara Kumponing-etaing Judia'nameensi'keta daampeto pou' miring Akabas.

Ee'noko tenang nii'anko poma Paula' bakaang tokonii' nkavura kau' dovang bireng dai'arama aa'puu', “Tanuaang Meekunge ee' minkuvumaang: Tee' nari' Ju'nupoonge teka Jerusalema'ka dai'aavaing naning narung aung ee'nara tokonii' okovenung, ee'noko teing-koo Ju'deeaing-koo bireng-koo sipaavaing.”
Ee'noko tenang nii'ke Paula' ninka nari' nanampiko'ninge tee' taaravampira teing teke otoroko'ning nari' orokoampiru' tee Paula' daanto Jerusalema' bearoo'naang.

Teketa Paula'ke maku'urima aa'puu', “Aming-koo dii' birontarima ning domang orari-antamerimaang? Ai' ning tee maamumari o'nong kiimata narung-koo deea', teka boo'koo tee' nari' Ovoring Jiisuu' bakaang miring-koo teke Jerusalema'ke.”
Ee'noko tenang nii' taaramuriaruio' nii'ke tamung doonko sipampiru' aa'pampira, “Makosi, Ovoring bakaang pia nkoaravaing.”
Ee'noko teketa nii' maamumarira daanto Jerusalema'aape meru'.

Ee'noko nii'ning Jiisuu' siompaako'ning Sisaria'keta nii' ninka nari' meru' Neeson bakanava-koo tavo'maarii'naang tee Saiparasi-namui'koonung, tutuna'ning Jiisuu' sionuka ninka nari' otoko'nung, tee ninka nari' o'norii'naang teke Jerusalema'ke.
Teinge baito-nupoonge Jerusalema' otoroko'ninge oomaarira dotuarima onkeonke'maaru'.
Teketa dauna'mung Paula' nii' ninka nari' meru' Jeemisi-anko, ee'noko ookara Karistoo'navitu-koo urantanuka te' porou'.
Ee'noko teing-koo tampara tampura Paula'ke pukevui minku-antavuru' teing kapoo'nanka Kumponinge nkovuu'ning taapo'nairu-koo Ju'deeaing-koo Paula' nanuma daankiarako.

Ee'noko tenang teinge urantanukai Paula' bakaang minkunaa taaravaara teinge Kumponing pankaing-antavau'. Ee'noko teinge aa'pau' tee, “Oovemaang nii'maiko' arekee'ning nantoong kokorei' otorong Ju'nupoong-koo meu'ke teing baito-nupoong, nka Moosesi-nung boto-ita keta'koo kontenuka.

Teinge ee'ninge da' daang taararau' dake Ju'nupoong Ju'deeaing ninka nari' otoromaing Moosesi bakaang boto si'koo naueriko biurukaa'koong dopa' napu'aariaroo'naang nauerima ee'noko toomo siompaavaroo'naang tampeko.
Enang arekee' nko-koo makosi da' tokontaa'neenga? Ai' teinge tee da' poinoo' taaravaava'naang.

Tee aa' kapoo' nii'ke naurampimatomaung nkoveaing. Nii'koo teing nantoong karenaumo otoromaang bii'ka meeka'pariri oto'koo marakavariru'ning. Bake-koo due'urimang Moosesi-nung toomo siompai kiiroraa'anta ee'noko boontunang tovang nkoaamanoo'keta.

Bokuerira teing ninka nari' nkorariai kiiroraa'antararima ee'noko tee boontunang-koong kau' karenaumo dake naro'ka moo'evuriai. Tee' pakueriko dapo apuka'pariri napu'arima taa'ni'antavariai tee biikaang maraka-anta tee dupeaing. Ee'noko tee' nkorarako ookarai da' noru'daavaing kapoo' da'koo minkuaamaung tee masikung deea', teka dake daka-koo siompei otong tee boto Moosesi-nung.

Teka teing Ju'deeaing-koo baito-nupoong teing, nii'ke karavoto daarievorompiru'ning kaka'dekemarira matauampiru'na' taamang kumponing tositosinanka-koo darinii' ee'noko ereng naiaavaroo'naang, bio' tutung tavaama ereng dakoaavaung-koong maa'aavaroo'naang, ee'noko kaukauro nkoaavaroo'naang.”

Ee'noko teing urantanuka biikaang kara tampa' taaravura Paula'ke teing nantoong karenaumo bokuvurira dauna'mung kiiroraa'antavaru' teing ninka nari'. Ee'noko pava dootuu'nava pankava-koo tumparu' piristi'nanka nauvurii'naang ˜kenaanka-taa doong tankinuko kiiroraa'ariaing, naruna' naruna' kante boontuarira teing.

Teing-koo ˜kenaanka-taa doong-koo asi'na'mung oparaa'naang otoko teinge Ju'nupoonge Eesia-nameensi'keta porou'ninge Paula' pava dootuu'nava pankava-koo ooaara nantoong karinga irikung-antavaarira tee moo'au'.

Bokiaama aa'pau', “Dii' aintaang nii'maikorori' Isireeli-nupoonge pakumereriai. Aung tee naning ookara nantoong osi ookutunairu-koo nau-antavurimaung aing aa'ning turang-antavurima niikaning nantoong ee'noko Moosesi-nung boto ee'noko ava dootuu'nava pankava. Baru'noo' Ju'deeaing ava dootuu'nava pankava-koo tung-antavuriee ava meekava orari-antavuma.”

Aunoo' tee teinge tee Toropimas Ju'deeaing-koong Epeses-nung ooaara tee ninka otoreko teka temono-koo osi pankamono-koo daang ee' noru'au', “Tee aunge Paula'ke dootuu'nava pankava-koo meekava-koo tung-antavuieeng.”
Tenang ookara nantoong osi pankaing-koo-nupoong donkonaara nari' kua'parira teinge Paula' moo'aara barantaakiau' dootuu'nava pankava-ita taapo', ee'noko karanaang namu'ke ku'numpau'.
Ee'noko tenang teinge dupisi'aava'naang nkoaako tee piatooronuka-koong bore' nauau' ookara Jerusalema'nupoong avitoitoi taatoiavariko˜.

Ee'noko teie namu'ke bakaning piatooronuka biikaning daaku'na' tarenuka ninka bokuvurira kua'pariru' doonko teing-aape. Ee'noko tenang teinge tee piatooronuka-koong bore' ooaara teing ninka bakaning piatooronuka ninka nari' Paula' tavu' bakeau'.
Ee'noko tenang teie tavu'nupoong-koong bore'ke pora Paula' moo'ura botoaru' dai'aava'naang sieenai kevintai. Ee'noko teie tana'urima aa'puu', “Aung baa? Aming nkovuinge?”
Teinge nantoonge karingai tee bokiaama avitoitoi minkuaako'. Ee'noko tenang naampavaako teie kapoo' masikung nkoaru'nung tasi'puarura tee botoaru' tee piatooronuka biikanava'koo be'anta-koo.
Ee'noko tenang paatang-koo basiarira tee koonto' piaatooronukai intampaara siroonge nkavau' purumpurunavinge aa'na' pore'antavaariko, teinge miatarai siompaari nanaama aa'paako, “Taveriai, taveriai!”

Tenang tee Paula' deto pava-koo aa'e-antavaava'naang due'uko te' piatooronuka biikanoo' teie Kiriki'na' karoma aa'puu' tee piatooronuka biikaang bore', “Ninge ee kapoo' naurampeu' da'?” Ee'noko teie ta'ninura aa'puu', “Oi, da' ee Kiriki'nung kara noru'ei otong?
Da' ee tee Iisipi'nupoong-koong deea' tee temu' Rooma'keta siivenke' tutumpuma nantoong karenaumo kokorei' tooreerenuka mee'bora' sirakamaa'koo be'antavuru'nung?”
Paula'ke maku'uma aa'puu', “Ning aa' Ju'nung. Nkaang osi tee pankaing, miring Taasus, Silisia-koonoo'. Teka ninge tana'damaang da' taura'meko aing nantoong karavarama'naang.”
Ee'noko tenang teie taura'puio' Paula' paatang-koo donkonura birenge ka'duu-antavurio' nantoong dooroompariru'. Ee'noko dooroomparirio' Ju' biikaang karai, Iiburuna', karoma aa'puu',
“Dii' mmataraang ee'noko mmarang Ju'nupoong, taarameriaing nkaang kara penkemarama minkuama'naang otoing dii'koo.”
Ee'noko tenang teinge biikana' karoko taaravaara aa'na' dooroompariru' teing.
Ee'noko aa'puu', “Ning tee Ju'nung, Taasusie ponto'maru'nung Silisia-koonoo'ke, teka anke Jerusalema'ke Kameliele-ankoi baremaru', niikakatauro-itaing boto to'biiari otoina' nari';

Dii' e'mung otorina' nari' Kumponing iri'moi siompama aa'noko' avung-koo Jiisuu' sionavung-koo ning o'noinavung-koo otoroko'ning manki'antavarama nii'ning dupisi'antavarantu'. Nantoong aa'ning donkaang ee'noko maniku' dai'arama kiimata-koo siparanko'.

Teie piristi' pankainge ee'noko ookarai Ju'nupoong-kooning pankenanka-koo koompaara'navitue masikee-antamaapeu'. Teing-eta ee'ning-eta ninge karavoto˜ taura'kooning nkavantu' nii'marang Ju'nupoong-anko Damaskas otoroko'ning-anko be'koong. Ee'noko Damaskas-aape nanantu' teing Jiisuu' sionavung-koo otoroko'ning baramparamira a' Jerusalema' kiimata-koo siparama'naang.”
“Ee'noko nanama Damaskas due'anko tenang duaaki'nang araka pankainge paning-eta too'muu' ning.
Ee'noko ning te' doonko kansi'koo dua'maru' ee'noko aurong taaravantu' aa'muko ning, ‘Soolo ee, Soolo, dake aming-koo ning manki'antamemaung?’
Ee'noko maku'ama aa'pantu', ‘Da' baa Ovoring?’ Ee'noko teie aa'muu' ning, ‘Ning Jiisuu', Nasareti'nung, tee ee'nara dake manki'antamemaung.’
“Enang teing nantoonge ni'ninka nanampiko'ninge araka ooau', ee'noko aurong taaravau', teka miru'noo' nkavaavaruu' tee-koong kara ning karamuko'nung-koong.

Ee'noko ninge aa'pantu', ‘Ninge aming nkoama'naang Ovoring?’ Ee'noko Ovoringe aa'muu' ning, ‘Deto donkonira Damaskas tuntaravaing ee'noko teka nauraava'naang da' teing kapoo' dake nko-koo miru'nii'ning.’
“Ee'noko tenang ning oo-koo makotumparuko arakai kaputu'antamuio' ning birenge komai nanu'antamau' teinge nari' nanampiko'ninge bera Damaskas basi-antamau'.
Temono-koo naning narung miring Ananaiasi otoko', tee ee'nara Kumponing-koo mee'du'piari otoko'nung Moosesi-nung botoi minkuvui otoina' ee'noko ookarai Ju'nupoonge aa'na' tampara tampaako' tee.
Tee ee'nara ning-anko pora due' donkonura aa'muu', ‘Mmaiko', Soolo, duta banteai enang.’ Ee'noko tenang tee-koo batei-koo ning bantomira tee ooantu'.

“Ee'noko teie aa'muu', ‘Teie Kumponing niikakatauro biikaange da' miru'duu'nung bakaang pia tasi'pee'naang ee'noko tee naning koonto' Jiisuu' dakaang dutai oovee'naang ee'noko bakaang kara taaravee'naang bakaang karang-eta.
Ai' da' tee bakaang kara sira' ookara nantoong-koo teing kapoo' taaraveiaining-koo ee'noko ooveiaining-koo.

Aia' deto nentarava' donkonira ntong-koo minkie meeka'antararavai, ee'noko dakaang oraka' nkonanka kuiaravai bakaang miring tampeko.’ Ee'noko tee'puio' tee' meeka'antamarara Jerusalema'aape toromaru'.”
“Ee'noko Jerusalema'aape toromarara avaka'koo dootuu'nava pankava-koo kunsimarama nii'naung-koo˜ bere'maru'.
Ee'noko Ovoringe aa'muko ooantu', ‘Iri'narung daa'darara Jerusalema'keta tenkeniai, ai' aing amono-nupoonge tee taararaavaroo'naang dake ning sira'meko anke.’

“Ee'noko ninge aa'pantu', ‘A, tee aa' tampa' noru'mai otong, ai' ninge teing pakuarama aa'noko'nung ookara pava dootuu'nanka-koo dai'arama tavaranko' teing-eta siivenke'arima da' Jiisuu' masika'antaraako'ning.
Ee'noko te'mung tee Sitiveni da' sira'duko'nung dupisi'au'na'mung ning teke due'ke donkonansi mononopa'nanka tee tavau'ning biikaning tareansi tampa' tampanko'.’
Teka Ovoringe aa'muu', ‘Ninge aa' botoramaang, tenkeniai isipo'aape Ju'deeaing-anko.’”
Teinge karingai barorompau' tee Paula'ke te' basinoo' kara minkuvuko, teka karoma Ju'deeaing-anko beainaare-koo basivuko deto bokiaama aa'pau', “Kansi'koo domampari otoauka'!”
Ee'noko tee' peusi'kaama misimisiarima da'mong ee' deto bai'au' Paula'aape.
Ee'noko tee' nkoariko tee piatooronuka biikaang bore' botoaru' piatooronuka biikanava'koo po'antavaarai'nange mura'aama okora' besi'aava'naang tee kapoo' tee turampaama bokiaako'nung.

Teka tenang mo'ming-koo bi'aara mura'aava'naang beeto'aako Paula'ke nauvuu' tee narung daaku' piatooronuka tanata teke donkonui otoko'nung, aa'puu', “Ning tee Rooma'nung, ee'noko niikaang botoi taura'duriaung Rooma'nupoong tamung mura'koo kapoo' orara mme' ooveria'.”
Tenang teie piatooronuka daaku' tanatanarai tee' taaravura tee piatooronuka biikaang bore'anko bera aa'puu' tee, “Aung naning dake arekee' nkovee'naang, ai' aung tee Rooma'nupoong-koong.”
Tee'koo teie piatooronuka biikaang bore'ke pora aa'puu' tee Paula', “Naumeai, da' ee tee Rooma'nupoong-koong?” Ee'noko teie aa'puu', “Ee'.”

Ee'noko teie piatooronuka biikaang bore'ke maku'uma aa'puu', “Ninge mmau' mooni'ke moo'antu' tee' naning Rooma'nung deemaraa'naang.” Paula'ke aa'puu', “Nka ninge moo'ampa', ning Rooma'nung paramau'noo'keta.”

Teketa tee teing mura'aama okora' besi'aava'naang mau'aako'ning namu'ke dunka'pariru' tee-ankoita. Ee'noko tee piatooronuka-koong bore' avorou' tee Paula' Rooma'nung tasi'pura ee'noko boto toto'pui dai'uu'na' tasi'parara.

Teketa dauna'mung teie bore'ke Ju'nupoonge tuumpiau'noo'koo okora' masipo' noru'koo piavora, Paula' sing-antavura botoaru' teing piristi'koo ovontung ee'noko ookara koompaara'navitu kune'eea'naang. Ee'noko teie Paula' doonko be'antavura teing-koo uro'kanoo' donkong-antavuu'.

Ee'noko Paula'ke dutai naapu narung oovurira teing koompaara'navitu aa'puru', “Ee mmarang Ju'nupoong, Kumponing-koo dutakanoo'ke aa'dampimang, ninge bakaang boto maroita toto'pansi o'noaung e'mung-koo basinoo'.”
Ee'noko teie piristi'nanka-koo pankainge Ananaiasie karang-koo tanko'paava'naang botovuru' teing tee-koo due' donkonai otoroko'ning.
Ee'noko Paula'ke aa'puu' tee, “Nna' da' Kumponinge tanko'duainge, kuung-takaa'. Dake ape' ning boto ninka paaramee'naang te' ba'nantaring ee'noko tee boto sipei ning tanko'koo botoraramang ee?”
Ee'noko teinge teke due'ke donkonai otoroko'ninge aa'pau', “Dake ee tee oraka' minku-koo makosi Kumponing bakaang piristi' pankaing?”
Ee'noko Paula'ke aa'puu', “Ee mmarang, ninge noru'ampa' tee Kumponing bakaang piristi' pankaing deeko'. Masika' Daari Meekunge ee' minkuvui otong,
‘Dii'ke oraka' minkueriauka' tee nantoong diikaning tare-nupoong-koong narung.’”

Teka tenang Paula'ke tasi'purira teing-koo nii'navitu Noru' Pitunavitu ee'noko nii'navitu Boto Keperuu'navitu˜ tee koompaara'navitu-koo bokuma aa'puu', “Ee mmarang, ning tee Boto Keperuu'navitu-koong ee'noko mma' Boto Keperuu'navitu-koonge. Ning tee tuutunang-koo˜ o'nomang dama'ke boo'keta domamariaing masika'antavamaung-koo.”
Ee'noko tenang teie tee' minkuvuko teke siivenke'eu' teing Boto Keperuu'navitu˜ ee'noko Noru' Pitunavitu˜ ee'noko tee oosinaura' teke tankaamparu'.
Noru' Pitunavitue aa'ning penkempaamanoo'koo tee': boo'keta daa', koosinunanka, tanuaang; teka Boto Keperuu'navitue aing ookeng masikeng tampaakoo'.

Teketa karakarare pankaing nkoaru' ee'noko nii'ning Boto Keperuu'navitu-kooning boto naunuka donkonaara deravariru' aa'paama, “Nii'ke kapoo' orara ooampia' aung-koo. Ai' pa tanuaange nii'noo' koosinunge nauvumaung deeko' turampampi'neenga.”

Ee'noko tenang tee turanturang tavu' aapearako tee piatooronuka-koong bore' avorou' tee Paula' bitutuaa'neeng-koo teinge, ee'noko piatooronuka-koo botoaru' doonko siarira tee Paula' pari'aarira mmari'antavaara biikanava-koo be'antavaava'naang.
Te'mung ee'na'mung muunga Ovoring tee-anko due' donkonura aa'puu', “Noru' purintaravai, ai' dake tee ning sira'memana' anke Jerusalema'ke tee' nari' tampa' sira'mee'naang teke Rooma'ke.”
Teketa tane'puko nii'ning Ju'nupoong mumunsiarira pinkapinka'eu' sinearima taamanaavaroo'naang bera Paula' dupisi'aavainoo'ke basi.
Donkaang karekai'pi divu'ke tee aung mumunsinang nkoau'.

Ee'noko teketa teing aa'ning-anko berou': piristi'nanka-koo ovontung ee'noko Ju'nupoong-kooning pankenanka-anko. Berora aa'pau', “Nii' teing koonto' nii'ka pinkapinka'meerira sinemaririning taamanampiaroo'naang bera Paula' dupisi'ampiainoo'ke basi.

Dii'ke koompaara'navitu ninka nau-antaveriaing tee piatooronuka-koong bore' tee Paula' dii'anko depeto sing-antavuaina' tuumpiaamanoo'koo tampa' tasi'perii'naang tamperima. Ee'noko nii' teing maamumariri o'noriaing tavu'koo tee taapo'ka dii'anko due'aravaruko.”
Enang tee Paula' baampuru'nunge taaravura tee maamunoora' bera piatooronuka biikanava'ke koinura nauvuu' tee Paula'.
Ee'noko Paula'ke narung piatooronuka daaku' tanatanara bokuvura aa'puu', “Aung nemaka piatooronuka-koong bore'anko be'antaveai. Kapoo' nauvuu'naang aunge tee.”
Ee'noko teie tee be'antavura piatooronuka biikaang bore'anko aa'puu', “Teie Paula'ke kiimata-koo otoinge bokumura naumuing aung nemaka da'anko tavo'ama'naang kapoo' da' naurua'naang.”
Ee'noko teie piatooronuka-koong bore'ke bireng-koo kompura taapo' be'antavura tana'uu' tee, aa'puma, “Tee aming kapoo' dake naumee'naang ning?”

Ee'noko teie aa'puu', “Teinge Ju'nupoong-koo pankenankai kara naroompaing da' nia'daako Paula' teing-anko doonko koompaara'navitu-anko be'antavee'naang tane' aavavaama tee-koo keperuu'ai tasi'paava'naang tampaama.

Teka teing aroo'eriauka' tee', ai' donkaang karekai'pi divu' maamuariri otoroo'naang baku'ariri tee dupisi'koo. Teing bii'ka sinearirining taamanaavaroo'naang bera tee Paula' dupisi'aavainoo'ke basi. Ee'noko enang teing teing maamuariri otorong tee taura' da'keta nempaitaa'.”
Teketa teie piatooronuka-koong bore'ke tee nemaka tenkeng-antavuu' teketa orokovuma aa'puu', “Naning naueauka' tee' ning naumeina'.”

Tenang teie kenaanka piatooronuka daaku'na' tanatavaareko'naanka bokuvureta aa'puretu', “Maamu-antaverereriaing kenaanka daaku' piatooronuka ee'noko naruaape-ita kenai'ka [70] oosie nanu'nuka ee'noko kenaanka daaku' daanko'po'nupoong, ee'noko tenang aasi'koo dua'nang doinang muunga Sisaria'navuntu'aape beriai.
Ee'noko Paula' ba'nanuaining oosining maamu-antaveriai, ee'noko tampa' basi-antaveriai tee-anko ovo'ma'anko Piiliks-anko.”
Ee'noko karavoto ee'pina' daarivuu',
“Ninge Kalaudias Lisiasie da' pankaing ovo'ma' Piiliks onkeonke'damaang.
Aung naning tee Ju'nupoonge moo'aara teinge tavaava'naang nkoaako ninge nkaning ninka piatooronuka ninka merira tenkeng-antavampira domampampirieeng, ee' noru'ampira aung tee naning Rooma'nung.
Ee'noko tuumpiau'noo'koo noru'koo piamora ninge doonko koompaara'navitu-koo be'antavantu'.
Ee'noko biikaang boto-koo tuutunampaako ooantu', teka tuumpiau'ning-koo kapoo' boo'anta-aapenung ee'noko kiimata-aapenung ooampa'.

Ee'noko ning tee Ju'nupoonge tee naning dupsi'aava'naang mumunsiaako narunge makenge naumuing. Tee'koo ninge namu'ke da'anko botoansing. Ee'noko napo' teing tuumpiaamaing da'anko botoaransinge da'koo uro'kanoo'ke sira'paava'naang teing kapoo' tuumpiaamaing. Enang bakearing.”
Teketa tee teinge piatooronukai tee boto siompai Paula' bokuaara berou' muunganang Antipatiris-aape.
Ee'noko teing piatooronuka kau'ke nanaako'ning teketa' dauna'mung toroariru' biikanava-aape, oosie nanu'nuka ninka nari' nanaako tee Paula'.
Ee'noko tenang teing Sisaria' basiarira tee karavoto˜ avau' tee ovo'ma'. Ee'noko Paula' tee-anko tavo'au'.
Tenang teie tee karavoto deeruvura teie tana'uu' tee Paula', aa'puu', “Da' aremeensi'koong?”

Ee'noko tenang Paula' Silisia-nung noru'ura teie aa'puu', “Da' ninge tareamanoo'koong deentarako ninge taararerompaing dakaang kara maku'na' tenang teing tuumpiraamaing poroainang.” Ee'noko botoaru' tee Daurarong˜ Eeroti' bakanava-koo otoko Paula' tanatavaava'naang.

Ee'noko pa'noko' doong tankinuko tee piristi'nanka-koo pankaing Ananaiasi daampeto pou' nii'ning koompaara'navitu-koo pankenanka ninka ee'noko naning narung nari' tuutunang˜koo kara-tavo' miring Teetalas. Ee'noko teinge tavo'au' tee-anko ovo'ma'anko tee biikaang kara Paula' tuumpiau'naare.

Teketa ovo'ma'ke Paula' bokuvuko Teetalasie kara tuumpi tutumpuma aa'puu', “Ee da' pankaing, Piiliks, da' otoko nii' tampa' mooa-koo o'norimaung ee'noko nii' Ju'nupoong pakumerima aarumo tampeng tavo'antavemaunge;
Osi ookara-koo avutevu'mariri nii'ke aroo'ampimaung ookara tampa' nari' tampampima.
Teka iirau'antarampi'neeng-koo tampa' tange bakeama enang aa'damaang ninge, tampa' noru'meri io' baroromeriaing nii' oki'noo'.

Nii'ke tee aung naning taarapiika ooampimaung, turang-anta-nko ooampimaung ookara Ju'nupoong-koo ookutunairu-koo otoroining-koo, ee'noko napo' narunge biumaree' tevitu-koo nerakavitu tee Nasareti'nung siompaamanavitu-koo.
Ee'noko napo' nii' Kumponing-ankoi dootuu'nava pankava-koo dootuu'mariko orari-anta-koo paaramuru', teka tee' nkoarako nii'ke dai'ampiru';

Nii'ke niikaang boto siompampiri paaravampii'naang tampampiko teie Lisiasie, teing kivora daaku' piatooronuka tanatai, aa'na' iri'oi niikaang bireng-eta pari'murira aa'muru', ‘Dii' tuumpi nkonuka ovo'ma'anko berira tuumpireeriaing.’
Teka daka dake tana'era noru'eaing tee ookara kapoo'nanka nii'ke tee tuumpiampirining masikeng.”
Ee'noko teinge Ju'nupoonge ookara kapoo'nanka Teetalasie tuumpivuko'ning-koo masikee-antavaako'.

Ee'noko tenang teie ovo'ma'ke kara-koo botovuu'nang tee Paula'ke maku'uma aa'puu', “Ning dotumari penkemaraa'naang teing-koo kara tuumpimau'ning-koo da' tasi'dansi mmau' mare'koo da' kara-simpe' deentari otomaung-koo.
Dake nia'eriko masikee-antamaavaing, baru' doong kivora-ita ke'munta divu'uaruko ning Jerusalema'aape deto dootuu'koo meu'.
Ee'noko ainge ning oomaava' tata'meeriko dootuu'nava pankava-koo. Napo' oomaava' tavutavu' tutumpanko dootuu'navananka oki'nareka'koo ee'noko osi pankamono-koo.
Teing napo' masika'pariarupeu' da' nauraama teing kapoo' enang ning tuumpimaamaatomaing-koo.

“Teka tee aung ning enang da'koo sira'maraa'naang: Ning tee Kumponing-koo dootuu'maramaung niikakatauro biikaang-koo tevung nerakavung daang-koonavung tampaamanavung siompansi, masika'antavansi teing ookutuning kapoo' Moosesi-nung botoi minkuvui otomaing ee'noko Kumponing-etaning nakaro-nupoonge tero daariau'ning,
ee'noko Kumponinge maraka-anta dupearavainoo' nempansitaa' tee' nari' aing nkoarimana' boo'keta daa' noru'ampiri ookeng-koo aa'noko teing koonto'nuka ee'noko teing koonto'nuka deeaing.
Tee'koo ning paaramaramaung domang kiiroraa'mari o'noo'naang Kumponing-ankoi ee'noko nantoong-ankoi.
“Enang tee nii'ning mare' tankinuio' toromaru' nkanavitu-anko avuavu' mooni' ata'oinku'koo tavo'ama ee'noko boontunamaraa'naang.
Tee' nkomarako teinge ning oomau' kiiroraa'marama pava dootuu'nava pankava-koo kuunge, nantoong karinga ee'noko naampa dovang otoaruko, teka Ju'nupoong naing Eesia'keta porou'ning teke otoroko.
Teing ee'ning a' da'anko porora ning tuumpi-koo makosinuka kapoo' ning tuumpi-koo makosi oto'evoroi deeko'.
Nii'noo' ainge koompaara'navitu bii'ka tuumpimaavai kapoo' orara taaravau'nung deeko' nkaang kara simpe'aama teka Jerusalema'ka.

Teka tee kapoo' nii'nung otoa', aung narung tuumpimaamaatomaung otong tee tenang uro'kanoo'ke teing-koo donkonansi bokuma aa'pantu'nung, ‘Ninge tee napo' boo'keta daa' narung masika'antavamaung-koo dii'ke e'mung tuumpimerimaang.’”

Teka teie Piiliksie, bane tevung nerakavung taung siraka'pui tampa' tasi'puko'nunge, teka toto'pura aa'puu', “Tenang Lisias tee piatooronuka-koong bore' daampeto poainang ninge simpe'ampaing aung kara da'koong.”

Teketa tenang tee piatooronuka daaku' tarenara botovuu' teie tee Paula' tee ninka tareaio' otoo'naang teka baru' kiimata-pina' deea'. Ee'noko ba'maikori'ke beero'koo orokoaava' piavoaining-koo pakuaama.

Teketa nii'ning doong tankinuko Piiliks ba'aang ninka Ju'koonani miring Darusila ninka poreta botoaru' Paula' po'antavaava'naang ee'noko taaravuu' minkuvuko Jiisuu' tero Pako'pari'nii' masika'anta-koonavung.

Ee'noko tenang Paula'ke to'biiari aing aa'ning-koo minkuvuko: koonto' nkona', baka tarena', ee'noko doong asi'na'mung tuutunang nkoaravaing-koo, Piiliksie avorora aa'puu', “Io' beaing anketa. Nii'nang batei ooamira bokurampaing napo'.”
Napo' ee' noru'uko', “Ning pa mooni' amuu'naang Paula'ke dama'ke napo' bokuanko.” Tee'koo mmau' namu'pie bokuvuma minkuareko'.
Teka kemare'ka tankinuko Poosias Peestasie Piiliks pari'antavuu', teka Piiliks tenkenuma Ju'nupoong dotu-anta-koo Paula' teke kiimatanava-koo pinka'ari otoko sipuu'.
Enang tee Peestasi ovo'ma' deemparara beenang doong tankinuko Jerusalema'aape daanto beu' Sisaria'keta.
Ee'noko teka tavo'arako piristi'nanka-koo ovontunge ee'noko Ju'nupoong-koo pankenankai Paula' tuumpiaako'ning nauau'.
Ee'noko aa'na' etuau' tee eentavarima tee botoarako Paula' Jerusalema'aape tavo'aa-va'naang, taunga tavaava'naang maroau'na' noru'ai.
Peestasie maku'urima aa'puu', “Paula' tee Sisaria'ke tareai otomaung ee'noko ning tee due'ka mee'naang noru'maramang.
Tee'koo dii'koo nii'ning pankenanka ni'ninka nari' danto meriaing. Kapoo' oraka' nkovuu'ning otoko tee-koo deeko' teka dii'ke tuumpieriai.”
Teketa Jerusalema'keta kivora doong divu'uaruko Peestasi danto Sisaria'aape beu'. Ee'noko dauna'mung kara simpe'doma ba'nanura Paula' po'antavaava'naang botoaru'.
Ee'noko tenang Paula' kuung poio' teing Ju'nupoong Jerusalema'keta danto berou'ning tee koroai donkonaara kapoo' mmau'nanka ivekeng-koo tuumpiaara masika'antanoo' otoroaruu'.
Teketa Paula'ke penkemparama aa'puu', “Ninge kapoo' teing aing ee' oro' toto'pui otoing nkoampa': Ju'nupoong biikaang boto, dootuu'nava pankava ee'noko tee Rooma'nung daurarong˜ Siisa'.”
Teka Peestasie Ju'nupoong dotu-anta-koo aa'puu' tee Paula', “Da' ee Jerusalema'aape daanto be'koo aroo'dari otong teka paararaavaina' teing aing kapoo' ning-koo dutakanoo'ka tuumpiraining-koo?”

Teka Paula'ke aa'puu', “Ning aa' Siisa' bakanoo' kara simpe'doma donkonansi o'nong, aa' ee'noo' ning tuutunang-koo makosinoo', ai' ning Ju'nupoong-koo kapoo' orara nkoampa', tee' dake tampa' noru'ei otong.

Ning kapoo' orarananka-nko deeko' ee'noko kapoo' ning boo'koo makosi nkoantu'nung deeko' ning boo'keta mmari'koo paaramaravarupeu', teka teing kapoo' ning tuumpimaamaing boturopananka deempari otoko naning otoa' teing-anko sing-antamupeu'nung, ai' ning tee Siisa'koo aroo'mari o'nong teie paaramuaing.”
Teketa Peestasie bakaning tuutunang-koo˜ norukasi'nanka ninka minkuarira aa'puu' tee Paula', “Siisa'koo aroo'daring tampeio' aa'damaang: Makosi, tee-anko Siisa'anko naniaing.”
Enang tee, nii'ning doong divu'uio' tee Akiripa', daurarong˜, teni ninka baara'ma'naang Beenis ninka, Sisaria' tavo'kuretu' Peestasi onkeonke'uree'naang.
Ee'noko teke mmau' doong otorora Peestasie Paula' bakanai' tee daurarong nauvuma aa'puu', “Anke naning narung otomang Piiliksie kiimatanava-koo otoko sipura tenkenuu'nung.
Ee'noko tenang ning Jerusalema' o'noko teing piristi'nanka-koo ovontunge ee'noko pankenankai Ju'koo-nupoonge tee dooremaama nia'mau' tee kara taaraevomira dupisi'koo makosi tampama'naang.

Teketa ninge aa'parantu' teing, ‘Nii' Rooma'nupoong tee' nkomariaung naning nii'ninge dupisi'koo sing-antavampii'naang tutung tuumpiaamaing ninka oing ooveearuko, napo' doona penkemparavaing-koong oovuaruko.’
“Tenang teing ninge nauaransio' a' oosiariru'nang ning nemarava' dauna'mung kara simpe'doma ba'nanamira botomaru' tee naning po'antavaava'naang.
Teketa tenang teinge tuumpiaako'ninge donkonaara teinge kapoo'koo oreng-pina' ninge tero noru'antu'ning-koo tuumpiaava'.
Teka nii'ning kapoo' oovuning-koo turampaako' daang masika'antavaamaing-koo, ee'noko naning narung-koo Jiisuu'koo boo'paru'nung-koo teka Paula'ke domamparu'nung tampukoo'.
Ning amurii' kapoo' baakeeneama simpe'koo paa'marara ninge nia'antu' aa'pama, ‘Da' ee Jerusalema'aape nanipeu' ee'noko teka dii' Ju' diikaning koompaara'navitue simpe'daavai dakanai'koo?’
Teka tenang Paula' Siisa'ke simpe'uu'naang tamparako ning botomaru' pinka'ai tanatavaava'naang bera Siisa'anko botoampainoo'ke basi.”
Ee'noko Akiripa'ke Peestasi aa'puu', “Ninge ninka taara-koo piamomaang tee aung naning.” Ee'noko Peestasie aa'puu', “Makosi, tane' taaraveaing tee.”

Teketa dauna'mung tee Akiripa' ee'noko baara'ma'naang Beenis, dauraronanka biikaninge nepunepu'ke aa'na' nepu'aresi poreta tumparetu' te' tuutunang nkoroma ee'noko teing kivora daaku' piatooronuka tanatanuka nari' porou' ee'noko teing nantoong tevuntu'koo bore'nuka. Teketa tee Paula' Peestasie botovurio' asi'na'moo po'antavau'.

Ee'noko teketa Peestasie aa'puu', “Da' Daurarong Akiripa' ee'noko dii' ookara a' nii' ninka nari' porining, ooveriai aung naning Ju'nupoonge ning eentamaamaung ookeng-koo aa'noko Jerusalema'ka ee'noko anka, otoaroo'naang tampaamaung peusi'kaama.
Teka ninge kapoo' tee boo'anta-koo makosi ooampa'. Ee'noko ee'nara baka Siisa'ke simpe'uu'naang tampario' ninge Siisa'anko botoama'naang matauantu'.

Teka ninge kapoo' taa'ni'antavama daariampaing oto'memua' tee nkaang ovoring nauama tee-koo. Tee'koo ninge a' dii'anko, ee'noko baru'noo' da'anko daurarong Akiripa'anko donkong-antavansing anketa paaravampira kapoo' oreng ooampiaining daariama'naang.
Ai' ninge ee' ooamaang, ninge naning kiimatanung tamung boturopa botoamparupeu' tuumpiaamaing-koong siraka'anta otoaruko.”
Akiripa'ke aa'puu' nauvuma tee Paula', “Ninge enang taura'dang da' daka minkuraraa'naang.” Ee'noko tenang Paula' tanka' toonuma penkeng-koong kara sira'paru' aa'puma,
“Ning e'mung biraankemaring nkaang kara sira'koo da'ankoi penkemarama Daurarong˜ Akiripa'ankoi teing kapoo' ookarai Ju'nupoonge tuumpimaamaing-koo,
ee' noru'amira da' tee ookara aarumonanka ee'noko turananka Ju'nupoong biikaning noru'ei otomaung dau basinoo'. Tee'koo ninge nia'damaang tampa' dooroontari ning taaramee'naang.
“Nkaang aarumo tee temu'keta nemaa'noo'keta o'noi o'nou'na' ookara Ju'nupoonge noru'mai o'nong teing-koo nkaning nantoong-koo meu'ke teke Jerusalema'ke.
Teinge tee temu'keta noru'mai o'nong, sira'maapeu' piavorora deeko', tee ning tee Boto-koo Keperuu'navitu-koong aarumo koonto' siompansi o'noko'nung, niikaang dootuu'koo aa'na' monkeena'navitu.
Enang tee ning aung a' donkonansing tuutunange paara-koo tee biraanke, boo'keta daa' tavo'kuaing nempamaung-koo, Kumponinge niumaraang-koo maraka-antavuu'nung.

Tee nii'namurii' biraanke deea' nii'ke ookarai Ju'nupoonge nempampimaung muung ee'noko doong karimarima Kumponing dootuu'ampima. Teka tee, ee daurarong, tee ee'nara biraanke sira'pansio' ee'ninge tuumpimaamaung Ju'nupoonge.
Aming-koo dii' Judia'nupoong Kumponinge boo'nuka daa'anta masika'anta-koo makosiria'?
“A'noo' ninge tee ninka koonto'na' ee'pina' noru'anko': Aung miring Jiisuu' Nasareti'nung onou amutemurii'ke turampamaa'noaing.

Ee'noko tee tee' nkoanko' Jerusalema'ke, aa'noko' meekupoong Jiisuu' sionuka kiimatanava-koo ku'numparanko' taura' tee piristi'nanka-koo pankenankai amau'nung ninka, ee'noko tee narung deea', nii'ninge teing meekupoong dupisi'koo mau'aariko' teing irikumparanko.

Ee'noko napo' ninge mmau'namu'pie kiimatavaranko' teka pava dootuu'nanka-koo ookara-koo Karistoo' penkempaavaina' paara-antavarama. Ee'noko bakei aa'na' iirang-antamarama manki'antavaranko' teing, bane osi pankeng oovuning biikaning-koo.”
“Nii'na'mung tee' nari' nkomarama Damaskas-aape nanantu' piristi'nanka-koo pankenge taura' amaara botomaio'.
Ee'noko ee daurarong, duaaki'nang taunge nanama araka paning-etaing ooantu' aa'na' sisisiisi duaa' divu'ui. Ning ee'noko teing nari' nanampiko'ning koromuri arakavaru'.

Ee'noko tenang nii' ookara kansi'koo doonko dua'marira ninge aurong taaravantu' Iiburuna' karoma aa'muko, ‘Soolo, Soolo, dake aming-koo ning manki'antamemaang? Nkaang kara dimpa'ema daka baikeraramaung irinto' deemparako.’
“Ee'noko ninge aa'pantu', ‘Da' baa Ovoring?’ Ee'noko Ovoringe aa'puu', ‘Ning tee Jiisuu', tee dake manki'antamemaung.

Teka donkoniaing deto, ning tee da'koo oro'marinoo' aung kapoo' otoko: Da' miru'damaang botorampaina' nkovema sira'pee'naang enang oomeina' ee'noko dama'ke kapoo' napo' da'koo oro'marara naurampaina'.
Mmari'antarampaing nantoonge aa'ninge turantaako dakanavitu Ju'nupoonge ee'noko Ju'deeainge, tevitu ee'navitu da' botoramaatomanoo'navitu.

Duta bante-antaveriko mutaanang-eta araka-koo bere'aria'naang ee'noko Sietani'keta Kumponing-koo bere'ariai biikaning oraka' nkonanka tonta'aravaina', ee'noko barenku-koo-navaro oto'evoroai teing ninka ning-koo baitoarira meekupoong deempariru'ning ninka.’”

“Tee tee', ee Daurarong Akiripa', kontemoa' nko-koo tee' paning-eta oro'parara naumuu'na'koo ninge sira'pansi nau-antavarantu' Damaskasie, teketa' Jerusalema'ke ee'noko teketa ookutunairu-koo Judia'navaro-koo ee'noko napo' Ju'deeaing-koo orara aarumo sipaara Kumponing-aape bere'arii'naang, ee'noko tampa' nkoarima bere'nii'nuka makosina' taa'ni'antavariri otoroo'naang.
Okora'noo' tee'koo Ju'nupoonge komaara pava dootuu'nava pankava-koo dupisi'maava'naang nkomau'.

Teka Kumponinge pakumuio' e'mung-koo basinoo' ning daankimaramaung bera e'mung a' donkonansi kapoo' ooantu'na' sira'pamaang ookara nantoong-koo ovontung-eta bera toire'koo basinoo'. Tee' Moosesi dovang teing Kumponing-etaning nakaro-nupoong urikupoonge nkoaravaing tampaama naumaaru'na' nari' minkuamaung, nii'na' deea'.

Aa'noko Kumponinge nii' domang-anta-koo Pako'pari'nii'ke baike tora'puaing-koong ee'noko tee tutuna'nung boo'keta daa'aravaing-koong, ee'noko tee' nkoarama baka araka sira'paraa'naang ookavitura-koo aa'noko Ju'nupoong-koo ee'noko Ju'deeaing-koo.”
Ee'noko tenang teie tee' penkemparama minkuvuko Peestasie bokuma aa'puu', “Paula', da' kanu'daring. Dakaang barevare pankainge kanu'antaruing.”
Teka Paula'ke aa'puu',
“Ning kanu'marava', da' pankaing Peestasi, teka ning koonto' to'biimari masika' karomang.

Aunge dauraronge noru'ui otong, masikee-antamupeu' aing-koo kapoo'koo, ee'noko tee-ankoi tamung danto minkuampeu' teie noru'uio', ai' ninge masika' noru'ansi o'nong kapoo' aing-koo nii'naare bakaang punkaa'koo nerakanaare deea', ai' ookarai noru'ai otong kapoo' nkoaru'na'.
Arekee' da' daurarong Akiripa', dake ee Kumponing-etaning nakaro-nupoong urikupoong masika'antaveri otong? Ee', noru'ansi o'nong, dake masika'antaveri otong.”
Ee'noko Akiripa'ke aa'puu' maku'uma, “Anaarei apukanaarei ee Karistoo'aape bere'antamee'naang?”
Ee'noko Paula'ke aa'puu', “Kumponing-koo kunsimaramang da' narung paku-koo deea' teka aing ookara tee' nari' e'mung taaramaamatomaing dii' ning-pina' oro'darii'naang aing sieena io' doonko otoko.”
Teketa tenang daurarong deto donkonuko aa'nou' ovo'ma' donkonuu' ee'noko teni Beenis donkonuu' ee'noko ookara nantoong teke ba'naniau'ning teing ninka nari' donkonau'.
Ee'noko tenang teketa tenkenaara bii'ka kareaama aa'paako', “Aung naning kapoo' tee dupisi'koong ee'noko kiimatanava-koo pinka'koong makosi nkovuaung.”
Ee'noko Akiripa'ke Peestasi aa'puu', “Aung naning unaa-antaveripeu'nung Siisa'ke taaravuu'naang aroo'aravaruu'nung dei.”

Teketa tee nii' Itali-aape aarerie be'koo tamaaru' Paula' ee'noko nii'ning kiimata-nupoong nari'. Ee'noko tee naning miring Julias teing tanata-koo botoau', tee Siisa' bakaning mau'moni'navitu-koo narung daaku' piatooronuka tarenara.

Ee'noko danto aareri-koo A'damitiang biikanareng-koo koinampira tenkenampiru', Eesia-nameensi' kantevui siompuai-nareng-koo. Aristakas nii' ninka nari' meru', Tesalonaika'nara, Masedonia'nameensi'koong.
Teketa dauna'mung Saidoni'navuntu' daanto duumemariru', ee'noko Juliasie Paula' tampa' nkovuma ba'maikori' beero'koo taura'puu' teinge pakuaava'naang.
Ee'noko teketa danto tenkenampima Saiparasi-namui'koo nee'mariri meru' boo'ai tamuriko.
Ee'noko tenang pirung pako'ampiri merima Silisia ee'noko Pampilia' aa'namensi'kai kato tankinampira Maira-navuntu'koo tavo'mariru' Lisia-nameensi'koonoo'.
Teka teie piatooronuka daaku' tarenarai narung aareri oovuu' Aleksandaria' biikanareng Itali-aape beko, ee'noko tereng-koo koo'muru'.

Teketa makenge terenge nanampiko mmau' doong divu'kuio' karimarikotaa' Naidas-navuntu' due'mariru'. Ee'noko pionge doonko Eesia siong-koo koonto' bono'murio' ee' deto Kiriti'namui'koo pako'marira nee'mariri meru' Saamoni-koo siuru˜ koroampiri.
Aa'na' pore'mori Kiriti'namui'koo miirimariri merikotaa' nii'noo' miring Tampoo' Kunkumenoo' tampaamanoo' basimariru', Lasea'keta osi pankamono-ita due'.

Tee' pore'morima mmau' batei tamung tanking-antavampiru' aa'noko Ju'nupoong unkumoarimanang ee'noko pirunge nanu'koo tampanang. Ee'noko nanu' arika'pario' pirung oraru'kumanang meu'pampira Paula'ke nauvurima aa'puru',

“Ee aing, ninge ee'pina' ooamaang: Nari' nanampiaing deeko' tee baike kune'ampii'naang, ee'noko kapoo' baru' paa'araa'naang otoining aing aa'ning: kavo narung deea' teka areng aareri-nareng ee'noko niikaang domaang nari'.”
Teka teie piatooronuka narung daaku' tarenarai tee tereng okovenung ee'noko tee nanu'anta-nko beekaang kara aa'na' barorompuko', Paula' baru' deea'.

Ee'noko teketa te' kunkumenoo' baku'koo makotuaruio' piong kamaari ninkaing batei-koo, teing-koo mmau' nantoong teketa tenkeng-koo piavorou' ee' noru'aama, Piiniks-navuntu'koo pa tampa' tavo'kampipeu'. Te' ee'noo' napo' Kiriti'koonoo' kunkumenoo' baku'koo tampoo' kamaari bakanang.
Ee'noko tenang tee piong ee'depeto tampa' poko aa'pau', “Enang Piiniks tampa' tavo'marii'naang.” Ee'noko teinge aanka' doompeto barampaarai'nange Kiriti' miiringe danto meru' piisi' due'ke.
Teketa tee piong bari'uu' ee'doompeto piong ivekung pomana', pora'ka daue doompeto pora tamuru'.
Ee'noko tenang tee aareri tee' kompuio' piong-aapei be'koo makotuaruio' tamung danto bere'ampirio' bii'muru'.
Ee'noko oki'namui'koo mui'namui' miring Kauda'namui'koo nee'mariri meru', ee'noko teke karimarima tee bakaasi deto kakau barampampirai'nange kuunga aareri-koo pinka'ampiri dai'ampiru'.

Teketa tereng aareri-nareng nanampi-ko'nareng koomponge pankenge boonavete puring-antavampima dai'ampiru'. Ee'noko Aperika'koo due' daunaa'noo' pionge koing-antamuri'neeng-koo avoreaama tene' piontee'nane' miiruni-koonane' depeto siau'. Teketa mo'ming-koo bi'aara doonko pirung-koo dua'antavaio' tene'ke tee aareri teka date'date-antavuu'. Ee'noko tee' nari' o'noriko tamung bii'muriko'.
Ee'noko dauna'mung pionge avitoitoi bai'muriko teinge tee piontee'koong botunarong oko dua'koo depeto sing-antavau'.
Bera piong beenamparu'na'mung nii'ke ookarai birenge kompampiri doonko kosi'ampiru' ookara kapoo'nanka terong botunarong-koo bi'ari otoko'ning ninka nari'.
Ee'noko mmau' doong-koo duaa' dovang beento' oki'noo' oro'pariaruko', ee'noko aung piong aa'na' pankaing masikung oro'parako domamariauka'nung-pina' noru'mariru'nung.

Ee'noko teing tee taamang nai-koo mmau' doonge datavaavaruio' Paula'ke uro'kanoo' pora teing-koo aa'puu', “Ee aing, tee' naurampiru'na' taaramerira Kiriti'keta moriaruu'nung dei tampa', aung baike kune'ampiarupeu' ee'noko aing kapoo'nanka kera'pampiarupeu'.
Enang tee naurampimang ninge, domang kuaa'doriaing aa'noaina': dii'koo narung minkiaravauka', teka aung aareri narung naka'aravai.
Ai' e'mung tee muunga ning-anko tee koosinung˜ Kumponing-nung donkonuing tee ning moo'muio' mintoompevomaung bakaang.

Ee'noko teie aa'mui, ‘Aroreauka', Paula'. Da' tee bakei Rooma' tampa' basirarara Siisa'koo uro'kanoo' donkoniaing. Ee'noko ooveko aing teing da' ninka nari' nanirimaatomaing Kumponinge da' ninka nari' domamparii'naang tampuru'ning.’
Tee'koo domang kuaa'doriaing, ee aing, ai' ninge tee Kumponing masika'antavansi otong tee' nari' naumuina' masika' nkoaraa'naang.
Teka nii' teing nii'namui'koo piisi'koo koing-antamuriaining.”
Teketa piong kivora-ita karenamparu'na'mung tavo'kuko tee' tamung danto pirung Eeriria-aape-naru'koo bii'antamuriko meu'namang aareri-koo-nupoonge ee' noru'au': Nii' pa kansi'koo due'marimang.
Teketa paaranampaama ee' doonko daanga'noo' kenaanka kivora daanga' paaravau'. Teketa napo' danto'daanto paarananpaama kivora-ita pa'noko' daanga' paaravau'.
Ee'noko avoreaara kapang-koo koinampi'neeng-koo karenaumo aanka' sing-ntavau' taa'o˜namarang-eta doonko. Ee'noko da'deng tane'puu'naang piavoroi nempaako'.
Ee'noko teketa aareri-koo-nupoong mmariaava'naang kariarima tee bakaasi doonko sing-antavaako' pirung-koo, daang aanka' sing-antavaama koo'be˜ita doonko.
Teketa Paula'ke tee daaku' tarenara ee'noko teing piatooronuka aa'puru', “Aing aareri-koo kuung otoroaruko deeko' dii' teing domantariaroo'naang.”
Teketa teinge piatooronukai tee bakaasi-koong mo'ming napu'aara danto sipau'.

Teketa tane'puma nanuko Paula'ke teing taamanaava'naang aa'na' botovurima aa'puu', “E'mung te'mung kivora-ita ˜karenang doong taa-na'mung teing-koo doong dii' taamang nai dataveria' ee'noko avoro' narung-koo otorikoo'.
Tee'koo ninge taamanirii'naang botorampimang dii' puring-antaruriaina'. Taaraveriai, dii'koo bore'keta dapo-koo navi' paa'aravaroo'naang.”
Ee'noko tee' minkuvura teie berete' nkavura tampa' tampura Kumponing-koo, teing-koo dutakanoo'ke teke pisi'ura nai tutumpuu'.
Tenang teing ookara tee' nkovura domang kuaa'antavurio' nii'ning taamang-koo naiau'.
Nii' ookara nantoong aareri-koo o'noriko'ning naro'ka kenaanka daaku'keta naruaape-ita kenai'ka bera ˜narung-taa [276].
Ee'noko aa'nou' uite' nai-koo makosining naiampira poomuru', ee'noko naiampima sipampiru'ning ookara bakurapo' dua'aaru' pirung-koo aareri kuaa'oo'naang.
Enang tee tane'puio' teinge tevora' kansi' tasi'paava', teka teinge nii'noo' ooaako' kunkumenoo' piisi'po'noo' ee'noko te' ee'noo' piisi'koo tee aareri koing-anta-koo maroaako' makosi deeko'.

Ee'noko teinge teing aanka'nanka-koong mo'ming pirung-koo dua'aara aanka'nanka teka nari' sipaaru'. Tee' nkoaama tenang ee'nang teing bentang aareri koong-antaning dapa'aareta bi'aresi otoreko'noo'keta doonko sing-antavaaretu' beekanoo' pirung-koo. Teketa tene' piontee'nane' uro'kanoo'nane' deto siampau', teketa piisi'aape daanto be'antavau'.
Teketa' daunaa'noo' paaku'antavaara piisi'koo koing-antavau'. Teketa koo'benoo' piisi'koo keemparara ka'nunuaruu' ee'noko taa'o-namarang boo'ai teka naka'uu'.
Teketa teinge piatooronukai teing kiimata-nupoong tavu'koo maroaariko' naampearira koo'ari'neeng-koo.

Teka teie piatooronuka daaku' tarenarai tee Paula' domang-anta-koo piavora orokovuru' tee' maroaako'na' nko-koo. Ee'noko teie naampe-koo makosinuka botovuru' tutung doonko koo'arira naampearii'naang piisi'aape.
Ee'noko asi'ninge bentananka ee'noko aareri pute'aru'nairu kompai naampe-koo botovuru'. Aung tee tee' ee'na' domamariru'na' kansi'aape morira.
Teketa tee' domamariru'noo'keta nii'ke noru'ampiru' temui' mui'namui' miring Maalta-namui'.
Ee'noko temui'nupoonge nantoonge aa'na' bakei navumaaru', onkeonke'maarima aa'nou' nta' betu'memaaru' tenang ee'nang apo'uma kamaari nkoarako.
Paula'ke tee koi'nanka oosivuma nta'koo betu'uko tenang tee boru' doparopa-po'nung nta'ke uipaarii'oko teketa bakoarara Paula'koo bireng-koo kakiaru'.

Tenang teinge nantoonge temui'nupoonge ooaara teu boru'nu bireng-koo bi'ari otoko teinge aa'paako' bii'ka kareaama, “Aung naning pa dupisi'nko deemparako bane aareri-eta domampari, teka teie kumponinge mero'nkoi domang-koo taura'pua'.”
Teketa Paula'ke tee boru' nta'koo tanka'ni'pura baike kune'ua'.

Teketa teinge tee nempaako'nung doremparara nii'noo' boo' dua'arako ooaava'naang. Teka pankaroong nemparikotaa' tee-koo kapoo' basiaravaruio' teinge norunoru' paariarira aa'pau', “Aung tee kumponinanka-koo narung.”

Narung ovo'ma' pankaing temui'koong miring Publias teke kansi' oto'evuko'nung simariru'noo'ke due'ke. Teie ee'narai bokumurira onkeonke'murira beenang doong-koo o'nori tampa' nkomuriko' nii' damisimainku.
Tenang ee'nang Publias bauma siipavoko uipaarii' ninka kuviri'oma, ee'noko Paula'ke bera beero'uma bireng pante'ura kunsivuio' taarevou'.
Ee'noko tenang ee'nang tee tee' taarevoio' taaravaara temui'koo-nupoong ookara siipa-po'nupoong tee-anko porora taarevorou'.
Teinge tee nii' avuavu'nanka mmau' amaaru'.

Teketa' tee beekuri kaara tankinuko teketa tenkenampiru' aarerie teke kamaari bakaang batei-koo temui'koo otou'nareng-koo koinampira. Ee'noko temui'nupoonge ookara kapoo'nanka nanu'koo apuka'mariru'ning te' aareri-koo kuung si'memaaru'. Tereng aareri-nareng Aleksandaria' biikanareng miring Pauroonka Kumponinka tampaako'nareng, uro'kanoo'ke bore' kenaanka teka'nii'nareng.
Teketa Siirakius basimarira teke beenang doong o'noru'.

Ee'noko teketa tenkenampira tee dovinge dama'du-aape bii'muri'neeng-koo kororairai' nanampikotaa' doonko Reekium basimariru'. Teke na'mung doong o'norio' doving toroarama ee' depeto poio' tenkenampira ke'munta-na'mung namu'ke Puteoli basimarira aareri teka sipampiru'.

Ee'noko teka nii'ke nii'ning Karistoo'koo baito-nupoong kune'arampirio' teing tasi'maarira bokumaaru' teke teing ninka nari' o'norii'naang ˜ke'munta-taa doong-koo. Ee'noko temono-ita daanto kau'ke nanampiru' bera Rooma'aapenairu-koo basimariru'.

Ee'noko teinge Karistoo'koo baito-nupoonge nii' moru'noo' taaravaara Rooma'keta porora narung osi-koo basiariru' nii' kune'maarii'naang, Aapia Bakanoo' Baaveroma tampaako'noo'. Ee'noko teing-koo nii'narionge pava beevaari baave-kooning otoko'noo'ka osia kune'maaru'. Paula' teing oovurira Kumponing-koo tampara tampuma domang purimparu'.
Ee'noko tenang Rooma' tavo'marira Paula' baka oovunava-koo oto' piavoio' taura'pau' teka narunge piatooronuka-koonge tanatavui otoo'naang.

Ee'noko beenang doong tankinuko Paula'ke ookara Ju'nupoong pankenanka teke otoroko'ning naro' bokuvuru'. Ee'noko tenang oosiaririo' Paula'ke aa'puru' teing, “Ee dii' mmarang, Ju'nupoong, ninge tee bane kapoo' nkoampa' niikaning nantoong orari-anta-koo ee'noko niikakatauro biikaning toomonanka, teka ning tamung dai'maara Jerusalema'ka Rooma'nupoong-anko tavo'mau'.
Ee'noko teinge Rooma'nupoonge nkaang kara simpe'aara tee ning kiimata-ita unaa-antamaava'naang piavorou', kapoo' tenai'koo nkanai'koo ning boo'anta-koo makosi ooaavarura.
Teketa tenang Ju'nupoong tee'koo piavoroaruio' ninge nii'na' noru'amparura Siisa' narung-koo aroo' sipantu' simpe'muu'naang. Nkaning Ju'kooning pankeng tuumpi-koo moa'.

Tee'koo ning tuumpimau'noo'koo ninge dii' oorampira dii' kararampima naurampii'naang botomaring. Okora'noo' ning sieenai dai'mari o'noing tee aung kapoo': Tee Pako'pari'nii' Isireeli-nupoonge Nempaamaung ninge masika'antavamaung-koo.”
Ee'noko teinge aa'pau' tee, “Nii'ke karavoto Judia'keta nkavampia' da'koo minkunaa, ee'noko nii'nung nii'marang-koong otoa' nii'koo a' pora nii' naumurima oraka' minkuruu'nung da'.
Teka nii' dake minkueko taara-koo piamorimang dake noru'ei otoina', ai' nii'ke tee ookanairu-koo tamung oraka' nari' minkuaako taaravampimaung tevung nerakavung dake siompemanavung.”

Tenang teinge doong nii'na'mung miru'evaara otoko'nava-koo karinga porou'. Ee'noko teie enang tevung nerakavung kankenkankeng-antavuru' teing, tane'keta bera kamunoo'ke basi. Ee' nauvuru', nantoong Kumponing-namuu'kooning arekee' oro'nuka teie daankivuru' teing-eta kara aa'noko Moosesie boto sipuma daarivuu'ning ee'noko teinge nii'ninge nakaro-nupoonge tenang-eta deto daariaako'ning, teing tasi'antavurii'naang tee Jiisuu' tee Kumponinge temu'keta Pako'pari'nii' bakaang muu' tare-koo.
Ee'noko nii'ninge Jiisuu' tasi'pau' bakaang kara taaravaara, teka nii'ninge masika'antavaava'.
Teketa siivenke'eema tenkenaava'naang nkoariko Paula'ke asi'naare minkuvuma aa'puu', “Tanuaang Meekung tee masika'paru'nung teing-koo diumaraang-koo Aisaia' karantavuko˜ daarivuma aa'puu'noo'ka,
‘Aing Ju'nupoong bera aa'periai, Dii'ke tee bakei bane nkaang kara taaraverikotaa', teka onoue komperiauka'nung; ee'noko bane taa'ni'anta ooverikotaa', teka tasi'periauka'nung.

Tee' naueriaing, ai' aing nantoong teing maroita domang poruruorou'˜ ee'noko biikaang punkaa' kapamporou'nankai maroita taaravaa'neeng-koo, ee'noko biikaang duta mutuuariru'nankai aa'no'neeng-koo: dutai tasi'paara, punkaa'ke taaravaara, domange onou kompaara ning-anko bere'ariko taare-antavarami'neeng-koo.’
“Enang tee, tee' daarivuu'noo'koo dii'ke noru'eriaing Kumponinge tee domang-anta bakaang Ju'deeaing-anko bee'naang tampuu'. Teinge taaravaavaing tee.”
Ee'noko Paula'ke tee' minkuvuio' teing Ju'nupoong bii'ka deepaiko'eema tenkenau'.
Ee'noko tee Paula' teva'koo kemare'ka ookutuning otou' dai'aritaa' baka moo'uma teva. Nantoong tee-anko poroko'ning onkeonke'uriko'.
Ee'noko makempua' teing-koo daankivuko' tee Kumponing bakaang muu' ee'noko kapoo'ke avo'uaruko nau-antavuriko' Jiisuu' tee Ovoring tero Pako'pari'nii' ookara nantoong domamuriainoo'koo.
Basi te'.

Aung karavoto˜ ninge Paula'ke daariamang. Ning ee'nara Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaang botovotonaa' Kumponinge kara-okomui-nka deemaraa'naang bokumuu'nung. Teie simpe'mui bamuu' bakaang doorenang tampara tavo'koo.
Tero urikamu' Kumponinge miru'uu' tee aung doorenang tampara teing nakaronuka˜ urikupoong biikaang Daari Meekung-koo kuunge.
Tee doorenang tampara tee tee ee'nara Bauring-koonung;

Mono bakanamenge parapara-koo tee Deevita'ke bakanavinge ponto'aru'nung tang-koo makosi, nka boo'keta daa'aru'na'koo tee ee'nara naning meekung masikung ee'noko Kumponing Bauring aa'na' purinto' sira'pari otong. Tee niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo'.
Tee-koo e'manansi kara-okomui-nka deemaru' nantoong amutemurii' meung-antavarama'naang tee masika'antavaava'naang tee.
Dii' Rooma'nupoong teinge teing ninka nari' otoring, Jiisuu' Karistoo'ke bokururu'ning.

Tee'koo aung karavoto dii'anko daariamang, dii' nii'ning Rooma'nupoong-kooning Kumponinge piaaruri bakaning meekupoong deentarii'naang bokururu'ning ookara-anko. Biraanke ee'noko mooa dii'koo otoaing Kumponing Niuma-itaing ee'noko teieta Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo'.
Tutung tee nkaang Kumponing-koo tampa' tang minkuama'naang dii' tee-koo baitorarimaung-koo Jiisuu' Karistoo'ke pakumurio'. Ookara kansi'ke taaravaamaung.

Kumponing ee'nara ninge mintoompevomaung nkaang domang ootukununge Bauring bakaang doorenang tampara doorearama teie ee'narai masika'antamuko aa'dampimang: Ninge dii' tantampimaung nkaang kunsi-koo ookara-koo.
Mmau'namu'pie kunsimaramaung Kumponing tana'ama taura'muu'naang bakaang piai tampa' tokoona' nanama beero'dampii'naang.
Aa'na' oo-koo piamoi otong dii' nii'ning avuavu' Tanuaang Meekung-etaing pare'dampii'naang puring-antaruriaining.
Aa'noaing: nii' tee Kumponing nari' masika'antavampimaing nari' kune'meerira oomeeri domang kuaa'antameeriai.

Aung dii'ke noru'erii'naang piamomaang dii'ke mmaikori'ke: Mau'maramaung dii'anko be'koo tampa' dii' ninka ning mintoomarako sinang tampa' bi'uaina' tee' nari' teing nii'ning Ju'deeaing-kooning nauaranko nkoaramana', nka e'mung doong-koo basinoo'koo dii' beero'koo avo'mari o'nong.
Ning botomuu' ookamurii' nantoong nauarama'naang, osikaiaang ee'noko biikoori, norukasi'nuka ee'noko amakoori, ookara.
Tee'koo aa'na' piamoi otong daankiama'naang tee tampara doorenang dii' ookara Rooma'nupoong-koo.

Ning maia'moa' tee doorenang tampara sira'koo. Ai' tee tee Kumponing bakaang purinto' domang-anta-koo makosi ookara nantoong masika'antavaavaining, tutuntoma Ju'nupoong ee'noko napo' teing Ju'deeaing.

Doorenang tamparai tee sirapo'antavuing tee' Kumponinge nantoong nari-antavuriaina' tee ninka nari'. Ee'pina': Jiisuu' masika'antavaako, tee-koo masika'anta-koo narung-koo koonto'nuka tampuriai. Tee' Daari Meekung-koo aa'pumana',
“Naning tee bakaang masika'anta-koo Kumponing ninka nari' nariari otoaing tee domamparavaing.”
Kumponing bakaang iira tee paning-etaing siraka'pari otong teing-koo Kumponing piavoroaing ee'noko oraka' nkoarimaing-koo, teing kara masikung avo'aamaing-koo oraka' nkoaama.
Ookara kapoo' noru'koo makosi Kumponing-koong sira'pari otong teing oreng-koo. Kumponinge baka siraka'antavuu'nung teing-koo.

Kansi' pupu'aru'noo'keta bakaang iri' o'paa' ee'noko bakaang aarumo deto basi bane oro'paravainge, otoremaung. Noru'aapeu' kapoo'nanka nkovuu'ning ooaama. Tee tee enang maku'na' oto'evoroa' tuutunang˜koo.

Noru'noo' tee temu' noru'aako' Kumponing, teka pankaing-antavaavaruko' ee'noko tampara tampaavaruko' tee-koo makosina'. Teka biikaang noru' toosi-paa' deemparara minkuminku tutumpaako' daang-koonanka. Bera biikaang domang kanu'koo baraa'aru' koonto' mutaanang.
Norukasi'nuka tamparima baru' kanu'nanka deeng-antavariko'.
Paariaako' Kumponing boo'paa' bakaang meenasi teinge baka-oonanka booromaing-pina' oro'nankai aa'ning-koo: nantoong, bareng, ee'noko kau' karenaumonanka-koo.
Tee'koo Kumponinge sipurira

Paariaama Kumponing bakaang kara masikung tositosie teing kapoo'nanka Kumponinge nkovuru'ning dootuu'aakoo' meekeng-pina' tareaarima, tee ee'nara teing nkovuru'nung divu'aitaa'nange, tee biraanke-po'nung doong kante otomaung. Ee', bakei!
Tee'koo Kumponinge tamung doong-koo sipuru' aarumo orara maimaia' karaa'koo. Teing-koo maniku' nampeesi baari'au' bii'ka maniku' naing oto'ke.
Napo' donkaang tee' nari', maniku' ninka nampeesi sipai bii'ka donkaang naing bakiaa'eeko' maimaia'na'. Tee'nko aarumo orara-koo tee kiimata makosina' tora'paamaung bii'ka-koo.
Teketa' Kumponing noru'koo kasiaavaruko Kumponinge tamung doonko sipuru' biikaang noru' orara-koo oto'koo, aarumo toosi-paa' ninka.
Bakei amutemurii'ke maanto'uru', oraka'nkoi, orara aarumoi, oko'okoi, ee'noko oraka' noru'ke. Mamairoi maanto'ke ee'noko tavu'nkoi, turang, tositosi, too'deng;

Teing temurii' tee ukuusi baukonuka, miring orari-antananka, Kumponing-eta kare-nupoong, bauvaupaa' nkonanka, bii'ka kirokai-nuka, baka daanganuka, daang mataunuka, biumaraang-koo meuntepa'nuka, onouropanuka, maraka-anta toto'nuka, piaaropanukai, ee'noko ama'ama'nuka.

Kumponing bakaang miru' ee' oro': Teing tee' nkoariaining tee booroaining. Ee'noko bane tee tee miru' noru'ai nka tee teinge nkoaamaung, ee'noko bakei kei'oromaung nii'ning oo-koo tee' nari' napo' nkoariko.

Ee' masika', dii'koo narunge tee aa'pupeu': Teing bakei oreng dake ning naumemaing. Teka io' noru'eai mmaiko': Da' tee' nari' oro'ke, teing-pina'. Teing dake aa'perima: Teing oreng, kiimatavariaining, tee' minkuema tee, da' nari' teing ninka minkuraramang da' tee' nari' nkoraramaung-koo.
Dake aa'pepeu': Nii'ke tee noru'ampiri otong tee Kumponing-nung kiimata makosina' tavo'aravaing teing-koo nantoong-koo temurii' kapoo' nkoaamaing-koo.
Nka ninge ee'pina' nauramaang mmaiko': Nka dake teing naing tuumpierimaang dakanoo' noru'darava' tee' nari' nkoraramanoo'? Dake ee' noru'emaung ee: “Ninge baari'ampaing Kumponing bakaang kiimata.”?
Teie aa'na' piaaruma da' pankaroong kiimatarua', boimpui nentumang bere'daraa'naang dakaang oraka' nko-ita, ee'noko noru'ea' otong ee?
Tee dakaang domang ivekung bere'daravaunge mmau' deeng-antavemaung tee iirananka Kumponing-etananka, ee'noko tee oro'paravaing asirana'mung bakaang kiimata koonto'nanka sira'puaina'mung.
Teie tee moo' avuriaing ookara nantoong biikaang nko-nkoi siompui otoina'.
Teing nantoong tampa' nari' nkoaamaing ee'noko besi'aakoo' tee meenasi Kumponing-etaing, pankaing-anta, ee'noko domaang boo'paa', teie teing domaang tampa' nari' oto' avuriaing.
Teka teing turang nkoaamaing ee'noko kara masikung siompaavarukoo' ee'noko orara aarumo siompaakoo' teing tee Kumponinge aa'na' iiravoitaa' tavuriaing.
Kune'aavaing teinge tee pore'anta orarunsi ninka ookara nantoong oraka' nkoarimainge, tutuntoma Ju'nupoong ee'noko napo' dama'ke Ju'deeaing tee' nari'.
Ee'noko tee meenasi, miring pankaing ee'noko mooa kompaavaing teinge tampa' nkoarimainge tutuntoma Ju'nupoong ee'noko napo' Ju'deeaing, Kumponinge nari' basinoo'ka noru'urimaung-koo.

Teing nantoong oraka' nkoarimaing Moosesi-nung botoi kuung deempuriaruko kera'anta kune'aavaing, bane tee noru'aava' nkoaamaunge. Ee'noko teing teie botoi kuung deempurio' oraka' nkoarimaing tee teie botoi simpe'uriaining.
Naninge tee, tee boto taaravupeu' nka tee siompuarura Kumponing-ankoi koonto' deemparavarupeu'. Teing mutero'aamaing naing koonto'nuka tampuriaing.
Nii'ning Ju'deeaing Moosesi-nung boto oto'evoroaing, nka tee bii'ka matauai tampa' nkoaako tee, noru'ampipeu' teinge tasi'pai otong tampara aarumo bane Moosesi-nung boto noru'aavainge.

Tee matau biikaang tampa' ooampira noru'ampipeu' kapoo'nanka botoi minkuvui otoining teing-koo biikaang domang-koo daariari otong. Ee'noko biikaang domange nari' masika' onouaakoo'. Tasi'pari otong biikaang noru'ke nii'ning namu'na' tuumpivurikoo' ee'noko napo' namu'na' pakuvurikoo'.

Tee'koo, teie doorenang tamparai minkuvui otoina' ninge sira'pamaunge, tee' nari' nkoaravaing te'mung asi'na'mung Kumponinge Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo kuunge koong-antavuriaing biikaang aarumo makensi'ning noru'uitaa'.
Enang tee da' Ju'nupoong-koong tantarama Moosesi-nung botoi pakuruio' da' Kumponing bakaang naning tantarama daangantaramaung deeko',
ee'noko tee boto-koo barerararai'nange Kumponing-nung pia noru'ei otoing deeko',
ee'noko simpe'epeu' kapoo' orara ee'noko tampara, ee'noko da' naning mutuu siong-anta deeko', ee'noko araka teing-koo mutaanang-kooning-koo,
napo' nau-antai amakoori-koo, ee'noko kake'ii-anta toire'koo deeko', ee'noko kompei otomaung noru' masikung kinkompario' tee boto-koo kuung deeko',
da' nantoong nau-antaverimaung daka ee nau-antararava' otong? Da' bakiaa'koo daankirarama poteverimaung, arekee', bakiaa'kiaunge?
Nampeesi orari-koo poteverikoo'. Arekee', daka nampeesi orarieaunge? Kumponing tositosinanka maremaarenanka tamperikoo'. Arekee', maareroa' teing-koo pakuraramaung ee?
Bakei daangantaramaung tee boto tampa' noru'ei otoing tantarama. Arekee', Kumponing-nung miring dua'antaveaung ee tee boto toto'pema?
Daari Meekunge tee' nari' minkuvui otong, aa'pumaung,
“Dii' Ju'nupoong oraka' otoriko tee'koo Ju'deeainge Kumponing oraka' minkuaamaung.”
Dopa' toto' tee Kumponing-nung taa'ni'anta masikung tampa' taaraveri dei tee boto. Teka toto'periaing deeko' tee boto tee, diikaang dopa' toto' tee-pina' tamunsi'nung deempari otoaing.

Teka nii'nung naning Ju'deeaung dopa' toto' nkavuaruinunge tee boto tampa' siompui dei siraka'pari otong tee makosi, otopeu' tee-pina' naning dopa' toto' nkavuing-pina', bane dopa' toto' nkavuarupeu'nunge.
Tee ee'nara naning, dopa' toto' nkavuaunge boto tampa' tarevui dei, teie tee da' boo'koo makosi tantupeu', da' ee'nara boto toto'pemaung, bane boto daarinii' ee'noko dopa' toto' kompei otomaunge.
Nka naning tamung dama'dunung oo'ooe Ju'koong Ju' masikung deea', ee'noko dopa' toto' masikung tee mono-aapenameng-koong aarumo deea'.

Naning Ju' masikung tee, bakaang domang Ju'pina' otomaung, Tanuaang Meekunge dopa' toto'nii', tamung boto paara-koong deea'. Baa tee naning temurii' aampari' nkavuaing bakaang domang-koo tee, teie daangang nkavuaing Kumponing-eta, nantoong-aapeita deea'.
Aming nkoaravai naning Ju'koong deemparako? Dopa' toto'ke arekee', pakuvuai?
Ee', moo' pankaing amutemurii' otong. Tutuntoma ee': Ju'nupoong-koo Kumponinge kinkompuu' bakaang karakara.
Kinkompuio' nii'ninge masika'antavaava' tee kara. Enang arekee', teinge masika'antavai meumpaavaruko Kumponinge koonto' masika' bampuu'na' nkovuai? Ai' tee' napo' teing-pina' nari' meuntepa'aravai?
A, tee' deea', bakei! Kumponing tee masika'pari otoaing, bane nantoong ookara tosiariko. Daari Meekunge ee' minkuvui otoina',
“Dakaang kara masikung deemparaa'naang tenang da' kareko, ee'noko tuutunantaako boong deempee'naang.”

Nii'ninge bii'ka matauarima tee, daang ee' minkuaamaung, “Nii'ka meuntepa'marimaung-koo Kumponing-koo oraka' otoa', ai' nii' oreng oomaarima nantoonge Kumponing bire'ario' aa'na' tampara ooaako teie nii' kiimata-koo makosi deea'.”
A, tee aa' tee' deea', bakei! Ookara nantoong Kumponinge kansi'nupoong simpe'uriaing kiimatavurima.
Nii'noo' naninge aa'mupeu', “Io' noru'eai: Nkaang tosiro'ke Kumponing pankaing-antavumaung tasi'anta-koo Kumponing bakei masikung. Tee'koo ning boo'koo miru'muauka'.

Aming-koo potemerimaunge oraka' nko-koo? Tee tee tee' nkomariko kapoo' tampara basiarapeu'.” Nka tee teing nantoong temurii' kara minkuaamaing teing boo'koo miru'nii'nuka te' minkunii'na'. Nii' Karistoo'navitu kara tee' oro' minkuampiaing. Tamung nii'ninge tee' tuumpimaarimaung.

Enang arekee', nii' ee Ju'nupoong Ju'deeaing-koo deu basinuka? Bakei koonto' makotua'. Ninge tee, tero naurampiring nii' Ju'nupoong ee'noko Ju'deeaing ookara nari' o'noring oraka'nkoi naro'ka kuung deemuri otong.
Tee' daariari otoina' Daari Meekung-koo,
“Naning tampara otoa', narung duukung otoa' bakei.
Narung noru'po'nung otoa' Kumponing besi'umaung.
Ookara dama'du-aape bere'ariring, oroo'ke nari' beroing. Narung naninge tampa' nkovua'. Narung duukung otoa' bakei.
Kara orara biikaang karang-eta tavo'aramaung davoru-koong ka'mi' kuvi dako'doma-eta tavo'aramana'. Biikaang meneng tositosi-nko. Biikaang kara boru'ketaing dopa-pina' beruu'keta tavo'arakoo'.
“Biikaang karang barakosi'ke maanto' naari-anta ninka.
Teing dupisi' namu'ke nkonanka.
‘Taung tooreere navung siompaamaing nantoong oraka' dee'antavaarima.
‘Ee'noko mooa-koonavung taung noru'aava'.
“Kumponing noru'aavarukoo', avoreaava'.”

Tee'koo Kumponinge baru'noo' kiimatavuriaing Ju'nupoong deempariko ai' teing teing makosinuka Kumponing bakaang boto meung-koo, teka meumpaava' teinge, oreng aarumo oraka'nko nkoaama. Nii'nung teing-koo aa'maio'aravauka'nung. Ee'noko teing naing deea', ookara kansi'nupoong tee kareaavauka'nung tuumpivuriko Kumponinge.
Naning otoa' Kumponing bakaang boto siompuma koonto' tamparavaing, ai' boto tee nantoong ookara oreng tasi'anta-koo miru'nii'.
Nka tee enang nii'navung sira'paring nantoong koonto'nuka deemparipeu'navung Kumponing-ankoi, botoi deea'. Tevung tevung tero teie botoi ee'noko nakaro-nupoonge nari' minkuau'navung.
Ee'noko tee tevung enang sira'parinavung ee' oro'navung: Teing Jiisuu' Karistoo' masika'antavaamaing Kumponinge koonto'nuka tampuriaing, ookara tee' nari'. Tankatankaang otoa'.
Aming-koo, ookara nari' oraka' nkoarima kaari'arikoo' Kumponing bakaang meenasi kong-koo.
Nka tee enang nii' ookara naro'ka koonto'nuka tammurining tamung bauta'murima, Jiisuu' Karistoo'ke niikaang kiimata nkavura moo'murio' bakaang erenge.

Kumponinge Jiisuu' botovuu' tee' nko-koo ookara-koo dutakanoo'ke tee masika' antavampiko tee ninka naroong-antamurii'naang, ee'noko napo' nau-antamurii'naang tee Kumponing tee aarumo koonto'koo okora', ai' tero-nupoonge oraka'nko nkoaako tee mii'kui tamung doonko oovuriko' kiimatavuria' Karistoo'ke mero' kompuaing noru'uitaa'.
Ee'noko nii'ke enanupoonge tasi'pampii'naang piavoing Kumponing tee aarumo koonto'koo okora' ee'noko nantoong koonto'nuka deeng-anta teing nantoong Jiisuu' masika'antavaavaining.
Enang ee nii' daangamaripeu'? Makotua'. Aming-koo makotua'? Tee aa' tamung masika'antavampiko koonto'nuka tammuru', tampara nko-nko-koo deea'.
Nii'ke tee aa'pampimaung: Kumponinge naning koonto' tampuma tee bakaang masika'anta oovura tee' tampuaing, bane Moosesi bakaang boto noru'ua'.
Kumponing ee Ju'nupoong naing biikaang, ee'noko Ju'deeaing ninka nari' deea', ee? A, ookara biikaang, ai' tee tee Kumponing narung masikung.
Ee'noko tee narung masikung deemparitaa' navunge taunavunge ookamurira koonto'nuka tampuriaing teing domampuripeu'nung-pina' masika'antavaako dopa' toto'nii'nuka ee'noko toto'pariaing nari'.
Enang ee masika'anta-koo minkuampima boto dua'ampimang? Otoa'. Boto tee aroo'ampiri minkuampiring.
Io' Kumponinge Eebaraami' bire'uu'na' noru'eriaing, ai' tee mono-nameng-koo tutuntomaa nii' Ju'nupoong niuma.
Arekee', bakaang nko-nko tampara-koo Kumponinge naning koonto' tampuu'nunge? Tee'koo deeko' tee daangamparapeu'nung. Nka tee' deea'. Kumponing-koo uro'kanoo'ke daangamparavarupeu'.
Ai' Daari Meekunge tee ee' minkuvui otong,
“Eebaraami'ke Kumponing masika'antavuko Kumponinge tamung naning koonto' tampuu'.”
Naning tee nko-nkoarakotaa' bakaang moo' nkavuaing. Tamung bauta'pina' tang-koo makosi deea', tee bakaang nko-nkoi moo'.

Nka naning tee Eebaraami'pina' bakaang nko-nko tamung doonko noru'ui Kumponing bakaang piaa masika'antavupeu'nung aa'puma: Teie oreng koonto'nuka deeng-antavurimaung bakaang duta-koo, Kumponinge tee ee'nara naning koonto' tampuaing bakaang masika'anta-koo.
Tee-pina' napo' Deevita'ke minkuvuu'na'pina' naning bakaang doturoto-koo Kumponinge koonto' tampuainung boto siona' otoko. Aa'puu',
“Biraankeariaining teing biikaang boto-toto' tonta'evuriaining ee'noko teing biikaang oraka'nko tamung doonko daka'pevuriaining.
“Biraankearavaing tee naning bakaang orara nko-nko-koo Kumponinge tampuauka'nung.”

Tee baa Deevita'ke biraankenung tampuu'? Ai' nii' Ju'nupoong dopa' toto'marimaing tee' minkumuru'nunge, teing Ju'deeaing ee naro'ka deea'? Otoa', ookara naro'ka. Tero naurampiru' Eebaraami'koo Kumponinge koonto' tampuu'nung bampuu'na' masika'antavuko.
Arenang koonto' tampuu', ai' dopa' toto'pario' ai' mme' toto'paravaruko? Dopa' toto'pario' deea'. Mme' toto'paravaruko Kumponinge koonto' tampuu'nung.

Ee'noko tee dama'ke Kumponinge nauvuio' dopa' toto'paru' taa'ni'anta-koo. Teie taa'ni'antai aa'pumaung: Aung naning Kumponinge koonto' tampuu'nung teie masika'antavuko toto'paravaunge. Tee tee, Eebaraami' nantoonge biuma deemparu'nung dopa' toto'pariainge masika'antavaako Kumponinge koonto'nuka tampurimainge.

Ee'noko napo' tee' nari' biuma teinge nantoong dopa' toto'paririninge. Nka tamung boturopa toto'paririning deea', nka teing naing Kumponinge koonto'nuka tampuru'ning Eebaraami'pina' Kumponinge bampuru'na' masika'antavaako, tero dopa' toto' nkavua' masika'antavuko'na'.

Kumponinge barevuru' Eebaraami' bakanavitu ninka depeto ookara kansi' okovoroo'naang. Kumponinge barevua' Eebaraami' botonang siompuu'nung-koo, teka Kumponing masika'antavuko naning koonto' tampura barevuu'.

Nii'ke ee' minkuampiri dei: Moosesi bakaang boto siompaamaing naing oko-antavuriaing tee barenku daamaripeu'. Tee' ee' minkunii': Masika'antai tee kapoo' basi-antavuarupeu' ee'noko Kumponinge bakaang maraka-anta tee daang-koong.
Teka teing boto-koo noru' sipaamaing teing tevung boto sionavung kaari'aama Kumponing bakaang iira narung ooaavaing, ai' naning otoa' tee boto keperuu'ui tampa' tarevupeu'nung.

Kumponinge tee, tee biraanke nii'keta paa'aravaroo'naang piavora tee biraanke bauta' deeng-antavuu' nii'ke nka-koo masika'antavampima. Tee'koo Eebaraami' bakanarempo'kai ookenge kompaavaing tee barenku, teing tee boto siompaamaing naing deea', nka teing nii'ning napo' barenku masika'antavaamaing ninka nari' Eebaraami'pina', tee nii' ookara niuma.
Kumponinge Eebaraami' nauvuu'na', Daari Meekung-koo ee' daariari otong,
“Da' tee ninge enang amutemuu' muu'ke biuma deeng-antaransing.”
Aung kara koonto' Kumponing-koo uro'kanoo'ka taaravuu', bakaang-koo Ovoring-koo masika'antavuko'nung-koo tee boo'nuka domang-anta ee'noko kapoo'nanka otoroaing karai tavo'anta.

Kumponinge nauvuu' Eebaraami', teie narung bauring donkaani avuu'naang tampuu' ba'dompenku mmau' deeng-antavuriaing ee'noko pankavitu deempariaing. Ee'noko Eebaraami'ke masika'antavuu' Kumponing, bane tee aung kara makotuaung-pina' oro' nauvuko.
Barenku masika'antavui kara dua'ua', bane mono pankara noru'arama boo'koo makosi, bane tee bakaning mare' daaku'koo due'ari otoing ee'noko bane ba'aang Seera' bisiirai.
Nii'nung noru' konte-pina' oro' tavo'arava' Kumponing-nung barevare-koo, teka aa'na' purimpari masika'antavuko' Kumponing daangampuma.
Koonto' tasi'pari noru'uko' kapoo' Kumponinge barevumaung tee makosi nkovuaing.
Tee'koo ee'na'koo Kumponinge koonto' tampuu'.
Teka tee kara Kumponinge koonto' tampuu'nung Eebaraami' baka nau-anta-koo daariarava', teka nii'koo napo'.
Kumponinge napo' nii' koonto'nuka tammuriainge masika'antavampiko tee napo' domang-antavuu'nung boo'keta Jiisuu' Karistoo', niikaang Ovoring.
Tee ee'nara Kumponinge taura'puio' boo'paru' niikaang boto-toto'koong kiimata nka-koo, ee'noko Kumponinge napo' daa'uu', tee' masika'antavampiko Kumponinge nii' konto'nuka deeng-antamurii'naang.
Tee barenku masika'antavampirio' Kumponinge koonto'nuka tammurimaung. Tee'koo Jiisuu' Karistoo'ke pakumurio' enang mooa-koo o'noring Kumponing ninka.
Jiisuu'ke tee Kumponinge tampa' oomurimanoo' basi-antamuru' ee'noko dotumarimaung nempampiritaa' Kumponing-nung meenasi kong-koo.
Baru'noo' tee dotumarimaung sisikeeramorima ee' noru'ampima: Sisikeerai tee iveka'antamurimaung orara puru'koo.
Ee'noko iveka'mariko makosi-antamurimaung. Makosi-antamuriko masika'antavampimaung kapoo' tampuu'na' nkoaravaing.
Ee'noko masika'antavampima munte'moriarupeu' nempampima, ai' teie Tanuaang Meekunge, Kumponinge amuru'nunge Kumponing-nung piaa nii'koo koo'uu' niikaang domang-koo.
Tenang nii' aruaru'mori o'noriko, Karistoo' batei baumai miru'uu'nung-koo boo'paru' Kumponing noru'aavaing-koo.
Nantoong baru' booroaung nii'ning pari'anta-koo, bane tampeng-koo. A'noo' naninge dee'ma aroo'upeu' naning tampara-koo boo'koo aa'na' piaavoma deeko'.
Nka Karistoo' bakei nii' nantoong oreng o'noriko boo'paru'nung-koo Kumponinge bakaang piaa aa'na' deto basi naumurimaung.
Enang aa' tee nii' bakaang erenge naroong-antamurining deemariko enang makosi moo'muriaing koonto' kiimata-ita.
Tenang napo' nii' kare-nupoong o'noriko napo' bauring boora navu-antamuru' Kumponing ninka. Enang tee nii' navunavuro'nuka deemariko makosi nii' koonto' domamuriaining bakaang domaange.
Ee'noko tee narung deea'. Napo' nii' dotumarimaung Kumponing-koo niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo'ke pakumurio', teie ee'narai osikoimuru'nunge.

Enang noru'eriaing tee aung taa'ni'anta. Narung naning oraka' nkoario' bakaang oraka'nkoi nantoong karika' orari-antavuru' ee'noko teie orari-antai tee boo' basi-antavuu' nantoong kansi'koo-nupoong-koo. Ee'noko tee teie boo'ke ootukunung kuung deempuru' ookara oraka' nkoaririo'.

Nii'ke noru'ampiri otong Aadama bakaang oraka'nkoi tavo'antavuu' tee. Teka tee'koo nantoong oraru'kiaako' Aadama bakaang batei-eta bera Moosesi bakaang batei-koo basi. Kumponinge tee boo'koo tampuriaruko' boto toto'paako, ai' bakaang boto mme' avuria' teing.

Tenang biikaang mono booroma biikaang oraka' nko-koo booroaruko', teeo Aadama bakaang-koo booroko'. Teinge toto'paava' tee boto Kumponinge Aadama avuu'nung tee sinang orokonii' maa'koong. Aadama tee uu'aa'pina' tee Domang-anta Tavo'aravaing-koong.

Nka tee, nari' oro'ka deea' Aadama bakaang oraka'nko ee'noko Kumponing bakaang piaae nantoong tampa'nko. Narung bakaang oraka'nkoi boo' tavo'antavuu' nantoong mmau'koo, nka aunge narunge Jiisuu' Karistoo'ke baru' puru'uitaa' tonta'anta bauta'pina' deto basi tavo'antavuu' mmau' nantoong-koo teie Kumponing bakaang piaae.

Kumponing bakaang bauta' tee, narung bakaang oraka' nko-nko-koong sinang-pina' deea'. Namu'ke boto toto'pui Aadamai boo'koong kiimata pare'uu' nii'koo ookara-koo. Teka Kumponing bakaang bauta' tee, niikaning oraka' nkonanka mmau' pau'ariko amuru'nung, makosi-antamurima nii' Kumponing ninka nari' naroomariri o'noriii'naang domamariritaa'.

Narung naning oraka' nkoarara ookara nantoong boo'parimaung. Teka enang napo' nii'nung narung-koo tee-koo Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo Kumponinge deto basinoo' tampa' nkomurimaung niikaang oraka' nkonanka tamung tonta'memurima. Ee'noko tee'koo nii' koonto'nuka tammurimaung. Ee'noko teing tee bauta' nkavaavaining Kumponing-nung teing ee'ning ovontumpariri otoroaing ee'nara ninka narung ninka Jiisuu' Karistoo' ninka.

Tee tee ee' otong: Ookara nantoong kiimatavariaing oraka'nko nkovuu'nung-koo, napo' tee' nari' Kumponinge nantoong koonto'nuka tampuriaing ee'noko domampariai nii'nung narunge tampara aarumo nkovuu'nung-koo.

Ee'noko tee'koo napo' nantoong karika' orara aarumo nkonuka deempariru' teie naninge Kumponing siompuarura, ee'noko napo' tee' nari' nantoong karika' tampara aarumo nkonuka deempariaing Jiisuu' Karistoo'ke Kumponing tampa' siompuu'nung-koo.

Kumponinge boto avuru' biikaang orara aarumo pankaing tasi'paava'naang. Ee'noko orara aarumo aa'na' sira'pario' ooampima tee' nari' Kumponing bakaang piaa deto basi napo' sira'pario' ooampipeu'. Ookara oraka'nko tonta'memurimaung teie.

Tutung tee oraka'nkoi kuung deempuri otoko' ookara nantoong, ee'noko boo'nameng-aape sipuru'nung, teka enang Kumponing bakaang piaae taremurimang aarumo koonto'koo kuung deemuri, bera domaang oparavaung-koo tavo'muriaing tee-koo Jiisuu' Karistoo' niikaang Ovoring-koo kuunge.
Nka ee' noru'ampiauka', “Orara nkoampimatoaing Kumponing bakaang piaa pankainge piaamuriaina'.”
Bakei makosi deea'! Ai' nii' teing Jiisuu'koo kuunge moompirining deemariritaa' orara nko-koo piamoria', ai' arekee' napo' toromarii'naang?
Ee' noru'eriaing: Nii' teing Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo o'nori ntong-koo minkie meeka'antamariru' ning bakaang boo'koo kuung minkinisinuka.

Tenang ntong-koo minkimarira meeka'antamariru' tee miru'noo' tee-pina' nii' nari' moompiru' ee'noko napo' nari' dako'maaru' Karistoo' ninka. Tee tee' nkoaru' tee, Niumai domang-antavuu' bakaang iirakutai. Nii' teka nari' domamuru' nantoong nerakupoong o'norii'naang aampari'marira niikaang aarumo-koo.
Teka nii' Karistoo' ninka narung deeng-antamarima nari' moompiru'ning deemariritaa' tee' nari' Karistoo' ninka boo'keta nerakung otooto'koo o'noriaing.

Nii'ke noru'ampiri otong niikaang urikung aarumo tee ninka nari' dupisi'au' aa'barata'koo˜ tee niikaang orara aarumonanka teke bakearaa'naang ee'noko enang tee orara aarumo-koo bi'mariri o'noriauka'nung napo'.
Davorue tee orara aarumo napo' nkovuarupeu'.
Teka nii' Karistoo' ninka nari' moompiru'ning deeko' nii'ke masika'antavampiri otong nii' teing tee ninka nari' domamariaining.
Nii'ke tee noru'ampiri otong Karistoo' tee domamparu'nung boo'noo'keta ee'noko napo' booauka'nunge; enang tee boo'ke kuung deempua'.
Tee boo' tee boo'paru'nung tee niikaang oraka' nko-koong iri' bake-anta-koo, boo'paru' totora'pui. Teka tee enanung otooto' tee Kumponing-koo domampari otong.
Dii' tee' nari' noru'dariainge: Oraka' nko-koo dooru'ning ee'noko napo' domantaririning Kumponing-koo Jiisuu' Karistoo' ninka.
Tee'koo taura'dariauka' orara aarumoi kuung deeng-anta-koo diikaang mono. Teie orara aarumoi baranturi'neenga mono bakaang karakaraa'ke.

Diikaang mono-koo nii'nairu taura'periauka' orara aarumo bakaang pia-siong deemparama orara nko-koo, teka dii'ka arariaing Kumponing-koo teing-pina' nantoong boo'keta domang-antanii'nuka-pina', ee'noko dii'koo ookanairu Kumponing bakanairu deeng-antaveri otoriai aarumo koonto' siong-koo.
Oraka'nkoi kuung deenturiauka' dii' boto-koo kuung otoriaung-koo Kumponinge piaa-koo kuung otoriko.

Nka tee boto-koo kuung o'noria' oraka'nko nkoampiauka' aa'pampima, “Nii' aa' boto-koo kuung o'noria', nii' Kumponing bakaang piaa-koo kuung o'nori oraka' nari' nkoampiaing.” Tee' minku-koo bakei makosi deea'.

Dii'ke ee noru'eria' baa dii'ke meumperimaung tee diikaang ovoring, ee'noko dii' teing bakaning botovotonaa'nuka, aa'noko oraka'nko meumperiaing deeko' boo' kune'eriaing, ee'noko Kumponing meumperiaing deeko' tampara domaang kune'eriainge.
Tenang tutung tee dai'dariri otoriko' orara aarumoi date'durio', teka enang tampara tampamang Kumponing-koo dii'ke tampa' meumperimaung-koo tee Ovoring bakaang kara nauraario' masika'antaverimaung.
Teka enang Kumponinge unaa-antarurira orara aarumo ninka dai'dariri otoriko'noo'keta tampara aarumoi dai'dariri oto'nuka deeng-antaruring.

Aing aarumo kementavario' minkuansing naninka botovotonaa'ka-pina' dii'koo tampa' siraka'paraa'naang. Nka ee' minkuamaang: Tee' taura'dariru'na' aa'na' ku'mi'koo ee'noko orara-koo tee' nari' napo' aa'na' iri'dori taura'dariaing te'aape koonto'aape ee'noko kiiroraa'aape.
Tenang dii' orara aarumo-koo dai'dariri tee tara'doria' otoriko' koonto'nameng-koo.
Nka aremurii' kapoo' dii'koo tavo'arako'nung teieta orara aarumo-ita enang maia'dorimaung-eta'? Tee aa' kapoo' boo' tavo'kumaing.
Nka enang tee Kumponinge unaa-antaruring orara aarumo-ita bakaning botovotonaa'nuka deentarii'naang. Enang deto du'duriaining meeka'dariri domaang oparavaung nkaveriaina'.
Orara aarumoi tee moo' avu'koong, tee boo'. Ee'noko Kumponinge tee bauta'muriaing teie domaang oparavaunge Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo kuunge, niikaang Ovoring.
Dii'ke mmaikori'ke boto-koo norukasi'nukai noru'eri otong teie botoi tee naning kuung deempui otomaung tenang tee naning domampari otoko.

Tee-pina' nani manikuma nampeesinii' botoi naro' tapo'uresi otoremana' ba'ung ninka tenang ba'ung domamparitaa'. Teka tenang ba'ung booko dei teni unaavopeu' teieta boto teni dai'ui otomaung-eta ba'ung-koo.

Tee'koo teni manikuma nii'nung ninka otoresi dei tenang ba'ung booaruko teni tee nampeesi orari tang-koo makosi. Teka ba'ung booko dei, siraraavi' otoi boto-ita, nii'nung ninka nampeesiarepeu', tenie nampeesi orarivua'.

Tee' ee'na' nari' dii' tee' otoring mmaikori'. Boo'koo teie nari' dooru' tee' botoi minkuvui otoina'koo ai' dii' teing Karistoo'koo mono-koonamenuka. Enang tee dii' tee bakaning deentariri otoring tee boo'keta domamparu'nung nii'ke sinang Kumponing bakaang bi'antaevompiaina'.
Tero tee, orara aarumoi dai'muritaa' Kumponing-nung boto toto'koo pia-antamuriko' ee'noko tee'koo kapoo' oraka' nkonanka mmau' nkoampiko', teing kapoo' nii' boo'anta-koo makosinanka.

Teka enang nii' unaamori o'noring boto-ita moompira tee-koo kapoo'koo nii' dai'muri otoko'nung-koo. Tee'koo enang Kumponing mintoompevompiri o'noring urikung botoi Moosesie daarivuu'nunge deea' teka tee-koo nerakung otooto'koo Tanuaang Meekung-etaing-koo.
Enang are'pampipeu' nii'ke? Tee boto ee orara?
