Teka teie botoi tee orokomuio' orara aarumoi doona oovura tee boto-koo ning karaa'antamuko', nka orara aarumo tee baka boto otoaruko dei purimparavarupeu'.
Ning tero domang kuaa'moi o'noko' mme' boto noru'ampa', teka tee boto noru'amira ee'namu' orara aarumo domamparako ning moontu'.
Teie ee'narai narunge botoi ning domang-antamuu'naang noru'anko'nunge ning boo'antamuu'.
Orara aarumoi doona oovura tee boto-koo tosimuko' ee'noko teie botoi tamuu'.
Tee'koo ookara Moosesi-nung boto tee meekung, ee'noko tenaare tamuu'naare tenaarei meekanaarei koompari tampa' oto'naare.

Nka arekee', botoi tamparai tamuu'nung tampamang, ee? A, tee aa' orara aarumo okora'ario' botoi tamparai ning tamuu'nung tampamang. Teie botoi tamparai tee naumumaung masika' oraka' nkomaramaung. Enang napo' orara aarumoi tamuu'nung tasi'pamira masika' noru'ampeu' tee orara aarumo tee bakei orara masikung.
Nii'ke noru'ampiri otong boto tee kapoo' tanuaanavete-koong, teka ning mono boo'koong, orara aarumoi dai'nii'.
Nkaang nko-nko tampa' noru'ampaunge, tee kapoo' tampara nko-koo piamomaung tee nkoampaung, teka tee kapoo' orara tampamaung nkoankoo'.
Teka tenang ninge nkoama tee kapoo' piamoaung tee boto tampara tampamaung-pina' otong.
Tee' nari' tasi'pamaung ninge masikunge tee nkoampa', teka tee orara aarumo ning-koo otoko ninge tee' nkoamaung.
Ninge noru'ansi otong kapoo' tampara ning-koo otoa' ninka. Kapoo' tampara maroamira nkoamparupeu'.
Tee kapoo' tampara ninge nko-koo piamomaung tee ninge nkoampa', teka tee kapoo' orara ninge nko-koo piamoaung napo' tee ee'nara nkoankoo'.
Enang tee ninge kapoo' ning piamoaung nkoama tasi'pamaung okora'noo' tee orara aarumo ning-koo ima'ari otong, ning masikung deea'.
Tee tee orara aarumo-koong iri' tee' nari' oro'paramaung. Tampa' nko-koo piamoko orara aarumoi diku'mui otokoo'.
Pankaruntoonge Kumponing-nung boto karaa'amaung.
Teka nkaang mono-koo oomaramaung nii'nung kapoo' karenung otong tee ninka nkaang onou ninka. Teie dai'mui otomaung orara aarumoi ning-koo mono-koo otomaunge.

Tee tee tee' pina' nari' o'noi o'noaing noru'anko', aa'noko, ninka tee ninge Kumponing bakaang boto tamung onoue siompama ee'noko mono-namenge orara aarumo siompamaa'noaing. Bakei piaaru' ning. Baie diki'muainge teieta' aung mono boo'koong-eta? Tee'panko'na';
Nka enang tampara tampamang Kumponing-koo, Jiisuu' Karistoo' niikaang Ovoringe boo'parama diki'memuio'.
Tee'koo enang Kumponinge boo'koo miru'muria' nii' Karistoo'koo o'norining.
Aming-koo, nna' Jiisuu' Karistoo' ninka o'noriko Tanuaang Meekung-koong iri'ke unaa-antamuring teieta orara aarumo bakaang iri'keta ee'noko boo'keta.

Botoi tee nii' domang-anta-koo makotua' mono aruaru'oma boto toto'pumaung-koo. Teka Kumponinge deeko' nii'nung taung nkomemuru' nii' moo'murii'naang. Tee Bauring narung masikung botovuu' tee-pina' niikaang mono-pina' oro'pario', nka tee nii'pina' orara aarumo-po'nung deea'. Porai'nang tee orara aarumo-koong iri' pesi'uu' bakaang mono booma nii'koo parekavarama.
Tee boo'pario' enang nii' makosi tampa' oto'koo teie botoi botomurimana' nko-koo Tanuaang Meekunge taremurio', ee'noko siompampiauka' tee urikung aarumo orara.

Teing nantoong mono bakanameng siompaamaing tee biikaang noru' mono bakanameng-koo pinka'arimaung. Teka teing nantoong Tanuaang Meekung bakanameng siompaamaing tee biikaang noru' Tanuaang Meekung bakanameng-koo pinka'arimaung.

Teing nantoong biikaang noru' mono bakanameng-koo pinka'ariaining tee booroaining. Teka teing nantoong biikaang noru' Tanuaang Meekung bakanameng-koo pinka'ariaining tee domampariaing ee'noko mooa-koo otoroaing.
Tee noru' mono bakanamenge otomaung tee Kumponing-koo too'denung, Kumponing-nung boto-koo kupi'omaung, bakei makotua' nii'na' nko-koo.
Teing mono bakanamenge otoromainge tee Kumponing dotu-antavaavarupeu'.

Teka dii' tee mono bakanameng-koo otoria', teka Tanuaang Meekung bakanameng-kooning, tee ee'nara Tanuaang Meekung Kumponing bakaang dii'koo otoing deeko'. Baa naning Tanuaang Meekung Karistoo'nung oto'evuaung tee, tee bakaang naning deea'.
Teka Karistoo' dii'koo otoko deeko' tee, bane mono boo'paravaing orara aarumo-koo, teka tee diikaang tanuaang domamparavaing Kumponinge koonto'nuka tanturu'nung-koo.
Jiisuu' boo'keta daa'uu'nung bakaang Tanuaang dii'koo otoing deeko' teie ee'narai Jiisuu' Karistoo' boo'keta daa'uu'nunge diikaang mono boo'koong domampuaing ee'nara bakaang Tanuaang dii'koo otoinge.
Mmaikori' ee, bakei navo'ka kapoo' nii'ke Kumponing bari'evompiaing otong bakaang pia siompampira, mono bakaang pia siompampia'.
Mono bakaang pia siomperiaing deeko' tee dii' dooriaing. Teka Tanuaang Meekung bakaang pia siomperima mono-koong aarumo toto'peri domantariaing.
Teing nantoong Kumponing bakaang Tanuaang Meekunge siong-antavurimaing teing Kumponing baurukaa'.

Tee Tanuaang Kumponinge aruru'nung dii' avoro'ke kai'anta-koong deea' dai'nisinuka-pina'. Nka aampari'ario' Kumponing baurukaa' deenturimaung, ee'noko tee ee'nara Tanuaang Meekung bakaang iri'ke amanampia' Kumponing bokuampimaung ee'pina': Mma' ee, Mma'.
Tee'koo Kumponing bakaang Tanuaang niikaang tanuaang ninka narung deemarima nii' sira'marimaung nii' teing Kumponing baurukaa'.
Ee'noko nii' Kumponinge baurukaa' deemariko barenku oko-antamuriai Jiisuu' Karistoo' ninka, a'noo' tee nari' baike kompampira tee ninka deeko' bakaang biraanke nari' kompampia'naang.
Ninge tee ee' noru'amaang: Tee kapoo'nanka baikenanka enanung batei-koo kompampimaatomaung tee kapoo' deea' tee-koo biraanke dama'ke nkavampiaing-koo.
Ookara kapoo'nanka Kumponinge nkovuru'ning tee nemparimaung Kumponinge baurukaa' biraankevurima sira'antavuriaina'mung-koo.

Tero ookara kapoo'nanka nkovuru'ning barakosi'uru' tamunsi'nanka deemparii'naang, bii'ka biikaang noru'koo deea', tee Kumponing bakaang noru'koo, kuung otoroi nempaava'naang bera te'mung makotuai Kumponing baurukaa'ke meenasi nkavaavaina'mung.
Te'mung tee ookara kapoo'nanka Kumponinge nkovuru'ning teieta kiimata dera' bakaang-eta unaa-antavurira meenasi basi-antavuaing baurukaa'koo basi-antavuaina' nari'.
Nii'ke noru'ampiri otong ookara kapoo'nanka kansi'kooninge aa'na' sisikeera tora'paamaung baike amutemurii' kune'aama e'mung doong-koo basinoo'koo.

Ee'noko teing nkovuru'ninge nainge deea'. Bane tutuna'navaro Tanuaang Meekung-koo komariri o'noring, nii'ke tee' nari' tee sisikeera tora'pampimaung nemarima baurukaa'pina' oro'antamurii'naang, niikaang mono moo'murima boo'nameng-eta.
Tee' nari' nkoaravaing-koo masika'antavampiko Kumponinge moo'muru', kapoo' tero oro'paru'nung-koo narung-koo deea', tee kapoo' mme' oro'paravaung-koo.
Teka masika'anta otoko kapoo' ooampiaung-koo tee nemariri o'noriaing dooroonge.

Tanuaang Meekunge pakumurimaung niikaang aruaru'koo. Ai' nii'ke tee tampa' noru'ampia' kunsi bakaang taung koonto'navung. Teka tanuaang Meekunge baka eentamemurimaung nii' paku-koo pankaruntoong-eta baiarama karai sira'koo makotua'.
Ee'noko Kumponinge ookara biikaang domang keperuu'urimaunge tee noru'ui otong tee onou Tanuaang Meekung bakaang, Kumponing-pina' nari' noru'aramaung-koo eentavevurima ookara bakaning meekupoong.
Ee'noko nii'ke noru'ampiri otong teing ookara kapoo'nanka tavo'arimaing nii' tampa' nko-koong nii' Kumponing piaavampimaing ee'noko baremuri bokumuru'ning.
Tero urikamu' Kumponinge tasi'puru' bakaning. Teing tasi'puru'ning miru'uru' bauring-pina' nari' oro'pariri otoroo'naang. Ee'noko bauring tee tutuna'nung kura'nari'koo kuunga.
Ee'noko teing miru'uru'ning tee bokuvuru'. Teing bokuvuru'ning tee koonto'nuka tampuru', ee'noko teing koonto'nuka tampuru'ning tee nerampuru'nung.
Tee tee, enang are'pampipeu'? Kumponing niikaang pakupaku deemparako nii'koo karenung baa? Otoa'.
Teie bauring orokovuaruu'nunge nii'koo baike kune'uu'naang, ookara kapoo' ee orokovupeu' bauring ninka nari' avu'koo? Makotua'.
Baie tuumpivuripeu' Kumponing bakaning miru'nii'nuka? Otoa'. Kumponinge ee'narai koonto'nuka tampuru'nung.
Baie boo'koo-nupoong miru'muriaing? Otoa'. Jiisuu' Karistoo' nii'koo boo'paru', ee'noko masika' Kumponinge boo'keta daa'uio' tampavine-koo Kumponing-koo otong nii' eentamemurima.
Baie te'nemuripeu'nung teieta piaa Karistoo' bakaang? Turanturang makotua', orarunsi makotua', tuumpinang, peera, simpenoi', avo'avoro' ee'noko tavu', bakei ookara makosiaava'.
Ee' daariari otoina' nii'koo masika' otong,
“Dakaang miring-koo nii' teing tamaarimaing ookara doong-koo, maa'maa' tavu'kooning-pina' noru'maarima.”
Nka tee, bane aing ookara kapoo' kune'ampiainge nii'ke tee bakei aa'na' puru'ampiaing Karistoo' ninka nii' piaamuru'nung ninka.

Ninge tee tasi'pansi otong kapoo' otoa' nii' tankaamuripeu'nung Kumponing bakaang piaa-eta Jiisuu' Karistoo' niikaang Ovoring-koo oro'paru'nung-eta, bane aing aa'ning tavo'kuai: boo', domang-anta, koosinunanka, ovontunanka, enang otoroining, kapoo' dama' tavo'aravaining, iri'nanka, detonoo', boonkonoo';
Ee'noko nii'nung kapoo' makosi otoa' napo' Kumponinge nkovuru'ning-koo.
Enang kara minkuampainung masikung, Karistoo'koo kuung o'noi, nkaang onoue pankaruntoong-eta masika'antamumaunge Tanuaang Meekunge kuung deemuio'.
Tee kara ee'pina': Ning bakei aa'na' orarunsimaramaung, nkaang domang-koo uatepa oraka' dee'moma'nomaung ee'koo: Isireeli-nupoong domamparia' otoromaung-koo.
Barakosi'marama Karistoo'keta tonta'marapeu'nung-pina' noru'maramaung teing mmarang ni'ninka narung ereng moo'ariaina' makosi deeko'.

Teing Kumponing bakaning miru'uru'ning, baurukaa' deempuru'ning ee'noko bakaang meenasi avuru'ning. Teing amutemu'ke kara tampa' naroompevuru'ning ee'noko avuru' tee boto ee'noko tee dootuu' masikung;

Teinge nkavau' tee Kumponing bakaang maramaraka, biikaang muu' oko'bosi-nupoong biurukaa' deemparira. Ee'noko tee Domang-anta, Karistoo' tee biikanamuiaang-koonge, ee'nara Kumponing, ookara-koo dau basi deempari daangang-po'nung o'paa'na'. Ee', masikung.

Kumponing bakaang maraka-anta teing-eta Isireeli-nupoong toto'pari otoing minkuampa' nii'ning Isireeli-nupoong moo'aria' otoroining-koo, ai' baru' ookara Isireeli-nupoong Kumponinge miru'nii'nuka naing deea'.
Ooveriai: Eebaraami' baurukaa' ookara miru'aria'. Teing naing Kumponinge tampuru'ning deeko', Daari Meekung-koo aa'puu'na',
“Aisake' narung-eta doonko miru'nii'nuka tamparampaing.”
Miru'noo' ee': Tamung monoi para-koo Kumponing baurukaa' tampariarupeu', teka tee' nari' Kumponinge tampuu'na'koo miru'uma deeko' baurukaa' tamparipeu'.
Ai' Kumponinge marakavarama Eebaraami' Eekaa' ninka beuring bata'uma ee' tampuu',
“Enanung batei-pina' daunamare'koo tee ning toromaravaing ee'noko Seera' ee'nani tee enang bauring-po'nani deemparavaing.”
Teketa' tee narung-koo miru'uu'na' bera Aisake' ponto'aru'.
Ee'noko napo' dama'ke Kumponinge nii'ning naing miru'urimana' sira'puu' tenang Rebeka' kempo'kui otoko pauroonka nkavuresitaa' tee ninka ba'ung niikaaka Aisake' ninka.
Bane tee ke'de-koo otoresi ponto'area', kapoo' orara ee'noko tampara-pina' oro' nkovurea', Kumponinge teni-koo ee' tampuu',
“Bataata baara'ma'nung-koo boong otoaing.”
Nii'noo' napo' ee' daariari otong Kumponinge temainta minkuvuretu'na',
“Jeekopi' tee ninge piaavansi otong, ee'noko Iiso munte'ansi otong.”
Tee' nkoaru' Kumponinge nantoong miru'urimana' tasi'anta-koo; nko-nkoi deea', bokue narunge.
Enang ee ee' noru'ampii'naang: Kumponing koonto' deea' ookamainta nari' nkovurearuu'nung-koo? Bakei makotua'.
Moosesi nauvuma ee' minkuvuu',
“Ninge tee naning tampa' nkoampaing deeko' tampa' nkoampaing, ee'noko tee naning piaavampaing deeko' piaavampainge.”
Enang tee Kumponing bakaang miru' ee' oro'pari otong: Naning bakaang piai deea', bakaang nko-nkoi deea', teka Kumponing bakaang piaa-koo narung-koo deeko' makosi.
Nii'noo'ka napo' Daari Meekunge Moosesie daarivuu'nung-koo Kumponinge tee daurarong˜ Peero' turampuarura ee' nauvuu',
“Ninge tee da' donkong-antaransinung da'koo nkaang iri' oro'paraa'naang ning nkaang miring noru'aavaina' ookara kansi'koo.”
Tee' minkuvuio' aa'pamaang: Naning tee Kumponinge baka piaavuaing deeko' piaavuaing. Ee'noko napo' baa naning piaavuaru-peu'nung deeko' konte-antavuma sipuaing makosi.
Dii'koo narunge Peero'pina' noru'darama ee' tana'mepeu' dee'ma: Kumponinge aming-koo turang nkovumaang piavomana' nari' nkomarako? Baie dimpa'upeu' bakaang miru'?
Nka baie da' Kumponing maku'epeu'nung kansi'keta? Utaue ee tee naning ta'nampumaung karavuma aa'pupeu': Dake ning aming-koo ee' ta'namemaang?

Arekee'? Tee naning ee utau ta'nampumaung makosi deea' bakaang mataue utau ta'nang-koo? Nau-koo kansi'nu-koo aa'nopeu': Nameng-eta neranii'nareng ta'nampupeu' ee'noko nii'nameng-eta tamunsi'nareng ta'nampupeu'.

Kumponinge bakaang iira sira'anta-koo piavoi otong ee'noko tenang ookara nantoonge ooaavaing bakaang purinto'. Teing nantoong orara moo' nka-koo miru'nii'nuka teroita maamuariri otoromaung orari-anta-koo, teka enang Kumponinge makenge nempuri otong orari-antavuria'.
Aming-koo, nna' bakaang meenasi pankaing tasi'anta-koo piavoi otong teing-koo nantoong bakaang piaa nka-koo miru'uru'ning-koo, teroita maamu-antavuru'ning bakaang meenasi nari' kong-koo.
Tee-pina' nii' bokumuru'ning, Ju'nupoong naing-eta deea', ee'noko Ju'deeaing-kooning nari' ookara-ita.
Tee-pina' Kumponinge minkuvuko Osea'ke daarivuu'na' Daari Meekung-koo,
“Nantoong nkaning deeaing tee nkaning tamparampaing. Ee'noko teni ninge piaavampa'nani teni ninge piaavampaing.”
Ee'noko
“Teka ninge aa'pantu'noo'ka, ‘Teing nkaning nantoong deeaing,’ teke tee nantoong dama'ke Kumponing domantoo' baurukaa' deemparira miring kompaavaing.”
Napo' Aisaia'ke ee' minkuvuu' Isireeli-nupoong-koo,
“Ooveriai, Isireeli-nupoong biurukaa'koong deeru tee piisi' pirung-koo makosi, nka tee teing-koo mmau' kera'pariko oki'ning naing otoroi domampariaing.
Bakei iri'narumpui Ovoringe nkovuaing kansi'koo tee kapoo' nkovuu'naang tampuu'nung.”
Tee' nari' Aisaia'ke minkuvuu'na' temu'navarang-koo ee'pina',
“Ovoringe paning-koonge niurukaa'koo duukung sipuarui dei nii' tee teing-pina' osi Sodom ee'noko Komora' nkomaripeu' nta'ke opuru'ning-pina'.”
Tee-koong miru'noo' ee' oro': Teing Isireeli-nupoong deeainge koonto'nuka deemparii'naang paaravariaruko'ninge miring koonto'nuka tampuriainavung pe'numpaara tampa' okovorou' masika'anta ninka.
Teka Isireeli-nupoong bane koonto'nuka deemparii'naang paaravariko' botoi tampui otoina', kaari'ariru'.
Aming-koo kaari'ariru'? Nna' Kumponing-koong duta-koo koonto' oto' tee kapoo' bamuru'nung-pina' masika'antavaava' besi'aama, aa'paama, “Moosesi-nung boto tampa' tareampiko deeko' makosi;”
Tee'koo tupampariru' tere'koo Kumponinge tero minkuvuu'na' Daari Meekung-koo, ee'pina',

“Ooveriaing, ninge bempampaing tere' manto-nare' dii'koo meu' Saioni-namono-koo, nantoong tere'koo tupamparira tee pu'ariaing. Nka tee naning tee masika'antavuaing tee sirakura' oko-antavampaing tee biraanke.”
Mmaikori' ee, pankaruntoonge ning aa'na' piamoi Kumponing-koo kunsimaramaung nkaning nantoong Isireeli-nupoong domamparii'naang.
Ooansi sira'pampeu' teing biikaang aarumo avarimana' Kumponing-koo, nka tee avariaina' makosinoo' siraka'paria'.
Noru'aava' tee taung Kumponinge nantoong koong-antavurimanavung. Bii'ka matauarima kaari'aamaung Kumponing bakanavung siong-koo kupi'oroma, Karistoo'koo kuunge.
Karistoo' tee Moosesi-nung boto o'anta-koong. Tee'koo teing ookara nantoong Karistoo' masika'antavaavaining teing koonto'nuka tampuriaing.
Moosesie boto siong-koo ee' daarivuu',
“Tee naning aung boto siompuaing tee domamparavaing.”
Nka tee nii'noo'ka ee' minkuvuu' masika'antanavung-koo,
“Dii'ka ee' minkueriauka': Baa paning-aape koinuainge tee Kumponinge Teroita Pako'pari'nii' nii' domamuri taremuriainoo'koong depeto boku-koo teie pakumurii'naang?
Napo' ee' minkueriauka': Baa doonko kansi'koo kuung tumparavai napo' tee Pako'pari'nii' boo'keta daa'antavuu'naang?
Ai' tee Kumponing bakaang kara tee teroita dii'anko due' otong, diikaang be'duu'koo ee'noko domang-koo otong.”
Emu' tee tee kara teie minkuvuu'nung tee tampara doorenang daankiampimaung dii'ke masika'anta-koong.

Tee dii'ke karang-eta sira'periaing deeko' aa'perima, “Jiisuu' tee Ovoring,” ee'noko masika'antaveriaing diikaang domang-eta tee Kumponinge domang-antavuu' nung bou'noo'keta, tee'koo enang dii' domantariaing.
Tee naning masika'antavuko bakaang domang-eta tee koonto' naning tampuaing; ee'noko sira'puaing bakaang karange tee tee moo'aravaing.
Nii'noo'ke Daari Meekunge ee' minkuvui otong,
“Naning tee masika'antavuaing tee Kumponinge sirakura' oko-antavuaing tee biraanke.”

Enang tee norunoru' tankatankaang-koong otoa' meu'ke teing-koo Ju'nupoong ee'noko Ju'deeaing, ai' Ovoring tee Ovoring ookara biikaang, ee'noko avurimaung bakaang biraanke teing nantoong tee-koo kunsiarimaing.
Napo' Daari Meekunge minkuvumana' ee'ke,
“Ookara nantoong Bakaang miring tampaama kunsiariaining teing domampariaing.”

Nka arekee' kunsiaripeu' nantoong tee-koo biikaang masika'anta otoaruko dei? Napo' arekee' masika'antavaapeu' bakaang miring taaravaava' dei? Ee'noko arekee' taaravaapeu' napo' naning tee sira'pumaung otoaruko?
Ee'noko nantoonge arekee' sira'paapeu' nii'ninge botoaariaruko dei? Tee' daariari otoina',
“Tee tampara doorenang nkavai poroma kapari'kaako taaravampira doturotumarimaung.”
A'noo' baru' ookarai masika'antavaavaruu' tee doorenang tampara, tee-pina' Aisaia'ke minkuvuma aa'puu'na',
“Ovoring, baie masika'antavuu' tee kara nii'koo taaravuu'nung?”
Nka tee nii'nunge masika'antavupeu'nung deeko' tee taaravura masika'antavupeu' Karistoo' daankiaako.
Isireeli-nupoonge aming-koo masika'antavaavaung, ai' mme' taaravaava'? Otoa'. Bakei taaravau' biikaang minkunaa deemparako daariari otoina' ee',
“Biikaang kara beremparu' ootukunairu-koo. Napo' biikaang minkunaa berempario' taaravau' ootukunung kansi'kooninge.”
Nka ee Isireeli-nupoonge taaravaara tasi'paava' tee minkunaa okora'noo'? A, tee aa' tang kupi'oroko. Kumponinge ee' nauvuru' Moosesie daarivuu'nane'koo,
“Nantoong miring-po'ning deeaing tampa' onkeonke'aranko dii' mamairorarimatoainge. Nii'navitu onou otoroa'navitu pakuaranko iiraroriaing.”
Napo' tee Aisaia'koo iveka'antavui ee' nauvuru',
“Teinge kune'mau' nantoonge bane besi'maavaruko'ninge. Ee'noko ning sira'maru' teing-koo ning-koo nia'kaavaru'ning-koo.”
Ee'noko Isireeli-nupoong-koo karoma ee' minkuvuu',
“Bireng takaa'mokoo' bokurampima dii' taarapiikanuka, kupi' baukonuka.”
Enang arekee', Kumponinge bakaning dama'duvuru' ee? Tee aa' tee' deea', bakei! Ning tee Isireeli-nupoong-koo narunge, Eebaraami' bakanaving-kooning-koo, Bensimani bakanamuiaang-koonung.

Kumponinge tee dama'duvuriaung Isireeli-nupoong. Otoroaina' noru'uritaa' teing bokuvuru'. Dii'ke noru'eria' dee'ma Eliasi bakaang minkunaa Daari Meekung-koo otomaung Isireeli-nupoong tuumpivuru'nung-koong? Eliasie aa'puu',
“‘Ovoring, teinge tavaaru' dakaning nakaro-nupoong, boonturoma-nairu pesi'evaarima. Teka ning narung enang o'nong, ee'noko ning napo' tee', nkaang domaang napu'koo piavoroi otong.”
Ee'noko tee'puko Kumponinge ee' bari'uu',
“Ninge aa' ˜kenaanka-taa kokorei' nantoong tarearansi otong mme' kiunaava' tee-koo daang-koong kumponing-koo miring Baaelo-koo.”
Tee tee ee'nara tee' nari' enanavarang-koo teing ee'ning taakeng otorong Kumponinge bakaning miru'uru'ning bakaang piaa-koo okora'ario'.
Teing piaa narunge nantoong bakaning tampurimaing dempariko nantoong biikaang nko-nko-koo okora'ario' bakaning tampuriauka' ai' piaa tee nko-nko-koong moo' deea'.
Tee'koo Isireeli-nupoonge tamung kaari'aamaatoko teing oki'ning naing miru'uru' biraanke nka-koo. Teing nii'ning bakaang piaa nka-koo kupi'oroma bia'orou'.
Tee' nari' daariari otoina', aa'pumana',
“Kumponinge avuru' tanuaang kanu'aapenung, duta kaputu'anta-koong, ee'noko kipau-anta-koong e'mung-koo basinoo'koo.”
Ee'noko Deevita' bakanarong-koo ee' otong:
“Biikaang paroro meekunanka tee beana deemparavaing teing baanka'urii'naang, dinkung-pina' pu'antavuriaing maku'koo.
Biikaang duta kaputu'aravainge ooaa'neeng-koo, ee'noko kopini manki'ke takaa'oromaatoai.”
Enang arekee', pu'arima koonto' ee oraru'kiaakoo' ee? A, otoa'. Teing pu'aririo' Isireeli-nupoong deeainge domaang kompau' Isireeli-nupoong mamairoarira napo' dama'ke bere'arii'naang.

Tee'koo ookara kansi'ke biraanke kompaing Kumponing-nung avuavu' domang-anta-koonung Isireeli-nupoonge boto toto'paarai'nange Kumponing bakaang piaa kosi'aako. Enang noru'eriai, tee' deeko' bakei biraanke pankaing ookara nantoonge nkavaavaing dama'ke, Isireeli-nupoong napo' tapo'ariko Karistoo'koo.

Enang tee ning dii'koo karomang Isireeli-nupoong deeaing-koo. Ning kara-okovui-nka Isireeli-nupoong deeaing-anko deemarara aa'na' mintoomaramaung kapoo' masikung-pina' noru'ansi mmaikori' Isireeli-nupoong mamairoarira moo'ariaina'.

Kumponing teing-eta ako' bere'arara ootukunung nantoong kansi'nupoong bakaning turani'nuka-anko bere'arako tee-anko tapo'ariko. Ee'noko tee aa'na' dakaosi' deemparavaing tenang teing Ju'nupoong Karistoo' bakaning deempariko dama'ke, nantoong boo'nuka napo' domampariaina' oro'paravainge.

Pankaraampuri meekupoong meekung deeko' makosi dama'naving napo' meekupoonge. Eebaraami' dovang teing Kumponing-nung koi'koong kaakeng makosinuka ee'noko bakanaving tevari-koong kaumpe'nanka makosinuka.
Enang tee koi' Kumponinge keenavaang-eta nii'ning kaumpe'nanka kente'uko dii' teing kaumpe'nanka pora'koong makosinuka tevari-koo be'nu'antaruru'ning kaakeng-eta iri' nari' nkaverii'naang.

Dii'ke tee irua' koi'koong keenavaang-koong nkaverima daangantariauka' teing kente'nii'nanka-ankoi. Daangantarima deeko' noru'eriaing keenavaang-koonge kaakenge dii' pinka'duri otong. Dii'ke kaakeng pinka'eria'.
Dii'ke pa ee' minkuerimang: Ee', bakei kente'aring kaumpe' nii' enang te' be'nu'marii'naang.
Ee', masika'. Teinoo' tee kente'ariring teinge masika'antavaavarura. Teka dii' iveka'dariri be'nu'dariri otong masika'anta narung ninka. Tee'koo baru' daangantariauka' teka tarerariri otoriai.
Teka Kumponinge kaumpe' keenavaang-koong papi'oa' kente'uu'nung deeko' dii' napo' tee' papi'oa' tooto'duriaing.

Ooveriaing Kumponing tee bakei aa'na' piaa-po'nung ee'noko napo' aa'na' kiimata-po'nunge. Kiimata teing-koo nantoong dua'arimaing-koo ee'noko piaa dii'koo bakaang piaa masika'antaveri otorining-koo otong. Nka masika'antaveriaruko deeko' tee dii' napu'duripeu'.

Nii'noo'koo tee teing Isireeli-nupoong kente'uru'ning napo' bere'arira Karistoo' masika'antavaako deeko' Kumponinge tee napo' be'nu'uripeu' te' napo' kente'ariru'noo'. Kumponing tee purinto' oto'evung teing napo' be'nu'anta-koo te' unapo'.
Dii' kaumpe'nanka pora'koong koi'keta tooto'durima otoa'na' keenavaang-koo be'nu'duru', ee'noko tee'koo bakei teing kaumpe' keenavaang-kooning kente'uu'ning napo' be'nu'koo biikanave-koo makosi.

Mmaikori' ee, kapoo' tero makensi'nung naurampiai dii'ka daangantariauka'na'. Ai' teing Isireeli-nupoong teing ive'iveka'poroi otong ee'noko tee' nari' otoromaatoaing bera tee-koo batei-koo Isireeli-nupoong deeaing-kooning ookara miru'nii'nanka tumpariainoo'ke basi.
Tenang tumpariko ookara Isireeli-nupoong moo'ariainge, Daari Meekunge ee' naumuru'na',
“Saioni-namono-ita tee Domang-anta tavo'aravaing ee'noko teie toro-antavuriaing Jeekopi'daang biikaang oraka' nko-ita.
Tenang ee'nang ninge tonta'evorompaing biikaang oraka' nkonanka, siompansi tee kara naroompevorontu'nung.”

Teing Isireeli-nupoonge tampara doorenang dimpa'aama Kumponing-koo too'de-nupoong-pina' deempariko tee doorenang pari'antana' dii'ke tampa' nkaveru'. Nka teroita miru'uru'noo'koo Kumponinge ee'nariong bakei aa'na' piaavuri otong biikakatauro piaavuriko'nung-koo.
Teing kapoo'nanka Kumponinge avurimaing ee'noko teing nantoong avu'koo barevurimaing tonta'koo makosi deea'.
Dii' nii'na'mung Kumponing meumperiaruko'ning enang nkavering bakaang piaa Isireeli-nupoonge tee meumpaavaruio'.
Ee'noko tee tee' nari' meuntepa'ariru'nung tasi'paama teinge napo' tee piaa nkavaava'naang dii'ke nkaveru'nung ooaara.
Kumponinge tee nantoong ookara meumpaava'nameng-koo otoroko sira'puing bakaang piaa narunge ookara nari' domampurii'naang.
Kumponing bakei bakaang noru' ee'noko matau aa'na' masika' ee'doonko isikung otong. Naninge bane keperuu'ke bakaang onou tasi'puarupeu' ee'noko bakaang aarumo tasi'paa'ke.
Tee' Daari Meekunge aa'pumana',
“Baie Kumponing bakaang onou tasi'pui otong? Baie Kumponing koong-antaevung?”
Ee'noko
“Baa ninka Kumponing komaaru˜ otong?”
Otoa'. Tee ootukunung kapoo'nanka nkonung, tarenara ee'noko miru'anta. Bakaang meenasi tee' nari' otomatoaing. Ee', ee'na'.

Tee'koo, mmaikori' pia-antarampimang, Kumponinge piaamuri unaa-antamuru'nung-koo dii'ka diikaang mono ootukunung arariaing Kumponing-koo pareka domantoo'pina', meeka' dariri Kumponing dotu-antana' otoritaa'. Aung tee taung masikung Kumponing dootuu'numpo'.

Avutevu' aarumo paaraveriauka' teka Kumponing taura'periko paari-antaruriaing diikaang onou pankaruntoong-koo. Tenang ee'nang dii'ke noru'eriaing tee Kumponing bakaang pia dii'koo, tee kapoo' tampara, dakaosi' ee'noko dotu-antavuai.

Enang dii'ke naruna' naruna' taarameriaing Kumponinge avuavu' amuu'nung-koo dii' pakurampii'naang. Narunge tee dakaang miru'noo' tampa' tasi'peainge daka. Tee miru' aruing kompei napo' tee-koo deto basinoo'ka noru'daravauka'. Dii'ke ookarai tee tampa' masika' noru'eriaing koong-antaveri tee miru' diikaang masika'anta-koong Kumponinge kanteruring dii'.
Narung naning-koong mono tee anairu tenairu-po'nung, nka nko-nko-koo nari' miru'aria'.
Tee' nari', nii' tee'ke, bane mmau'ke, narung mono nko-antavamping naro'ka Karistoo'koong. Teka naruna' naruna' nii' tee tankaamariri pakumeerimaung.
Nii' amutemurii' avuavu'po'nupoong Kumponinge piaamuri amuru'ning. Dakaang avuavu' tarampee-koong˜ deeko' makosi, tee' nkoveaing aruu'noo' basi dakaang masika'anta ninka.
Dakaang avuavu' nantoong pakupaku-koong deeko' makosi, aroo'ei nkoveaing. Da' nau-anta deeko' tee avuavu' kompei kake'ii-antaveri naueriainge.

Naning bakaang avuavu' nantoong daa'anta-koong deeko' domang dontong-antavui tee' nkovuaing. Ee'noko bakaang kapoo'nanka tankee'koong deeko' avusiro'ari tankaampuaing makosi. Ee'noko baa naning nantoong-koo pankaing, teie mataa'iari tarevurimatoaing teing. Naning napo' piaa ninka nantoong unaa-antavurimaung deeko', doturotuari tee' nari' nkovurimatoainge.
Piaa tee koonto' domang-eta piaareeriaing. Piaroriauka' orara-koo. Kapoo' tampara-koo kato pinka'dariai.
Piaareerimaatoai navurariritaa' namaia'pina'. Otori deto noru'deeri otorimaatoai.
Iri' o'dariauka'. Ovoring meung-koo nta'pina' uruntariri otoriai Tanuaang Meekunge iri'antarurio'.
Tee barenku nemperimaung noru'eritaa' doturariri otoriai ee'noko orara doong kune'erima dooroontariri otoriai. Uatepa kunsirarimatoai.
Dii'koo nii'ning apuka'pariko pakuereriai Kumponing bakaning meekupoong. Napo' nii'noo'nupoong poroko dii'anko tampa' tarevererimaatoai.
Nantoong oraka' nkoraariaining biraankei maku'evurereriai, barakosi'ereria'.
Doturoturarimatoai teing ninka doturotuarimatoaining ninka nari'. Biromparimatoaining ninka nari' birontarimatoai.
Naroong-koo otorimaatoai. Beekareeria' otoai, teka navureeri otorimaatoai doonko otoromaing ninka. Kirokai-pina' noru'dariauka'.
Orara orarai maku'eriauka'. Tampa' nari' nkoverimatoai ookara.
Mataurariri mooa-koo otoriai ookara ninka, makosiri deeko'.
Mmaikori' ee, mero' nkoveriauka'. Tamung doonko otoriai. Kumponing-nung iira otong, maku'uaing. Tee' Daari Meekunge ee' minkuvuu'na',
“Mero' tee nkaang. Ninge ninka mero'ampaing. Kumponinge tee'puu'.”
Ee', dakaang too'denung peeravoko bau'eai. Ntong nai piavoko aveainge. Tee' nkovema taung daare'ee'naang onou paariarara dama' navureereaina'.
Orarai puru'duriauka' dii', teka orara dii'ke puru'eriai tampara ninka.
Teing doonge-taaranuka˜ meumpereriai dii' ookarai, ai' tanata nkonuka bii'ka daa'aririning otoroa' Kumponinge miruu'uriaruko. Ookara daa'aririning teing Kumponinge miru'uru'ning.
Tee'koo tee naning biikaang kara dimpa'uaing tee tee-pina' Kumponing teing miru'uru'nung bakaang kara dimpa'umaang, ee'noko teing dimpa' nkoaavaining tee kiimata nkavaavaining.

Tampa' siompereriaing deeko' tee dii' avoro'koo makosi deea' teing-koo dii' tareraariaining-koo, teka dii'ke oraka' nkoveriaing deeko' aroreripeu'. Dii'ke ee diikaning doonge-taaranuka-koo aroreria' oto'koo piarori otong? Tampa' nari' nkoverimatoaing, tampeng tantaariaina'.

Doonge-taaranuka teing Kumponinge botovuru'ning dii' pakuraarii'naang. Nka dii'ke kapoo' oraka' nkoverima deeko' dii' teing avoro'koo otoripeu' teing-koo iri' oto'evoromaung ninka kiimataraari'neeng-koo, ai' teing teing Kumponinge botovuru'ning temurii' nko-nko nko-koo.
Tee'koo dii'ke siomperiaing, Kumponing-etaing kiimata baari'koo narung-koo deea', teka tunsi unaarori oto'koo diikaang onoue diikaang nko-nko tampara-pina' tasi'perima.
Tee narung onou-koo napo' dii'ke iivaa nkoverimatoainge doonge-taara bakaning moo'aarimaatoaina'. Tee'koo Kumponing-nung nko-nko tampa' nkoaamatoai dii' pakuraarima.

Komaaru amutemurii' oto'deruriko maku'eriai, aremurii', iivaa deeko' iivaarariai, masika'anta-koo-nupoong deeko' masika'antaverererimaatoai, deto basi-anta-koo-nupoong deeko' deto basi-antavererimaatoai.

Ee', komaaru maku'eri bakeveriaing tampamang, teka Kumponing bakaang piaa tee komaaru maku'paa' deemparako piaareeri otorimaatoai. Baa tee naning tee-koo miirinung piaavumaung Kumponing-nung boto tampa' siompumaung.
Daari Meekung-koo ee' minkuvui otoina',
“Nampeesi orarieauka'.
“Naning dupisi'eauka'.
“Bakiaa' nkoveauka'.
“Nii'nung bakaang kapoo' karaa'eauka'.”
Teing ee'noko nii'ning botonanka otoromaing anaare-koo bi'ariri otorong,
“Dake tee naning da'koo due'nung daka piaararamana' nari' tee' piaaveaing.”
Baa tee naning nantoong piaavurimaung tee kapoo' orara nkovuarupeu' teing-koo. Tee' piaavurima tee boto siompumaung teie.

Tee' nari' nko-koo ana'dariauka' doong asi'na'mung due'uio' tasi'peri. Tamung aasiri otoriauka'. Te'mung tutung masika'antavampima aa'pampiko', “Moo'mariaina'mung due'uing.” Nka e'mung-eta baru' due' masipo' deemparing.
Muung tee enang oparama nanuko tane'ke due'uing. Enang kiru'marira dua'ampiaing teing nko-nkonanka muung bakaning ee'noko nepu'mariaing aarumo tamparai araka-koonunge.
Tane'nung aarumo-pina' nkomariaing. Aa'noauka': taarapiikarariauka' naikirima, kaukauro nkoveriauka', ee'noko nii'ning kapoo' maimaia'na' nkoveriauka', napo' mamairoreeri tata'deeriauka'.
Teka Jiisuu' Karistoo'pina' nari' otoriai. Orara aarumo nko-koo piaroria' mono bakaang pia siomperi.
Tee naning bakaang masika'anta-koo aruaru' dii'anko poko onkeonke'eriai, nka tee ninka tata'deeria'.
Teie naninge masika'anta purinto'po'nunge tee kapoo' naro'keta naivumaung ee'noko teie naninge masika'anta-koo baru' purimparavaunge tee taamang bire'nii'ning naivumaung.

Teie naninge naro'keta naivumaunge tee kerempumaung orara tampuauka'nung. Ee'noko teie kerempumaunge tee naro'keta naivumaung orara tampuauka'. Aming-koo, nna' ookaanka Kumponinge onkeonke'uresi otoreng bakanaanka botovotonaa'ka deemparesi otoree'naang.

Baie da' simpe'nko˜ tantuu'nunge bautaranuka nii'nung bakaning? Tee bakaang Ovoringe deeko' simpe' nko-koo makosi arera tampara ee'noko arera orara. Ee'noko tampara tampura tee Ovoringe makosi donkong-antavuaing.

Naning narunge nii'ning doong meekeng tampurimaung ee'noko nii'ning meekeng deea'. Teka nii'nunge ookara doong nari' oro'nanka tampurimaung. Makosi, ookara nantoong tee naruna' naruna' bii'ka noru'ariri otoromana' date'pariri otoroaing biikaang onou-koo.

Baie naninge nii'na'mung doong tare-koo piavora tee tarevuaing te'mung ee'na'mung Ovoring pankaing-antavui. Ee'noko tee naning naro'keta naikumaung tee Ovoring daangampuma tee' naro'keta naikung Kumponing-koo tampa' tampuma. Kerempumaunge tee', Ovoring daangampuma kerempumaunge, ee'noko Kumponing-koo tampa' tampuma.
Nii'koo naning baka otomaung otoa', nii' Kumponing bakaning naing, domamariri o'nori deeko' ee'noko moompima deeko'.
Nii' domamariri otoko tee Ovoringe kuung deemuri otong ee'noko moompiko napo' teie, Ovoringe kuung deemuri otong. Arekee', domamariritaa' deeko' ai' moompima deeko' nii' teing Ovoring bakaning.
Karistoo' boo'paru' ee'noko napo' domamparu' tee ookara-koo nari' Ovoring otoo'naang boo'nuka-koo ee'noko domantoo'nuka-koo.
Arekee'koo dake da'maiko' orara tampemang? Napo' arekee'koo da'maiko' oovemaang? Nii' teing ookara donkonampiaining teke Kumponinge simpe'muriainoo'ke.
Tee' Daari Meekung-koo daariari otoina',
“Kumponinge aa'pumaang: Masika'keta masika', ookara nantoong ning-koo kinkinaavaining ee'noko ookara menenge ning Kumponing daangamaavaining.”
Tee'koo noru'ampiri otong nii'ka niikaang nko-nkonanka ninka basimariaing Kumponing-anko teie nari-koo.
Tee'koo nii'ka simpesimpe'meeria' otoaing. Teka ee' noru'erimatoai: Kapoo' naning nii'maiko' tupamparara dua'arapeu'nung-pina' oro' nkoampiauka'.
Nkaang otooto' Karistoo' ninka nari' o'noresi ninge tasi'pansing kapoo' baka tanuaang ku'mi'anta otoa'. Teka naninge masika'antavui ku'mi'anta tampuko dei, ku'mi'anta deemparapeu' tee-koo.

Nka kapoo' nii'nunge ku'mi'anta tampui otoing dake naiera tee da'maiko' domang orari-antavepeu', ee'noko domang orari-antaverai'nange ee' noru'darapeu': Ninge enang piaanavung siompamparuing. Ai' tee Karistoo' tee da'maiko' moo'uu'naang boo'paru', tee'koo dake napo' orari-antaveauka'nung naro'keta kapoo' naiema.
Tareraravai tee-koo kapoo'koo dake tampara tampei nkovemaung-koo nii'ninge oraka' minkuminku-aa'neeng.
Kumponing bakaang tare taamang-aape deea' tuaang tovang, teka koonto'nung aarumo-aape, mooa-aape ee'noko doturotu Tanuaang Meekung-etaing-aape.
Naning tee te'aapei Karistoo'koo dai'ari mintoompevumaung Kumponing dotu-antavukoo' ee'noko nantoonge tampara tampaakoo'.
Tee'koo to'bii-antamariri o'noriaing mooa-aape ee'noko pakupaku-aape nari'.
Taamang narung noru'eri Kumponing bakaang nko-nko orari-antaveriauka'. Ookara tee bakei kiiroraa'nanka masikung, teka masika'parapeu' oraka' nii'ning dua'anta-koo tamung naro'keta naiampiko.
Tampa'na' ee': Kerempeaing tee bio' maa'koo, purinto'naru' nai-koo ee'noko nii'ning kapoo' tee da'maiko' orari-anta-koo makosining.
Tee masika'anta temurii' da' oto'deruing tareveai, da' Kumponing ninka nari' kontui otoaing. Biraankenung tee naning tampara aarumo masika'antavumana' nari' nkoarama tuutunang˜ baari'umaung.

Nka naning tee tamung naro'keta naivumaung pankaruntoonge noru' keekoo'arama, tee tuutunang-po'nung. Aming-koo? Tee aa' tee masika'anta-ita nkovuaruing. Ai' ookara kapoo' tee'ke, masika'antavua' nkovuma tee' oraka'ke.
Nii' ee'ning masika'anta-koo purimariri o'norininge tee teing aruaru'nanka pakuarampiaing, niikaang pia siompampia'.
Nii'ke naruna' naruna' oovuning dotu-antavarampimaatoaing tampa' purimpariri otoroaina'.
Ai' Karistoo' teie, baka dotu-antavaravaruko' Kumponing noru'ui, Daari Meekung-koo aa'puu'na'koo,
“Oraka' minkuraamainge minkumaako tora'pantu'.”
Ninge tenaare-koo noru'antarampimang, ai' ookara kara Daari Meekung-koo otoing teing nii' nau-anta-koo, tee Daari Meekung-koo pinka'mariri domang kuaa' ninka mii'kampiri tee barenku nempampiaina'.
Enang tee, Kumponinge domang kuaa'antamuri mii'kampiri o'norii'naang pakumurimaunge navu-antaruriaing Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaang aarumo siomperi otoriko.
Tee' biraankeruriko nari' karerima Kumponing daangamperiaina', tee niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' Bauma.
Tee'koo onkeonke'deerimaatoaing Karistoo'ke dii' tero onkeonke'duru'na', Kumponing meena'poaina'.
Noru'eriai tee Jiisuu' Karistoo' pou' sira'antavuma Kumponing tee masika'pari otomaung bakaang maraka-anta-koo Ju'nupoong paku-koo teing tutuna'nupoong tero nauvuru'na'.
Ee'noko napo' noru'eriai tee pou' Ju'deeaing napo' moo'uriko teinge Kumponing miring pankaing-antavaava'naang bakaang piaa-koo teing-koo. Tee' Deevita'ke daarivuma minkuvuu'na',
“Ninge daangantampaing Da' Ju'deeaing-koo meu'ke, ee'noko dakaang miring kenavampainge.”
Nii'noo'ke napo' ee' daariari otong,
“Doturariaing dii' Ju'deeaing teing ninka bakaning Ju'nupoong ninka nari'.”
Napo' nii'noo'ke Daari Meekung-koo aa'pui otong,
“Daangamperiaing Ovoring dii'ke Ju'deeainge. Ookarai daangamperiaing tee.”
Napo' Aisaia' bakanoo'ke aa'pui otong,
“Jeese' bakanaving-koo narung naning daa'araa'naang tarevuriaing teing Ju'deeaing, ee'noko tee narung-koo teinge biikaang noru' sipaavai.”

Ai' teie Kumponing maraka-antamurio' nempampimaunge maanto'antaruriaing doturotue ee'noko mooai masika'antaveriko. Ee'noko teie purinto'ke Tanuaang Meekung bakaange aa'na' tasi'antaruriaing tee barenku mme' oro'paravaung.
Ninge tee ninka tampa' noru'dampimaung dii' mmaikori' tampara aarumoi maanto'antararirio' ee'noko norunoru'ke, ee'noko makosirariri dii' dii'ka nau-anta-koo.
Nka tee amanampa' nii'ning kapoo' napo' noru'antarampimang, mmaikori', noru'ansi dii' tampa' otoritaa' tamung napo' minkuanko meena'poaing, ai' ning tee Kumponinge mintoong maneenung amuu'nung.

Ning tee poka'mari kara-okovui-nka-koong tee doorenang Jiisuu' Karistoo'keta Ju'deeaing-aape. Ning tee pareka-nko makosi, piristi'pina' dii' parekarampiko dii' boontunang tampara deentariru'ning Kumponing-koo Tanuaang Meekunge makosi-antarurio' Kumponing dotu-anta-koo.
Nka tee makosi ning danga'daangamaravaing tee-koo ookara kapoo'nanka-koo Jiisuu' Karistoo'ke nkovuing-koo ning-koo kuunge.

Kapoo'koo ninka nkoansing-koo daangamaravarupeu', nka tee-koo Karistoo'ke narunge nkovuing-koo ning-koo kuunge daangamaravaing Ju'deeaing pia-antavarantu'nung-koo aa'ninge: kara, tampa'nko, iirakuta-koong taa'ni'anta oro'pariko ee'noko Tanuaang Meekunge purimpari daa'uriko;
Tee' nari' daankiarantu' Karistoo'koong doorenang ookara teketa Jerusalema' kato Ilirikung-navuntu'.
Tee' nkomarama ee' to'bii-antamaramaung: Tee doorenang nauarama'naang tenairu Karistoo'koong miring nii'ninge mme' sira'paava'nairu nanama, aa'pama: Nii'nunge natuku keempuu'noo' kaniami'neenga.
Daari Meekunge minkuvumana' nari' nkoaraa'naang ee'pina',
“Teinge tero ooaavaruu'ninge nauaariaruko tee ooaavaing, ee'noko teinge tero taaravaavaruko'ninge tee tasi'paavaing.”
Tee' nkomarama dii' tero taaraveru'ning-anko meaung tamung maromarama po'koo.
Nka enang opansing ookara nkaang nko-nko ameensi'koo. Teka makotuko deeko' enang Sipeini-nameensi'aape nanama'naang, ee'noko te' nanama beero'dampiaing pa, mmau' mare'koo dii' oo-koo piamonanoo'koo.
Ee'noko oki'noo' navumariritaa' o'noo'norira pakumerio' napo' tampa' nanampaing nkanavunge.
Nka enanoo' Jerusalema'aape nanama'naang avuavu' ninka Kumponing bakaning meekupoong-koo.
Teing Masedonia' ee'noko Akaia'nameensi'kooninge dotuariri avuavu' nkoau' teing meekupoong-koo ata'oi'nuka-koo Jerusalema'ka.

Tamung dotuariri avaaru', nka tee tampara doorenang-koong komaaru maku' makosi. Ai' Ju'nupoong-eta tee tanuaang-aapenung biraanke nkavaara teinge napo' pakuaariai Ju'nupoong mono-aapenung pakupaku-koo.
Teka tenang tee aung avuavu' opansi avoromira oosievorompiru'nung tenang tankinampaing Sipeini-aape ee'noko tankinama beero'dampiai.
Ee'noko noru'ansi otong ning tenang dii'anko basimaravainang tee Karistoo'ke biraanke pankaing amuaing dii' paku-koo.

Enang naurampimang dii' mmaikori' kuunge Jiisuu' Karistoo' niikaang Ovoring-koo ee'noko tee ninka piaa Tanuaang Meekung bakaang, ni'ninka nari' mintoomariaing kunsi-koo pakumeriko Kumponinge tonta'antamuaina' teing-eta nantoong masika'anta otoroaing-eta Judia'navetei otoroining-eta, ee'noko nkaang nko-nko Jerusalema'ke tampa' aroo'aavai Kumponing bakaninge meekupoonge.
Tee' nari' Kumponinge piavomana' ning dii'anko meaing dotumarama dii' ninka tampa' dee'moi o'noo'naang.
Tee ee'nara Kumponing mooa-po'nung tee' dii' ookara ninka nari' otomatoaing. Tee' ee'na'.
Dii' ninge naurampimang ani nii'mari Piibii' tampa' noru'eriaing. Ani teni pakupakunani dootuu'nupoong-koo teke Siekuria-namono-koo.

Tampa' onkeonke'eriaing onkeonke'eemana' Kumponing bakaning meekupoong, ee'noko pakueriaing teni kapoo' piavoaining-koo, ai' teni teni ee'nani pakupaku nantoong karika'koo, ee'noko ning-koo tee' nari'.
Nauereriaing tering Pirisika'daring Akuila nkaang doturotu tering-koo, nari' Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo mintoomarimanaring-koo.
Kuru toto'koo avororea' pakumuretu' domang-antamurema. Ning narunge tampa' tang-koo makosi deea' tering-koo teka ookara dootuu'nupoong osi kante-koo tampara tampaavaing, Ju'deeaing-kooninge.

Nauereriaing nkaang doturotu teing dootuu'nupoong tering beekanava'koo kune'eemaing. Napo' naueriai tee Epinitas nkaang doturotu, mmaiko' masikung, tee ee'nara tutuna'nung Eesia-nupoong-koo Karistoo'aape bere'aru'nung.
Napo' doturotu nkaang teni-koo Meeri'koo dii'koo aa'na' kake'iinani.

Doturotu napo' tenaanka-koo Antoronaikas naanka Junias, ning-pina' Ju'koonaanka ee'noko nari' dai'nisira. Tenaanka Kumponing-nung kara-okovuresi-nkara miring pankaing-po'naanka. Ning mme' bere'maravaruko tenaanka tutung bere'aretu'naanka Karistoo'koo.
Doturotu tee-koo Ampilietas, mmaiko' masikung Ovoring-koo.
Napo' doturotu tee-koo Ebanus nari' mintoomarimaung Karistoo'koo, ee'noko napo' tee mmaiko' masikung Sitekis.
Doturotu napo' tee-koo Apelis, Karistoo' kake'iiari siompumaung. Napo' doturotu teing-koo Aristabiulas baurukaa'koo.
Napo' doturotu tee-koo Erodion, ni'ninka nari' Ju'nung. Napo' doturotu Ovoring-koo teing-koo teni Nasisis baurukaa'koo.
Napo' doturotu tenaanka manikumaara-koo Ovoring-koo mintoomparemanaanka-koo Taraipina ee'noko Taraiposa'. Napo' tee Peesis, mmaiko', aa'na' mintoomparamaung Ovoring-koo.
Doturotu tee-koo Ruupasi, pankaing Ovoring-koo, ee'noko teni bauko, napo' ninge tee', nko'ke.
Napo' doturotu teing-koo Asinkiritas, Pilikon, Eemis, Patorobas ee'noko Eemas ee'noko teing mmaikori' nari' otoromaing.
Doturotu napo' aing-koo: Pilolokasi, teni Julia, Nerias ee'noko teni ba'mari. Napo' Olimpas ee'noko ookara Kumponing bakaning meekupoong teing ninka nari' otoromaing.
Ookara doturotu-antareeriaing onkeonke'deerima. Karistoo' bakaning dootuu'nupoong napo' ameensi'kooninge ookara osi kante-ita doturotu nauraarimaang.

Enang tee bakei koonto' naurampimang dii' mmaikori': Oorariri otoriaing teing-koo dii' toto'anta-koo ee'noko pore'anta-koo piavoroi otoroining-koo tee kara tero taaraveru'nung bei'bei'aama. Donta'dariri otoriai teing-eta.
Nantoong tee' oro'nukai tee niikaang Ovoring Karistoo' siompaava', biikaang pia narung siompaamaung. Tampa' nari' kareaama ee'noko opampaarima tosiaarimaung teing amakoori domang-koo.

Dii' teing kara meumperimaing deentariko ookarai tampa' noru'daari otong ee'noko ning napo' tee'koo dotumaramaunge. Nka ninge dii' tampa' mataurariri oto'koo pia-antarampimang tampa' nari' nko-koo. Oraka' nko-koo amako-pina' otoriai.

Tee' nari' nkorariko tenang Kumponinge mooa-po'nunge Sietani' namu'ke dii'koo kau'koo boonavete-koo mme'uai. Tee biraanke niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaang dii' ninka nari' otomatoaing. Ee', masikung.
Timoti'ke ni'ninka nari' mintoomaremaunge tampa' tanterurimang, napo' Lusias dovange Jeesoni ee'noko Sosipata, ni'ninka namuu'kooninge.
Ninge ee'narai Tesiesie aung karavoto˜ daariansinunge tampara tanterompimang Ovoring ninka.
Teie Gaiasie nii' ookara dootuu'nupoong anke tanatamurimaunge tampara tanturimaang. Napo' Erasitasie osi-koong mooni' tarevumaunge ee'noko tee nii'maiko' Kuotasie tenaankai tampara tantaarimaang.
Niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo'ke dii' ookara piaaruri tampa' pakururiaing. Tee' ee'na'.

Enang tee daangampampimaatoaing Kumponing dii' tampa' donkong-antaruri otoaing tee' nari' teie doorenang tamparai minkuvumana' nauaramaunge Jiisuu' Karistoo' sira'pama. Teie doorenang tamparai tee kapoo' makensi'nung teroita makempari otou'nung enang sirapo' po'antavuing;
Kumponinge tee' nari' otoi otomaunge botovuio' sira'paring ookara amutemurii' nantoong-koo, teinge masika'antavaara siompaava'naang. Aung tee nakaro-nupoonge Daari Meekung-koo minkuau'nung.
Kumponing tee meenasi okovenung, ee'nara baka norukasi' daangampampimaatoaing Jiisuu' Karistoo'ke pakumurio'. Ee', masikung.
Aung karavoto˜ tee ninge Paula'ke daariamang, ninge ee'narai Kumponinge bakaang piai bokumuu'nunge Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaang kara-okomui-nka deemaraa'naang.

Ee'noko tang pakumui teie mmaiko'ke Sostenisie nari' daarirerompimang dii' Kumponing bakaning teke Koorin-namono-koo dootuu'darimaing, ee'noko ootukuning nantoong-koo ootukunairu-koo otoroining nari' eentavarimaing Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo miring tampaama, tee biikaang Ovoring ee'noko nii'ke niikaange. Dii' ee'ning Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo kuung otorining banturi bokururira bakaning deeng-antaruru'ning meeka'antaruri.
Biraanke ee'noko mooa dii'koo otoaing Kumponing Niuma-itaing ee'noko teieta Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo'.
Doong kante ninge tampara tampamaung nkaang Kumponing-koo dii' ee'ning-koo, teie biraankeruru'nung-koo Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo kuunge.
Dii' tee tee-koo maanto'duru'ning avaro-tevaro. Teie pakururimaung noru'koo ookara kapoo' masikananka ee'noko tampa' kareria'naang tee-koo.
Niikaang doorenang Karistoo'koong tee diikaang domang-koo date'pario' ookara avuavu' tanuaang-etaning nkaverira komperimaung nemperitaa' poainoo' tee niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo'.
Napo' teie pinka'antaruriainge o'doma basirarii'naang tuumpiraria' teroong-koo bera Karistoo' toroaravaina'mung-koo basi.
Kumponinge ee'narai tee' bokururu' Bauring Jiisuu' Karistoo' niikaang Ovoring ninka domang nari' oto'koo. Kumponing tee bakei makosi masikung nii' tee-koo baitomariri oto'koo.
Teka ee' minkurampimang mmaikori' tee-koo niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaang miring-koo: Naro' kareriai, ee'noko pokapoka'deeriauka', teka tapo'deeriai noru' narung-koo, narung miru' ninka.
Ai', mmaikori', dii' ninge doore taararampirining Koloui bakaning-koo nii'ninge naumaio', dii'koo meu'ke turanturang otong.

Aung tee ee' minkuamaang: Nii'ning dii'kooninge naruna' naruna' aa'perimaung, “Ning Paula' bakanavitu-koong.” “Ning Apolos bakanavitu-koong.” Napo' nii'ninge aa'perimaung, “Ning Siipas bakanavitu-koong.” Ee'noko nii'ninge aa'perimaunge, “Ning Karistoo' bakanavitu-koong.”
Karistoo' ee tankaampari otong? Ning Paula' ee dii'koo aa'barata'koo moontu'? Ning Paula' nkaang miring-koo ntong-koo minkirarira meeka'antarariru'ninge dii'?
Ning enang dotumaramang naning dii'koong ntong-koo minkie meeka'antavamparuu'noo'koo, a'noo' Krispas naanka Gaias deeko'.
Naninge ee' minkuvuauka', “Paula' bakaang miring-koo ntong-koo minkivurima meeka'antavurimaung.”
Oi, napo' ninge tee, Sitepanas bakanava-kooning deeko' ntong-koo minkiaramira meeka'antavarantu'. Teing-koo dama'due pa napo' nii'ning ntong-koo minkie meeka' antavarampa'.

Karistoo'ke ning tee nantoong ntong-koo minkie meeka'anta-koo botomua', teka tee doorenang tampara daanki-koo botomuu', baru' kara tarii'ke daangamarapeu'na' deea', Karistoo' aa'barata'koo boora moo'muru'nung-koong doore paa'aravaroo'naang.

Tee daankinang Karistoo' bakaang boo'koong tee-koo aa'barata'koo tee kanu'anta-pina' teing-koo nantoong mosianung-aape nanaamaatomaing-koo. Teka nii'koo, Kumponinge domang-anta-murimatomaing-koo tee tee kara bakaang iri'po'nung nantoong domang-anta-koo.
Ai' teie Daari Meekunge tee' minkuvuu',
“Ninge orari-antavampaing bii'ka norukasi'nanka tamparimaing biikaang noru', ee'noko tonta'ampaing bii'ka mataunanka tamparimaing biikaang matau.”

Tee'koo tee, arekee' nantoong poka'arima bii'ka daangamparipeu' aa'ning tamparima: norukasi'nanka, Boto Meekung-koong Dariraari tanatanuka, ee'noko kara-koo bore'ke deerenuka Kumponing-koo dutakanoo'ke? Makotua'. Kumponinge biikaang matau daang-antaevuri otong.

Aa'noio' Kumponing bakaang matau-koo makosiaavaruu' teing kansi'nupoong Kumponing noru'koo bii'ka biikaang noru'ke. Tee'koo Kumponing dotuaru' teie minkunaa daang-koong tampaamaunge nii'ke daankiampimaunge domaang moo'uriaing teing nantoong masika'antavaavaining.
Ju'nupoonge tee naning masika'antavaavaung taa'ni'anta aa'na' iri' ninka oro'paravaruko, ee'noko teing Ju'deeainge naning masika'antavaavaunge biikaang kansi'koong matau-pina' nari' oro'paravaruko.

Teka nii'ke aampari'marima Karistoo', tee Domang-anta aa'barata'koo˜ taakavau'nung-koong, daankiampimaung, Ju'nupoonge maimaia'na' maremaare-pina' taaravaamaung, ee'noko Ju'deeainge kanu'pina' taaravaakoo'.

Teka teing-koo bokuvuru'ning-koo naro'ka, Ju'nupoong ee'noko Ju'deeaing tee, Kumponinge tee teroita Pako'pari'nii' iri' ninka daa'uu'nung nii' domamurira tampa' taremurimatoo'naang, ee'noko tee-koo kuung o'nori Kumponing bakaang purinto' ee'noko matau deto basi tasi'pampiri dotumarimaung.

Tee Kumponing bakaang noru' bane daang-pina' oro'ke, aa'na' deto basi nantoong biikaang noru' pankaing-koo, ee'noko Kumponing bakaang iri', bane tarua'pina' oro', aa'na' deto basi nantoong biikaang iri' pankaing-koo.

Mmaikori' ee, norunoru'dariaing Kumponinge kansi'nung aarumo puru'ui bokururu'nung-koo, ai' oo'oorariai dii'ka diikanavitu dii'koo nantoong mmau' otoroa' aa'nupoong: norukasi'nuka tantaarimaing, iri'po'nupoong ee'noko ovontung biurukaa'.

Teka Kumponinge bampuu' kapoo'ke kansi'nupoonge kanu' tampaamaunge biikaning noru'po'nupoong maia'antavurii'naang, ee'noko napo' bampuu' kapoo'ke teinge iri'dopa tampaamaunge biikaning iirakutananka maia'antavurii'naang.

Kumponinge bampuu'nung kapoo' kansi'nupoonge doonko ooaama, oraka' noru'aama, otoaung-pina' noru'aamaunge dua'antavuaing biikaang kapoo' masikung tampaamaung, naning daangampara'neeng Kumponing-koo uro'ka-noo'ke.

Kumponinge nii' Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo kuung si'muru', ee'noko Kumponinge Jiisuu' Karistoo' niikaang noru' okovenung deeng-antavuu'. Teie ee'narai nii' koonto'nuka deeng-antamuru' Kumponing-koo ee'noko Kumponing bakaning taa'ni'antanisinuka deemurira Kumponinge moo'muru'.
Tee'koo ee' minkuamaang, Daari Meekunge aa'pumana',
“Naning daangang-koo piavora tee daangamparavaing tee-koo Ovoring-koo.”
Mmaikori', ning tee'ke, daangamarava' mou' dii'anko tee-koo karakara-koo ee'noko norunoru'koo tenang sira'pama tee Kumponing-nung kara baku'nisi.

Ning ee' noru'maru': Kapoo' nii'ning noru'ampauka'nung dii'aapeita. Kapoo' naurampiaing ee': Jiisuu' tee Karistoo', tee Kumponinge tero Pako'pari'nii' domamurira taremuriainoo'koo, ee'noko tee aa'barata'koo boora moo'muru'nung.
Tenang dii' ninka nari' o'noko'nang tee ning ka'duumari o'noko' naning aruaru'pina' oro'mari avoro'ke dankuranku'marapeu'na'.
Nkaang daankinang kansi'aapenung norukasi'ke barantampia' kara menaankamoma,
teka Tanuaang Meekunge bakaang purinto'ke masikee-antamuko aroo'dariru', diikaang masika'anta e'manuaina' naning bakaang norukasi'koo deea', teka Kumponing bakaang purinto'koo.

Nii'ke tee tee a'noo' nantoong purimparimaing-koo tee-koo Kumponing bakaang aarumo-koo teing-koo kara makosi nauarampimaung, nka tee kara kansi' bakaang noru'koo ee'noko pankainanka-koo makosi-pina' oro' deea', teing dua'ariaining deempariko.
Nii'ke tee Kumponing bakaang noru' makensi'nung sira'pampimang ee'nara noru' pankaing teroita maronisi ootukunung kapoo'nanka tutumparavaruko nii'ke meenasi kompampiaina' tee ninka.
Teing ovontung enang-navaro-kooning koonto' noru'aavaruu'ning. Teinge noru'ai dei tee, Tee Ovoring Meenasi Okovenung aa'barata'koo bi'aavarupeu'.
Tee' nari' Daari Meekunge minkuvuu'na' naurampimang, aa'puu'na',
“Kumponinge tero maamu-antavuu' teing-koo domange dai'aamaing-koo kapoo' tampara naninge teroita dutai oovua', ee'noko punkange taaravua', ee'noko bakaang onou-koo tumparava'.”
Teka nii'koo tee Kumponinge tampa' nkomuru'na' oro'antavuu' tee-koo Tanuaang Meekung-koo kuunge. Tanuaang Meekung tee ootukunung kapoo' sirapo'antanung, bane Kumponing-koo tumang masipo' otomaing.
Baie ee'narai naning bakaang onou noru'ui otong? Otoa'. Teie tee-koonge tanuaange deeko' noru'ui otong. Tee'pina' nari' Kumponing bakaang tanuaange narunge noru'ui otong Kumponing bakaang onou.
Enang nii'ke nkavampiring tee Tanuaang, tee kansi'nung deea', teka tee Tanuaang Meekung Kumponing-etaing tee nii'ke noru'ampii'naang teing avuavu' biraankemurima Kumponinge amuru'ning.

Aing teing kapoo'nanka nii'ke minkuampimaing naning bakaang noru'ke deea', teka Tanuaang Meekunge naumuriko. Nii'ke ee'nara bakaang kara siompampiri siraka'antavampimaung teing kapoo' teietaning teing nantoong-koo ee'nara Tanuaang Meekung-po'nupoong-koo.
Tee naning Tanuaang Meekung otoaung, teie aroo'uaung Kumponing bakaang Tanuaang-etaning kanu'antaning-pina' oovuma. Teing teie tasi'puarupeu' baku'nisining Tanuaang Meekunge sira'puaruko.
Teie naninge Tanuaang Meekung-po'nunge tee simpe'ui otong ookara kapoo', nka tee, naninge ee'nara tasi'puarupeu'.
Ai' Daari Meekunge aa'pumaung,
“Baie baka Ovoring bakaang onou tasi'puitaa' kapoo'nanka nauvupeu'? Otoa'.”
Teka nii'ke deeko', Tanuaang Meekung ninka Karistoo' bakaang onou-po'nupoonge.
Nka ninge tee dii' mmaikori' Tanuaang Meekung-po'ning-pina' teroita kararampiaung, teka nantoong tamunsi'nupoong-pina' kararampimaung, toirekaa'pina' Karistoo'koo.
Ninge tee dii' noonoo'ke bau'dampimaung, taamang ivekunge deea'. Dii' mme' makosiria' ivekung nai-koo, ai' dii' tee mme' mono bakanavete-koo otoring.
Tenang dii' mamairo-koo otoritaa' ee'noko turanturang, arekee', dii' mono bakanavete-koo ee otoria', tamunsi'nupoong nkoarimana'?
Tenang dii'koo narunge aa'puko, “Ning Paula'navitu-koong,” ee'noko nii'nunge aa'puko, “Ning Apolos-nung,” tee' karerima tamunsi'nupoong-pina' nkorarimang.

Aming-koo dii'ke nee' Apolos naanka daangamerererimaatoinge? Nee'naanka tamung Kumponing-koo kara-pare'ka nanaanka, tamung dii'ke nee'koo masika'anta nkaveru'nung, Ovoringe nee' kantemureta botomuretu'na' nkoampeko.
Ninge keempantu', napo' Apolosie duu'puu', masika', nka tee Kumponinge baka du'antavuu'nung tee sinang.
Tee'koo tee naning keempumaung ee'noko tee nii'nung duu'pumaung baru' noru'koo makosi deea', teka tee Kumponing baka du'antavumaung noru'koo makosi.
Tenaanka tee, keempumaung ee'noko duu'pumaung nari' basira; a'noo' tee Kumponinge tee' mintoomparetu'nung-koo moo'ureaing.
Nee' tee Kumponing ninka mintoong nkora, ee'noko dii' teing Kumponing bakaning keenkeenanka.
Ee'noko nii'noo'ke dii' teing pavanava-pina' otoring, Kumponing-nava, ee'noko ning tee pava kani-koo okote'.
Teie Kumponinge biraanke-antamuio' ninge matauna' konkoroompantu' ee'noko nii'nunge pora dau kanivuu'. Teka tee baa tee naning dau kanivuainge tee matauvui kanivuaing tampamang.
Nii'nunge naninge nii'nave natuku keeng-koo makosi deea'. Teve nave ninge keempantu'nave otoaing. Teve ee'nave Jiisuu' Karistoo'nave.
Nii'ninge kara-naunukai dee'ma tee-koo natuku-koo dau avutevu'ke kaniaava'naang, aa'ning-pina': baa'nankai, kaveera'ke ee'noko ankaro'ke; nii'noo' kooro dovange, siliva'ke ee'noko kapang pipi'daarie.

Teka tee dama'ke Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaang doong urumpari tane'puma kaniau'na' sira'puaing, ee'noko teie nta' ninka paaravuaing tee pava navarona' bono'eema kaniau'nung, arevaro tampavaro, arevaro oravaro. Ee'noko moo'uriaing kaniau'na'koo.
Teing ee'ning kapoo' tampeng-koo kanisiiau'ning taivuriauka'nung ee'noko tampara moo' nkavaavaing.

Teka teing kapoo' orara-koo kanisiiau'ning teing taivuriaining nta'ke, ee'noko teing nantoong kaniau'ninge moo' nkavaavauka', bii'ka deeko' domamparima moo'ariaing teing-pina' nta'ke taivuriko domamparipeu'ning-pina'.
Ai' dii'ke ee noru'eria' dii' teing Kumponing bakanava dootuu'nava pankava ee'noko Kumponing bakaang Tanuaang Meekung dii'koo otomaung?

Ee'noko nii'nunge narunge Kumponing bakanava orarivupeu'nung dei Kumponinge tee orari-antavupeu', ai' Kumponing bakanava dootuu'nava pankava teva meekava ee'noko dii' teing ee'nava deentariri otoring.
Dii'koo naning baka tosiaravauka'. Nii'nunge dii'koo narunge ee' noru'uauka': “Ning norukasi' enang-navaro-koo.” Kanu' tampaavai makosi Kumponing-koo norukasi' deemparavaina'.
Ai' aung kansi' bakaang norukasi' tee kanu'aapenung Kumponing-koo duta-koo. Daari Meekunge ee' minkuvui otoina'koo,
“Kumponinge tee norukasi'nanka tamparimaing bii'ka biikaang norukasi'koo taavi'antavurimaung.”
Nii'noo'koo napo' ee',
“Ovoringe tee noru'ui otong teing norukasi'nuka biikaang noru', ee'noko noru'ui otong biikaang matau katuauka'nung.”
Tee'koo dii'koo naninge nii'nung naning miring pankaing-antavuma daangamparavauka'.

Ai' ookara dii' diikaninge, aa'ning: Paula', Apolos ee'noko Siipas, ee'noko ootukunung kansi', domang ee'noko boo', tee kapoo' enang otoing ee'noko tee kapoo' dama' tavo'aravaing – ookara teing diikaning.
Teka dii' teing Karistoo' bakaning, ee'noko Karistoo' tee Kumponing-nung.
Dii'ke tee nii' tamung Karistoo' bakaning kara nkanuka-pina' noru'mereriaing Kumponinge makosi-antamurining-pina' bakaning kapoo' makensi'ning nau-koo.
Kapoo' pankaing masikung botovotonaa'ke nkovuaing ee' oro': Kake'iiari nkovuaing tee kapoo'nanka bakaang pankainge bampuining nko-koo teie.

Ning arekee'? Kake'iinunge? Tee aa' ning baru' tee-koo noru' manki'moaroo'naang dii'ke tokoona' noru'meriko deeko', napo' kapoo' nii'nunge minkuvuaing-koo. Ninka baakeenemarama masika'antamaravarupeu'.
Tee, ning kapoo' o'noa'pina' noru'maramang, nka ninka baakeenemaravarupeu'. Teie Ovoring narunge deeko' baka baakeenemui otong.

Tee'koo naurampimang, enang batei makotuaruko simpe'deeria' otomatoai bera te'mung Ovoring toroaravaina'mung basinoo'. Teie kapoo'nanka baku'nisining araka-koo sipuaing mutaanang-eta, ee'noko teie ee'narai oro'antavuaing niikaang domang arekee' to'bii-antamariri otoina'. Tenang ee'nang nii' bakaning botovotonaa'nuka kante makosina' daangang kompampiaing Kumponing-eta, nii'ning-eta deea'.

Mmaikori' ee, aung tee tamung paara-antavansi minkuansing nee'koo Apolos naanka-koo ning, dii' pakururii'naang Daari Meekunge minkuvui otoina' divu'eri'neeng nantoong daangamperererima bire'ereri, dii'ka mataunuka tantarima pokapoka'dariri.
Baie dii'koonarung pankaing-antaruinge? Aming kapoo' da' okorui otoing Ovoringe arua'? Otoa'. Ee'noko teie aruio' nkavera aming-koo da' daangantaramaang nkaveaung-pina' oro'darama?

Teing ootukuning dii' piarorimaing nkavering ee, dii'ke? Dii' teing tero makosiru'ning noru'darimang? Ee'noko ovontung deentariru'ninge tero dii'ka, nii' ninka deea'? Bakei, tero ovontung masikeng deentaripeu'ning, nii' tee', ovontung deemaripeu'ning dii' ninka.

Ninge ee' ooamaang: Kumponinge nii' kara okomuri nkanuka ee'pina' oro'antamurining kansi'nupoong-koo: bore'koo simuru'ning-pina', taura'murira boo'koo ookarai paninaanka-kooninge kansi' oomaario', nantoonge ee'noko koosinunankai.

Nii' teing Karistoo' Ju'deeaing-koo daankiampiko kanu'nanka-pina' noru'maarimaing; dii' teing nantoong tamung norukasi'nuka tantarimaing Karistoo'koo. Napo' nii' aruaru'nuka; dii' purinto'nuka. Dii' deto noru'daarimaing; nii' doonko o'norimaing.
Aung teroita depeto bera enanung batei-koo nii' peeramorimaung ee'noko nukaa'morikoo'. Ata'teempima oraka' duaanamarimaung. Dimpa'nisinanka nii'. Osi oto'memuriainge nii'.
Birenge mintoomarima takaa'morimaung bau'marii'naang. Tenang deu'maariko kara tamparai maku'arampimaung. Oraka' nkomaariko tamung dooroomarikoo'.
Tenang oraka' minkumaariko nii'ke tampa' karavarampimaung. Nii' teing ookara kansi'nupoong-koo oreng deemariru'ning. Teroita nii' siikopaa'nanka deemariri o'norimaung ookara-koo.
Aung ninge dii' maia'anta-koo daariampa' teka dii' nari-anta-koo dii' nnurukaa' piaaru'nuka.

Bane nantoong dakuraaku'ke dii' Karistoo'koo tanataraarimainge, nka mmau' diumatakaampi oto'deruria', teka dii' ninge pararampiru'ning-pina' deentariru'ning Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo tee tampara doorenang naurampirio'.
Tee tee enang nia'dampimang ning paarameri siomerii'naang.

Tee'koo ee'na'koo ninge tee Timoti dii'anko botoansing. Tee tee ee'nara piaaru' nnuring kake'iinung Ovoring-koo. Teie napo' noru'antaruriaing nkaang aarumonanka Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo tee-pina' ninge dootuu'nupoong nauaramana' ootukunairu-koo oosiarimanairu-koo.
Nii'ninge ee' noru'erimang ning pa moaroo'naang dii'anko. Tee' noru'erima bore' pankaintarimaung.
Teka ning moo'naang da'deng dii'anko, Ovoringe doona amuko deeko'. Ee'noko tenang nenke'ama'naang teing bii'ka daangananka biikaang kara, iri' masikung-po'nung deeko'.
Kumponing bakaang muu' tamunsi'nung karai ima'arava', teka iri' ninka ima'ari otong.
Arekee' dii' piarorimang? Ning dii'anko moo'naang bana' ninka ai' piaa ninka dooroomari?

Ninge doorenang orara taaravansing dii'koo narung-koo maritoroaramaung. Tee temurii' maritoro teie nkovumaung maremaarenamurii' nantoonge taura'koo makosi deea', bane mutaanang-koo-nupoonge. Tee temurii' bauma ba'aang ninka oto'.

Bakei, arekee' daangantarimaunge pankaing noru'koo ee'noko aung orara tasi'peria' maia'doriaung? Orarunsiraripeu'nung-koo tampa'. Tee' nkorarima tee naning temurii' aarumo nkovumaung bata'eripeu' dii'ankoita.
Ning tee mono taapo' o'nong, teka nkaang tanuaang dii' ninka otong, ee'noko teke o'noitaa' tee simpe'ansing tee naning tee' maremaare nkovumaung.
Ninge naurampimang tee-koo niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' bakaang miring-koo: Nari' minkunaarariai ning-koong ninka tanuaang ninka ee'noko tee purinto' niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' bakaang ninka.
Tee' oosirarima bata'eri tavo'eriai tee aung naning Sietani'anko bakaang mono-koo naunaua tora'purai'nange bere'arara bakaang tanuaang domamparavaina' te'mung Ovoring bakana'mung.
Tee' ee'na' daangantarimaatomana' tampa' deea'. Noru'eria' dii'ke ee narung naning oraka' nkoarama teie tee ootukunung naro'ka baaro'antavuring?

Dii' Karistoo' boora moo'duru'ning tantarimaung deemparako, makosina' tanatarariaing Taamang Baari'koong˜ tanatana', tee paroro Karistoo'nung boo'koong uro'kanoo'nung taa'ni'anta Ju'nupoong-koo. Dii'ke noru'eri otong Baari'koong Taamang-koo berete' iisi-po'nung uro'ke dua'aako' taamang iisi-ninka baaro'arava' narung otoko, meeka'mung-koo makosining.
Tee' nari' meeka'mariri o'noriaing urikung aarumo sipampiri ookara oraka' nkonanka, too'de dovang ninka, ee'noko domang kiiroraa'mori kara masikung-narung-po'nupoong deemariri o'noriaing.
Nkaang karavoto daariantu'nung dii'anko aa'pama, “Navurariauka' kaukauroarima otoromaing ninka.”

Nka ninge tee' minkuama ookara kaukauro nkonuka aung kansi'kooning minkuarampa', kapoo'koo tata'arimaing, bakisipunanka, ee'noko kumponing tositosinanka siompaarimaing tovang ninka. Teka tee a'noo' teing-eta si'dariarupeu' kansi'keta tonta'dariarura deeko'.

Tee aa' ee'pina' miru'ansi daarirerompiru'nung: Tamung navurariauka' tee ninka naning ninka nii'maikorori'koong tamparamaung ninka aing aa'ning ee' oro' nkoarama: Kaukauroarama, tata'arama, kumponing tositosinanka siompuma, nantoong miring orari-antavurima, purinto'naru'ke kanu'arama ee'noko bakiaa' nkovuma. Aing nantoong tee' oro'nuka ninka nari' taamaniria' otoai.
Aming-koo papaararariringe nkaang karavoto deeruerima? Ninge ee simpe'aramaung teing nantoong dama'du-nupoong? Otoa'.
Kumponing narunge simpe'uriaing. Ee'noko dii' dii'ka tee'ke, teing nari' otorimaing naing simpe'ererimaing, ape' aing? Bata'eriai tee naning orara dii'ankoita.
Tenang dii'koo narunge narung da'maiko' minkuminkuema aming-koo maia'doa' otong tee kara dootuu'koo taapo'ke minkueko simpe'aava'naang?

Dii'ke ee noru'eria' Kumponing bakaning meekupoonge simpe'aariaing ookara kansi'nupoong biikaang aarumo. Da' ookara kansi' simpe'nko˜ deeng-antaruko aming-koo noru'ea' otong da' makosi simpe'koo teing kapoo' oki'nareka'?
Dii'ke ee noru'eria' nii'ke tee koosinunanka biikaang aarumo dama'ke simpe'arampiaing? Tee tee masikung. Tee tee pore' deea' simpe'koo teing kapoo'nanka anke kansi'koo nkoaramaing.
Bane teing nantoong noru' boong basi-po'nupoong dootuu'nupoong-kooning, simpe' aaripeu'! Tee'koo aming-koo nanimang da' teing nantoong dootuu'koo noru' otoroaing-anko?
Maia'doriaing. Arekee'koo dii'ke ooveria' otong naning narung noru'po'nung dii'koo baito-nupoong-koong dii' bake-antaruripeu'nung teieta' turanturang kenaanka naninka-koo meu'ka?
Tee'koo ee naning noru'po'nung dootuu'koo ureaamaing-koong ooveria' ako' be'antaverererimaung tuutunang-koo˜ nantoong mutaanang-koo-nupoong-koo dutakanoo'ke?

Koonto' dua'daririning tee' dii'ka tuumpireerima. Tenang nantoonge dii'koo nii'ninge dii'maikorori'ke oraka' nkoraariko dii', ai' bakiaa'daariko, dii'koong kara-simpe' otoaruko makosi tampa' ee': Ampa'dori otoriaing dii'.
Teka dii' tee' nkoraria' otong; teka baru'noo' oraka' dii' ee'ning namaia' makosinuka dii'ka oraka' nkoreerimaung bakiaa'deerima kara ave'eri tuumpireerima.
Noru'eria' otong teing nantoong nampeesi orariaavaining teing Kumponing bakaang muu'koo tumpariauka'nung? Aavaraariko taaraverereriauka'.

Ai' aing ee'ning teing ee' oro'nuka tumpariauka'nunge: Kaukauroarimaing, kumponing tositosinanka siompaamaing, nampeesi orariaamaing, nantoong bii'ka avarimaing ee'noko teing paaravaamaing oraka'nko aarumo bii'ka, bakiaa' nkonuka, mamaironto'nuka, purinto'naru' naiaama kanu'arimaing, kapoo'koo tata'arimaing, oko'oko baukonanka, deu' baukonuka, ee'noko tavu' ninka bakiaa' nkoaamaing. Tevitu avitu ee' oro'navitu tumpariauka'nung te' Kumponing bakaang muu'koo.

Nii'ning tee dii'koo tee' ee'na' nkorariko'ning, teka Tanuaang Meekunge Kumponing-etainge diikaang domang kiiroraa'antaruru', ee'noko meeka'antarurira koong-antaruru' tee Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaang miring-koo kuunge.

Dii'ke aa'peri otomaung, “Amutemurii' kapoo' taura'pari otong nii'ke nko-koo.” Teka nii'ning kapoo'nankai pakumuriaung. Amutemurii' kapoo' taura'pari otong ninge nko-koo, teka ning ninka boong si'maravauka'nung kapoo' nii'nung bakaang purinto'koo.

Napo' dii'ke aa'peri otomaung, “Taamang tee pakosii'koo makosi ee'noko pakosii' tee taamang-koo makosi.” Teka ampa'doriauka' asi'noo'ka Kumponinge tee ookaanka tamunsi'naanka deeng-antavureaing. Nka niikaang mono arekee'? Kaukauro-koo makosi deea'. Niikaang mono tee Ovoring-koo makosi ee'noko Ovoring tee'ke, niikaang mono-koo makosi.
Ee'noko asi'noo'ke teie bakaang purinto'ke deto daa'muriaing nii' niikaang mononanka tee' ee'na' Ovoring daa'antavuu'na' nari'.

Dii'ke ee noru'eria' diikaang mononanka tee namarana' Karistoo' bakaang mono-koong? Arekee', makosie naninge taapo' tonta'ui dei namarana' Karistoo' bakaang mono-ita ee'noko baraa'upeu' nii'nani ninka bakaang mono bakiaa'koo baavearamai ninka? Bakei katua'!
Dii'ke ee noru'eria' tee naning baka be'nu'aravaing teni ninka bakiaampa ninka beekaang mono tee narung mono deemparavaing? Tee' ee'na' Daari Meekunge minkuvumana' aa'puma,
“Tenaanka tee narung mono deempareaing.”
Teka baa tee narung baka Ovoring-koo avaravaing beekaang tanuaang tee narung tanuaang deemparavaing.
Baari'antarariri otoriai kaukauroi oto'keta. Teing nii'ning oraka' nkonanka nkoampima tee mono-ita taapo'ke nkoampimaung, teka naning kaukauro nkovuma tee baka bakaang mono orari-antavaramaung.
Ai' noru'ea' ee dakaang mono tee Kumponing bakaang Tanuaang bakaang pava meekava? Kumponinge te' sipuu' ee'noko te' ee'noo' otomaung. Tee ee'nara okovenung, da' deea'.
Teie tee da' pankainge moo'ke moo'duinung napo' tororuma. Tee'koo dakaang monoi pankaing-antavei otoaing.
Enang ninge maku'derompii'naang tee diikaang kara daarimemuru'nung. Tampa' ee' makosi: Naning nampeesiarava' otoaing.
Teka orara aarumo beremparimaung-koo tee, makosi, donkaani ba'aang oto'evuainge, ee'noko manikuma ba'ung oto'evuainge.
Ba'unge tee kapoo' nampeesi-koo bi'ari otoining piavoko ba'aang avuaing. Tee' nari' ba'aange napo' ba'ung avuainge.
Ba'aang baka bakaang mono tanatavarava', ba'unge deeko' makosi. Tee' nari' napo' ba'ung bakaang mono tanatavarava', teka ba'aange deeko' makosi.
Orokoraria' otoai. A'noo' oki'nung batei-koo makosi nari' karereta kunsirarema otoree'naang deeko'. Ee'noko dama'ke mono konteereai; dii'ka tanatarariaruko Sietani'ke paararuri'neenga.
Ninge boto siompansi minkuampa' nampeesirarii'naang, teka piarorima deeko' tee makosi.
Ninge ee' naurampimang: Nampeesirariarui dei makosi ning-pina', nka noru'ansi o'nong nii' nari' oro'nanka deea' Kumponinge naruna' naruna' nkomuru'na'koo.
Enang ninge ee' naurampimang dii' nampeesirariaing ee'noko naaroonku: Dii' nampeesirariarui dei tampa', ning-pina' nari' otoripeu'.
Teka dii'ka tanatarariauka'nung deeko', makosi, nampeesirariaing, karaa'ke boo' otorimaato'neenga.
Teka ninge ee' naurampimang dii' nampeesinii'nuka, a'noo' Ovoringe tee' ee'na' botoruru'na' ee'pina': Ba'aang ba'ung-eta tonta'aravauka', ee'noko ba'unge ba'aang sipuauka'.
Ba'aang tonta'arara deeko' tee nampeesiarava' otoaing, nii'noo' napo' ba'ung-koo tampo'aravai.

Nii'ning-koo Ovoringe tero boto nkoevuria', teka teing-koo ninge aa'pamaang: Nii'nung Karistoo'koo baito-nupoong-koo narung ba'aang mutaanang-koonani ee'noko teni pinka'ari otoaing deeko' tee ninka nari' otoree'naang, teie tee, teni ba'aang sipuauka'nung.
Ee'noko nii'nanie dootuu'koonanie ba'ung mutaanang-koong deeko' ee'noko tee pinka'ari otoaing deeko' teni ninka nari' otoree'naang, tenie tee, tee ba'ung sipuauka'nung.

Donkaani mutaanang-koong teni manikuma ninka pinka'aresi tee beekaang nampeesi meeka'pari otong. Ee'noko nani manikuma mutaanang-koonani Karistoo'koonung ninka pinka'aresi tee beekaang nampeesi napo' meeka'pari otong. Ee'koo tee': Beekaang nampeesi meeka'pari otoaruko dei beurukaa' Karistoo' bakaninge biurukaa'pina' deempariarupeu'. Nka enang-pina' tee teing Kumponing bakaninge biurukaa'.

Ee'noko naring-koo naveu mutaanang-koonaveu poka'koo piavoaing deeko', makosi, poka'aravaing. Poka'arako Karistoo'koonaveu tee-koo baru' noru' dai'aravauka', ai' Kumponinge tee da' mooa-koo miru'duing.
Da' ba'aang ai' da' ba'ung Karistoo' masika'antavemaung deeko', dake noru'ea' nii'nung ninka otorekotaa' tokoona' nkoarapeu'nung: Domampepeu' ai' domampearupeu'.

Nka dii' Kumponinge bokururu'ning teing nii'namurii' otooto'koo pare'dariaina' besi'eriauka', teka tee otooto' tero naruna' naruna' Karistoo'ke tankee'duri aruru'nung komperi otoriai. Aung tee boto ninge sipamaung ookara dootuu'nupoong-koo osi kante-koo.
Naning dopa' toto'nisi bokuvuko deeko' makosi, tee' Ju'koonung-pina' otoitaa' nanuaing. Napo' dopa' toto'paravaung bokuvuko deeko' makosi, tee' nari' Ju'deeaung-pina' otoaing.
Dopa' toto' kapoo' deea', ee'noko toto'paravaung tee', kapoo' deea', teka Kumponing bakaang boto siong tee masikung.
Dii' temurii' otooto'koo otorimaatoaing naruna' naruna', Kumponinge tankee'durio' otoriko'na' te'mung Karistoo'ke bakaning deentarii'naang bokuruu'na'mung.

Da' tero naning-koo botovotonaa' deentari otoko Kumponinge bokuruu'nung deeko' tee' otoi simpiri'anta-koong taung besi'eauka'. Teka doona simpiri'anta-koong oro'parako deeko' makosi simpiri'daravaing.

Baa naning tee bokuvuing nii'nung bakaang botovotonaa' deempari otoko tee unaa-antavuing Kumponinge, ee'noko tee' nari' tee baa bokuvuing tenang nii'nung bakaang botovotonaa' deemparava' otoko tee Karistoo' bakaang botovotonaa' deempari otong.
Da' tee moo'duu' moo'ke. Nantoong biikaang dai'nisi deentari otoauka'.
Mmaikori' ee, Kumponing-koo ima'mariri o'noriaing te' naro' bakaang bokubokue pe'numuring-navaro-koo naruna' naruna' teke o'noritaa'.
Enang teing nampeesiariaing-koo ning boto o'noa' Ovoring-eta, teka nkaang noru' arompimaang, Kumponinge piaamurai'nange naning dii'ke masika'antameriaing deeng-antamuu'nung.
Ninge tee ee' noru'amaang: Nii' enang pore' kune'ampimaung-koo o'noritaa' makosi nampeesimaria' tamung o'noripeu'nung-koo tampa'.
Arekee'? Da' da'aang-po'nunge? Teni sipeaina' besi'eauka'. Ai' da' da'aang otoaunge? Nampeainani besi'eauka'.

Da' nemaka nampee-siraravaing deeko' oraka' nkorarava'. Ee'noko nerai'na' tee', nampee-siaravaing deeko' oraka' nkoarava'. Teka teing nampeesiariaininge tee arikung kune'aavaing kansi'koo, ee'noko ninge tee' oro' kune'eri'neeng-koo tee' minkuamaang.
Mmaikori', ninge tee naurampimang tee aung: Batei enang apuka'paring Ovoring bakana'mung-koong. Enang-eta' deto teing bii'ankaampi-po'nupoong bii'ankaampi oto'evoroaing-pina' otoroaing.
Teing biromparimatomaing birompariaing-pina' otoroainge. Teing dotuarimatomaing dotuaria' otomaing-pina' otoroainge. Teing moo'moo' nkoaamatomaing tee moo' nkoaava' otoromaatomaing-pina' otoroainge.
Teing nantoong kansi'koong nko-nko nkoaamatomaing teing kansi'koong nko-nko baru' aa'na' noru'ai nkoaava' otoromaing-pina' otoroaing, ai' kansi'koong avutevu' nko-nkonanka tankinuaing.
Ninge pia-antarampimang dii' baru' norunoru'koo paa'dariri otoriauka'. Tee naning nampeesiaravaung tee Ovoring bakaang mintoong-koo kake'iiari otomaung Ovoring dotu-antavuaina' piavoitaa'.
Tee naning nampeesiaru'nung bakaang noru' kansi'koo otomang, teni ba'aang dotu-antavuu'naang piavoma.

Tee bakaang onou tee poka'ari otong. Teni nampeesiaravai ai' nerai'na' bakaang noru' Ovoring bakaang mintoong-koo otong. Teni Ovoring bakanani oto'koo piavomaang ookavetara-koo, mono ee'noko tanuaang. Teka teni nampeesiaru'nani tee kansi' bakaang mintoong-koo noru' otong, tenie ba'ung dotu-antavumaatoo'naang piavoma.
Ninge tee aung dii' ee'ning dii'ka paku-koo naurampimang, dii' poterampii'naang deea', teka tampa' toosirariri otorii'naang, mataa'irariri Ovoring-koo, tunsi paakararia'.

Nii'nung naninge ee' noru'ui dei: nani manikuma nampeesi-koo kariviri'ai piokang napu'nisi tamung panka'koo makosi deea' nampeesiarava', ee'noko teie nari-antavuaing nampeesi-koo pakuvuitaa' tee, tee makosi, piavoaina' nkovuaing. Teie tee oraka'nko nkovua' nampeesi-koo miru'uma teni.
Nii'na' napo' ee': naninge ninge minkuamana' aroo'ui dei, ee'noko tee' nari' nko-koo piavoi dei, tee' tampa'ke, teni nerai'na' nampeesiaravai tarevuaing.

Tee tee-pina': Tee naning teni baurang nampeesiaravaing-koo pakuvumaung tee, kapoo' tampara teie nkovumaung; teka napo' tee naning teni tanatavumaung nampeesiaravaruko teie, tee kapoo' baru' tampara masikung nkovumaunge.
Teni ba'aang tee ba'ung-koo bi'ari otong tenang tee domampari otoko, teka tee ba'ung boo'pari dei teni tee makosi napo' nampeesi-koo piavoaing ninka Kumponing-koo kuunge.
Teka teni deto basinoo' dotuari otopeu' teni nampeesiarava' otoi dei. Aung tee nkaang noru', ee'noko baru'noo' ee' noru'ansi o'nong: Ning-koo Kumponing bakaang Tanuaang otoko minkuamaa'nomaung.

Enang tee kapoo'nanka kumponing tositosinanka-koo darimpaamaung: Nii'ke tasi'pampiri otong tee' dii'ke aa'perimaung-koo, “Nii'ke tee-koo noru' deto basi kompampiri otong siompampipeu'nung.” Teka teing noru' deto basi narung siompaamaing teing tamung bii'ka daangamparimaing. Piaae deeko' nii' naro'ka puring-antameeripeu'.
Naninge baka daangamparama ee' noru'upeu'nung: “Ninge ootukunung kapoo' noru'ansi otong.” Nka tee teie noru'ua' tee' Kumponinge pia-antavui otoina' teie noru'koo.
Teka naninge Kumponing domange dai'ui dei Kumponinge tee bakaang naning tasi'pui noru'umaung.

Enang tee, arekee' noru'ampii'naang tee boontunang-koo Kumponing tositosinanka-koo akovitue darimpaamaung-koo? Makosie nii'ke nai-koo? Nii'ke aa' tee noru'ampiri otong kumponing tositosinankai kapoo' basi-antavaava' ookara kansi'koo, ee'noko amutemurii' kumponing otoroa', teka narung masikung Kumponing otong.
Nantoonge tee, a'noo' aa'paamaung: Kumponinanka otorong ookaanka-koo paning ee'noko kansi'koo, mmau'nanka ookeng kumponinanka ee'noko ovontunanka.

Teka nii'koo tee narung masikung Kumponing otong, tee Niuma. Ee'nara-ita ookara kapoo'nanka tavo'aramaung, ee'noko nii' tee-koo o'norimaunge. Ee'noko tee tee narung Ovoring otong, Jiisuu' Karistoo'. Tee ee'nara ookara kapoo'nanka teie pomaung ee'noko nii' teie domamariri o'noring.

Nka tee ookarai nantoonge aung amurii' noru' noru'aava'. Nii'ning tee nantoong dii'koo-nupoong aruaru'nanka teroita, temeng-koo datavoroi otoromaung, taamang daring mme' masika'antavai otong. Ee'noko teinge temurii' naiaama pankaruntoonge tee noru'aripeu' oraka' nkoarimaung.
Taamange tee, bane aremurii'ke, Kumponing-aape be'antamuriauka'nung. Nii' naiampiarui dei doonko si'mariarupeu' Kumponing-koo. Ee'noko naiampiri dei deto si'mariarupeu' Kumponing-koo.
Tanatarariai dii' purintaririning, naierima teing dii'koo aruaru'oroi otoroining orari-antaverereri'neeng.

Tee ee'pina': Naninge boontunang-koong taamang nai-koo oraka' noru'umaunge tee da' oorupeu' boontunang naiaamanava-koo naikiko temurii' boontunang-koong taamang daang pina' noru'ei. Ee'noko teie oorura piavora paararupeu' bane pankaruntoonge oraka'pina' noru'uitaa'.
Tee' nkorarako dakaang noru'ke tee orari-antavupeu' tee da'maiko' aruaru', Karistoo' tee-koo bou'nung.
Nii'ning nii'maikorori'koo tunsie noru'arimana' siong-koo pore'oromaung, ee'noko biikaang tunsie noru'arimana' daang-antavariaina' nkoverima dake tee Karistoo'koo oraka'nko nkoveing.
Tee'koo tee teie taamange mmaiko' dua'antavupeu'nung-pina' ooama ninge maa' ampauka'nung tee bio', tee ntara'ma'nung dua'antavami'neenga.

Enang tee, ninka tee' orokomarako dii'koo nii'ninge tokomeriko tee aa'pamaang: Arekee', ning ee naning pankaing deea'? Ning ee kara-okomui-nka deea'? Ninge ee Jiisuu' Karistoo' ooampa'? Dii' ee sinananka deea' nkaang nko-nko-koo tee-koo Ovoring-koo?
Ning nii'ning-koo kara-okomui-nka deeaung deeko' ning tee dii'koo sira'mari o'nopeu'nung ning Kumponing-koo kara-okovui-nka, dii' dootuu'nupoong deentariru'nung-koo, ning taaramerira.
Nkaang kara-dimpa' teing ning tokomaamaing-koo aung:
Arekee'? Ning ee taura'marava' dii'ankoa taamang-koo nai-koo ntong tovang-koo?
Ning ee taura'marava' dootuu'koonani nampansira nari' nanu'koo tee' Piita, ee'noko Ovoringe baara'mainkaang ee'noko nii'ning kara okovuri nkanuka nanaamana'?
Arekee', nee' Baanabas naanka nanaankai kemurii'ka nko-nko nkoampematoainge mono bau'koonge manta'pario'?
Baa naning tee piatooronuka˜koong tavu'koo nanuma taamange baka bau'aramaung? Baie tee taamang keempuma sinang nkavuaung? Baie tee naning kau'karenaumo-navontu bau'urimaung baka maa'kua'? Otoa'.
Ee'noko nantoong biikaang noru' narung tee' minkuamaang ee? A, Moosesi-nung botoi tee' nari' napo' minkuvui otomaung.
Ee'pina' daariari otong,
“Boromaka'koong muring dai'eriauka' uite'koong˜ sinang kau'ke ke'dee'koo botoverima, tee-koo uite'koo maa'kuaina'.”
Kumponinge ee boromaka' narung noru'uitaa' tee' minkuvuu'?

Nii' ee tee' minkumuria'? Tee aa' nii' minkumurima tee' daari-antavuu'nung. Ai' tee naning kansi'meemeng tee sinang nkavuaina' noru'uitaa' tee' meemeng-koo makosi. Ee'noko tee naning sinang-bire' tee sinang-koo nii'nariong nkavuaina' noru'uitaa' bire'koo makosi.
Tee tee enang ninge Tanuaang bakaang kara dii'koo keempansi dei, arekee', baru' ee aa'na' manki'dori noru'erimang ning pakumeripeu'na'koo?

Nii'ninge dii' ee' noru'daariko, “Nii' bakei bau'maarii'naang,” ninge tee' nari' baru' deto basinoo' noru'dampipeu'. Nka tee ninge bane makotuio' tee nkomarava'. Ninge arikananka bane tokoonamurii' doonko tamung meu'pamaung Karistoo'koong doorenang tampara arika'antavami'neeng-koo.

Dii'ke ee noru'eria' teing Kumponing bakanava-koo mintoomparimaing teing tee, tee taamang teva-ita nkavamaung? Teing boontudomai mintoomparimainge tee, taamang-koo biikanariong napo' tevaro-ita nkavaamaunge.
Tee'koo Ovoringe botomuru' nii' bakaang kara tampara nkavampiri daankiampimaing niikanariong teka tee-koo doorenang tampara-koo nkakampiainge.
Teka teing aing ning-koo makosining tee ninge nkavampa', ee'noko ninge aung nka-koo tampama daariampa'. Makosi, ning moompaing nkavampa'. Naninge daang-antamuauka'nung ning daangamarina'koo.

Tee, ee': Ninge daankiama tee doorenang tampara tee, tee kapoo' ning daangamaravauka'nung tee-koo. Tee, nii'navung taung o'noa', aung tee daankinang nkoamaa'noaing. Tee doorenang tampara daankiamparui dei ning tee baru' oraka' tora'pampeu'.
Aung amurii' nko-nko aroo'ansi nkoampaing deeko' teie tampa' maku'muaing, teka aroo'amparuko etumuio' nkoampaing deeko' tamung nkoamaa'noaing moo'dopa.

Ai' ning aremurii' moo' kompampaing? Tee aa' nkaang moo' ee' oro': tee kapoo' ninge nka-koo makosi karakara tampara-koo tee ninge nkavamparuing. Tee kara tampara ninge daankiansing kapoo' otoaruing. Tee tee ee'nara nkaang moo'.
Ning moo' nkavama naning-koo botovotonaa' deea', teka ning ninka ootukunung biikaang botovotonaa' deeng-antamaramaung nantoong mmau' Karistoo'koo baramparama'naang.

Ju'nupoong-ankoi tee ning Ju'nung deemaramaung Ju'nupoong baramparama'naang. Teing Moosesi-nung boto-koo kuung otoromana' ning tee' nari' tee boto-koo kuunung-pina' deemaramaunge teing baramparama'naang, bane tee ning tee boto-koo kuung o'noa'.

Ju'deeaing baramparama'naang Moosesi-nung Boto-koo dama'due otoromaing ning tee tee boto-koo dama'dunung-pina' deemaramaung. A'noo' tee Karistoo' bakaang boto-koo kuung deemari o'noitaa' Kumponing-nung boto-koo dama'due o'noaung.
Aruaru'oromaing-ankoi ning tee' nari' aruaru'momaunge teing baramparama'naang. Amentemeng-koo bere'maramaung aa'pama, “Makosina' nkomarama nii'ning baramparampaina'.”
