Tee ookara kapoo'nanka ninge nkoamaung tee bereng-anta-koo tee doorenang tampara, tee-koong biraanke mmau' ninka nari' kompampii'naang to'bii-antamaramaung.
To'bii-anta tee kapoo' masikung, ai' dii'ke ee noru'eria' teing nantoong kua'parimaing deikoo'koo tee kua'parimaung namu', teka narunge moo' nkavumaung. Tee' nari' kua'dariaing moo'koo nkakiriaina'.
Ookara moru-nupoong tee paaravarimaung bii'ka tampa' tanatavarii'naang ootukunairu-koo. Biikaang moo' tee tamung baa'koong baakopo, da'deng mara'omaung; teka niikaang moo' tee pankaroonge oto'.
Tee'koo to'bii-antamari ning kua'maramaung. Ning tamung auvi'au ki'bitu bai'ampaung, meu'pansi naro'.
Nkaang mono doonko si'mari meung-antamaramaung Karistoo'ke bamuu'na' oto'koo aa'pama, “Dama'ke ninka dua'mara'neenga nii'ning daankiarankotaa'.”

Enang tee mmaikori', ninge noru'antarampii'naang dii' piamoing teing niumaraang Isireeli-nupoong-koo nkoaru'na' tasi'perii'naang. Teing ookara kamo'ka boonge nanau'ning, ee'noko ookara pirung meu' toto'pai tankinau'.
Ee'noko tee kamo'naanka-koo pirung kuunge nanau'nung miru'noo' tee ookara tee' meeka'antavariru' Moosesi-koo kuung-nupoong deemparima.
Ee'noko arikanameensi'ke nanaama taamang tovang ntong otoa'nameensi'ke ookarai taamang tee narung Tanuaang-etaing naiaako'.
Ee'noko ookarai teri nari ntonari Tanuaang-etanari naiau', teieta boia' Tanuaang-aapeita tuuvuko. Ee'noko tee enang noru'ampiri otong tee boia' tee Karistoo' ee'nara teing ninka nanaako'nung.

Nka, bane ookara biraanke-po'nupoonge, daping ookara-koo teing-koo Kumponing tee dotuaravaruko' biikaang aarumo orara-koo, ee'noko nanaama avitoitoi booroma biikaang mono dera'oroko' mee'bora' sirakamaa'koo.
Teing ee'ning kapoo' nkoaru'ning teing taa'ni'anta nii'koo nii' koono-anta-kooning oraka'nko piamori'neeng-koo teing-pina'.
Tee'koo kumponing tositosinanka daangamperereria' otoaing teing-koo nii'ninge nkoaako'na'. Daari Meekunge tee naumurimaung teinge kumponing tositosinanka siong-koo bareariko'na' aa'puma,
“Teing nantoong paroro pankaing nkoaama, taamang ntong tovang naiaama, donkonaarai'nange moruarima siong-antaveeko'.”
Ee'noko kaukauro nkoveriauka'nung. Teing-koo nii'ning tee' otorokotaa' kenaanka kivora-ita beenaumo kokorei' [23,000] dua'arira boorou'.
Ee'noko nii' Karistoo' iirang-antana' nkomariauka'. Teing-koo nii'ning tee' nkoarikotaa' booroko' boru'ke kakiaariko.
Ee'noko ukuusirariauka' Kumponinge pakururiaung-pina' tantarima. Teing-koo nii'ning tee' nkoariko'ning Orari-antai boo'antavuru'.

Aing teing kapoo' teing-koo nkoaru'ning nii'ke oo-koo taa'ni'antananka, Kumponinge daari-antavuu'ning koono-antamurima nii' asi'naroong-koo o'norining naumurima tutuna'nupoong nkoarima opariru'na' biikanaroong-koo.
Tee'koo nauramaang, da' purintari donkonii otomaung-pina' noru'dari deeko' bakei tampa' masika' tanatararavaing dua'dara'neeng-koo.

Teka tenang kapoo' arikung deeko' ai' orara aarumo-koong piai meu'duko deeko' ee' noru'eaing: da' ookara paara-anta puru'koo makosi. Mmau' da'koo uro'nupoonge nantoonge temurii' paara-anta kune'au'nung. Kumponinge bakaning sipuriaung, ee'noko teie tee paara-anta taura'puauka'nung da' puru'koo, teka tenang paara-anta poko teie tee da' puring-antaruaing mmari'navung nauruma.
Tee tee mmaikori' ee, baari'antarariri otoriai kumponing tositosinanka siong-eta.
Ninge daariamang dii'koo dii' onou-po'nupoong noru'dampima. Tasi'peri pinka'eriai kapoo' ninge naurampimatomaung dii'.

Tereng biraanke-nareng biraanke-antavampima-narenge ee nii' naro'kamuriaunge tee ninka ereng Karistoo' bakaang ninka? Tevio' taamanavio' pisi'meerimanavio'ke ee naro'kamuriaunge Karistoo'koo mono ninka nari'?
Tee aa' naro'kamurimaung, ai' tevio' tee navio' masikavio'. Bane mmau'ke nii', narung mono deeng-antamurimaung naro'ke tevio'ke pisi'meerima ookara.
Oovereriaing teing Isireeli-nupoong Kumponing siompaamana'. Tenang taamang naiaama Kumponing-anko boonturomai darimpaamaung, arekee', Kumponing ninka ee teing naro'kavariaung?
Enang arekee' miru'ari otong? Kumponing tositosi ee kapoo' masikung? Ai' tee kumponing tositosi-koo darimpaamaung ee kapoo'ke?
A, tee' deea'. Tee ninge minkuamaatomaung kapoo' tee teing Ju'deeaing boontuarima, Daari Meekunge minkuvui otoina' aa'puma,
“Teing ma'nari-koo boontuarimaing, Kumponing-koo deea'.”
Ee'noko piamoa' ma'nari ninka pisi'deerii'naang.

Dii' tuaantariauka' ookarenta-ita, aa'noko Ovoring bakanareng-eta ee'noko ma'nari biikanareng-eta. Tee' nari' napo' ookavaako'ka-ita nari' taamaniriauka', aa'noko Ovoring bakanavaako'keta ee'noko napo' ma'nari biikanavaako'keta. Tee' makosina' deea'.
Arekee', Ovoringe iirai uipaarii'anta-koo piamorimaunge? Arekee', nii' tee-koo ee dau basinoo' iirakutanankai?

Dii'ke aa'perimaung, “Amutemurii' kapoo' taura'pari otong nii'ke nko-koo.” Nka tee, ookara kapoo' pakupaku-po'nung deea' nantoong-koo. Amutemurii' kapoo' taura'pari otong nii'ke nko-koo masika', teka ookara kapoo'nankai puring-antamuriaung.
Naning baka tanatavarama otoauka'. Ookara tee naruna' naruna' tanatameeriaing tampa' oto'koo.
Tee ee'pina': Kara otoaruko deeko' kapoo'nanka baaveroma baaveaavaining tee makosi, naieriaing, nka nia'kiria' boontunang-koo darinii'pina' norunoru'erima.
Ai' “Ootukunung kansi'po' tee Ovoring bakaang.”
Ee'noko da' naninge masika'anta oto'evuaunge bokuruko nanu'koo piarora deeko' makosi, naieaing ookara kapoo' aruaining nia'kia' boontunang-koo darinii'pina' norunoru'era.
Teka nii'nung naninge aa'duko deeko', “Aung kumponing tositosi-koo darinii',” tee, tee'puko naieauka'. Tevunge tee naning bakaang masika'anta orariearupeu' ee'noko bakaang domang mooavari otopeu'.
Ninge da' dakaang domang minkuampa', tee bakaang domang minkuamaang. Bane nia'kia' naiemaung, nii'nunge ooruma oraka' noru'du'neeng.
Ninge tee naiamira deeko' Kumponing-koo tampara tampampeu', teka naiampauka'nung. Piamoa' nii'nunge ning oraka' noru'muu'naang.
Tee'koo taamang-koo naikima ntong tovang-koo, aming kapoo' nkoveaing-koo, nkoveaing ootukunung kapoo' Kumponing pankaing-anta-koo.
Nii'nung naning dua'antaveauka', arera, Ju'nung deeko', Ju'deeaing-koong deeko' ai' Kumponing bakaning dootuu'nupoong-koong deeko', tee' nari' ookara nantoong ninge dotu-antavaramaung avuntevunge.
Ninka paku-koo besi'marava', teka ookara nantoong paku-koo moo'arii'naang.
Barerariaing ning-koo ning Karistoo'koo baremaramana'.
Dii' teing tampenanka tantampimaang ning norunoru'merimaung-koo ee'noko tee naurampiru'nung aarumo tampa' ima'eri otomaung-koo.
Teka ninge dii' pia-antarampimang tee Karistoo' noru'erii'naang tee tee Bore' ookara donkaang kante-koo, ee'noko donkaani tee manikuma-koo bore', ee'noko Kumponing Karistoo'koo bore'.
Baa donkaani kunsiaravaing nii'na' tarampeearavaing˜ bore' daka'paritaa' tee tee Karistoo' dore'ua' otong, bakaang Bore'.

Nii'nani manikuma oosirarimanoo'ke kunsiarapeu' nii'na' tarampeearapeu' bakaang bore'koo baarong maniku'koo makosina' kurumparava' tenie tee ba'ung dore'ua' otong, tee bakaang bore'. Teni tee teni-pina' nari' dapo kaariarinani-pina' maia'po'nani.

Nii'nani manikuma bore'koo baarong kurumparavarupeu'nani makosi, dapo opui napu'arapeu', teka kaariari oto'koo maia'opeu'nung deeko' makosi maniku'koo makosina' baarong kurumparavaing napo', bore' daka'pui.

Donkaani tee bore'koo baarong kurung-koo makosi deea' dootuu'koo oosirarimanoo'ke, ai' teie tee tavo'antavumaung Kumponing bakaang oro'oro'na' ee'noko tee meenasi bakaang; teka manikumai donkaani bakaang meenasi tavo'antavumaung.
Tutuntoma tee donkaani manikuma-ita Kumponinge nkovua', teka manikuma donkaani-eta nkovuu'.
Donkaani tee Kumponinge manikuma nkoevua', teka manikuma Kumponinge donkaani nkoevuu'.
Tee'koo manii'koo bore'koo baarong kurumparimatoaing taa'ni'anta-koo donkaani deto deeng-antavui, ee'noko koosinunankai ooaama dotuarimatoai.
A'noo' tee ee'koo: Manikuma donkaani-eta tonta'arava', napo' donkaani manikuma-ita tonta'arava' Kumponing bakaang aarumo-koo.
Tee' nari' manikuma donkaani-eta nkovuu'na'koo napo' tee' nari' donkaani manikuma-ita ponto'aramaung, nka aing ookara teing Kumponing-etaning.
Dii'ka-koo arekee', oosirarimanoo'ke bore'koo baarong kurumparava' manikuma ee kunsiarapeu' Kumponing-koo, makosie?

Enanaroong-koo nii'ke nantoong-koo nkoaramana' ooampima dei tasi'pampipeu' makosina' ee': Narung donkaani dapo isikung otoi tampa' deea', ee'noko nani manikuma dapo isikung oto'evuitaa' tee tampa', ai' tee tee bakaang meenasi. Aming-koo, nna' Kumponinge tee dapo avuu' bore' daka'koo.
Baa nii'nung naning minkuminku-koo piavoko ee' naurama'naang, “Nii'namurii' aarumo oto'memuria', ee'noko Kumponing bakaning dootuu'nupoong osi kante-koo oto'evoroa'.”
Naurampima aing botovotonanka napo' narung tuumpi oto'memung ninge minku-koo ee': Dii' naro'darima oraka' nkoverimatoininge tamparananka daka'purimatoi.
Tutung tee taaravansieeng dii'koo tankatankaang otong tenang dii' dootuu'koo naro'darima, ee'noko ninge masimasika'antavamang.
Aming-koo, nna' aarumo tankatankaang tee masika' tavo'kuaing dii'koo tasi'pampiaina' baata areing masika'pariri otong.
Tee tee taamang dii' nai-koo naro'darimaung Ovoring-nung tamperima Ovoring-nung taamang deea',
ai' tee tee nariona' dii'ka naierimaung ee'noko tee'koo nii'ning peeravorokoo' ee'noko nii'ninge naiaamatoma kanu'antavarikoo'.

Arekee', osie diikanoo'ke taamang ee'noko ntong tovang ee naieriarupeu'? Kumponing bakaning dootuu'nupoong ee oki'na'anta-koo piarorimaunge, ee'noko ata'oi'nuka maia'anta-koo? Are'dampii'naang ninge; daangantampii'naang? Bakei, katua' tee'koo.

Tee pare'naanta ninge naurampiru'nung Ovoringe baka po'antavuu'nung. Te'mung muunga Judasie tooka kompura kare-nupoong-koo sivuu'na'mung Ovoring Jiisuu'ke berete' nkavura, Kumponing-koo tampa', tampura tenang pisi'uu' ee'noko aa'puu',
“Aung tee nkaang mono makosi dii' nee'dampima boo'koo taura'maring. Ee' naierima ning noru'merimatoaing.”

Taamang bakearako tee tee' nari' napo' tereng uaini-po'nareng nkavura aa'puu', “Enang-eta deto areng-koo naikirima ee' noru'merimatoaing, ninge Kumponing ninka nerakung kara naroong-anta nkaang erenge pinka'antavantu'nung dii' domantarii'naang.”
Tenang naierima aung berete' ee'noko tuaantarima areng-eta' dii'ke sira'perimatoaing tee Ovoring dii'koo boo'paru'nung poainoo'ke basi.

Tee tee enang naning tee berete' naivuaing tuaamparama tereng-eta Ovoring bakanareng-eta makotua'na' nkovuma tee tee tuumpivuaing mono-koo ee'noko ereng-koo Ovoring bakaang-koo oraka'nko nkovuing-koo.
Naning tee tutung baakeenearavaing baka mme' naivua' bakanavio' berete'koo ee'noko teru' tereng-eta.
Ai' tee naning Ovoring bakaang mono tampa' tasi'pua' naivuaing tee tee baka orari-antavaravaing tee-koo naivuing-koo.
Tee'koo ee'na'koo mmau' dii'koo-nupoong aruaru'oromaung ee'noko siipavorokoo' ee'noko mmau' boo'parikoo'.
Tutung dii'ka tampa' simpesimpe'daripeu'ning deeko' teie orameng-koo simpe'duriarupeu'.
Teka Ovoringe orameng-koo simpe'durima tee, teie koong-antarurimaung baurukaa'pina' asi'noo'ke dii' kiimata-nupoong tanturi'neeng-koo kansi'nupoong ninka nari'.
Tee'koo mmaikori', taamang-koo naro'darima tampa' navurariri tata'deeria' naierimatoai.
Nii'nung peeravoko osie taamang-antaverimatoai diikaang naronaro' kiimata-po'nung deempara'neenga. Dama'ke mora napo' nii'ning naurampiaing.
Enang dii' mmaikori', ninge dii' noru'koo pia-antarampimang teing kapoo'nanka Tanuaang-etaning avuavu'.
Dii'ke noru'eri otong tenang dii' mutaanang-koo otoriko'nang Kumponing tositosinanka siompereri poorarima noru' masikung nkaveriaruko'.

Nka tee dii' enang sirapo'aaperaririo' naurampimang Kumponing bakaning nantoong masikeng tasi'pereriaina'. Nii'nung naninge Jiisuu' barakosi'koo tampuko noru'eriaing tee naning Kumponing bakaang Tanuaang-eta karoaung. Ee'noko naninge Jiisuu' tee Ovoring tampuko noru'eriaing tee naning Tanuaang Meekung-eta karomaung, ai' naninge tamung tee' minkuvuarupeu'.
Teing mmau' Tanuaang Meekung-etaning avuavu' otorong, teka Tanuaang teing avurimaung tee narung masikung.
Teing nko-nkonanka tee amutemurii' otorong, teka narung masikung Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo'.
Napo' nii'ning otorong amutemurii' iri' Kumponing-etaning mintoomparimaing, teka Kumponing tee narung masikung teing kante-koo mintoomparamaung.
Tanuaang Meekung bakaning nantoong-koo ookara-koo kante avutevu'ari taa'ni'antavaramaung, pakueea'naang.
Nii'nung-koo Kumponinge kara matau-po'nung makosi-antavumaung Tanuaang Meekunge. Nii'nung-koo kara noru'po'nung avumaung teie narunge Tanuaange.
Nii'nung-koo arikung kune'uko masika'anta deto basi avumaung teie narunge Tanuaange. Nii'nung-koo Tanuaang-etaing avuavu' siipa-po'nupoong taare-anta-koonung avumaung teie narunge Tanuaange.

Nii'nung-koo nko-nko deto basi nko-koong avumaung. Nii'nung-koo tarampee-koong avumaung. Nii'nung-koo iri'nanka Kumponing-etaning ee'noko oreng simpe'koong noru' avumaung. Nii'nung-koo Kumponinge kara tasi'paa' meneng-koo sipumaung minkuvuu'naang. Nii'nung-koo napo' oovunara tasi'paa' menenge kara bere'koong noru' avumaung.
Aing teing ookara narung Tanuaang bakaning nko-nkonanka. Teie ee'narai tankaampumaung naruna' naruna' kante piavomana'.
Tee ee'pina': Naninung mono tee avatevaro-po'nung, nka teing avatevaronanka tee narung mono. Karistoo' bakaang mono tee' oro'ke.

Bane nii' Ju'nupoong nii'noo' Ju'deeaing, dai'nisinuka nii'noo' dai'ariaing, nka tee narung Tanuaang-koo kuunge meeka'antamariru'nung-koo tee nii' narung mono deemariri otong ee'noko tee ookara narung Tanuaang okomuring makosina' iri' nka-koo.
Naning-koong mono nari' oro' deea', nka tee avatevaro.
Kau'ke deeko' aa'pui dei, “Ning aa' bireng deea', tee'koo ning mono-koo-navio' deea',” teie temurii' karai tee mono-ita bita'aravarupeu'.
Ee'noko dome'ke deeko' aa'pui dei, “Ning aa' duta deea', tee'koo ning mono-koonavio' deea',” teie temurii' karai ee temono-ita bita'arapeu'? Otoa'.
Ootukunung mono duta narung deempari dei, taara-nko are' otong? Napo' ootukunung mono dome' narung deempari dei nuuraa'nko arerai?
Nka tee masika'pari otoina' ee': Kumponinge avitevio' be'nu'uring kantena' narung mono-koo tee' nari' nii' narung mono-pina' oto'koo bamuru'na'.
Ookara mono-koo namaranoo' naro' otoi dei, arekee' mono tampampipeu'?
Nka tee masika'pari otoina' ee': Avatevaro otong teka narung mono tee.
Dutai aa'puarupeu' bireng, “Ning da' piamoa'.” Napo' bore'ke kau' tee'puarupeu'. Katua'.
Nii'nairu mono-koo aruaru'nairu tampampimanairu tee tenairu-koo makosina' nkovupeu'.
Ee', nii' dotumarimaung otoko nii'nairu mono-koo oraka' oonairu, ee'noko tee tampa' masika' nepu'mariri duaanamarimaung oo-koo makosinairu deea'nairu.
Teka tee tampa' oonairu baru' tanatavampiaung. Tee' nari' Kumponinge mono be'nuve'nu'uu' nepu'arava'nairu nepu'ui.
Tee'koo tankatankaang otoaroo'naang mono-koo, teka navarona' mono tampa' tanataveeai nari'.
Nii'navaro mono-koo sisikeeravoko tee ootukunairu nari' tora'paavaing. Navaroi daangang nkavuko deeko' ootukunairu nari' dotuariaing.
Enang tee dii' Karistoo'koong mono, naruna' naruna' avatevaro otoring.

Ee'noko Kumponinge bakaning dootuu'nupoong-koo aing ee'ning miru'uru': tutuntoma teing kara okovuri nkanuka, kemu'kana' teing nakaroarimaing˜, beemu'pina' teing kapoo' Kumponing-etaning naunuka, teketa teing iri' ninka nko-nko nkoaamaing, teketa teing Tanuaang Meekung bakaang avuavu'po'nupoong siipa-po'nupoong taare-anta-koong, teing nko-nko pakupaku-po'nung nkoaamaing, teing nko-nko tampa' tankaampaamaing nantoong-koo, ee'noko teing kara tasi'paa' oovunara menenge kareaamaing.
Arekee', ookarai kara okovuri nkanuka naing ee? Ai' ookara ee nakaronukai? Napo' ee ookara kara-naunukai? Ai' ookarai ee iri' ninka nko-nko nkoaamaing?
Ookara ee tee avuavu' taare-anta-koong oto'evorong? Ookara ee oovunara menenge kareaamaung? Ookarai ee kara bere'aamaung? Otoa'.
Teka paaraveriaing tee Tanuaang Meekung bakaning avuavu'nanka pankeng masikeng nka-koo. Ee'noko ampa'doriauka' piaanavung navunge avuavu'nanka kong-koo makosi.

Piaa tee kapoo' masikung ee' oro': Bane ning karompeu'nung dei teie karakarai amutemurii'nankai ookenge nantoong biikaange ee'noko koosinunanka biikaange, teka piaa o'noarui dei ning-koo, ning tamunsi'nung kareng kenkorinumaung-pina', tankeri' aako keeiinumaung-pina'.

Ning oto'memupeu' avuavu' tarampee˜ koong ee'noko ookara kapoo' makensi'ning noru'ampeu'nung-koong ee'noko ookara kapoo' opansi noru'koong, ee'noko tee masika'anta iu'nanka tonta'koong makosi oto'memupeu', teka piaa oto'memuarui dei tee ning kapoo' deea'.
Nii'noo' ata'oi'nuka bau'arama kapoo'nanka o'marapeu', nii'noo' nkaang mono amarapeu' arikung kune'koo daangang nka-koo, teka piaa oto'memuarui dei, kapoo' nkavampeu'nung otoa' tee-koo.
Piaa tee oraka' nkoaako da'deng maku' deeaung;
Piaa tee nantoong tampa'nko, mamairo deea';

Piaa tee baka daangang deea', nantoong baa'pina' noru' deea', makotua'na'nko deea', baka nii'ning puru'na' besi' deea', iirankesi' deea', orananka-koong deeru tarevua' otoo'naang, mero' noru'uaung, dotuaravaung orara-koo, teka doturotuarakoo' kara masikung siompaamaing ninka.

Nii'nung naning piaavema deeko', bane aming kapoo' tavo'kuko, dake doong kante sipeauka'nung tee, tee masika'anta-koo piaromaatoaing, tampa' nkoaravaing-pina' noru'emaatoaing, ee'noko purintari tee paku-koo otomatoaing.
Piaa tee doong kante makotui otomaung, teka tarampee-koong karananka deeko' teing bakearavaing. Oovunara menenge karananka deeko' teke oparavaing. Kara noru'po'nung deeko' teke botu deemparavainge.
Tee avuavu' noru'koong nkavampimana' dupearavaung, ee'noko tarampeemarimana' dupearavaunge.
Teka ookara kapoo' masikananka dupeariri oro'pariko, teing kapoo' dupeariaing piamoriauka'nung.
Tee ee'pina': Tenang ning tooto'mari ning tooto'pina' karonko', tooto'naunge noru'anko', ee'noko tooto'pina' taarakanko'. Enang tee panka'marara tooto'pina' napo' nkomarava'.

Nii'noo' ee': Enang nii' tee' ookampimaung uu'aa' paparo-koo ookampipeu'na', teka dama' oing bari'meeri oomeeriaing. Enang tee nkaang noru' dupearava', teka dama' tee ninge dupeansi tampa' tasi'pampaing tee-pina' Kumponinge ning o'mui noru'mui otoina'. Tee'koo aa'pamaang: Piaa tee kapoo' masikung, ai' doong kante makotui otomaung.
Ee', aing beenaumo kapoo' pankaroong otomatoaing aa'ning: masika'anta, Ovoringe moo'muriaing-koo noru', ee'noko piaa. Teka pankaing masikung teing-koo napo' tee piaa.
Tee tee enang piaanavung to'bii-antarariritaa' teing avuavu' Tanuaang-etaning kong-koo paararariaing, teing-koo deto basining aa'na' piarorima, baru'noo' tee tarampee-koong.

Baa naning tee Kumponinge kara tasi'paa' meneng-koo sipui avumaung deeko' tee, karoaing Kumponing-koo teie, teka nantoong-koo deea', ai' nantoonge tasi'paavarupeu' tee tee' oovunara menenge karoko tanuaang-eta minkuvuma teing kapoo' baku'nisining.
Teka tee naning tarampeearamaung tee, teie kara sira'pumaung nantoong iri'antavurima, tampara aarumo siong-koo aroo'antavuri domang kuaa'antavurima.
Tee naning oovunara menenge karomaung tee baka puring-antavaramaung, teka tee naning tarampeearamaung teie tee puring-antavurimaung teing nii'ning nari' dootuu'arimaing.

Piamoi otong ning dii' oovunara menenge kara-koo, teka baru'noo' aa'na' piamoi otong dii' tarampeerarima kara sira'koo, ai' tee naning Kumponing bakaang kara sira'pumaung tee deto basi tee-koo naning-koo oovunara menenge karomaung-koo. A'noo' naning kara-bere' otoko deeko' makosi teie pakuvuripeu' teing nii'ning nari' dootuu'arimaing puring-anta-koo.

Dii' mmaikori' ee, ning dii'anko mora oovunara menenge karompeu' ee'noko tokoona' kapoo' makensi'nung Kumponing-etaing oo-antamupeu'ning naurampia' deeko', kapoo' baku'nisi-koong noru' amupeu'nung sira'derompia' deeko', napo' karantamuko tarampeemarama puring-antarampiaruko deeko', ee'noko kapoo'koo nau-antarampia' deeko', arekee' dii' ninge pakurampipeu'?
Tee-pina' kapoo' boo'nanka otoromaung, aa'ning kovi, tankovani'. Tenang nii'na' karoko arekee' kena-koong aurong tasi'pampipeu'?
Ee'noko piatooronuka˜ biikaang tuuviri nii'na' puumpupeu', arekee' teinge piatooronukai noru'aapeu' tavu'koo bokuvurimatomaung deeko'?
Tee' nari' daka tampa' siraka'antavearuko karema dakaang menenge arekee' tasi'paapeu'? Da' aa' tamung doona-koo karemang.
Otorong karananka amutemurii' ootukunung kansi'koo, ee'noko kareaamainge kante tasi'pai otorong noru'amaang.
Teka ninge naninung kara tasi'pamparui dei tee naning ning karamumaatomaung damisimai ning-koo, ee'noko ning damisimaie tee-koo, ee'noko tee' pakumeerearupeu'.
Dii' tee' nari'ke. Dii' aa'na' piarorimaung nka-koo teing avuavu'nanka Tanuaang Meekunge amurimaing. Makosi, purintariaing nka-koo temurii' dootuu'nupoong naro'ka puring-anta-koong.
Tee'koo tee naning avuavu' oovunara menenge kara-koong oto'evuing eentavaravaing napo' tee kara bere'koong iri' nka-koo.
Ning oovunara menenge kunsimarama nkaang tanuaang narung kunsiaramaung, teka ninge noru'ampa' tee kapoo' minkuamaung.

Enang arekee' nkomaravaing? Tee aa' kunsimaravaing nkaang tanuaang narung ninka, napo' kunsimaravaing nkaang onou ninka. Ee'noko kenamaravaing nkaang tanuaang narung ninka, ee'noko napo' kenamaravaing nkaang onou ninka.
Tenang dake Kumponing biraankeveko tanuaang narung ninka oovunara menenge, arekee' naning da' ninka nari' tamung otomaunge masikee-antarui “Masikung” tampupeu'?
Bane dakaang eenta Kumponing-koo makosina' tampeinge, tee nii'nung naning paku-antavea' otong.
Ninge tampara tampamang Kumponing-koo, oovunara menenge karomaung-koo mmau'namu'pie, dii' divu'dampiri.
Teka dootuu'nupoong naro'arimanoo'ke namoora'noo' sirapo'ke kara-koo piamomaung, baru' oovunara menenge karoma doong o'anta-koo piamoaung.

Mmaikori' ee, bakerariaing toire' biikana' noru'koo. A'noo', orara matau-koo toire'pina' amakorariri otoriaing, teka petaa'doriaing diikaang noru'koo. Aa'periauka', “Oovunara menenge kara tee taa'ni'anta pankaing Kumponing nii'anko otomaung-koong.”
Ai' Kumponinge naunaua-antavurii'naang mau'urima Isireeli-nupoong-koo aa'puu',
“Akoing-koo karoma karavarampaing nkaning, akoing biikaang karai. Teka bane tee' nkoanko taaramaavauka'nung.”

Daari Meekunge tee' minkuvuio' nii'ke noru'ampiri otong tee oovunung menenge kara tee taa'ni'anta makosi, teing-koo masika'anta oto'evoroining-koo deea', teka teing-koo masika'anta-koo kontevoromaing, teing koono-anta-koong. Ee'noko teka tee tarampee tee masika'anta-po'nupoong biikaang, masika'anta-koo kontevoromaing biikaang deea'.
Ai' dootuu'nupoong oosiarira ookara oovunara menenge kareaako tenang nantoong tamung masika'anta oto'evoroaing te' poropeu', porora aa'paapeu', “Dii' kanu'daririning!”
Teka ookarai tarampeerariko naning damisimai, nii'na' naning masika'anta oto'evuaung pora taaravuko tee ootukunung taaravupeu'ning karai too'pupeu' tee, noru' tante-antavuma.
Kapoo' bakaang makensi'nanka sirapo' po'antavupeu' ee'noko miinge keemparara Kumponing daangampupeu' aa'puma, “Kumponing masika' dii'anko otong!”

Arekee', dii' mmaikori'? Tenang dootuu'koo naro'darima avutevu' nko-koo piaroriaing makosi, nii'nung kena ninka, nii'nung nau-anta ninka, nii'nung Kumponinge sira'naare ninka, nii'nung oovunung menenge kara, nii'noo' kara-bere' ninka, teka ootukunung nkoverima teing nii'ning dootuu'nupoong puring-antana' nkoveriaing.
Oovunung menenge kara otoko deeko' makosi kenaankara deeko' nii'noo' beenaumo-koo basi oovunung menenge kareaapeu', ee'noko doompeitaa', ee'noko nii'nunge biikaang kara bere'evuriko.
Teka dootuu'koo naro'arimaing-koo naning kara bere'umaung otoaruko deeko', makosi kareaavauka'nung teing nantoong oovunung menenge kara-koo piavoromaing. Tamung bii'ka kareaavaing Kumponing ninka.
Teing-koo nakaro-nupoong˜koo makosi, kenaanka nii'noo' beenaumo kareaavaing, ee'noko ookara baroromparirio'.
Tenang nii'nung karoi otoko nii'nung-koo Kumponinge kara-sira' tavo'kupeu' naning ba'nampari otomaung-anko, makosi tee tutuna'nung bakearavai.
Dii' teing ookara batei oto'deruriaing diikaang kara minku-koo Kumponing-etaning tarampeerarima naruna' naruna', ookara barerarira tampara aarumo siong-koo domang kuaa'antareeriaing.
Teing nakaro-nupoong bii'ka bake-anta-koo makosi, nii'noo' nempariai nii'nung batei-koo.
Ai' Kumponing tee toosi-paa'koong deea', teka mooa-koong.
Ookara dootuu'nupoong osi kante-koo nkoarimana' tee' nari' nkorarii'naang naurampimang.
Maniku' teie, dooroomparimatoai dootuu'koo naro'darima. Teing kara-koo taura'paria'. Teing tamung doonko otoroaing tee' Moosesi-nung botoi minkuvui otoina'.
Kapoo' noru'koo piavorora deeko' biumatakaampi tana'aariaing osia, ai' maniku'koo tee maimaia' dootuu'koo meu'ke kara-koo.
Arekee'? Dii' ee okora'nuka tee Kumponing bakaang kara? Ai' dii' nainge nkaveru'nunge tee Kumponing bakaang kara, nii'ninge deea' ee?

Nii'nung naning ee' noru'ari dei, “Bakei nakaronara ning,” nii'noo', “Tanuaang-etaning avuavu' oto'memuing,” noru'uaing teie tee kapoo' ninge daarirerompimatomaung dii'anko tee ee'nara boto Ovoring-etaing.
Baa naning tee tara'oa' taaravuaing tee napo' naninge taaravuauka'nunge.
Tee'koo, mmaikori', bia'doriaing tarampeerari minku-koo, teka oovunung menenge kara poteveriauka'.
Teka oosirarimanoo'ke ookara kapoo' makosina' nkoveriaing narung mono-koo-nupoong pakureeritaa'.
Enang tee dii' mmaikori' ninge tee tampara doorenang tero daankirerompiru'nung napo' noru'antarampii'naang miru'noo' sira'pama. Dii'ke tero nkaverira enang ima'darimaung tee-koo.
Tee-koo tampara doorenang-koo kuunge domantariri otorimaung, a'noo' tee tee' nari' ninge naurampiru'na' pinka'eri dei ai' dii'ke daang masika'antaveriarui dei.

Tee, ninge dii'koo danto tuu'antu' tee-pina' kapoo' tutuna'nung pankaing masikung tee kapoo' ninge nkavantu'nung. Aa'noko tee Karistoo' boo'paru' niikaang oraka' nkonanka-koo tee' Daari Meekung masika'paru'na'.
Aa'noo' dako'au', napo' domamparu' beenang doong deemparako tee' Daari Meekung masika'paru'na'.
Aa'noo' napo' Siipas-koo oro'paru', napo' teing nanai'keta kenaankara-koo oro'paru'.
Napo' dama'ke teing-koo pa'noko' daaku' divu' nii'maikorori'koo oro'paru', Ee'noko teing-koo dapi' ookara mme' domampariri otorong, teka nii'ning boorou'ning.
Napo' dama'ke Jeemisi-koo oro'paru', teketa ookara kara okovuri nkanuka-koo.
Asirang-koo masipo' ning-koo oro'paru' ta'nimpaarii'na' ponto'antamuma mme' iri'moaruko.
Ninoo' tee ee'nara asi'noo'nung kara okovuri nkanuka-koo, teka ning kara-okovui-nka tang-koo makotumpa', Kumponing bakaning dootuu'nupoong oraka' nkoaranko'nung-koo.

Masika' kara-okovui-nka deemari o'nong, nka Kumponing bakaang piaae avusiro'ari bakaang kara-okovui-nka deeng-antamuio'. Enang tee avusiro' ning pare'muu'nung iri' otoaung deea'. Bakei teing ookara-koo deto basimari mintoomaru', a'noo' tee ning deea', teka tee Kumponing bakaang avusiro' ning-koo otoing.
Ai' tee tee bane ninge ee'noko teinge nari' daankiampimaunge tee tee ee'nung niikaang kara, ee'noko tee dii'ke masika'antaveru'.
Karistoo' boo'keta daa'aru'nung daankiampimaung deeko' aming-koo nii'ninge dii'koo koroarima aa'paamaung, “Boo'keta daa' otoa'?”
Boo'keta daa' otoarui dei, Karistoo' baka tee daa'aravaruu'nung deemparapeu'.
Ee'noko Karistoo' boo'keta daa'aravaruu'nung dei, tee kara nii'ke daankiampimaung tee tamunsi'nung ee'noko diikaang masika'anta tamunsi'nunge,
ee'noko napo' daang minku-nupoong deemaripeu' Kumponing-koo, aa'pampimaung-koo, “Karistoo' Kumponinge boo'keta daa'antavuu'nung,” ai' Kumponinge daa'uarupeu' boo'keta daa' otoarui dei.
Boo'nuka daa'uriarupeu'nung deeko' Karistoo' tee'ke, bane pankainge, daa'uarupeu'.
Ee'noko Karistoo' daa'uaruu'nung dei diikaang masika'antai kaari'darima diikaning oraka' nkonanka-koo kuung otoripeu'.
Ee'noko teing napo' Karistoo' bakaning boorou'ning tee paa'ariri otopeu'.
Teka tee nii'ke ee' noru'ampira Karistoo'ke enang-navaro navaro-koo otooto'koo pakumuriaing ee'noko dama'navaro-koo paa'mariri, nii' teing piaaru'nuka ookara-koo dau basinoo'ka.
Nka tee ee' masika': Karistoo' boo'keta daa'aru', ee'noko tee' nkoarama tasi'antamuru' teing boorou'ning daa'ariaing.
Aadamai baka ookara nantoong boo'ke para'uru', ee'noko Jiisuu'ke baka ookara nantoong makosi-antavuru' boo'keta daa'koo.
Tee' nari' ookara booroaing Aadama-koo kuung otoromaing, napo' tee' nari' ookara napo' domampariainge Karistoo'koo kuung otoromaing.
Teka tee ookara kapoo' makosina' nkoaravaing Karistoo' doompaitaa'. Karistoo' mme'nung taa'ni'anta-koo boo'keta daa'aru', teka dama'ke teing bakaning daa'ariaing tee napo' poko.
Tee' nkoarako teketa botu basiaravaing tenang otoa'antavuainang teing ookara pankainanka, ovontung ee'noko iri'nanka, teketa' ookara kapoo'nanka teie tarevui tavo'uaing Bauma Kumponing-anko.
Tee Karistoo' tee ovorimpari pankaimparamaatoaing bera tenang Kumponinge ookara bakaning kare-nupoong kau'ka boonavete-koo sipuriainang.
Ee'noko tee karenung asi'noo'ka kune'ampimaung otoa'antavuainge, ee'nara boo'.
Ai' tee' Daari Meekunge minkuvui otoina' aa'puu'na',
“Kumponinge ookara kapoo'nanka Karistoo'koo bakaang kau'koo boong si'koo mimpuu'.”
Tenang Daari Meekunge ookara kapoo'nanka boong sipuaing tampuma Kumponing naro'ka minkuvua', ai' tee tee Kumponing ee'nara teie sipuaing ookara kapoo' Karistoo'koo boong.

Teka tenang ookara kapoo'nanka Bauring-koo boong sipuko Bauring ee'nara napo' Bauma-koo boong otoaing tee ee'nung-koo ookara kapoo'nanka Bauring-koo boong si'koo mimpuu'nung-koo, teka Kumponinge naro'ka tanatavurii'naang.

Tee boo'keta daa' napo' otoarui dei aming tavo'kupeu' teing-koo nantoong ntong-koo minkie meeka'antavarimaing-koo nii'ning boorou'ning paku-koo? Koonto' boo'nuka napo' domampariarui dei, aming-koo napo' teing-koo boorou'ning-koo ntong-koo minkirarima meeka'antararikoo'?
Ee'noko aming-koo kapoo' avo'avoro'nanka kune'ampimaunge nii'ke kara okovuri nkanukai ookara batei-koo?

Ninge tasi'antarampimang dii' mmaikori' marirampima, dii' ee'ning ning dotu-antameri niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo kuung otorimaing: Ning tee tavu'koo doong kante koraposi'maamaung Karistoo' daankianko ning boo'keta daa'maravaing noru'mari.

Ning boo'keta daa'maravaruu'naang deeko', aming ning-koo basiarapeu' nantoong biikoori avorokesi'nuka ninka tameeriko anke Epeses-namono-koo? Ee'noko napo' boo'keta daa' otoauka'nung deeko', makosi, “taamang ntong tovang naiampima tamung do'dero'de'mariri o'norimaa'noaing, ai' dauna'mung moompira bakemariai.”
Purintariri otorimaatoai tee' tosiraarima aavaraari'neenga. “Oreng ninka navurarima diikaang aarumo orari-antaraaripeu'.”
Kanu'keta tanterariai oraka'nko siperi. Nii'ninge dii'kooninge Kumponing noru'aava'. Tee'panko maia'dorii'naang.
Teka nii'nung narunge aa'pupeu', “Boo'nuka arekee' daa'ariaing? Mono aremurii' oto'evoroaing?”
Bakei kanu' tee aung niania'. Tee sinang dake keempeaing tee tutung booaing domamparavaing deeko' dama'ke.
Ee'noko aremurii' sinang keempeaing, uite' deeko', teu sinanu keempeainu teu tamunsi'nu, mono teieta dama' dupuaina' oro'nu deea'.
Ee'noko Kumponinge miru'uru'na' siompai ootukuning sinananka avitoitoi ookara kante-koo mononanka dupurima oro'parimaung.
Teing paning-kooning mononanka otorong, ee'noko teing kansi'kooning mononanka otorong. Ookara kansi'koong mononanka teing namurii' deea'.

Nantoong oovunamurii' mono oto'evorong, ee'noko kau' karenaumo oovunamurii' oto'evorong, ee'noko barennanka oovunamurii'ke, ee'noko tavi'nanka oovunamurii'ke. Teing kansi'kooning mononanka namurii' meenasi oto'evorong, ee'noko paning-kooning mononanka nii'namurii' meenasinanka oto'evorong.
Teing-koo paning-kooning mononanka-ita duaa' nii'namurii' meenasi oto'evung, tee kaara nii'namurii', teing beento'nanka nii'namurii'. Ee'noko beento'nanka-koo nari' basining deea' arakanoo'koo.
Nantoong boo'keta daa'ariaing tee' nari' oro'ke, tee-pina' sinang-pina' tee mono tee dako'koong kansi'koo paa'aravainung deempario', ee'noko teketa tee daa'aravaing paa'aravauka'nung deempari.
Tee mono nii'ke dako'ampimaung tee tamunsi'nung. Mono tee boo'keta daa'aravaing tee maneenung. Tee mono dako'ampimaung tee purinto' otoaung. Mono tee boo'keta daa'aravaing tee purinto'po'nung.
Tee mono dako'ampimaung tee kansi' bakaang. Mono napo' boo'keta daa'aravaing tee tanuaang bakaang. Ee', otong mono kansi' bakaang. Napo' otong tee mono tanuaang bakaang.
Tee'koo Daari Meekunge minkuvuu', aa'puma,
“Tee tutuna'nung naning Aadama naning domantoo' deemparu'.”
Teka tee asiranung Aadama (tee Karistoo') boo'keta daa'ari domaang avu'koong tanuaang deemparu'.
Tee-koo ee' noru'koo makosi: Tanuaanavete tutung tavo'kuaung, teka mono-navete tutung tavo'kuko dama'ke tanuaanavete pokoo'.
Tee tutuna'nung naning kansi'keta tavo'kuu'nung da'mong-koong nkonii'. Teka tee kenaanka-nung naning paning-eta pou'nung.
Teing nantoong da'mong-koo-nupoong teing tee-pina' naning da'mong-koong-pina' oro'nanka. Teka teing nantoong paning-nupoong teing tee-pina' naning paning-koong-pina' oro'nuka.
Tee' nari' nii' tee-pina' naning da'mong-koong-pina' oro'marimaung-koo napo' tee' nari' oro'mariaing tee naning paning-koong-pina'.

Tee kapoo' ninge naurampimatomaung dii' mmaikori' tee aung: Tee nii'koo tamung bio' ereng tovang navaro tee okovuauka'nung tee barenku Kumponing bakaang muu'koo tunumpo'. Napo' teing kapoo'nanka paa'ariaining okovuriarupeu' tee kapoo' paa'aravauka' nung.
Taaraveriai, ninge kapoo' makensi'nung naurampii'naang: Nii' tee o'mariri moompiauka'ning, teka tenang asi'namu' tuuviri paning-eta karoko nii' ookara teing paarimariaining namu'ke, piping-pina'.
Tuuviri karoko boo'nuka tenang daa'ariaing ee'noko tenang-eta booroauka'nung, ee'noko napo' nii' paarimariai.
Ee' makosina': Teing mononanka boo'koo makosinanka kiri'ampira teing boo'koo makosi deeaing si'mariai.
Tenang mono boo'koo makosinanka boo'koo makosi deeaung deemparako Daari Meekunge minkuvuu'na' masika'paravaing aa'puu'na',
“‘Kumponinge boo' bakaang iri' opui puru'antamuriaing.”
“Ekee da' boo', dakaang iri' arera?
Da' boo', arerai dakaang tuu'neke'?”
Ai' orara aarumoi tuu'neke'pina' tupu'murimaung boo'koong iri' ninka, ee'noko ee'nung iri' tee ee'nara boto nii' boo'koo tammurimaung.
Teka tampara tampampiaing Kumponing-koo boo'koong iri' opura domang amuru'nung-koo niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo kuunge.

Tee'koo mmaikori' ninge piaavarampimaing, ima'dariri otoriai diiri'daria'. Ookara batei-koo aa'na' kontariaing Ovoring bakaang mintoong-koo ee' noru'eri: Ovoring-koo mintoomarikotaa' tee niikaang moo' paa'aravauka'nung; boo'ke daka'puauka'nunge.
Enang tee ee'pina' mooni' oosieriaing teing Kumponing bakaning meekupoong paku-koo: Dootuu'nupoong Kalesia-nameensi'ka osi kante-koo nauarantu'na' nkoveriaing, ee'pina':
Saandei kante dii' naruna' naruna' dii'ka taakore'ning taapo' kore'dariai. Tee tee oosi bakenii' otoko ning moaing.
Miru'ereriaing nii'ning dii'kooning, ee'noko tenang ning tavo'kamira ninge karavoto˜ ninka botoarampaing diikaang avuavu'nanka ninka Jerusalema'aape be'anta-koo.
Makosina' deeko' ning nari' meriainge.
Ning maromaramang Masedonia'nameensi' beero'ansi nanama'naang. Masedonia' beero'ansi dii'anko moainge.
Ee'noko dii' ninka o'noo'noriaing dee'ma, ai' pa kamaari-po'naveraa'ka-koo nari' o'noriainge dii'ke pakumeriaina' nanampainairu-koo be'koo.
Enang tamung oki'noo'koo beero'dampii'naang piamoa', teka pankapankaroong oto'koo piamomaang dii' ninka, Ovoringe taura'muko deeko'.
Ning Epesesie o'noi o'noaing bera Pentekos-na'mung basinoo'ke.
Ai' doona pankaing oro'paring ning mintoomaravaing-navaro-koo sinampuriaining. Ee'noko teing ni'ninka turani'nuka mmau' otorong.
Teka Timoti poaing deeko' dii'anko, tampa' ooveriaing tee avoro'neeng-koo tenang dii' ninka otoritaa', ai' teie tee Ovoring bakaang nko-nko nkovumaung ning-pina'.
Tee dii'koo narunge doonko noru'eauka'. Pakuerio' danto nanuaing mooavari tee ning-anko basiaravaina'. Nii'ke nii'maikorori' ninka nempampimaang tee.
Napo' tee-koo mmaiko' Apolos: Ninge aa'na' pia-antavantu'nung dii'anko bee'naang nii'maikorori' ninka, nka tee enang be'koo piavoa', teka tee beaing doona oovura deeko'.
Tanterariri ima'dariri donkoniriaing diikaang masika'anta ninka, naning-naunturi purinto' ninka.
Ootukunung kapoo' nkoveriaing piaa ninka nkoveriai.

Mmaikori' ee, dii'ke noru'eri otong Sitepanas bakanava-nupoong teing teing teva-nupoong tutuna' bere'ariru'ning Akaia'nameensi'koo ee'noko teing to'bii-antavarimaung Kumponing bakaning meekupoong paku-koo.
Ninge botorampimang dii'ke taaraveriaing kara teing-eta nantoong tee' oro'nuka-ita, ee'noko ookara-ita nii' ninka nari' aa'na' mintoompariaining-eta.
Ning dotumaring aa'ning poroio': Sitepanas, Potunatus ee'noko Akaikas dii' pari'antaraari.
Tavo'kaio' ning unaamou' ee'noko dii' tee'ke, unaaroru'. Dii'ke tee tasi'periaing teing tee' oro'nuka makosinuka tampa' noru'koo.

Teing dootuu'nupoong osi kante-koo Eesia-nameensi'koo otoromainge tampara tantaaring. Akuila daring Pirisika' nari' teing dootuu'nupoong beekanava-koo naro'arimaing ninka piaa ninka tampa' minkuraaringe Ovoring-koo.
Nii'maikorori' ookarai aa' otoroininge tampara tantaaringe. Dii' ookara naruna' naruna' onkeonke'deeriaing meekupoong nkoarimana'.
Enang tee, ninge Paula'ke napo' tampara minkurampimang anaare ninge koonto' daariama nkaang birenge miring taa'ni'antamari.
Baa naning tee Ovoring domange dai'uauka'nung barakosi' tee-koo otoaing. “Maranata” – Ovoring poaing.
Tee biraanke Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaang dii' ninka nari' otomatoaing.
Ninge piaarampimaang dii' Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo kuunge.
Masikung.

Aung karavoto˜ tee ninge Paula'ke daariamaang, Jiisuu' Karistoo'koong kara-okomui-nkai Kumponinge bamuio', ee'noko tee Timoti nii'maiko' nari', dii'aape Kumponing bakaning-aape teke Koorin-navuntu'koo dootuu'darimaing-aape, napo' teing ookara Kumponing bakaning meekupoong Akaia'namensi'kooning dii'anko otoromaing.
Biraanke ee'noko mooa dii'koo otoaing Kumponing Niuma-itaing ee'noko teieta Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo'.
Kumponing tee Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' Bauma tee bakei nii'ke deto biraankeampiri oto'koo makosi, tee piaa ee'noko domang kuaa'anta-koo okora'.
Teie nii' dunsirunsi˜antamurimaung teing-koo niikaning arikananka-koo nii'ke napo' teing arikung-po'nupoong dunsirunsi-antavarampii'naang tee' nari' nii' Kumponinge dunsirunsi-antamurimana'.
Nii' teing Karistoo' ninka nari' arikung deepo' kune'ampimaing deemariri tee napo' tee' nari' Karistoo' ninka aa'na' domang kuaa'antai maanto'murima nii'ning-koo pare'ampikoo'.

Ee', kapoo'ke manki'antamuriko tee makosi, dii' Koorin-nupoong domang unaarori domantariaina' tee'. Ee'noko tenang nii'ke domang kuaa'morimanang dii' napo' domang kuaa'dorikoo', ee'noko puring nkaverikoo' ookara batei-koo teing manki'nanka puru'koong nii'ke nari' mantompampimaing.
Dii' e'maniriaina' masika' noru'darampiri otong, ai' tee' arikung kune'ampiko domang kuaa'antamurimana' Kumponinge napo' dii' domang kuaa'antaruriainge.
Ee mmaikori', arikung Eesia-nameensi'koo kune'ampiru'nung-koo papaararariaroo'naang naurarampimang. Nii' teing aa'na' masika' arikunge pakusi'murio' domamariauka'ning-pina' noru'mariru'ning.

Bakei boo'koo bamuru'ning-pina' noru'mariru', teka teie Kumponinge tee arikung nii'koo taura'puu'nung nii' tee narung-koo baitomarii'naang boo'nuka domang-antavurimaung-koo, ee'noko niikaang puring-koo bi'maria'.
Ee', teie Kumponinge kapoo' nii' dupisi'koong-pina' oro'keta domang-antamuru'nunge tee' nari' taremuri otong. Tee'koo tee' nari' tee-koo aroo'marimaung daanto nari' moo'murimatoaing-koo.
Dii'ke teie kunsi-koo nari' pakumereriaing, ai' dii'ke mmau'ke pakumereriko deeko' tee nantoong mmau'ke Kumponing-koo tampa' tampaavaing tenang Kumponinge nii' pakumuriko.

Nii' tee dotumarimaung domang kiiroraa'mariri ee'koo: ai' nii'ke tee aarumo koonto' narung nkoampimaung Kumponing piavomana' ookara nantoong ee'noko dii'koo meu'ke, nii'nung kapoo' makempampia', ee'noko tee' oro'noo'koo kansi' bakaang matau siompampia', Kumponing bakaang piaae kake'ii-antamuriko bakaang aarumo siompampikoo'.
Ookara kapoo' ninge daarirerompimaing teing makensi'ning deea', deeruerima tasi'peripeu'.
Dii'koo nii'ninge nii' tampa' tasi'mereri otoina' tasi'merii'naang ookarai piamomaang.
Dii'ke ning masika'antamerimaung noru'ansi ning dii'ankoi tutung mee'naang tammaru' ee'noko toromarama napo' beero'dampiri kemu'kana' paku-antarampii'naang.
A'noo' tee ninge tenang Masedonia' mema dii' oorampiri be'koo noru'antu' ee'noko Masedonia'keta napo' dii'anko meko pakumeriko Judia'aape mee'naang.
Teketa maromaru'na' dii'anko mearuko tamung akapeu'marama minkuantu'nung-pina' noru'meriauka', ai' ning akapeu'marama maromaravaung naning kansi'koong bakana' tosiro'marama.
Kumponing masikung minku deemparako niikaang kara tee'ke dii'koo nii' tosiro'maria'.

Ai' tee Kumponing Bauring Jiisuu' Karistoo' tee Pako'pari'nii' nii'ke dii'koo daankiampimaung, aa'ninge Sivenus, Timoti ee'noko ning tee tosiro'koong deea', teka tee-koo kuunge ookara batei-koo tee nii' masikung narung minku-koo makosinuka.
Ai' ookara maraka-antananka Kumponinge deining Jiisuu'koo kuunge teing masika'paravainanka. Tee'koo Kumponing daangampampima Jiisuu'koo kuunge aa'pampimaung, “Ee', masikung, nkoaravaing!”
Enang tee Kumponing narunge ookeng dii' ee'noko nii' ima'antamurimaung Karistoo'koo.
Bera pako'pari'murima bakaning deeng-anta-koong taa'ni'anta tee bakaang Tanuaang Meekung niikaang domang-koo sipuu' tee kore'nang tasi'anta tee-koo biraanke dama' ooampiaing-koong.
Enang tee masika'anta-koo Kumponing bakaang miring tampamang aa'pama: Ning tee dii' oraka' mantong-antarampi'neeng-koo dii'anko te' Koorin napo' toromarava'.
Tenang ning mora tee diikaang baito booni'anta-koo piamoa' diikaang baito-koo tampa' donkoniri otoriko, teka ninge doturotu-aape-nameng-koo deeko' pakurampii'naang.
Tee tee napo' kemu'kana' dii' orarunsi-antarampima beero'koo kasiamparuu'nung.
Ai' dii' orarunsi-antarampiko deeko' ning baie napo' dotu-antamupeu'? Otoa'. Tee tee dii'ke deeko' ninge orarunsi-antarampiaruko dotu-antameripeu'.

Tee'koo ninge tee tutuna'nung karavoto dii'anko daariantu'nung dii'anko tamung mora dii' orarunsi-antarampiaroo'naang, dii' ning dotu-anta-koo narung-koo makosinuka-pina' noru'dampimaing. Ai' ninge ee' noru'dampiru'nung, ookara kapoo' koomparako deeko' dotumari dii'anko meaing, ee'noko ning dotumarako dii' ookara doturariai nari'.
Koonto' sisikeera ninka domang manki'moi daarirerompiru'nung ta'due duu'marama. Dii' manki'anta-koo deea', teka dii'ke ninge piaae maanto'mui piaarampimana' noru'erii'naang.

Teka teie naninge tee orarunsi-anta basi-antavuu'nunge ning narung orarunsi-antamua', teka dii' ninka nari' orarunsi-antamuru'nung, teka aa'pamaang, dii' ookara nari' orarunsi-antaruria', kara baru' manki' minkuami'neeng-koo.
Dii'koo mmau'ke kiimata averu'nung makosina' tee naning.
Tee'koo enang tee dii'ke bere'darima tonta'antaverima domang kuaa'antaveriaing, baru' manki'orai'nange orarunsie booni'u'neeng.
Tee'koo ning dii'koo eentamarang piaa nau-antaverii'naang tee.
Tee tero tautaurampiri daarirerompiru'nung tee dii' paara-anta-koo dii' ookara kara aroo'nuka masikeng deeko' sira'darii'naang.

Enang tee baa naning dii'ke tonta'antavering ninge teie tee' tonta'antavansinge. A'noo' tee kapoo' ninge tee tonta'antavansing tee ning-aape nkovua', tamung dii' pakurampiri tonta'antavansing Karistoo'koo uro'kanoo'ke.
Tee' nkomarima tee Sietani' doona avompiaroo'naang nii' barang-koo, ai' nii' teing amakonanka deea' tee maroaramana' tasi'koo.
Tenang ning Toroasi-navuntu'koo basimarama tee doorenang Karistoo' bakaang daankiama doona ning-koo daate'ari otoko ooantu' tee Ovoring bakaang nko-nko nko-koo.
Nka nkaang noru' baru' tampa' o'noa' tee Taitas, mmaiko', teka ooamparura dii'koong doorenang ninka mme' poaruko. Tee'koo tee besi'ama Toroasi-nupoong teka siparamira Masedonia'nameensi'aape mou'.

Teka tampara masikung tee-koo Kumponing, ai' teie tee Karistoo'koo kuunge aroo'antamurira siong-antamurimaung ookara batei-koo ookara kapoo' puru'uu'na' sirakura' oro'antavuma. Ee'noko nii'koo kuunge tee Karistoo' noru'koong noru' avitoitoi bereng-antavukoo' nuuraa' tampa' ka'mi'pina'.
Ai' nii' teing Karistoo'koong numponuponanka ookara nantoong-koo meu'ke Kumponinge bamuru'na';

Teing nantoong boo'pariaing-koo tee niikaang doorenang tee oraka' ka'mi'pina' nuu, ee'noko teing-koo domampariaining-koo tee boo'antana' nuuraa' niikaang kara. Ee'noko baa naning baka tee' tampa' nuuraa'arapeu' Kumponing-koo taapo'ke?

Ai' nii'ke tee Kumponing bakaang kara mooni' nka-koo daankiampiaung nii'ning nkoarimana', teka nii' nantoong aroo'po'nupoong masikeng, Kumponinge botomurio' Kumponing-koo dutakanoo'ke Karistoo'koo kuunge karompimaung.

Teing mooni' nka-koo daankiarimaing teing kara tasi'anta-koong tutung uro'ke nauraariko taaraverererimaing. Ee'noko napo' tenkenaama karavoto˜ eentaraarimaung tasi'anta-koong averereriko nii'ning napo' nauaarii'naang. Teka nii'ke kara nau-antararampiko namu'ke tasi'mererima taaramerererimaung, Ovoring-etaing kara okomuri nkanuka deemariko.

Ee'noko nii'ninge nantoonge tee'ke taa'ni'anta-koong kara besi'aava' taaramaarimaung, ai' teinge noru'ai otong dii' nii'ke pankaruntoonge noru'darampimana'. Ee'noko teing tampara aarumonanka Karistoo'ketaing nii'ke dii'koo pare'antavampiru'ning ooaama tasi'maarikoo'.

Ai' nii'ke tamung karonge siinkirarampia', ee'noko tamung dama'du teka'darampia' tee' Moosesie Kara Kivora kapang-koo teka'puu'na', teka Kumponing taa'ni'poio' bakaang Tanuaang ninka diikaang domananka-koo Karistoo' bakaang kara pare'darampiru'.
Karistoo'ke makosi-antamurio' nii'ke aa'na' masika'antavampiri tee' minkuampimang Kumponing-koo aroo'mariri.
Nii' nii'kamai' makosinuka tammaria'. Kapoo' tavo'arako nii'keta pupu'nii' tampampiarupeu', teka Kumponing narung okovuio' deeko' nii' makosinuka.

Teie ee'narai makosi-antamuru'nung tee nerakung kara nantoong Kumponing ninka naroong-anta-koong pare'arampii'naang. Moosesi bakaang boto keperuu'ui domaang besi'na' minkuampiaung, teka Tanuaang Meekung uroio' siona' nauarampimaung. Tee boto tee nantoonge toto'paako tang boo'koo tuutunampurikoo', teka teie Tanuaang Meekunge nantoong daa'urima domang-antavurimaung.

Tenang tee boto Kumponinge kapang-koo teka'pui daarivuu'naare avuriko tee bakaang meenasi aa'na' siisioi oro'paru'. Moosesi bakaang oing aa'na' pipi'davou', ee'noko bane tee araka sirisiri'arako teinge Isireeli-nupoonge bakaang oing ooai oto'koo makosiaavaruu'.

Nka tee boto, bakaang aarumo nantoong boo'anta-koong, meenasi pankaing ninka sira'paako ooampira ee' noru'ampiai: Tanuaang Meekunge domang-anta-koong kara sira'na' napo' aa'na' deto puring ninka meena'poi otong.

Aa'nomaung: tee temurii' aarumo Moosesi bakaang, boto sionge nantoong tamung kiimata-antavurimaung miring pankaimpo'nung deeko' tee, tee aarumo nii'ke tareampimaung, nantoong Kumponing-ankoi koong-anta-koong, miring bakei aa'na' deto basi.
Tee Moosesi bakaang meenasi temu' aa'na' arakavaru'nung tee enang otoa' aunge e'mununge meenasie Tanuaang Meekung bakaange nari' donkonuresi apoo'uio'.
Ee'noko tee urikung aarumo paa'arama beu'nung meenasi-po'nung deemparako tee, ee' noru'ampiaing: aung aarumo tee' nari' tampa' otoi oto'koong aa'na' meenasi-po'nung deempari otoaing.
Enang tee, tee kara domang-anta-koong purinto' masika'antavampiri nii'ke tee aa'na' to'biiampiri daankiampimaung.

Nii' teing Moosesi pina' araka niikaang avo'ampiaung teka sira'pampimaung ookarai ooverii'naang. Moosesi tee bakaang oing daka'paru'nung Isireeli-nupoonge ooai siisioroko bane doonko siri'arama nanuko tee araka.

Ee'noko tee tenang biikaang onou nari' avo'ariru' koonto' tasi'pai taaravaa'neeng-koo. Ee'noko e'mung-koo basinoo' tee urikung kara nantoong Kumponing ninka naroong-anta-koong deeruaama noru' biikaang tee tee' nari' avo'ariri papaaravarimaung Kumponinge domampuriaina' oo-koo. Siraka'paria', ai' tee Karistoo'koo kuunge deeko' makosiaapeu'.
Ee', e'mung-koo basinoo' tee Moosesi bakaang kara taaravaama biikaang domang mme' daate'aria'.
Nka tenang nantoong Ovoring-anko bere'ariko deeko' tee noru' biikaang papaaranii'nanka siraka'antavurimaung Kumponinge domampuriaina' tasi'koo.
Enang tee, tee Ovoring minkuampimaung tee Tanuaang Meekung, ee'noko teing nantoong Ovoringe Tanuaang Meekunge kuung deempuriaining teing teieta boto-koong tuutunang˜ eta unaavoroi otoroaining.

Ee'noko nii'ke ookarai ee'ninge niikaang onou avo'maria' o'norimainge tee Ovoring bakaang araka tampa' ooampiri oorara-pina' oro'antavampimaung, ee'noko paarimarima tee' Karistoo'pina' oro'marimaung deto bia'morima meenasi-aape. Tee aung aarumo tee Ovoring-eta pomaung, tee ee'nara Tanuaang Meekung.
Tee'koo Kumponinge piaamurira tee araka oko-antamuri bereng-anta-koo botomurio' tee nii' iri' o'maria' sira'pampimaung.

Nii'ke nantoong daua'arampiaunge niikaang minkunaa masika'anta-koo. Naning tosi-koo piamoriaunge. Kara Kumponing bakaang mare'ampiaunge. Teing maimaia'na' oro'nanka tee dama'duampiru'ning. Kumponing narung-koo uro'kanoo'ke donkonampiri kara masikung narung siraka'antavampiri nantoong nauarampimaung teinge tampa' tasi'maarira domang-eta aroo'aava'naang.
Ee'noko tee doorenang tampara daankiampimaung aa'na' siraka'pari otong, teka teing-koo boo'aape nameng-koo otoroining-koo deeko' tasi'parava'.

Teing ee'ning masika'anta oto'evoroaing teie daang-koong kumponinge kansi'koonge siompaamaunge noru' kaputu'antavuru'ning. Tee'koo tee Karistoo' tee Kumponing siuraampi˜ meenasi-po'nung bakaang doorenang tampara arakavarako ooaavarukoo'.
Ai' nii' nii'ka minkumarima daankimaria', teka Jiisuu' Karistoo' Ovoring deempari otoing sira'pampimaung, ee'noko nii' teing dii' diikaning botovotonaa'nuka Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo.

Ai' teie Kumponinge kansi' pupu'uma aa'puu'nunge, “Araka, arakararavai mutaanang-koo meu'ke,” tee bakaang arakai niikaang domang siisi-antavuu'nung nau-antamurima tee meenasi Kumponing bakaang, Karistoo' bakaang oing-koo oro'parako tasi'pampira aa'pampii'naang tee tee Ovoring, Kumponinge tero Pako'pari'nii' nii' domamuri taremuriainoo'koo.

Nka bane tampeng meenasi nii'koo kuung otoko, nii' teing utau aaveta'nanka kansi'koo nkonii'pina' oro'nuka. Kumponinge tee' miru'muru'nung iri' dau basie puring-antamuriko nantoonge tee bakaang iri' tasi'paava'naang, niikaang deea'.
Ookamenta-ita tee aa'na' iinkunumaarimaung, teka naka'mariaung. Bane papaaramariko, nka oraru'kampiaung.
Turamaarimaunge, teka Kumponinge si'muriaung. Na'namaarima orari-antamaariarukoo'.
Niikaang moni'ke doong kante boo' kune'umaung tee' Jiisuu'koo nkoaru'na' nari' Jiisuu' bakaang iri' tampa' oro'paraa'naang niikaang mono-koo.
Ee', nii' domamariri o'noriko teie Kumponinge taura'murimaung boo' kune'koo Jiisuu'koo, Jiisuu' bakaang iri' taa'ni'poi oro'paraa'naang niikaang mono boo'dumpaa' deemparako.
Enang tee nii'ke Karistoo' daankiampima boo' kune'ampiko dii'ke unaa-anta mantomperikoo'.
Tee' Daari Meekung-koo narunge aa'puu'na', “Ninge masika'antavamira karontu'nung,” teie narunge Tanuaange masika'anta-koonge daa'muriko masika'antavampima karompimaung.
Aming-koo, nna' ee' masika' noru'ampiri o'noring, teie narunge Ovoring Jiisuu' boo'paru'noo'keta domampuu'nunge domamuriaing tee ninka, ee'noko dii' ninka nari' tavo'antamuriaing Kumponing-anko.

Kumponinge aing ookara kapoo' nkoarampimaing tee dii' paku-anta-koo miru'uu'ning ee' noru'uitaa': mmau' nantoonge tee biraanke nkavaama tee napo' teinge Kumponing daangampaavai, ee'noko Kumponinge meenasi nkavuai tee-koo.
Tee'koo tarua'moriaung. Bane dama'du insimarima, nka nii'koo kuunoo' tee doong kante neraka'mariri o'norimaung.
Aing niikaning arikananka teing a'noo' kuaa'ning, pankaroong oto'numpo'ning deea', teka teinge nerimemurimaung tee moo' aa'na' manki' tee meenasi otoi oto'.

Tee'koo nii' teing-koo kapoo'nanka-koo e'mung oro'pariri otoroining-koo ookampiri o'noria', teka teing-koo oro'pariaing-koo aroo'mariri o'noring. Teing kapoo' oro'pari otoining oto'numpo'ning deea', teka teing oro'pariaing teing otoi otoaining.

Enang tee nii'ke noru'ampiri o'noring tee niikaang mono anke kansi'koo o'noring bare-pina' pesi'arako nii' teing tee pava Kumponing-etaing oto'memuring teing paning-koo otoi oto' aa'ning naninge birenge kanivua'.
Enang nempampiri nii' teing baimarima o'noring tee mono Kumponing-etaing amurii'naang piamorima,
tee mono nkomemuru'nunge duaanamuriko simpenoi'nuka deemariaroo'naang.
Ee', enang mono kansi' bakaang-koo o'nori manki'morima baimarimaung. Mono tamung si'koo piamoria', teka niikaang mono boo'koong namu'ke mono boo'paa'ke daka'pui paari-antamurii'naang piamorimaung.

Nii' nii'ka tee' nko-koo noru'maria', teka Kumponinge nii' pia-antamuru' mono boo'paa' nka-koo, ee'noko bakaang Tanuaang amuru' taa'ni'antamuri, tasi'anta-koo tee maraka-antamuru'nung tavo'kuaing-koo.
Tee'koo ee' noru'ampiri ookara batei-koo aroo'mariri o'norimaung: Enang tee aung kansi' bakaang mono ninka o'nori Ovoring-eta taapo' o'noring.
O'noritaa' baitoi masika'anta ninka o'nori tee' noru'ampimaung, kapoo' dutai oo-koong deea'.
Aa'pamaang, aa'na' purimariri o'noring, teka aa'na' deepo' aung mono sipampira Ovoring-anko o'norii'naang piamori otong.
Ookara-koo dau basinoo'ka tee dotu-antavampii'naang piamori o'noring, anke mono ninka o'nori, nii'noo' aung mono sipampira deeko'.

Ai' nii' teing ookara Karistoo'koo dutakanoo'ka teie simpe'muriaining, naruna' naruna' moo' kante nkavampiaing tenang mono-koo o'nori nkoampiru'na' siompario', tampa' deeko' ai' oraka' nkoampiru'nung deeko'.

Tee'koo nii'ke Kumponing-koo amorompiri nantoong pia-antavarampimaung tee-koo aroo'arii'naang. Nii' kuung o'norimana' Kumponinge koonto' noru'ui otong, ee'noko bakei tampa' dii'ke tee' nari' tasi'mereripeu' diikaang domang pankaruntoonge.

Dii'ke baru' biivimerererii'naang etumaria', teka dii'ke nii' tasi'mereriaina'koo pakurarampimaang, ee'noko tenang teinge dii' barantaarimainge bii'ka tampeng tamparima nka biikaang domang tasi'paria' kararaariko, tampa' kake'ii-eta maku'ereriai.
Nii' nii'ning-koo kanu'nuka-pina' auromarimaung deeko' tee tee kapoo' Kumponing bakaang, teka nii' tampa' taaramerererimaung deeko' makosi, dii' paku-koo tee' auromarimaung.
Ai' nii' tee Karistoo' bakaang piaae aa'na' siong-antamuri o'noring tasi'antamuri tee narung nii'koo boo'paru'nung ookara-koo, ee'noko tee'koo ookara tee moompiru'ning-pina' o'noring.
Ee'noko tee tee ookara-koo boo'paru'nung teing tee-koo napo' domampariaining bii'ka dotu-anta-koo deea', teka Karistoo' narung dotu-anta-koo, tee teing-koo boo'parara napo' domamparu'nung.
Tee' tasi'pampiru'noo'keta nii'ke naning bakaang oo'oo-koo noru'ampiaung, kansi' bakaang noru'pina'. Karistoo' tee' noru'ampiko'nung deeko' enang tee' noru'ampia'.
Tee'koo tee naning Karistoo'koo otoing tee neraka'puing. Urikung onou otoa', teka ookutunung neraka'puing.
Aing teing ookara Kumponing-etaning tee ee'nara nii' baka-koo napo' navu-antamuru'nung Karistoo'koo, ee'noko navu-antamurira tee nko-nko nantoong napo' navu-anta-koong amuru' nii'ke nkoampii'naang.

Tee' aa'na' Kumponinge ookara kansi'nupoong napo' navu-antavuru' baka-koo Karistoo'koo kuunge biikaang oraka' nkonanka deeruevurima tuumpivuria'. Ee'noko teie baremuru' nii'ke tee minkunaa daankiampii'naang napo' Kumponing ninka navuariaina'.

Ee'noko nii' teing enang Karistoo' bakaning kara okomuri nkanuka Kumponing nii'koo kuunge karoko nantoong bokuarampimaing, ee'noko nii'ke ookara Karistoo'koo aa'na' kevi'arampiri bokuarampimaang aa'pampima: Aarumo orara siperira Kumponing ninka navurariai.
Kumponinge tee Jiisuu' oraka'nko noru'uaung oraka' nkonanka-po'nung deeng-antavuu' nii' pari'anta-koo, tee-koo kuunge nii' Kumponing bakaang aarumo koonto'po'nupoong deemarii'naang.
Tee'koo nii' Kumponing-koo nari' mintoomarimaing deemarima nii'ke pia-antararampimaang doona otoko dii'ke Kumponing bakaang piaa tampa' komperimaatoaina'.
Ai' Daari Meekung-koo ee' minkuvuu'nung,
“Ninge tee nkaang piaa tenang oro'paramanang makotuio' taararampiring, ee'noko te'mung domang-antana'mung-koo tee ninge pakurampiring.”
Tee batei Kumponinge piaa oro'anta-koo minkuvuu'nung aung e'mung makotuio' naurampimang. E'mung ee'na'mung te'mung nii' domang-antana'mung.
Ee aing, pinaunuka taarameriaing, ai' nii'ke aarumo naning tupang-antavampipeu'nung dii'koo uro'kanoo'ke oro'antavampia' teing niikaning kara daang-antavupeu'nung.

Nka ookara nko-nkonankai niikaninge tee sira'murimaung nii' teing Kumponing bakaning botovotonaa'nuka. Oomereriaing nii' tee aa'na' iveka'mori mintoomarimaung, bane ainge ee'oro'nankai paaramuriko: arikanankai ee'noko pore'nankai, napo' papaaranankai meu'muriko teka niikaang mintoong-koo meu'ka.
Napo' teie aa'na' mura'maarimaunge, kiimatanava-koo si'maarikoo', totopurumaarima˜. Ee'noko napo' takaa'morikoo', aasi'koo tora'kampiarukoo', peera ninka, dii'koo ookara-koo.

Napo' tasi'mereriai nii' teing domang kirokainku, napo' mataunukai, ee'noko napo' iira ninka mintoomariaunge, nka nantoong tampa' nari' tarearampimaung Tanuaang Meekung-koo kuunge piaa masikung ninka.
Nii' teing kara masikung narung minkuampimaung Kumponing bakaang purinto' kompampiri, ee'noko tampara aarumo ookanaantai kaa'ba-pina' kompampiritaa'.

Amutemurii' otooto'koo nii' Kumponing bakaning bautaranuka-pina' oro'antamarimaung: tenang tampa' nkomaariko nii'noo' poore'maariko, tenang daangamaariko nii'noo' daang-koo tuumpimaariko. Bane teie koomariri o'noriko nka tee tokomaarimaatoo'naang.

Bane ookarai noru'maaritaa', nka nii'ninge noru'maariaung-pina' nkomaarikoo'. Bane ampankeena' boo'nanka-pina' noru'maariko nka tee mme' domamariri o'noring. Tenang mura'maarima teie domang dupisi'maariaung.

Bane orarunsi-antamaarikoo', teka ookara batei-koo nii' dotumariri o'norimaung. Bane ata'kampiri, teka nantoong aa'na' biraankei maanto'antavarampimaung. Bane kapoo'navu' oto'memuria', teka kapoo' ookara okomuri otong.
Dii' nii'maikorori' Koorin-nupoong, nii'ke tee sira'mariri naurarampimaung niikaang domang aa'na' daate'mariri.
Niikaang navunavu dii'koo avo'maria', teka dii' deeko' nii'koo avo'darimaung.
Ninge tee dii' nkaning toirekaa'pina' kararampimang. Tampa' maku'meriaing diikaang domang daate'dariri.

Teing ninka nantoong masika'anta oto'evoroaing ninka nari' pake'deeriauka', ai' tampara aarumo orara aarumo ninka arekee' nari' meena'poresi oro'parepeu'? Ee'noko araka naanka mutaanang arekee' nari' otoresitaa' oro'parepeu'?
Ee'noko Karistoo' naanka Sietani' arekee' marieerepeu'? Naning Karistoo'koo baito-nung ee'noko naning baitoropa aremeng-koo onou narung deemparepeu'?

Arekee' teing daang-koong kansi'koong kumponinanka Kumponing deto basi domampari otomaung bakaang pava dootuu'nava-koo makosiai teke otoropeu'? Ai' nii' teing Kumponing domaang okonara bakanava makosinuka, Kumponinge aa'puu'na'koo,

“Ning tee teing ninka nari' o'noaing ee'noko teing ninka nari' meu'ke nanama'noai, ee'noko ning tee biikaang Kumponing deemari o'noaing ee'noko teing teing napo' nkaning nantoong deempariri otoroaing.”
Tee'koo Ovoringe napo' aa'puu':
“Oravitu-eta tonta'darira taapo'ke otoriai. Kapoo' ku'mi'po'ning komperia' ee'noko dii' ninge onkeonke'dampiaing.
Ee'noko ning tee dii' Diuma deemari o'noaing ee'noko dii' teing nnurukaa' deentariri otoriaing, ookeng donkaang ee'noko maniku'. Tee' minkuvuing teie Ovoring Purinto'ke.”

Ee mmaikori', teing aing maraka-antananka nkavampirinoo'keta kiiroraa'mariri o'noriaing teing-eta ookara kapoo' niikaang mono ee'noko tanuaang ku'mi'antavumaing-eta, ee'noko aa'na' paaramariai koonto' meeka'mariri oto'koo Kumponing-koo amorompiri.
Domang daate'dariri otoriai nii'koo, ai' nii'ke naning orari-antavampia'; oraka' nkoampia'; napo' auraimaria'.

Aung tee kara ninge dii' tompintampima minkuampa', teka tee' tero naurampiru'na' naurampimang dii' teing nii'ke domange dai'darampiritaa' o'noriaininge, ee'noko moompima deeko' moompiaininge dii' ninka nari'.

Ning koonto' dii'koo aroo' pankaing o'nong. Aa'na' doturotumaramaung dii'koo. Napo' domang aa'na' kuaa'antamerimaunge. Ee'noko ookara niikaang-koo arikananka-koo tee doturotue maanto'muma piampumaung.
Tenang ee'nang Masedonia'nameensi'aape meru'nang nii' tee niikaang mono uaa-koo koonto' makotuaruu'. Ookutunairu-koo meriko'noo'ka pore'anta kune'ampiko', aa'ning dama'due turang, kuunge avoro'.
Teka teie Kumponinge domang manki'nuka kuaa'antavurimaunge kuaa'antamuru' Taitas tampa' nii'anko po'antavura.

Taitas pou'nung narung-koo deea', teka dii'ke domang kuaa'antaveriko'ning pora ee' oro'ning naumurio': ning piaamerimaunge ee'noko nkaang tautau taaraverima aa'na' orarunsi ninka bere'dariru'nunge. Tee' taaramararai'nange dau basinoo' dotumarieeng!

Bane tero nkaang karavoto daariantu'nunge orarunsi-antarampiru'nunge, teka ninge enang baru' noru'ampa'. A'noo' tutung manki'mou'nung tee' daarirerompiru'nung-koo, teka enang tasi'pansi o'nong teie karavotoi tamung oki'noo'koo orarunsi-antaruru'nung.

Nka enang dotumaramaung, teka dii' orarunsi-antarampiru'noo'koo deea', teeo teie diikaange orarunsie orara aarumo-ita bere'antaruru'nung-koo. Ai' tee temurii' orarunsi dii'ke oro'antaveru'nung tee Kumponinge miru'uu'nung dii'koo. Tee'koo tee' oki'noo' nii'ke baike-antararampia'.

Tenang nantoong Kumponing piavomana' orarunsiarima bere'ariko tee domang-antavurimaung, ee'noko tee-koo domang manki'oroarupeu', teka kansi' bakaang aarumo siompai orarunsiarima Kumponing-koo domang-anta nkavaavaung.

Ooveriai, Kumponing piavomana' orarunsirariko kapoo' arekee' oro' basiaru' dii'koo. Bakei dii' namu'ke avoro' ninka tanterarira Kumponing-koo maia'dorira aa'na' aroo'eri kake'iirariru' tee orara aarumo naninge nkovuu'nung ampankeena' ooveri otoko koomperira simpiri'darii'naang tee' naurampiru'na'. Bakei aa'na' ning dii'anko mora pakurampii'naang piaroru'. Napo' aa'na' noru'eru' ee'noko motekaro'dariri tee kapoo' koonto' deeaung koomperu'. Ookutunairu-koo dii' masikeerariru'nung dii' koonto'nuka deentarii'naang tenai'koo tee naning bakanai'koo.

Ninge dii'anko temu' daariantu'noo' tee dii'ke nii' aa'na' deto noru'mererimana' Ovoringe sira'puu'naang. Tee naning oraka' nkoaru'nung baru' koong-anta-koo deea', napo' tee naning oraka' nkovuu'nung baru' paku-koo deea'.

Tee' deto noru'mererimana' naumererira nii' tee aa'na' domang kuaa'antamerereru'nung. Ee'noko daua napo' tee Taitas doturotuari poio' ooampira dotumariru' dii'ke ookarai teing kapoo' naurarampiru'ning siomperima domang kuaa'antaveru'noo'koo.

Temu' tee aa'na' daangantampiko'nung dii' tee-ankoi ee'noko dii' beero'durima tampa' ooruru'noo'koo dotu-antamuu'. Dii'ke masikee-antaverira maia'antameria' daangantampiko' noo'koo. Ookara kapoo' dii' daangantampima minkuantu'ning teing masikeng deemparu'ning tee' ookara kapoo' minkurampimaing masika'paramana'.
Ee'noko Taitasie bakei aa'na' noru'durimaung dii' aroo'keta onkeonke'eru'nung-koo amaiaa'dori dankuranku'darima.
Tee'koo ning bakei dotumaramaung dii' aroo'dariaining-pina' noru'dampima.
Enang tee mmaikori', nii'ke pia-antararampimaang tee' avusiro'ari oto'na' Kumponinge piaavurima teing Masedonia'nameensi'koo osi kante-koo dootuu'nupoong avuru'nung noru'erii'naang.
Bane aa'na' arikanankai paaravuriko ee'noko aa'na' ata'kai, teka doturotue maanto'uri avusiro'ariri avuavu' nkoaako'.
Koonto' ooamira ninge sira'pamaang makosiau'na' biikaang avuavu' nkoau'nung-koo, ee'noko bono' divu'au' avu'koo makosi-pina' oro'noo'.
Maroita bii'ka aa'na' tana'maako' nii'ke taura'parampiko nii'ning ninka nari' pakuei nantoong Kumponing bakaning meekupoong teka Judia'ka pakuaarii'naang.
Nii'ke ee' noru'ampiko', “Ai' pang tang nii'ning mooni' sipaava'naang,” teka teing bii'ka tutung avariru' Ovoring-koo ee'noko napo' nii'koo Kumponing bakaang pia-koo kuunge.
Tee'koo Taitas tana'ampiko aroo'ario' botoampiru' teie koompaara'durii'naang temurii' pakupaku piaa-koong dupeverii'naang, ai' dii' teing ee'narai tutung-antaruru'ning tee' nko-koo.

Dii' bakei dau basinoo' amutemurii' aarumo Kumponing-etaning tampa' nko-koo bia'dorimaung aa'ning-koo: masika'anta-koo, kara-koo, noru'koo, ookutuari aroo'koo ee'noko nii' piaa-koo. Enang napo' tanatarariai nari' dau basinoo' avusiro'dariri nko-koo.
Ninge eturampia' naurampimang diikaang piaa taa'ni'poaina' oo-koo nii'ning ninka.

Ai' dii'ke tee noru'eri otong tee piaa niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaang. Tee aa' bane maanto'ari otoitaa', teka dii' noru'duri boonko batari'arara ata'kuu' dii' teie bakaang ataata'ke maanto'antararii'naang.

Ee'noko ning nkaang tautau aung dii'koo, aung amurii' aarumo avuavu'koong nkoveriaina'koo: Boonamare'koo tee dii' ee'ning dootuu'nupoong ookara osi-koo avuavu'koo tutuna' tutuntariru'ning, ee'noko tee narung-koo deea', tee avuavu' nko-koong pia tee dii'keta tutumparu'.
Enang tee tampa'na' ee': dupeveriaing temurii' nko-nko nari' dompirompi'doritaa' otori tutuntariru'na' tee' dii'ka-koo makosina' noru'darimana'.
Kapoo' oto'deruriaung-eta deea', nka oto'derurining-eta avu'koo makosi. Arekee' basi tee avuavu' averiko tee Kumponing dotuaravaing diikaang aroaroo' oovui.
Nii' tee dii'koo manki' pante'koo piamoria' teing pakuererimaing tamung kuaa'oroi otoroko, teka ookamenta nari' basi-koo piamori otong.
Enanung batei-koo tee mmau' oto'derurining-eta nii'ning pakuereriaing apuka'pariko tenang dii' apuka'dariko pakuraariaina'. Ee'noko ookara naro' basinoo' oto'deruriai.
Tee' Daari Meekunge maana' ukuau'na' minkuvuma aa'pumana',
“Bane tee naning mmau' oosivuu'nung, nka baru' deepo' oto'evua', ee'noko bane tee naning oki'ning oosivuu'nung nka apuka'parava'.”
Ninge tampara tampamang Kumponing-koo tee Taitas napo' Kumponinge siong-antavumaung-koo dii' aa'na' pakururii'naang tee' ee'na' nari' ninge dii' noru'dampimana'.

Ai' tee Taitas tee aa'na' dotuari otong nkaang pia siompui napo' dii' beero'durii'naang, teka ee' noru'amaang, ninge nauamparuko dei baka beero'duripeu', ai' tee tee bakei dii' oo-koo aa'na' piavomaung.

Teka nii'ke Taitas ninka narung nii'maiko' nari' botoampimang dii'anko uroresi beree'naang, tee ee'nara ookarai dootuu'nupoonge osi kante-koo tampa' noru'aamaung doorenang tampara tampa' bereng-koo pakuvuriko.

Aung tee naning tampara, ai' ookarai dootuu'nupoonge osi kante-koo miru'au'nung nii' ninka nari' nanu'koo tee mooni' Karistoo' siompaamainge amaarimaung nari' kompampira dama' Jerusalema'ke tankaampampii'naang. Tee' ookara avuavu'nanka tavo'ampima tee Kumponing bakaang miring pankaing-antavampii'naang ee'noko niikaang paku-koong pia oro'antavampii'naang tee' pakumeeri.
Nii'ke bokuampiru'nung aung naning pakumurii'naang nantoonge tee mooni' avusiro'ariri sipau'nung oraka' tankaang-koo tuumpimaari'neeng-koo.
Nii'ke tampa' pukeampiri nkoampimaung kapoo' tampa' nari' nko-koo, Kumponing-koo dutakanoo'ke naro'ke deea', teka aa' nantoong-koo dutakanoo'ke tee' nari' nkoampimaunge.

Napo' tenaanka ninka nari' narung nii'maiko' motekaro' dii'anko botoampimang tee ookara batei-koo kake'iiari amutemurii' manki'nanka-koo pakumuriko tampa' ooampimaung, ee'noko dii' tampa' noru'duritaa' aa'na' masika' pakururii'naang noru'durimang.

Taitas tee ni'ninka manta'maresi pakumeeremaung dii' paku-koo ee'noko anaanka nii'maikorori'ka tenaanka ainge dootuu'nupoonge osi kante-kooninge anke otoromainge miru'aaretu'naanka biikaang noru' sira'puree'naang. Napo' teie tee Karistoo' pankaing-antavuremanaanka.
Tee'koo dii'ke diikaang piaa oro'antaveriaing aing-koo, ai' nii'ke tee diikaang piaa pankaing-koo biivintarampimaung, ee'noko ookarai dootuu'nupoonge ooaava'naang piamomaang.
Ee aing, aung a'noo' tamung dii'ke noru'eri otoing daariamang teing nii'ning Kumponing bakaning meekupoong paku-koo.

Ninge noru'ansi otong dii' Koorin-nupoong aa'na' paku-koo piarori otong, ee'noko tee'koo ninge dii' Akaia'nameensi'nupoong daangantampimaung aing Masedonia'nameensi'nupoong-ankoi ee' nauarama: dii' boonamare'keta maamurariru'ning tee avuavu' nko-koo ee'noko dii' tee' dompirompi'doriko ooraarira teing-koo mmau' daa'ariru' tee' nari' nko-koo.

Teka ninge teing aing nii'maikorori' botoaransinoo' tee nkaang kara biivintampimaung-koong tamunsi'nung deemparavaroo'naang diikaang avuavu'koong ee'noko dii' maamurariri tampa' nkoveriko ooraarii'naang tee' nari' minkuamana'.
Teka dii' daangantampimanoo'koo ning maia'mo'neenga tenang Masedonia'nameensi'nupoong ni'ninka nari' merira dii' maamurariaruko oorarampira. Ee'noko dii' teie, maia'doripeu'.

Tee'koo ninge ee' noru'ansing: ainge nii'maikorori'ke tutung beero'daarima pakuraarii' naang tampa' maamurariri dupe-anta-koo tee avuavu' avusiro'dariri nko-koo mau'dariru'nung. Bera ning moma tampa' maamuari otoko ooampai tee diikaang avuavu' domang-eta avusiro'ari avu' deempari otoko, minkuminku-po'nung deea'.
Aung kapoo' dii'ke noru'eriaing: Naning tee oki'ning sinang keempumaung tee oki'ning kavumaung. Ee'noko baa naning mmau' keempumaung tee mmau' kavumaung.
Narunge baka bakaang domange miru'uaina' avuai, domang manki'dori averi'neenga. Nii'narai botovuaina' avuauka', ai' Kumponinge tee naning aroo'keta avu' nkovumaung piaavumaung.

Ee'noko Kumponinge tee aa'na' aruripeu' apuka'darimanoo'keta deto, ee'noko bera teie teing-koo apuka'darimaing-koo ookara batei-koo makosiri oto'deruriaing, ee'noko enang tee dau basinoo' oto'deruriaing ookara tampeng nko-nkonanka-koo nii'ning paku-anta-koo makosina'.
Tee' Daari Meekung-koo aa'puu'noo'ka daariari otoina',
“Teie bakaang avuavu'nanka bereng-antavuu'nung teing-koo ata'oi'nuka-koo, ee'noko tee bakaang aarumo koonto' tee tee' nari' otoi otomatoaing.”

Kumponinge tee keenkeeng nkonuka sinang avurimaung ee'noko dama'ke keenavaang tampeng avurikoo' nantoonge nai-koo, ee'noko tee' nari' teie ee'narai deepo' amutemu'ke sinananka du'antarerurimatoaing, mmau' kaverima tankaamperimaatoaina' tampara aarumoi meena'dori.

Ee'noko dii' teing anatenairu-koo maanto'duri otoriaing tampa' avusiro'dariri otoriaina' ookara batei-koo, ee'noko tee' nari' avusiro'dariri tee diikaang avuavu' niikaang bireng-koo siperiko teinge Judia'nupoonge Kumponing-koo tampa' tampaavaing.

Tee aung pakupaku dii'ke nkoveriaing tee, teing Kumponing bakaning meekupoong naing paku-koong deea' kapoo'koo apuka'pariko, teka tee Kumponing dotuaravai amutemu'ke teinge napo' Kumponing-koo tampa' tampaako.

Ee'noko teie nko-nko tamparai dii'ka tasi'antarariaing-koo nantoonge tee Kumponing pankaing-antavaavaing, dii'ke tee doorenang tampara Karistoo' bakaang mavo'peri sira'perimaung-koo tee meumperi. Enang tee diikaang avusiro'dariri avuavu' teing-koo ee'noko nii'ning-koo averereriaing ooaara Jerusalema'nupoonge Kumponing daangampaavai.
Ee'noko biikaang kunsi-koo dii' pakuraarima pankaruntoonge noru'daariaing tee-koo Kumponinge aa'na' deto basinoo' avusiro'antaruru'nung-koo.
Tampara masikung Kumponing-koo tee-koo bakaang avuavu' minku-paa'koo.

Enang tee, kontampiri ning eentamaramaang dii'koo, ning ee'nara Paula', tee naning nkaning too'de-nupoonge aa'maamaung, “Tenang nari' karompima aa'na' karoarukoo', teka tenang isipo' otoitaa' aa'na' karamurikoo';”

Teka enang ninge daarirerompima Karistoo' doonko noru'ari navu ninka karomana' dii'koo eentamaramaang teing-eta tonta'dariaing. Tenang ning mora teing ning too'demaamaing turamparama dii'koo nii'ning nari' turantampi'neenga. Ai' teinge ning tasi'maavainge ning kansi'nung aarumo siompamaung-pina' noru'maama aa'maamaung, “Paula'ke kiimatamuriarupeu'.”
Teka tee bane kansi'koo o'noring, teka turang tovang kansi'nupoonge nkoaamana' nkoampiaung.
Tee iri' nii' oto'memurimaung tee kansi'nupoong biikaning kapatau-pina' oro' deea', teka tee Kumponing-etaing ee'noko Sietani' bakaang e'maniang pesi'koo makosie.

Tee Kumponing bakaang iri' ninka nii'ke siinka'parampimaung teing kara dairai'kooning ee'noko ookara daang minkunanka maavai'arima Kumponing tampa' noru'koo parapara'aama minkuaamaing. Ee'noko ookara biikaang mataunanka nii'ke pinka'ampiri bere'antavampimaung Karistoo' bakaang kara narung siompaava'naang.
Enang tee teing-eta tonta'dariri otoriko ning mora teing ning too'demaamaing kiimatavarampaing ookara biikaning taarapiikananka-koo.

Kapoo' diikaang duta-koo uro'kanoo'ke otoing ee ooveria' otong? Arekee'koo ning Kumponinge dii' tare-koo miru'muu'nung-koo ampankeena'dorimaang nii'ninge tosiraariko? Naning Karistoo' bakaang kara-okovui-nka-pina' noru'ari otoing deeko' tee ning tee' Karistoo' bakaang kara-okovui-nka-pina' noru'muainge tee' baka noru'aramana' nari'.
Ai' Kumponinge taa'ni'antamui pakumumaung, ee'noko naninge maia'antamuarupeu' bane deepo' daangamaramaung-pina' noru'mura, Kumponinge makosi-antamumana' nantoong tare-koo minkuanko.
Teka aa'dampimang, tee dii' tare-koong iri' Kumponinge amuu'nung tee dii' orari-anta-koong deea' nka dii' puring-anta-koong, nkaang karavoto dii' avoro'anta-koong-pina' noru'eri'neeng.
Ai' dii'koo nii'ninge aa'perikoo', “Paula'ke bakaning karavotonanka-koo aa'na' purimpari ivekung kara daarivukoo', teka nii' ninka o'nori amaiaa'omaung ee'noko bakaang kara tarii'oarukoo'.”

Teinge tee' kareaamainge ee' tasi'paavaing: Tee aa' kapoo' oovunamurii' otoa' teing-koo aing-koo aa'ning-koo, karavoto daariamaung tenang isipo' o'noitaa' ee'noko tee kapoo' ninge nkoampaing tenang dii' ninka nari' o'nori.

Ning tee makosi-pina' dooremaravaung teing-koo maavai'arima nau-antanuka tamparimaing ninka navaatang-koo oto'koo, ee'noko teing ninka naro' basi tang-koo bii'ka pankenanka tamparimaing ninka. Teka teing matauna' nkoaria' bii'ka miru'aamana' ooai paaravarima daang makosi-antavarikoo'.

Ning tee, teing-pina' deea'. Ninka doore karoma Kumponinge miru'muu'noo' divu'ampauka'nung. Teka miring-koo biivimaravaing deeko' tee makosi miru'muu'noo' basiario' biivimaravaing nantoong tare-koo miru'muu'noo'koo, ee'noko dii' teinge nkaang tanata-koo kuunge otoring.

Ning taapo' toonampa' Ovoringe miru'muu'noo'keta tenang dii' tautaurampima, ai' tenang tutung ning dii'anko mera tampara doorenang Karistoo'koong naurampiru'nang Ovoring bakaang iri' oro'paravaruu'nung dei ning Ovoringe miru'muu'noo'keta taapo' toonamaung tammeripeu'. Teka tee' nkomarava', ai' tenang tutung mou'nang Ovoringe iri' amuu'nung tee taa'ni'poi ning-koo oro'parako dii'ke ooverima domang bere'dariru'nung Ovoring-aape.

Ee'noko dii'koo mintoomaramana'koo daangamarama nii'ning biikaang nko-nko noru'ansi deepo' daangamaravaung. Nkaang pia tee diikaang masika'anta deto nari' dupui oto'koo bera niikaang mintoong dii'koo aa'na' kato panka'paravainge.
Aa'noaina', doorenang tampara napo' daankiampiai dii'ankoita kato anatenairu-koo. Ai' ning nii'nung bakaang nko-nko-koo daangang-koo piamoa' bakanoo'ke nkovuing-koo.
Teka Daari Meekunge ee' minkuvui otong,
“Naning daangang-koo piavora deeko' tee-koo Ovoring-koo daangamparavaing.”
Ai' naning baka daangamparama makotuarupeu', teka Ovoringe daangampuko deeko' makosi.
Io' taura'meri otoko oki'nanaare nkaang minkunaa-koo minkuampai. Bane biivimaring-pina' minkumarako teka dii'ke daangamaring-pina' taaraverima domang ima'dariauka'.

Ninge dii' bakei Kumponing-koo kuunge tokontampimaing dii' orarirari'neeng-koo. Ai' ninge tee dii' narung naning-koo konteerii'naang miru'dampiru'ning tee ee'nara Karistoo'. Ee'noko tee-anko tavo'dampii'naang dii' manikuma nerai'na' kuukuma˜pina' kiiroraa'oi otoko ba'ung-anko nampeesina'mung taavo'aamana'.
Teka amoromaang ning tee' Iivi aavavuu'na' teie boru'ke ampirinunge˜ dii' tee' nari' naninge diikaang onou tokoona' kaake'antaruri'neeng Karistoo'koo pinka'dariri otorimanoo'keta.

Ai' dii' teing ou'ou'nuka-pina' oorampimaing. Naninge dii'anko pora nii'namurii' Jiisuu' minkuvuma nii'na' daankivuko teieta' ninge dii'ankoi daankiantu'nung-eta tee tamung danto siomperikoo'. Napo' tee onou Tanuaang Meekung-etaing tero nkaveru'nung siperima oovunamurii' onou siomperikoo'. Napo' doorenang tampara mare'ai nii'na' daankiaako tero daankianko'na'keta tee napo' domang ima'dariarukoo' tee-koo.
Ning tee bakei teing-koo boong basi-pina' noru'marava' teing-koo diikaning nau-antanuka-koo kara okovuri nkanuka pankeng tamparimaing-koo.
Ning tee bane matau-pina' karompaunge, teka ning noru' o'nong. Ninge tee temu'keta avuntevunge tee' dii' tasi'antarampimaung.

Arekee'koo pa ning tee' tokomerimaunge? Tero ninge Kumponing bakaang doorenang tampara dii'koo daankiama moo' eentamarava'. Ai' tee' tompimari pankaing-antarampiko orara aarumo nkoamaung-pina' oomerimaunge?
Ninge tee mooni' nii'ning dootuu'nupoong-eta nkavantu'nung tee dii' paku-antarampii'naang.

Tenang ning dii' ninka o'noritaa'nange kapoo' piamoma nii'nung naning manki'antavampa', teka teinge nii'maikorori'ke Masedonia'keta porora pakumau' piamoko'ning-koo. Ninge dii' ookara taung-koo manki'anta avu'koo para'maramaung, ee'noko tee' nari' nkomaramatoaing.
Jiisuu' bakaang kara masikung ning-koo otoina' masika' minkuamaang, naninge dii' Akaia'nameensi'nupoong-koonge napu'muauka'nung tee' daangamaramaung-koo.
Aming-koo, ai' dii' piaarampia' ee? A, tee aa' Kumponinge noru'ui otong aa'na' piaarampimana'.
Ee'noko tee si'maravauka'nung tee' nari' nkoamana' nko-nko nko-koo. Teing nantoong ning-pina' basinuka tamparima moo' piavoroma bii'ka daangamparimaing e'mantoma oto'antavevorompauka'nung.
Teing aing nantoong teing daang kara okovuri nkanuka tamparima, oovunung kara nau-anta-koo mintoomparikoo', daang tosie Karistoo' bakaning-pina' oro'antavarima.
Ai' Sietani' tee'ke, baka nantoong tosivurima daang avitoitoi bere'aramaung maroita nantoonge koosinung˜ araka-koong Kumponing-etaing-pina' noru'aara siompaava'naang.

Tee'koo kapoo' ta'nimpaarii' deea' tenang bakaning botovotonaa'nukai tee bakaang aarumo siompai nantoong tosiaariko, tee' Kumponing bakaning-pina' oro'antavarima kara nau-antaraariko. Aing nantoong tee' oraka' nari' nkoarima botu basiariainoo'ke moo' makosina' kompaavaing.
Napo' unampama aa'pamaang, naninge ning baru' biivimaramaung-pina' noru'meauka', teka tokomerira deeko' tang taura'meriaing nii'ning taura'perererimana', ee'noko oki'noo' dooremaravaing dii'koo.
Aung ee' oro' aarumo ninka biivimaramana' tee Ovoringe baka nko-antavuaung ee'noko tee'koo tee' amako-pina' nkomaramang.
Teka tee aing nantoong daangamparimaung deeko' tee' kansi'nupoong daangamparimana' ning teie tee' daangamaravaing.
Makosi ape' aing? Amakonuka doturariri taura'perererimaung avutevu'daarimaatoo'naang dii' norukasi'nuka deentarima.

Napo' tang ooveri otoriko aa'na' deto bia'oroi biikaning botovotonaa'nuka deeng-antaraarikoo', ee'noko opantaarimaatoo'naang. Daua'daarima miita'daarii'naang, napo' maavai'arima botoraarikoo'. Ee'noko oing-koo tanko'daarimaatoo'naang.

Aming-koo tee' taura'daririo' oraka' nkoraarimaunge? Ai' tee' tampa'pina' noru'erimaunge? Ee'noko tee' teinge taura'daririo' nkoraarimana' ninge nkorampiri dei ee doturaripeu'? Tee' ee maimaia'na' tamperiarupeu'?
Teka teing aing bii'ka biivimparimana'koo deeko' ning tee'ke, ninka biivimarapeu', teka tee' minkumarama ning makotua'na'pina' karomang.

Teing Iiburu-nupoong deeko' ning tee'ke teing ninka nari' Iiburu-koonge. Teing Isireeli-nupoong deeko' ning tee'ke Isireeli-nunge. Teing Eebaraami' bakanaving-koo-nupoong deeko', ning tee'ke, Eebaraami' bakanaving-koonge.

Teing Karistoo' bakaning botovotonaa'nuka deeko' ninge noru'dopa-pina' karoma aa'dampii'naang: Ning tee teing-koo dau basinoo' puru'aransitaa' aa'na' mintoomaramaung. Tee'koo kiimatanava-koo mmau'namu'pie be'antamaakoo'; mura'maariko ninge aa'na' dau basinoo' sisikeera tora'pankoo'; dapi' moonkoo' amutemu'ke.
Nii'nang pa'noko'namu'pie Ju'nupoonge aa'na' oraka' tora'antamau', deerunoo'koo asi'namu' otoa' teing mura'mau'ning karenaumo kivora deemparaa'naang (39) te' taura'nii'noo' nantoong mura'koo.

Beemu'pie teinge Ju'deeainge bana'ke mura'mau'. Napo' nii'na'mung Ju'nupoonge kapange dupisi'maava'naang too'maako'. Beemu'pie aarerie˜ nananko aareri naka'aru'. Teing-koo nii'na'mung aa'nou' muung na'mung ee'noko doong na'mung maiara'koo tamung koi'koo komari naampemarama o'nou'.

Ookara batei-koo tee diiri'mari o'nomaung. Tee' nanama aing aa'ning-koo koraposimarakoo': doua dovang-koo minki-koo, bakisipunankai tavu'koo, nkaning nantoonge ee'noko Ju'deeainge dapi' tamaakoo', osi pankeng-koo ee'noko pora'ka dapi' tamaakoo'. Pirung-koo dapi' minkimarakoo', ee'noko daang mmaikori' tamparimainge dapi' orari-antamaakoo'.
Aa'na' pore'moi mintoomaramaung. Nii'nang baru' aatumparukoo'. Peeramoma ntong-koo nukaa'mokoo'. Nii'nang taamang-koo ata'ankoo'. Kamaarie dupisi'mukoo' baarong nopa'maravaing oto'memuaruko.
Napo' aing baikenanka-koo daua ookara dootuu'nupoong osi kante-koo manki'moi aa'na' noru'arankoo'.
Tenang nii'ning amutemurii' parapaaranankai aruaru'oroko ning tee' aruaru' mantomarakoo'. Ee'noko nii'ninge orara aarumo-koo dua'antavaariko ning tee napo' iirang-antamaramaung.
Ning biiving-koo etumerimatomanoo'koo makosi biivimaravaing teing-koo nkaning aruaru'nairu sira'pumaing-koo Ovoring bakaang puring ning-koo oro'paraa'naang.
