Teie Kumponinge tee niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' Baumai ookara batei-koo biraankeampimaatoainge noru'mui otong ning tosimarava'.
Tenang ning teke Damaskasie o'noko teie ovo'ma'ke, tee daurarong˜ Aretasi bakaange piatooronuka˜ botovuru' ning osi-koo parang-koo karanaanga tenkenanko nemaara dai'maava'naang.

Bera koo'marapeu'na' papaaravanko mmaikori'ke ning mmari'antamaama burunge doonko osi-koong parang-koo dama'due sing-antamau' ka'baraa'koo o'noko. Ee'noko tee' koo'maru' tee ovo'ma' bakaang bireng-eta.

Tee' nari' daangamaramaa'noaing. Bane kapoo' basiaravauka', teka io' temurii' danga'daangang sipamira nii'namurii' danga'daangang-koo pare'maravaing aa'ning-koo nii'naung-koo bere'marama ooamaing ee'noko teing kapoo' makensi'ning Ovoringe sira' antavumaing ning-koo.
Mare' kivora-ita karenaumo divu'uu'ning-koo ning tee Kumponinge paning-koo koonto' bakanoo' a'dei' beenaumo-navaro-koo deto bokumuu' beroveero'koo.
Teka ning noru'marava' moni'naung meu'nung deeko' ai' pang tanuaanoo'ke meu'. Kumponinge narunge noru'ui otong.

Teka noru'ansi o'nong ning deto a'dei' basimaru'nung te' osi tampoo', ee'noko kapoo'nanka ta'nimpaarii'nanka taaravarantu' naninge minkuvuma punkaam˜ puarupeu' aa'nanka, ee'noko minku-koo taura'parava'.
Ning tee' ookamira biivimarapeu', teka ning tee' nkomaravauka'nung, teka nkaang aruaru'nanka-koo deeko' biivimaravaing.

A'noo' tee biivimarama deeko' makotuio' biivimarapeu' kapoo'nanka masikeng minkumarama. Teka tee' nkomaravaung nantoonge baru' ning deto basi-pina' noru'maa'neeng-koo nii'naung-koo bere'marama ooamaing-koo, teka kapoo' ninge nkoamaing ee'noko minkuamaing-koo deeko' noru'aitaa' tasi'maavaing.
Teka ning biivimara'neeng-koo teing kapoo' makensi'ning aa'na' pankeng ooantu'ning-koo tee teie Sietani'ke mono-koo too'mung si'muu' teketa tora'antamumaatoo'naang Ovoringe taura'puio'.
Bera tee teketa beemu'pie eentamaru' Ovoring-koo tonta'uu'naang ning-eta.

Teka teie aa'muu' ning maku'muma, “Ninge da' piaaransi pakuramana' tee' makosina' da'koo, ai' nkaang iri' tee dupeari oro'paramaung teing-koo aruaru'nuka-koo.” Tee'koo ning aa'na' deto basinoo' dotumari daangamaravaing aruaru'momanoo'koo tee Karistoo' bakaang iri' ning-koo oro'paravaina' aroo'ansi.

Tee'koo ee'na'koo Karistoo' siompansi ning dotumaramaung aing aa'ning kune'ama: puring mantomaravaruma, deu'dovamaako, pore' kompama, turamaako ee'noko arikananka kune'ama, ai' tenang aing sisikeerananka kune'amanang tee Karistoo'ke puring-antamumaung bakaang mintoong nko-koo.

Tee kara ninka biiving-koong kanu'pina' karoma minkuansing tee dii'ke daangameripeu'ninge pore'antameriko minkuansing. Bane ning tamunsi'nunge, teka teinge kara okovuri nkanuka pankeng tamparimainge ning koonto' puru'maava'.

Tenang teke dii' ninka o'noi ninge ookara kapoo'nanka-koo iri' o'marava' doong kante taa'ni'antamaru'nung koonto' Kumponing bakaang kara okovuri nkanuka-koong masikung-pina', tasi'antamarama aing aa'ning dii'koo meu'ke nkoarako: amutemurii' ta'ning-antananka, taa'ni'antananka ee'noko nko-nko purinto'nanka.

Ee'noko ninge dii' tampa' dootuu'koo donkong-antarampiru' nii'ning osi-koo donkong-antavarantu'na' nari', teka manki' dii'koo sipampa' nii'ning-koo sipantu'na', ai' teinge taamang tovang-koo pakumau'nunge. Nka ning dii' ninka o'noi kapoo'nanka nkaang moni' paku-anta-kooning-koo apuka'marama ninge dii' eentarampia'. Teka ninka taremaru'nung-koo oraka' noru'meriauka'!

Enang tee ning maamumaramaang dii' beero'dampii'naang beemu'pina', teka ninge dii' manki'antarampiauka'nung nkaang apuapuka'koo, ai' ning tee dii' naing-koo piamomaung, diikaang kapoo'nanka mooni' dovang-pina' oro'nanka deea'. Noru'eriaing, toirekaa'ke tee biuma kapoo' kore'aavaung, teka biumai baurukaa' kapoo' kore'urimaung.

Tee'koo ninge dii' dotumarama pakurampiri ookara kapoo' nkaning dua'ampaing ee'noko napo' boo'koo taura'mari otong dii' pakurampima. Ai' pa ninge dii' aa'na' piaarampimaung-koo ee oki'noo' piaa-koo maku'meriaing?
Dii'koo nii'ninge aa'merimaung, “Masikung manki'antamuriaung-pina' oro'paramaung, teka daua'murima ooampia'na' mooni' nkavumaung.”
Arekee'koo tee'merimaunge? Ai' ninge teing botoarama mooni' eentaraarii'naang botoarampa' ee'noko teing porora mooni' dii'koo nkavaava'.
Ninge tee Taitas botoantu'nung dii'anko bee'naang, nii'nung ninka nii'maiko' ninka. Ee'noko Taitasie mooni' nkareruria', ape' aing? Ai' nee'ke tee narung taung siompampemaung narung noru' ninka.

Enang ning ee' minkumarako dii'ke pa ee' noru'merimang: “Aung Paula' baka pakuaramanoo'koo nii'koo dutakanoo'ke maroita tampa' oro'paraa'naang ee' karomang.” Teka tee' deea', ee mmaikori'. Kumponinge narunge simpe'muaing noru'ansi Karistoo'koo kuunge tee' karomang ookara karananka taaraverima koontariri otorii'naang.

Ai' ninge avoro'antarampimaang tenang dii'anko mera ning piamoa'na' otoriko oorampi'neeng-koo, ee'noko dii' doturariarupeu' ning mora turantampiri dei aing oreng aarumonanka-koo ee' oro'ning-koo: tata'naang, mamairo, peusi'kuma iira, siivenke'nanka, deu' dovang, minkuminkuru, baka kirokaiari oto', ee'noko onou betoveeto' ninka oto'.

Ee'noko napo' ee'koo ning amoromaang: nkaang Kumponinge oomui otoko maia'mo'neenga tenang dii'anko mora napo' biromarako tenang karingai oreng nko-nkonanka mme' sipaavaruko ee'noko bere'aria' teieta biikaang aarumo ku'mi'po'nanka-ita ee' oro'nanka-ita: kaukauro, ee'noko anutua maimaia'na'nko.
Enang tee ning maamumaramaang dii' beemu'pina' beero'dampii'naang. Ookara kapoo' simpe'kooning tavo'erii'naang nerirarira masikee-anta-nupoonge beenaumoi nii'noo' kenaankarai tavo'koo makosi.

Tenang ning dii' ninka nari' kemu'kana' o'noru'nang tero koono-antarampiri tautaurampiru'. Enang taapo' o'noi napo' unampama naurampima aa'pamaang: Ninge tee teing temu'keta oraka' nkoarimaing ee'noko napo' nii'ning nari' nkoariaining mora ookara naro'ka turamparampaing.

Dii'ke taa'ni'anta ning-koo oo-koo piarori otong tee Karistoo' ning-koo kuunge karomaung-koong. Bakei ooverii'naang tenang turamparampainang, ai' tee Karistoo' tee aruaru'oa' dii' koong-antarurima, teka tee tee iri'oi otong dii'koo meu'ke.

Nii'ke tasi'koo ee' ooampiaing, bane teie aruaru'oio' aa'barata'koo bi'aara dupisi'au'nunge, teka tee tee domampari otong Kumponing bakaang iri'ke. Ning teie tee-pina' nari' aruaru'ke tee aruaru'oi otoko'na', teka tee Kumponing bakaang iri'ke ning tee tee ninka nari' o'noremaatoaing dii' koong-anta-koo.

Dii' dii'ka paararariai diikaang domang-eta baito-koo otorimana' masika' oo-koo dii'ka Karistoo' bakaning masika'antarariaina'. Dii'ke ee tasi'peria' tee Pako'pari'nii' Jiisuu' dii'koo otoing? Teka a'noo' parapaara-koo dua'darimaung deeko' dii'koo otoa' tee.
Ee aing, ninge tampa' tasi'meripeu'na' noru'amaung, ai' ning tee parapaara-koo dua'maravaung.

Teka enang tee ning kunsimaramaang Kumponing-koo dii'ke kapoo' orara nkoveriaroo'naang, nantoonge ning kara-okomui-nka-koo makosi-pina' oomaava'naang deea', teeo dii'ke tampara aarumo siomperii'naang piamoi. Ee'noko bane turantampiaruma aruaru'pina' oro'marako ning makosi deeaung-pina' oomaapeu', teka dotumarapeu' dii' tampa' otoriko oorampira.
Ai' ninge tampara aarumo-koo nantoong turamparamparupeu', teka deto puring-antavarampeu' kara masikung siong-koo.
Ning dotumaramaung tenang ning aruaru'pina' oro'maramanang dii' purintariri otoriko diikaang masika'anta-koo, ee'noko nkaang kunsi tee dii' paku-koo nkoamaung dii' petaa'dori otorii'naang.

Tee'koo enang ning taapo' o'noi ane' daarirerompimang tenang ning dii'anko mera iiramoaroo'naang tee ninka iri' Ovoringe amuu'nung ninka. Ai' teie iri' ning amuu'nung tee dii' deto du'anta-koong, dii' kepu'koong deea'.

Asi'namoora'koo aa'dampimang ee mmaikori': Tampara, otoriko! Petaa'doriai. Tautau taaraveri domang kuaa'doriai, ee'noko napo' narung noru' ninka mooa-koo otoriai. Bera tee Kumponing piaa bauko mooa-po'nung dii' ninka nari' otoaing.
Ee'noko tampa' nari' onkeonke'deeriaing Kumponing-koo meekupoong-pina' otori.
Ookarai Kumponing bakaning meekupoonge anke otoromainge biikaang doturotukoong tampa' tang botoaamang dii'anko.
Tee biraanke Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaang ee'noko napo' tee piaa Kumponing bakaang ee'noko tee navunavu Tanuaang Meekung bakaang dii' ninka nari' otomatoaing. Ee', masikung.
Ee aing dii' dootuu'nupoong Kalesia-nameensi' otorimaing osi kante-koo, nii'maikorori'ke ookarai nari' o'norimainge tampa' tampampimaang dii'anko daarirerompima ni'ninka Paula' ninka;
Ning tee Paula' Kumponinge Baumai ee'noko Jiisuu' Karistoo' boo'keta daa'antavuu'nung, tekange ee'nakange koonto' miru'muretu'nung beekaang kara okomui nka-koo, nii'ninge deea'.
Biraanke ee'noko mooa dii'koo otoaing Kumponing Niuma-itaing ee'noko teieta Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo'.
Tee ee'nara niikaang oraka' nkonanka tonta'memuri baka avaru'nung kansi'koong orara aarumo-ita moo'murii'naang enanaroong-koo otomaung-eta Niuma Kumponing meumpui.
Tee-koo daangang otoaing ookara batei boturopa-koo. Ee', ee'na'.

Ning bakei ta'ninansi o'nong dii' da'deng bere'daririo' Kumponing-eta, tampa' bokururu'nung-eta dii' bauta'durii'naang Jiisuu' Karistoo'ke. Tee siperima ta'nina' nii'namurii' kara siong-koo tutumperu' “tampara doorenang” tamperima.
Teka tee nii'namurii' tampara doorenang otoa'. Nantoonge tosiraariko siperu' tampara doorenang Karistoo'koong ave'koo piavoromainge.
Baa tee, bane nii' ai' koosinung˜ paning-eta deeko' daankiampipeu' oovunaare “tampara doorenang” tampampima tero daankiampiru'nung-pina' oro' deeaung, tee aa' tee barakosi'ari otoaing.
Enang napo' unaunantampiri naurampimang: Baa tee naning oovunara kara “doorenang tampara” tampuma daankirurimaung daka'pui tee tenaare tero taaraveru'naare, tee tee ee'nara barakosi'ari otoaing.

Aung arekee', ai' nantoong dotu-antavarama'naang minkuansinunge ai' Kumponing dotu-anta-koonge? Tee aa' nantoong dotu-anta-koong deea'. Nkaang aarumo nantoong dotu-anta narung-koong deeko' ning tee Karistoo' bakaang botovotonaa' deea'.
Dii'ke mmaikori'ke ee' noru'erii'naang piamomaang tee ee'nara doorenang tampara ninge daankiantu'nung tee naning kansi'koong bakaang deea'.
Ai' nantoong-koo baremarava', napo' naninge nau-antamua', nka baka Jiisuu' Karistoo'ke sirapo'uu'nung ning-koo.
Dii'ke ning noru'meri o'nong nkaang urikung otooto' Ju'nung aarumo-koo kuunge o'noko'na';

Ning tee nkanavarang-koo bakei dau basi Ju'nung aarumo-koo nkanavitu-koo. Kaakatauro biikaang pare'naanta aa'na' purimari siompansitaa' teing dootuu'nupoong aa'na' tavarama turamparanko' pesi'arama'naang paaravama;
Aung aa' tee teketa ning-koo kapoo' nkoaru': Tee tee ning ponto'maravaruko Kumponinge tero miru'muu' bakaang kara-okomui-nka deemaraa'naang;
Teketa bokumuu' domaang oparavaung amuu'naang, ee'noko napo' baka bakaang pia siompuitaa' tee Bauring ning-koo sirapo'uu' ninge daankiama'naang tee avitevitunanka-koo;

Tee' nkoarako naning baa tasi'antamuaing besi'ampa' ee'noko Jerusalema'aape mea' teing-anko ning-koo uro'kanoo'ka kara-okovuri nka-nupoong deempariru'ning-anko, teka ning Arebia-nameensi'aape tenkenantu'. Ee'noko napo' dama'ke Damaskas-namono-aape toromaru'.
Teketa beemare'pi masiraani tankinuko Jerusalema'aape napo' toromaru' Siipas, tee nii'na' Piita, beero'ama'naang, ee'noko kivora-ita pa'noko' doong o'nou' tee ninka.
Teka nii'ning kara okovuri nkanuka-koo ooarampa', Jeemisi narung deeko' Ovoring baara'ma'nung ooantu'.
(Aung kapoo' ninge dii' daarirerompimatomaung-koo Kumponing-koo uro'kanoo'ke ning tosimarava'.)
Teketa tee ning aa'ning-aapei meu': Siiria-nameensi' ee'noko Silisia-nameensi'.
Ee'noko tee nii'ninge ning oing oomaava' Karistoo' bakaning dootuu'nupoong-kooninge Judia'nameensi'ka.
Teka tamung teinge ee' nari' taaramau': “Tee aung tee nii' tamuriko'nung enang tee minkunaa masika'antavampimaung daankivumang aa'nung tero turang-koo paaravuko'.”
Ee'noko teinge Kumponing daangampau' ning-koo.
Teketa kivora-ita karenaumo mare' tankinuko Jerusalema'aape meu' napo' Banabas ninka, Taitas nari' bokuansi.

Kumponinge botomuio' nanantu' ee'noko tee doorenang tampara teing-koo Ju'deeaing-koo daankiamaung napo' teing teka nauarantu', miring-po'nupoong naing biikanairu-koo, ee' noru'ama: Aung kapoo' ning pore'momaung nii'ning porora daang deeng-antavaa'neeng.

Nka tee teinge aroo'au' bane nii'ning baka-bokunanka kontevoroio' tee-koo Taitas ni'ninka nari' moretu'nung dopa' toto'pamparuu'nung-koo dootuu' aapearako. Teing tee makensi'navitu nii'maikorori' tamparima maroita kuung porou'ning baakenemaarii'naang tee tampara otooto'koo Jiisuu' Karistoo'ke nii' amuru'nung Moosesi-nung botoi dai'ari oto'keta tonta'antamurima;

Teinge nii' dai'anta-koona' tee' minkumaaru' nii' unaamori o'norining. Nka tee teinge nii' ninka nari' miring-po'nupoonge nkaang tampara doorenang aroo'aara botomaaria' Taitas dopa' toto'koo Kiriki'nung deemparako, Ju'deeaung.
Oki'noo' aroo' o'noria', bane batei oki'namu'koo. Tee kara koonto' doorenang tampara-koong orari-anta-koo taura'parampia' dii' noru'darampima.

Teing tee miring-po'nupoong deempariri kapoo' deea' ning-koo, ai' ookara teing nari' oro'nuka Kumponing-koo. Nka teinge tee miring-po'nupoonge nii' ninka nari' o'noru'ninge kapoo' nii'ning be'nu'antavai minkuaava' ninge minkuantu'ning-koo daua.

Bakei otoa'. Teinge tee ning noru'mau' Kumponinge ning aroo'mui botomuu'nung tee doorenang tampara okomui bereng-antavama'naang teing-koo Ju'deeaing-koo tee' nari' Piita oko-antavura botovuu'na' Ju'nupoong-koo.
Ai' ning tee Kumponinge iri' amuio' tampa' mintoomarako teing-koo Ju'deeaing-koo tasi'mau', tee' nari' Piita kara-oko-antavuio' tampa' mintoomparako'na' Ju'nupoong-koo.
Tee avuavu' Kumponinge deing tasi'paama Jeemisi dovange, Siipas
Teketa tee narung kapoo' masikung nko-koo naumaaretu' nee'ke, teing ata'oinku pakuarampee'naang, tee' ee'na' aa'na' piamou'na'ke.
Teka tenang Siipas Antioki'navuntu'koo pou'nang ninge tee duta-koo karavama turampantu' kiimata-koo makosina' nkoario'.

Ee' otong: Nii'ning nantoong mme' poroaruko Jeemisi-ankoita Siipas Ju'deeaing ninka tampa' nari' taamanaako'. Teka te' tavo'ariko dopa'toto'navitu-pina' mantompuri dama'du-aape kai'aru' ee'noko tonta'aru' teing tero navuariko'ning-ankoita.
Ee'noko tee' nkoarako teinge nii'ninge Ju'nupoonge Karistoo' siompaako'ninge tampara doorenang-koong aarumo nari' daka'pai siompau' tee. Ee'noko aa'nou' Banabas nari' barampau' tevunge oravunge.

Teka tenang tampa' siompaavaruko tee aarumo tampara doorenang-koong ninge ooamira Piita turampantu' ookara-koo dutakanoo'ka ee' minkuama, “Bane da' Ju'nupoong-koonge niikaang aarumo sipei Ju'deeaung-pina' nkoraramaung. Tee' nkorarakotaa' arekee' enang tororari bere'antaverimang Ju'deeaing Ju'pina' otoroo'naang?” Tee'pantu'.

Aming-koo, nna' bane nii' Ju'koo meu'ke ponto'mariru'ning Ju'deeaing oreng-koo deea', teka nii'ke noru'ampiri otong Kumponinge naning koonto' tampuaung Moosesi-nung boto siompumaung-koo, teka Jiisuu' Karistoo' masika'antavumaung-koo deeko'.

Ee'noko nii'ke Jiisuu' Karistoo' baitoampiru' Kumponing ninka naroomariri o'norii'naang Karistoo' masika'antavampimaung-koo, boto siompampimaung-koo deea'. Ee'koo, naning otoa' boto siompumaung-koo Kumponinge koonto' tampupeu'nung.

Enang tee Kumponinge koonto'nuka tammuriaina' besi'ampiri Karistoo' bakanavung siompampima nii'namurii' aarumo-koo basi-antamuriko deeko', Moosesi-nung botoi taura'puaung-koo, tee-koo aarumo-koo arekee' minkuampii'naang nii'ke? Ee' ee minkuampii'naang, “Karistoo'ke orara aarumo-koo basi-antamuring.”? A, tee' aa' deea' bakei.
Ninge oong boto aarempansinung sira'marapeu' napo' daa'amira tee aarumo boto sionge domang-koong, tee tampara doorenang daankiama pesi'ankotaa' napo' sipamira tee.

Nka tee ninge daa'ampauka'nung, ai' ninge tee Moosesi-nung boto siompamaa' noko teie teka totora'muu' nkaang sionsiong-koo ning boo'koo tuumpimura. Tee' ooansirai'nange bere'maru' Karistoo'koo bi'antamari tee ninka aa'barata'koo tero moontu'nung-pina' o'noi Kumponing-ankoi domamaraa'naang.

Tee ning nari' Karistoo' ninka aa'barata'koo bi'mari moontu'nung deemaritaa' enang tee domaang ning-koo kuunge otoing koonto' ning-koong deea', teka tee-koo Karistoo' kuunge domampari otong ning-koo. Ee'noko nkaang otooto' enang o'nomaung anke kansi'koo Kumponing Bauring masika'antavansi domamari o'nomaung, ee'nara piaamura avaru'nung ning-koo boo'paraa'naang.

Kumponinge naning koonto' tampupeu'nung dei aarumo boto sionge domang-koong paaravuko deeko', Karistoo'nung boo' tamunsi'nung deemparapeu'. Tee'koo temurii' aarumo napo' daa'ampauka'nung Kumponinge avusiro'ari tampa' nkomuu'na' tamunsi'nung deempara'neeng-koo.

Dii' Kalesia-nupoong bakei kanukanu'nanka! Arekee'koo dii'ke kara masikung siperi, ai' pa naninge doomaruringe? Nii'ke tee dii' naurarampiru'nung Jiisuu' Karistoo' baru' aa'na' siraka'antararampima koonto' dii'ke oovering-pina' tasi'antarampiri aa'barata'koo bi'ari dii'koo boo'paru'na'.

Aung io' kapoo' narung dii'ke naumerii'naang: Dii'ke ee tee Tanuaang Meekung Moosesi-nung Boto siomperimaung-koo nkaveru'nung? A, Moosesi noru'eria' nkaveru', tee Jiisuu'koong doorenang tampara taaraverira baitorariru'nung-koo.

Aa'na' kanu'dariri ampa'doru'nunge Tanuaang Meekung nkaveru'na', ee'nara nkaverira domang neraka'dariru'nung? Tee domang neraka'dariru'na' ee tamung mono bakaang iri'ke Tanuaang Meekung-eta taapo'ke dupeverii'naang noru'erimang?
Teing kapoo' ivekeng tero mantontariru'ning enang ee tamunsi'nanka deemparing? Tee' nkoarapeu' daana'?

Tee ee'nara dii' Tanuaang Meekung avusiro'ari aruru'nung ee'noko kapoo' ta'nimpaarii' purinto'nanka tavo'antarerurikoo'. Enang naumeriaing tee ee Moosesi-nung Boto siomperimaung-koo tee' biraankerurikoo' ai' doorenang tampara taaraverira baitorariru'nung-koo? Dii' aa' baitorariru'nung-koo tee' biraankerurimaung.
Eebaraami' tee'ke, Daari Meekunge aa'pumana'koo:
“Kumponing bakaang maraka-anta masika'antavuio' ee'noko Kumponinge bakaang masika'anta oovura naning koonto'nung tampuu'.”
Tee'koo enang tasi'periaing Eebaraami' baurukaa' masikeng teing nantoong masika'anta-po'nupoong.

Teroita daariari otomaung Kumponinge koonto'nuka tampuriaina' teing avitevitu Ju'deeaing baitoariko. Daari Meekunge naumurimaung Kumponinge Eebaraami'koo tee tampara doorenang daankivuu'na' aa'puu'noo'ka:
“Ookarai avitevitue da'koo biraanke nkavaavaing.”
Aung ee' miru'ari otong: Nantoong Kumponing-nung maraka-anta masika'antavaamaing tee, nari' biraanke nkavaamaung Eebaraami' ninka, masika'anta-po'nung ninka.
Teka baata teing Moosesi-nung Boto siong-koo mantomparimaing teing bakaang barakosi'koo kuung otorong, ai' Daari Meekunge ee' minkuvumaung:
“Baa tee naning Moosesi-nung boto siompui tee' nari' keperuu'aravauka'nung ookara batei-koo daariari otoina' pukevui tee barakosi'nii'.”
Ee'noko napo' ee' sira'pari otong tee naning Kumponing ninka naroomparavarupeu' Moosesi-nung boto siompumaung-koo Daari Meekunge napo' aa'puu'na'koo:
“Naning tee Kumponing baitovuko koonto' tampuainung domamparavaing.”
Tee'koo Moosesi-nung boto sionavung makotua'navung deempari otong baito-aapenavung deearuko ee' minkuaramana'koo:
“Naninge tee boto siompui nkovuaing tee teing nko-nkonanka nkovuaining-koo domam-paravaing.”
Teka Karistoo'ke moo'muru' nii' tee boto-koong barakosi'keta bakaang monoi barakosi' kune'ura nii' pari'antamurima, tee' Daari Meekunge minkuvumana' aa'puma,
“Ookara barakosi'po'nupoong koi'koo bi'aariaining.”

Jiisuu' Karistoo'ke tee' tora'puu' tee Kumponing-nung biraanke Eebaraami'koo minkuvuu'nung Ju'deeaing-koo poo'naang, tee-koo baitomarimaung-koo nii'ke Tanuaang Meekung nkavampiaing, tee bauta' maraka-antamuru'nung.

Mmaikori' ee, enang kara miru'po'nung naurampii'naang nii' doong kante nkomarimana'koong. Noru'eriaing, kapoo' kara naninka kenaankai naroompurepeu'nung, ee'noko marakavareko narunge toto'puarupeu' ai' be'nu'uarupeu' bane naninka kansi'koonaanka marakavareko, ee'noko Kumponing bakaang maraka-anta toto'koo makosi deea' bakei.

Enang tee Daari Meekung-koo otoina' tee Kumponinge Eebaraami' maraka-antavuretu' ba'dompeng ninka nari', ba'dompeng isi'isimpuaing. Daari Meekunge ee' minkuvua', “dakaning isi'isinanka ninka nari',” mmau'koo tampuma, teka narung minkuvuma ee' minkuvuu', “dakaang isi'ising ninka nari'.”
Ee'noko tee isi'ising tee Karistoo' ee'nara miru'ari otong.

Tee aung kapoo' ninge miru'ansinung: Teie botoi toto'puarupeu' dama'ke tavo'kuu'nunge mare' narung daaku'keta beenaumo kivora divu'kuio'. Tee Kumponinge kara naroong-antavui tero pinka'uu'nung ee'noko Moosesi-nung Botoi tee maraka-anta daang deeng-anta-koo makotua'.

Nii'ke tevung boto sionavung siompampikotaa' Kumponing ninka naroomaripeu'nung dei tee ee' sira'parapeu'nung: tevung nii'na' oro'navung Kumponinge naroong-anta nka-koo, Eebaraami'ke siompuu'navung-pina' deea', ai' teie tee tamung Kumponing bakaang maraka-anta masika'antavuko Kumponinge bauta'ui tee ninka nari' naroonii' tampuu'.

Enang aming-koo Moosesi-nung boto otong? Tee aa' tee oraka'nko otoko avuru'nung boto aarempaara oraka' nkoaamana' tasi'parii'naang. Kumponinge tee' nari' oto'koo miru'uu' bera tee isi'ising, Karistoo', tavo'kuainoo'ke basi, ee'nara tero maraka-antavuu' nung. Tee boto tee koosinunankai po'antavau'nung Moosesi nauaama kara-pare' Kumponing ee'noko teing nantoong-koo meu'ke.

Teka tenang maraka-anta Kumponinge Eebaraami' avuu'nang Kumponinge naning otoaruko kara-pare' Eebaraami' koonto' nauvuu'. Tee'koo napo' tee maraka-anta deu basi Moosesi-nung boto-koo, ai' boto tee tamung nantoong-koo otong.

Enang ee Moosesi-nung botoi Kumponing bakaang maraka-anta toto'pui otong? A, tee' aa' deea' bakei. Boto tee kapoo' nantoong domampuripeu'nung-pina' oro' otoi dei tee koomariri o'noripeu' tee boto siompampima.

Teka Daari Meekunge tasi'antamuru' nii' ookara orara aarumo-koo kuunge dai'mariri paapaa'marimaing, boto sionavung-eta bere'marira Karistoo'koo baitomariaina' Kumponing ninka naroomarii'naang. Tee' nkomariko deeko' Kumponinge dupe-antavuaing tee bakaang maraka-anta koonto'nuka tampuriaing-koong teing masika'antavaamaing.
Tenang masika'antanavung oro'paravaruko nii' botoi naro'ka parammuri o'noriko' dai'muritaa'nange bera masika'antanavung oro'paravainoo'ke basi.
Tee boto tee niikaang nau-anta-pina' otoko' Karistoo'anko po'antamurii'naang masika'antanavunge Kumponing ninka naroomarii'naang.
Teka enang tee masika'antanavung oro'pario' nii' tee enang botoi tanatamuria'.
Enang tee Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo kuunge dii' ookara Kumponing baurukaa' deentaririning teie diikaang masika'antai.
Dii' ookara ntong-koo minkie meeka'anta nkaverima Karistoo' bakaang tare-koo kuung poru'ning teing Karistoo'naunturi otoriaining, siivenke'deeria'.
Ai' tee Karistoo'koo siivenke' otoa' ee'pina': Ju'nung ee'noko Ju'deeaung, botovotonaa' nuka ee'noko osikaiaang, nii'noo' donkaani napo' manikuma. Dii' teing navitu tee-koo kuung otori.
Ee'noko enang Karistoo'koo kuung poring-koo dii' tee' nari' okoruriaing tee barenku Eebaraami'ketaing isi'ising-koong Kumponinge maraka-antavuu'nung.
Tee ee'pina' minkuamaang, tee naning oki'nara barenku okovupeu'nung tee tenang oki'na'pari botovotonaa' ninka nari' basira, bane teie ookara-koo dau basiari barenku okovuaing panka'parara.
Tenang oki'na'pari otoko tee nii'ninge tanatavai otoko otong tee kavokavoro-nanka bakaning ee'noko tee aung tooto' bera batei baumai miru'uu'noo' basi.
Nii' tee' nari'ke, tenang Kumponinge oko-antamuriainang batei mme' tavo'kuaruko kapoo'nanka kanto'puaing kansi'aapening-koo bi'mariri aavu'mariko'˜ barenku kong-koo.
Teka tenang batei dupevui makotuio' Kumponinge bauring botovuu';

Tee ponto'aru' nani-koo manikuma-koo. Moosesi-nung boto-koo kuunge ponto'aru' moo'urii'naang teing nantoong Moosesi-nung botoi kuung deempuri otoroko'ning nii' baurukaa' oko-antanii'nuka o'norii'naang.
Tee'koo dii' okovui baurukaa' deentariko Kumponinge Bauring-koong Tanuaang botovuu' niikaang domang-koo kuunge taa'ni'poi karantamuriko˜ dotumarima aa'pampii'naang, Mma' ee, Mma'.
Tee tee enang Kumponinge tampa' nkoruio' da' tee enang bautara-ita bakeraring ee'noko tee da' bauring deentaring, ee'noko bauring deeko' tee da' barenku okoruinung.
Tero tee tenang dake Kumponing noru'earuko'nang da' tee dai'dari otoko' teinge kapoo'nanka makotua'nanka kumponinanka deeng-anta-koo.

Teka enang dake Kumponing noru'eing, ai' aa' da' Kumponinge noru'dui. Tee'koo enang aming-koo da' napo' tororari teing kapoo'nanka kanto'puaing ninka dai'dari otoo'naang, teing ninka toomo sitovuru'nanka, aruaru'nankai ee'noko aavu'arimaing?
Dii'ke tee temurii'koo aa'ning siompererimaung doong a'munte'mung, kaara averaa'teveraa' ee'noko mare' amatemare' Kumponing ninka naroontariaina' besi'erima.
Dii'ke ning ariri'antamering ee' noru'amira, “Ning dee'ma dii' paku-koo tamung pore'mou'.”
Mmaikori' ee, ning boto-ita taapo' tonta'maring tee' dii' taapo' otoriko'na'. Tee' nari' bere'darira o'noriaing.
Dii'ke noru'eri otong tenang tee siipai siipa-antamuio' datemarara o'noi dii'koo tutung daankimaru', nka dii'ke ning oraka' nkomeria'.
Bane siipa-koo oraka' o'noi pore'antarampiko maareroria' ning-koo, baru' oraka' noru'meria', teka bakei Kumponing-nung koosinung˜pina' maneena' nkomeru', Jiisuu' Karistoo' nkoveripeu'na' makosina'.
Arerai tee biraanke ning-koo enang? Aa'nung dii'ke piaamerima dapi' duta banke'darima ameriko' pakumerii'naang.
Ning enang ee dii'ke munte'merimang kara masikung naurampiru'nung-koo?
A, tamung munte'meriauka'nung teinge navuraariko dii' orari-anta-koo. Ning-ankoita siivenke'antaraariko dii'ke teing daangamperererii'naang piavoromang.
A'noo' nantoonge dii' masika' paku-koo navuraariko deeko' ookara-koo tampa' ee'noko ning dii' ninka nari' o'noko naro' deea'.
Ee mmaikori', ning pareaava'naang sisikeeravoromana' sisikeeramomang dii'koo, dii' napo' ponto'anta-koo Karistoo' napo' dii'koo domang-koo tampa' taa'ni'anta-koo bera taa'ni'poainoo'ke basi.
Piaana' ning tee dii' ninka nari' o'noria'. Dii' makosina' kara-koo piamomaang, nka enang papaaramaring diikaang aarumo-koo isipo' otoriko.
Naumeaing dake Moosesi-nung boto-koo kuung oto'koo piaromaunge, tee boto ee taaraveaung dake?

Daari Meekunge ee' minkuvumaung: Eebaraami' baurinketa kenaankara otoreko', narung teni Seera' bauring, teni ovorinani, Eebaraami' ba'aang. Ee'noko narung teni Eekaa' bauring, teni tamung Seera' bakaang botovotonaa', dai'nisinani.

Teka tee teni dai'nisinani bauring tee Eebaraami' mono-namenge noru'ari nampuio' tee tooto' bauring paraevuu'nung tee barenku nka-koo makosi deea', ee'noko tee teni bisiira dai'arava'nani bauring tee Eebaraami' Kumponinge miru'uio' nampuu'nung-koo maraka-anta siompuio' tee tooto' bauring paraevuu'nung tee barenku nka-koo makosi.

Aung tee minkunaa paara-anta-po'nung. Anaanka manikumaara tee kenaanka kara naroong-anta Kumponing-etaing siong-antavaresi otong. Navung naroong-antanavung tee Moosesi-nung boto sionavung, Sainai-namii-koo nauvuru'navung. Arebia-nupoonge temii Sainai-namii tee Eekaa'namii tampaamaung. Ee'noko teni Eekaa', Eebaraami' ba'aang dai'nisinani, teni Jerusalema'navuntu' miru'ari otong, Ju'nupoong biikaang osi pankaing.

Ee'noko teing Ju'nupoonge Moosesi-nung boto siong-koo paaravaama Kumponing ninka naroompariaining-pina' noru'arimainge biukoree'ai otoromanamono temono. Ee'noko teing teing temono baurukaa' tee boto-koo dai'nisinuka deempariri otorong.
Teka nii' niikaang osi pankaing Jerusalema' paning-koong, ee'noko temono tee Moosesi-nung botoi dai'arava'namono.
Daari Meekunge Jerusalema' paning-koong dama'ke oro'paravaing teronung-koo deto basi tampuu' manikuma-pina' kara nauvuma aa'puu'na'koo:

“Doturaravaing da' bisiira pareai. Ta'nina' duuru'kiai bane da' tooto' mantompeai. Ai' Kumponinge da' teni daka-pina' otomai maraka-antaruing teni kura'nari' bioko deentaraa'naang teni ba'ung-po'nani puru'ei.”
Mmaikori' ee, nii' enang dai'arava'nani bauring pina', Aisake' pina' o'norining, maraka-antanavunge ponto'nii'nuka.

Ee'noko tee tee' nari' tee tooto' mono siompui ponto'aru'nunge oraka' nkovuko'na' tee Aisake', Tanuaang Meekung bakaang iri'ke ponto'aru'nung, tee' nari' enang nkomaarimaung nii' teinge mono-namenge noru'ariri Kumponing ninka naroong-koo paaravaamainge.
Teka teie Daari Meekunge arekee' minkuvumaung?
“Bata'eaing teni dai'nisinani ee'noko tee bauring, ai' tee dai'nisinani bauring tee barenku okovuauka'nung tee ninka teni dai'aravai bauring ninka nari'.”
Tee tee enang, ee mmaikori', nii' dai'nisinani baurukaa' deea' teka dai'aravai baurukaa' nii'.
Karistoo' tee nii' unaa-antamuru' dotumarii'naang unaamori. Tee'koo naurampimang, ima'dariri donkoniriai, ee'noko doonko napo' kinkiniriauka' dai'nisinuka ninka nari' pake'deeri.
Enang ninge Paula'ke bakei naurampimang, dii' teing Kumponing ninka naroontarii'naang piarorima dopa' toto'darima boto sionavung aroo'erima deeko', Karistoo'navung siperimaang pakururipeu'navung.
Napo' unantampiri nauramping ninge dii', ookara dopa' toto'navung aroo'eriaining dii' tee ootukunung boto Moosesi-nung pukeveri siong-koo dai'dariri otoriaining.

Aa'noo'naang, Karistoo'keta tee' toto'darii'naang dii' ee'ning Kumponing-ankoi koonto'nuka deentarii'naang piarorimaing tee boto siomperima, ee'noko dua'daririning-pina' otorii'naang bakaang avusiro'ari moo'navung-eta.
Teka tee Tanuaang Meekunge pakumurio' baitomarima te'mung koonto'nuka taa'ni'moriaina'mung-koo nemariri o'noring.
Nii' Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo kuung o'noritaa' dopa' toto' ee'noko toto' deeaung kapoo' deea', teka teie baitoi deeko' piaa ninka nkoaramaung.
Dii' tee deikoo'koo tero tampa' kua'dariko'ning-pina' otoru'ning, enang baie napo' toto'antarurio' tee kara masikung sionavung siperi?
Tee temurii' kara dii' daang aroo'antaruru'naare tee dii' bokururu'nung bakaang kara deea'.
Tee-pina' kapoo' oki'noo' dera'ke ootukunung dera'antavupeu'na' teie naninge dii' nko-antaruru'nung.
Masika' noru'ansi otong Ovoring-koo o'noi, dii'ke nkaang noru'koo taapo'ke nii'na' noru'eriauka'nung ee'noko baa tee naning dii' orari-antarurinung tee kiimata nkavuaing aa'nung tee ninge noru'ampa'.

Ee mmaikori', nii'ninge aa'maamaung, “Paula'ke dopa' toto'navung daankivumaung.” Nka tee' deea', ai' ning aming-koo oraka' nkomaamang tevung boto sionavung-koo baukoree'nukai? Ninge tee' daankiansi dei tee daang-antavampeu' tee doorenang Jiisuu'ke nii' domaang moo'muru'nung-koong, aa'barata'koo boo'pari boto bakaang taretare bakevura, ee'noko teinge Ju'nupoonge too'dempaavarupeu'.
Maiko' teing dopa'toto' siompaama dii' pore'antaraarimaing avitoitoi-koo bii'ka biikaang mono totototo'paripeu'nung.

Dii' mmaikori' unaarori oto'koo bokururu'ning, teka unaarori oto'koo otori diikaang mono bakaang pia narung siong-koo taura'dariauka', teka piaareerima pakureeriai dii' nii'ning-koo botovotonaa'nuka noru'dariri.
Ookara botonanka Moosesi-nung tee nanaare-koo dupeari otong ee' minkuvumanaare-koo:
“Dake tee naning da'koo due'nung daka piaararamana' nari' tee' piaaveaing.”
Teka oraka' nkoreerima orari-antareeri'neeng dii'ka.
Teka enang aa'dampimang, Tanuaang Meekunge naururiaina' siomperiai ee'noko mono bakaang pia siomperiauka'.

Ai' mono bakaang piai tee Tanuaang Meekung too'dempui otong ee'noko Tanuaang Meekung bakaang piai mono too'dempui otong, ai' anaanka tee turampeeremanaanka ee'noko dake kapoo' daka nkovepeu'nung otoa' tenaanka-koo narung taaravearura.
Dake Tanuaang Meekung taaravera siompeaing deeko' da' tee boto-koo kuung otoa'.

Mono bakaang nko-nko ee'pina' sira'pari otong: nampeesi orari, kaukauro-nko, noru' ku'mi', maimaia'na' nko, kumponing tositosinanka siong, dopa-nko, oraka' noru', turang-nko, orarunsi ninka munte', iira bauko, mosii', kara-koo tata', siivenke', mamaironto', purinto'naru'ke kanu', tooreere dovang;
Ninge enang tautaurampimang tero tautaurampiru'na': Teing tee' oro'nanka aarumo nkoaamaing Kumponing bakaang muu' aarenaavauka'nung barenku oko-koo.
Teka tee sinang Tanuaang Meekung-etaing aung ee' oro': piaa, doturotu, mooa, da'deng iira deeaung, tampa' nko, avusiro', masika'anta, banainge oto', ee'noko baka pinka'ari oto';
Aing pote-koong boto otoa' bakei.
Ee'noko teinge nantoong Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaninge tee biikaang mono-aapena' noru' aa'barata'koo taakavau' teing bakaning karakaraa'nanka domange etuvurimaing ninka.
Tanuaang Meekung-koo kuunge domamariri o'norimaung deeko', tee' nari' Tanuaang Meekung ninka nari' nanampimaatoaing siompampiri.
Nii' kirokainku-pina' o'noriauka', ereanameereauka' ee'noko mamairomeeriauka'.

Mmaikori' ee, dii'ke nii'nung narung oraka' nkoarako ooverira deeko' dii' Tanuaang Meekung siomperimainge tampa' pakueri koong-antaveriaing dooroomperi, tarerariri dii' tee' nari' napo' dua'dari'neenga.
Naruna' naruna' pakureeriai manki'koo. Tee' nkorarima dii'ke dupe-antaveriaina' tee Karistoo'nung boto.
Nii'nung narunge aa'pumaato'neeng, “Ning narung kapoo',” nka tee kapoo'pina' oro'parava'. Tee' nkoarama tee ee'nara baka tosi-antavarapeu'.
Nii'nung naning ninka mintarama doturarama daangantaravauka', teka tutung norunoru'daravaing dakaang nko-nko-koo, tampa' otoing deeko' ee'na'koo doturoturaravai makosi.
Kumponinge kantemuri manki' nka-koo bamuru'. Tee'koo daangantaria' piaareeri pakureerimaatoai.
Aa'noaing tee naning dii' Kumponing bakaang kara nau-antarurimaung pakueri moo'eriainge.
Nii'namurii' onoue tosiruriauka', ai' Kumponing tee daang-pina' oro'anta deea'. Tee-koo kapoo'koo naninge keempuaing-koo tee tee-koo ee'nung-koo sinang kavuaing.

Dake dakaang mono narung dotu-anta-koo noru'ei keenkiaing deeko' dake teieta mono-ita orari-anta kaveaing simpe'muriaina'mung. Ee'noko dake Tanuaang Meekung dotu-anta-koo noru'ei keenkiaing deeko' dake teieta Tanuaang Meekung-eta domaang oparavaung kaveaing.
Tee tee enang kakarua'moriauka'nung tampa' nko-koo dama'ke makosinaveraa'koo tampa' kavampiaina' kontemoriauka'nung deeko'.
Tee'koo enang batei oto'memuri tampa' nkoarampiai ookara nantoong, baru'noo' teing nii'maia'kooning masika'antanava-koo kuung otoromaing.
Ooveriko enang daari-nko pari'amira daari pankaveroveroi' narunge daarirerompimang nkaang birenge taa'ni'antamari.

Nantoong Kumponing ninka naroomparii'naang Karistoo' aa'barata'koo boo'paru' baitoaara daankiampiko teing Ju'nupoong iiravoromaung dopa'toto' minkuampiaruko, Moosesi-nung boto dovang ninka. Tee'koo nii'ninge eturaarimaung dopa' toto'koo tampa' oro'parii' naang Ju'nupoong-koo. Maroita, Ju'nupoonge turampaariaroo'naang teing.
Teinge ee'ninge dopa' toto'parira boto bii'ka siompaavaunge, tamung dii' ee'ning dopa' toto'koo piavoromaung dii' tee' nkorariko miring pankaing nkavaava'naang.

Nka ning temurii' aarumo piamoaung bakei, Karistoo' aa'barata'koo boo'navung masika'antavamaung-koo deeko', miring pankaing nka-koo makosi. Tevunge kansi'nung aarumo ninka siivenke'meeresi aa'nong kansi'nung aarumo taakavaring-pina' otong ning-koo ee'noko ning taakamaring-pina' o'nong tee-koo.
Tenaankai aa'noko dopa' toto' ee'noko dopa' toto' deeaung kapoo' basi-antavureaung, teka napo' neraka'pari nkonii'ke deeko' makosi.
Mooa ee'noko piaa dii'koo otoaing aung ee'nara aarumo minkuansinung siomperimaing-koo, teing Isireeli masikeng-koo Kumponing bakanavitu-koo.
Enang-eta deto ning naninge pore'antamuauka'nung, ai' ninge tee nkaang mono-koo Karistoo'koong taa'menanka taa'ni'anta-pina' kompansi o'nong.
Dii' mmaikori', tee biraanke niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaang diikaang tanuaang ninka nari' otomatoaing.
Masikung.

Aung ane' karavoto˜ ninge Paula'ke Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaang kara-okomui-nkai Kumponinge miru'muio' dii' bakaning meekupoong Epesesie otorimaing daarirerompimang, dii' ee'ning Karistoo'koo baitorarimaatomaing.
Biraanke ee'noko mooa dii'koo otoaing Kumponing Niuma-itaing ee'noko teieta Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo'.

Tampara tampampiaing tee-koo tee Kumponing ee'noko Bauma teie niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo'ke, tee ee'nara Karistoo'koo kuunge biraankemuru' ookara biraankenankai Tanuaang Meekung-etaning paning-koo otoromainge.
Aa'nong teroita kansi' mme' pupu'aravaruko-ita miru'muru' Karistoo'koo kuung o'noritaa' meeka'mariri o'norii'naang tuumpimaria' tee-koo dutakanoo'ke.
Tee tee piaamuritaa' miru'muru' baurukaa' deemarii'naang Jiisuu' Karistoo'ke makosi-antamurio' baka bakaang piai, maroita.
Teie tee' nkomuru' daangampampiaina' tee-koo avuavu' maneenung-koo Bauring Piaaru'koo kuunge avusiro'ari amuru'nung-koo.
Karistoo'ke bakaang erenge moo'murira makosi-antamuriko Kumponinge niikaang oraka' nkonanka tonta'memurira unaa-antamuru'nung;
Tee'koo bakei aa'na' maanto' bakaang piaae nii'koo piampuu'nunge,
tee ee'nara bakaang mataue tavo'antavuu' bakaang noru' ninka Kumponinge sirapo'antamemurima kapoo' makensi'nung teie tavo'anta-koo piavoko' Karistoo'koo kuunge.
Tee aung ee'nara: Uripo'keta teie marovuko' tee Karistoo'koo ookara naro'urii'naang bateinang makotuko aa'ning paning-nupoong ee'noko kansi'nupoong, ookara-koo bore' deempari.
Ookara kapoo' tee Kumponinge matauvuma miru'umana' nkoaramaung, ee'noko nii' tee'ke Kumponinge bakaning deemarii'naang miru'muru' Karistoo'ankoi tutuntomaa tampuu'na'.
Bakaang matau ee': Nii' urompiri Karistoo' nempampimainge nantoong daangang-antavarampiaing bakaang meenasi-koo.

Ee'noko dii' ee'ning nari'ke, Karistoo'ankoi baitorariru'ning kara masikung taaraverira tee doorenang tampara dii' domanturiaing-koong. Ee'noko bakaning deentariko date'antaruri Tanuaang Meekung aruru' bakaning avurii'naang maraka-antavuu'nung.

Tee Tanuaang Meekung nii' amuru'nung tee tasi'anta-koo nii'ke nkavampiaing ootukunung barenku tero naumuru'na'. Tee kompampirio' Kumponinge asi'na'mung dupe-antavui oko-antamuriaing, nii'ke tee daangampampiaina' meenasi-po'nung.
Tee'koo ninge taaravamira dii' masika'anta oto'deruring Ovoring Jiisuu'koo ee'noko diikaang piaa ookara Kumponing bakaning meekupoong-koo,
tenang-eta deto taararampira dotumaramaung kunsi-koo tantampima.

Ee' eentamaramaung: Teie Kumponinge niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaange, Baumai Meenasi Okovenunge aruriaing tee Tanuaang matau dii'koo siraka'antavuaing bakaang kara-koo miru'noo' dii'ke tasi'peria'naang tee Kumponing.

Ning eentamaramaung diikaang domang-koong dutai siraka'antaruriko dii'ke tasi'perii'naang tee barenku bokumurira bamuru'nung, ee'noko bakei aa'na' maanto' meenasi-po'ning otoromana' teing biraankenanka bakaning-koo meekupoong-koo maraka-antavuru'ning tankee'eeaining.
Ee'noko napo' eentamaramaang tasi'perii'naang iri' aa'na' pankaing nii'koo baitomarimaing-koo sipuing, paaranang-koo makosi deeaung.
Tee aa'nung iri' baukoni'ke kompui Karistoo' boo'keta daa'antavura tampavine-koo Kumponing-koo ba'nang-antavuu' paning-koo Ovoring-antavui.

Teenoo' Ovorinoo' tee deu basi anantenaung-koo: ookara tare-nupoong, pankainuka, purinto'po'nupoong, ovontung ee'noko ootukunung amutemurii' miring-po'nupoong, enanariong ee'noko dama'nariong napo' nari'.

Tee tee Kumponinge ookara kapoo'nanka Karistoo'koong kau'koo boong sipuma Karistoo' tee bore' deeng-antavuu' ookara kapoo'nanka-koo dootuu'nupoong tampa' pakuvuriaina', teing tee bakaang mono makosinuka.
Ee'noko tee-pina' bore' mono ninka be'nu'ura dupearapeu'na' tee' nari' Karistoo' dupe-anta baka dupearavaing ootukuarara.
Nii'nang tee dii' doori otoriko' boto-toto' ee'noko oraka'nko nkoverima. Tee' nkoverima kansi'kooning biikaang aarumo narung siomperiko'.
Sietani' siomperiko', ovonturi biikaang bore' auvi'au-eta bakaang muu' tareaamaing, tee ee'nara Kumponing siomeevanuka-koo meu'ke mintoomparamaung.

Nii' ookara tee'ke tero niikaang orara aarumo-koo amarima karaa' dovange boo'koo niikaang mono ee'noko onou piavoko'na' nari' siompampiko'ning. Tee tee nii' domang oraka' o'norikotaa' Kumponing-nung kiimata kompampiaining akoing-pina' nari'.
Teka teie Kumponinge piaae maanto'ke aa'na' piaamurikotaa' bane nii' boto toto'ke moompiri o'noriko domang-antamuru' Karistoo' ninka nari';
Tee tee Kumponing bakaang avusiro'ke tee' domamuru'.
Ee'noko domamurira Karistoo' ninka nari' napo' daa'muru' nari' tare-nupoong o'norii'naang tee ninka paninaumariri.
Aing ookara kapoo'nanka tampa' nkomurima tavo'antavuu' tee-koo Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo dama'navarang nau-anta-koo bakaang avusiro'ke maanto'ari otomana' paaranang-koo makosi deeaung.
Ai' Kumponinge avusiro'ari domang-anta masika'antaveru'noo' deeko' domantariru'ning, dii'ka deea', bauta'durima.
Kapoo' nkoveriko tee' domanturia' maku'koo. Maroita, naning daangampara'neeng-koo.
Kumponinge tee nii' o'norina' nari' nkomuru'. Teie Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaning deemuri nkomuru' tampara nko-nko nkoevompimaa'noo'naang o'nori tero miru'muru'na'.

Tee'koo tero oraka' otoriko'noo'koo ampa'doriauka'nung. Dii' teroita Ju'deea', dopa' toto'dariaruko'ning, tamunsi'nupoong tantaariko'ning, a'noo' teing tamung dau naro' dopa' toto'ke meeka'antavarima.

Ampa'doriauka'nung tero tee dii' Karistoo'koong noru' otoriaruko', Isireeli-nupoong-eta taapo' otoriko'ninge, Kumponinge kara maraka-antavui naroompuu'na'koo damisimainkue, kansi'koo naro' bi'dariri domaang isikung nkana' noru' otoa', Kumponing pakurupeu'nung otoa'.
Teka enang dii' tee teroita Pako'pari'nii' domanturira tareruriaing-koong ninka tapo'darira Kumponing-anko po'antarurining bakaang erenge tero taapo' isipo' otoriko'noo'keta.
Tee tee Karistoo' tee niikaang mooa-nko. Teie tee naro'ka tapo'muring aa'ning Ju'nupoong ee'noko Ju' deeaing.

Bakaang mono boo'koo avaru'noo'ke teie tee teteva'uu' tee ku'nung turanturang-koong siivenke'muri otoko'nung nii'. Moosesi-nung boto teka bakevui, mono etu-koong. Aing ookara kapoo' ee' oro' nkovuu'ning nerakariong nkovurii'naang aa'ning-eta Ju'nupoong ee'noko Ju'deeaing teie baka naro'kavurira pinau-anta-koo.
Aa'barata'koo boo'paru'noo' tee turanturang bake-antavuu'naang naro'kamurira ookavitura Kumponing-koo navitu-pina'.

Teketa' pora teie karantavurima˜ daankivuu' tee doorenang tampara mooa-po'nung ookavitura-koo aa'noko Ju'deeaing ee'noko Ju'nupoong, dii' isipo'ke taapo'ke otoriko'ning-koo ee'noko teing Ju'nupoong tee-anko due'nupoong-koo.
Ai' tee tee teie taung nkomemurio' nii' ookavitura Bauma-anko be'koo makotumpiri otong tee narung Tanuaang Meekung-koo kuunge.
Enang tee dii' akoing damisimainku otoria', teka dii' osikaiaang deentariri otoring teing ninka nii'ning bakaning meekupoong ninka nari', ee'noko Kumponinge tarevurimaing-kooning dii'.
Dii' Kumponing-nava kani-nupoong tee' pau'deeri otoring teing-koo kara okovuri nkanuka ee'noko nakaronuka˜koo dau, Jiisuu' Karistoo' tee ee'nara ookara-koo e'manianare' makosi, tumanung.
Tee-koo ootukunung nari' be'nu'ariri otoi kaniari otomaung dootuu'nava pankava deempari Ovoring-koo.
Ee'noko dii' nari' tee-koo otoritaa' tee-koo kanirariri otoring Kumponing oto'doma deentariri Tanuaang Meekung-koo kuunge.
Tee'koo eentamaramaung dii'koo, ning ee'nara Paula', dii' pakurampimaung-koo dai'nisi Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaang.
Dii'ke taarameru' dee'ma tee kapoo' makensi'nung daarirerompiring-koonaare ning-koo sira'pura Kumponinge makosi-antamuu'na' bakaang piaa dii' nau-anta-koo.
Anka deeruerima ooveriaing tampa' tasi'pamana' tee kapoo' makensi'nung Karistoo'koong.
Urikavarang pankaraamuriko tee sira'paravaruko' tee aung tee' enang Tanuaang Meekunge sira'antavuina' teing-koo bakaning-koo kara okovuri nkanuka-koo ee'noko nakaronuka-koo.

Tee ee'nara makensi'nung tee aung kapoo' teing ee'ning Ju' deeaing nii' ninka tapo'meering Ju'nupoong ninka nari' barenku nkavampii'naang narung mono-kooning deemariri ee'noko narung maraka-anta-kooning Kumponinge deing, tee ee'nara Jiisuu' Karistoo'ke dupe-antavuu'nung tampara doorenang tavo'ura.
Kumponinge tee maneenung taura' amuu' aung ee'nara doorenang tampara ookara nantoong nau-koong, makosi-antamui bakaang iri'ke.

Ning-koo ee'nung-koo bakaning meekupoong ootukunung-eta asiranung masikung-koo Kumponinge tampa' taura'mui amuu'nung daankiama'naang teing-koo Ju'deeaing-koo tee doorenang tampara Karistoo'nung avuavu'koong bono'dopa.
Ee'noko naumuu' siraka'antavama'naang ookara-koo tee Kumponing bakaang miru' makensi'nung.

Uripo'keta tee teie ee'narai ootukunung kapoo' nkovuu'nunge tee baka noru'ui otoko' enang bakaning dootuu'nupoong donkompurinamu' sira'paraa'naang avatevaro mataunanka aa'ning-koo ovontung ee'noko iri'po'nupoong paning-nairu-kooning-koo.
Tee ookara nkoaru'ning tee dupe-anta-koo tee Kumponing bakaang onou pupu'doma dopa-ita marovuu' tee-koo Jiisuu' Karistoo' niikaang Ovoring-koo teke taavoarara oparaa'naang.
Ee'noko tee ninka narung deemariri masika'antavampima tasi'pampiri Kumponing-anko due'marira karavampiaing amaiaa'moria'.
Tee tee enang kontampiri si'damping aa'dampima, tarua'doriauka' teing arikananka ninge dii' pakurampima kune'amaing-koo dii' meenasi-koo basi-anta-koong onoueri.

Tee tee tee tutumpama naurampirina' Kumponinge tampa' nkoruru'nung-koo tee'koo ning kinkinama eentamaramaung Niuma-koo aa'nung-koo ootukuna'kantu paning-kooning ee'noko kansi'kooning miring tampariri otong.

Kunsimarama ee' eentamaramaung: Teie bakaang avuavu' maanto'ui oto'keta aruriaing tee purinto' ee'noko iri' tanuaang Meekung-etaing diikaang pankaruntoong-koo otoaing, ee'noko Karistoo' diikaang domang-koo unaavoi otoi otoaing baitoverio'.
Napo' eentamaramaang piaa-koo daue du'durira ari'aruritaa' iveka'darii'naang,
ee'noko tee' nari' makosirariri otoritaa' tampa' tasi'perii'naang ookara ninka Kumponing bakaning meekupoong ninka ookanairu-eta paaranang-koo makotua' tee piaa Karistoo'nung.
Tee dii'ke mantomperi noru'erii'naang tee piaa punkaang˜paa' dii' maanto'duri otoriaina' Kumponing-pina' nari' nariari oto'ke ookarai.
Daangang otoaing Kumponing-koo deekoronoo' basiropa nkovumaung-koo eenta ee'noko noru'marimanoo'keta dau basinoo' tee ninka bakaang iri' nii'koo mintoomparamaung ninka.
Ee'nara daangampampimaatoaing dootuu'koo naro'marima Jiisuu' Karistoo'ke pakumurio', ookavarantue doomeeritaa' botu kong paa'na'. Ee', tee' ee'na'.
Tee tee ninge Ovoring bakaang dai'nisie kontampiri botoramping makosina' bokururu'na' otorii'naang.
Boonko noru'dariaing, banainge otori da'deng iiraroria'. Piaa oro'antaveri otorimaatoai tokoona' noru'deeria'.
Tanuaang Meekunge tee dii' narung deeng-antarurining, teka aa'na' paarararimaatoai narung deentariri oto'koo mooareeri otorima.
Mono tee narung otong nii'ke nko-antavampimaung Karistoo'nung, ee'noko Tanuaang Meekung tee narunge tee' nari' narung noru'koo oto'koo bokururu'nung.
Ovoring narung otong, kapoo' masika'antavampimaung narunge, ntong-koo minkie meeka'anta narunge;
Kumponing narunge tee Niuma nii' ookarai, nii' ookara taremuri niikaang birenge mintoomparama nii'koo kuung otomaung.
Teka teieta bakaang maanto'ui oto'keta Karistoo'ke nii' kantemuru' namarana' teing avuavu'nanka tee' Daari Meekunge minkuvuu'na' aa'puma:
“‘Tenang paning-koo deto koinura barampuri dai'nisinuka teie Ovoringe tankaampuru' tee avuavu'nanka teing nantoong.”
Tee “deto koinuu'”-naare miru' aming? Tee aa' miru' ee': Tee tero napo' siaru'nung depeto kansi'koo boonavaro-koo.
Tee ee'nara narung siaru'nung tee ee'nara napo' deto koinuu'nung paning-koo daunavaro-koo isipo' masipo' ootukunairu-koo maanto'antavaraa'naang.

Ee'noko tee “avuavu' tankaampuru'”-naare miru' aming? Miru' aa' ee' oro': Nii'ning kara okovuri nkanuka deempuru', napo' nii'ning nakaronuka deempuru', nii'ning doorenang tampara daankivuma nanu'nuka deempuru' ee'noko nii'ning tanata nkonanka nau-antavaarima.
Biikaang nko-nko Kumponing bakaning meekupoong bare-anta-koong dootuu'nupoong kake'iiariaina' ee'noko Karistoo' bakaang mono makosinuka panka'antavaavaina'.
Bera tee nii' ookara narung deemariaing masika'anta-koo ee'noko Kumponing Bauring noru'na'koo, ee'noko naning-naummariri petaa'moriaing nari' basina' Karistoo' dakaosi'na' dupeari petaa'omana'.

Teketa tee nantoong onou tasi'paa'nukai daang ampirinumparima˜ aavamaariko toire' oki'nareka'pina' o'noriauka'nung amutemurii' daang-koong nau-anta siompampiritaa', aa'na' boo'ai nankara avitoitoi bii'urimana' dovinge uupuvuriko.
Otoa', masikung narung minkuampima piaameeritaa' ootukumariri panka'mariaing Karistoo'naummariri, tee-koo kuung o'nori, niikaang bore' deemparako.

Teie taremuriko nii' teing bakaang mono-koo-navio'nanka-pina' matauna' be'nu'mariri o'noring ee'noko naruna' makotumpiri pakumeeriaing nii' ookara tee ee'nara mono panka'antavampiri ee'noko purimariri piaae.
Aung tee nkaang naunau dii' naurampimang Ovoring bakaang miringe dii' date'antarampima: Akoing tamunsi'nanka-pina' nkorariauka' kapoo' masikung deeaung siompaamaing-pina'.
Teing biikaang noru' tee mutaanang, damisimainku teing tee-koo domaang Kumponinge amurimaung-koo. Aming-koo, nna' papaaranuka koonto', bore'ke deerenuka otorokotaa'.
Anutua nkoarima maimaia'na' nko-koo avariri oto'nuka, naro'keta oko'okovurima aarumo ku'mi' nkoaamaing.
Teka tee Karistoo'koo barerariru'na' tee' deea'.
Dii'ke tee koonto' tampa' taaraveru' tee, ee'noko dii' tee-koo kuung otoritaa' bakaang kara masikung nauraariko barorontariru'.
Urikanaung enang bakei kiru'dariaing teronung aarumo-koo otoriko'na'koong, mono narung bakaang noru' karaa'ke boo' tositosi-koong siompui otomaung dii' orari-anta-koona'.
Diikaang onou ee'noko tanuaang neraka'antarariaing.
Nerakanaung kuruntariai Kumponinge nkonii'naung, tee-pina' oro'naung, koonto'nuka, meeka'dariri otoriaina' masikung siomperi.
Tee'koo enang bakerariaing tosi minku-eta. Masikung narung minkuerimatoaing tapo'deeri otorimaing ninka, ai' dii' teing narung mono-koo manta'deeri otong.
Dii' iirarorima deeko' tee iira oramuriau deeng-antaveriauka'. Bointuriai duaa' mme' tumparavaruko.
Sietani' doona aveauka' tee'.
Tee bakisipung bakiaa' nko-ita bakearara bakaang birenge mintoong tampara kake'iiari nkovuai apuka'paravaing ninka tankaampuaina'.
Kara orarananka minkueria' otoai, teka tampara to'biiari kara narung, pakureeri navureerima. Tee'koo taararaariaininge tee tampa' taararaariaing biraankeario'.
Tee' nari' Tanuaang Meekung Kumponing bakaang orarunsi-antaveria' otoai, ai' tee Tanuaang Meekung tee Kumponing bakaang taa'ni'anta nii' moo'muriaing-koong asi'na'mung.
Donta'dariri otorimaatoai aing aa'ning-eta', domang oraka' noru', iira, ioo', peusi', minkuminku ee'noko napo' too'de.
Teka navureeri otorimaatoai dunsirunsi˜antareerima, tonta'antareerima dii'ka Kumponinge Karistoo'koo kuunge tonta'antareruru'na'.
Tee'koo dii' Kumponing baurukaa', teie piaarurimaing, paararariaing tee-pina' nari' oto'koo.
Piaareeri otomatoai tee' Karistoo'ke piaamuru'na' ee'noko tee baka nii'koo avaru' tee boontunang tampa' nuuraa' Kumponing-koo.
Kaukauro-nko, ee'noko noru' ku'mi' siong, nii'noo' makosi deea'na' karaa' bakei dii'koo otoauka'nung; minkueria' otoai Kumponinge meeka'antanisinuka deentariri.
Napo' kara sikuri'ke si', kara kanu' ee'noko deu' makotua' dii'ke minku-koo. Tampa' tang narung dii'ke minku-koo makosi.

Koonto' tasi'peri noru'eriaing naning tee kaukauro-nko, naning kiiroraa' deeaung, nii'noo' mamaironto' tee oto'evuauka'nung barenku-koo Karistoo'ke ee'noko Kumponinge tareaaremaing ninka. Temurii' karaa' siong kumponing daang-koong boontuvuma-nko.
Ee'namurii'koo Kumponinge iira basi-antavumaung teing-koo bakaang kara siompaavaing-koo. Taaraveriauka' nii'ninge nii'na' nauraariko kara menaankavoroma.
Tee tee teing ninka nari' manta'deeri otoriauka'.
Tero tee dii' mutaanange maanto'duri otoriko'ning, teka enang arakai Ovoring-etainge maanto'duri otong. Tee tee enang araka siraka'antaveri nanirimaatoaing.
Noru'eriaing tee ee'nara arakai aing aa'ning tavo'antavumaung: tampara aarumo, aarumo koonto' ee'noko kara masikung amutemurii'ari.
Ee'noko io' paaraverira ooveriaing aming-koo Ovoring dotuaramaunge.
Temurii' mintoong mutaanang-koong kapoo' basiaravaing-koo kanto'daria' otoaing, teka sira'periai temurii' aarumo orara.
Kapoo' makempario' nkoaamaing bakei maremaare, maimaia'na' taara minku-koo.
Teka tenang sira'pevurereriko teie arakai tee biikaang oraka'nko orara-pina' tasi'pario' sira'puaing. Ee'noko daamparimana' tasi'parira nii'ning tee arakavariaing napo'.
Tee' ee'na' kenai minkuvumana' aa'puma,
“Tanteraravai da' aasi' bauko. Boo'keta daa'darako Karistoo'ke da' araka-antaruaing.”
Enang tee araka-koo otoritaa' tarerariri otoriaing dii' otoriaina'koo, tampa' mataurariri, kanu'aapena' deea'.
Tee' nkorarima doona siperiauka', ai' enang batei orara, doong arikung.
Tee'koo kanu'dariauka', teka paaraveriai noru'koo Ovoring bakaang pia.
Purinto'naru'ke baru' naikirima kanu'anta-koo bakerariai diikaang domang ootukunavaro orari-antarari'neeng, teka Tanuaang Meekunge maanto'duri otoaing.

Tee' otoritaa' kenanankai karareerimaatoai aa'ninge Daari Meekung-koo daarinii'ninge, Ovoring daangang-koo nantoonge toroaamainge ee'noko Tanuaang Meekunge karantavuko˜ kenanankai. Diikaang domang-eta kenararima amutemurii' ninka kovirariaing Ovoringe taararuriaina'.
Ookara batei-koo tampara tamperimaatoai tee-koo Kumponing tee Niuma, niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaang miring-koo.
Ee'noko aroo'antareeri otorimaatoaing Karistoo'koo mee'du'pirariri.
Dii' bii'ankaaru' dii'unkaampi-koo aroo'dariri otorimaatoai Ovoring bakaang kara aroo'erimana',
ai' donkaani tee manikuma bakaang bore' tee'pina' nari' Karistoo' dootuu'nupoong-koo bore' deempari otomana', bakaang mono, ee'noko tee tee baka domang-anta tee mono-koo.
Tee tee tee' nari' dootuu'nupoong Karistoo'koo aroo'ariri otoromana' tee' nari' dii' bii'ankaaru' dii'unkaampi-koo aroo'dariri otoriaing.
Dii'ke bii'unkaampie dii'ankaampi piaaverereri otomatoai tee' nari' Karistoo'ke dootuu'nupoong piaavuri bakaang mono avaru'na'.
Tee' nkovuu' teing naro'ka ba'aang makosinavitu deempariko tevitu kiiroraa'antavui meeka'antavuu'naang aa'noma ntonge duu' kara meeka'anta-koong ninka.
Karistoo'ke tee' nkovuu' tevitu bakanavitu tee-anko pipiraari donkonuu'naang nerampari, ku'mi' dovang dopai, naankuviraa', meeka'nisi, dakaosi'.
Tee' nari' bii'unkaampie bii'ankaampi piaavaarimatoaing, tee' biikaang mono bii'ka piaavarimana' nari'. Baa tee naning ba'aang piaavumaung tee baka piaavaramaung teni piaavui.
Naning bakaang mono munte'aramaung otoa', teka tee mono bau'aramaung piaavari tanatavarama, tee' nari' Karistoo'ke bakanavitu dootuu'nupoong tanatavurimana'.
Tee' nkorariaing dii' bakaang mono-koo manta'deeri bi'dariri otorining deentariko.
Tee' Daari Meekunge minkuvumana' aa'puma,
“Tee'koo naninge baumararing sipureta tee ba'aang ninka dai'arara tenaanka narung deempareaing.”
Kapoo' pankaing masikung aung-koo baku'ari miru'ari otong, nka ninge ee' ooamaang: Aung kapoo' Karistoo' ninka bakanavitu dootuu'nupoong miru'uri otoing.
Teka sira'pari otoina'koo ee' otong: Dii'ke naruna' naruna' dii'ankaampi piaaverererimaatoai tee' diikaang mono dii'ka piaararimana' nari'. Ee'noko ba'aang ba'ung-koo mee'du'piari otomatoai.
Toire'ke tee diumaraang Ovoring-koo tampa' taaraverererimaatoaing, ai' aung tee dii' diikaang nko-nko.
Daari Meekung-koo ee' otong,
“Daumararing deto noru'eresi pakuereaing. Tee' nkorarama tee anke kansi'koo pankaroong tampa' otoaing.”
Aung tee tutuna'nung boto Kumponing-etaing maraka-anta ninka mavo'pari otoing.
Dii'ke biumaraange diurukaa' iirang-antana' nkovereria' otoai, teka tampa' tanataverereriai Karistoo' bakana' kake'ii-antavereri, bakaang kara bare-antavererima.
Dii' dai'nisinukai teing dii' tanataraarimaing anke kansi'koo makosina' ankampereri mataa'irariri siompererimaatoai tunsi paakararia', tee' Karistoo' dotu-antana' noru'eri.
Nantoonge ooraarii'naang tampa' nari' mintoontaria' otoai ako' dotu-anta-koo, teka dii' Karistoo' bakaning botovotonaa'nuka deentariko domange tampa' noru'eri mintoontariaing Kumponing-koo.
Doturoturariri pakuereriaing kara siomperi – Kumponing noru'eri, nantoong noru' ereria'.
Noru'eri otong Ovoringe tee nantoong ookara kapoo' tampa' nkoaamana'koo tampa' maku'uriaing aa'ning dai'nisinuka ee'noko dai'ariaing nari'.
Dii' oko-nupoonge tee tampa' tarevereriainge teing diikaning tee' nari', mau'mau'ereria' ee' noru'erima: “Nii' ookara taremurimaung otong teke paning-koo nari' noru'muri, duukung sipuaunge.”
Asirang-koo ee' naurampii'naang: Purintariri otoriaing Ovoring-koo bakaang iri' iirakuta ninka.
Nopa'dariaing ootukununge Kumponing bakaang mononopa' tavu'koonge tee ninka nari' Sietani'ke aavaruriko dimpa'eriaina'.

Aming-koo, nna' nii' tee nantoong tumuusinanka ninka tameeria', teka aa'ning ninka: ma'nari-koo ovontung avatevaatang-koo neriariri otoroi Sietani'koo kuunge, paning-nairu-kooning-koo oravitu bakei maare ninka tameering, mutaanang-aapei ootukunung kansi' booni'antanuka enanaroong-koo.
Tee'koo nopa'dariaing teie Kumponing bakaang mononopa'ke ootukununge dii' dimpa'dariaina' doong ora'mung basiarako, ee'noko kare oparako dii' tee tee' nari' tampa' donkoniri otoriaing.
Tee tee tampa' pinka'dariri donkoniriaing. Kara masikunge tokoni'pina' tokorariai. Koompari oto' si'daravai murukeu-nee'pina'.
Maamurariri otoriai tee tampara doorenang mooa-koong nkavui nanu'koo tee' piatooronuka˜koo tutung kau'koo boonamante˜ baraa'arimana' maamuariri.
Napo' teing ookara ninka baito komperiai kapatau kompaamana' tumpari' nta'po'ning sirivaa'uko taamparavaing teie orarai, Sietani'ke, bai'uko.
Ee'noko deto komperiaing tee domang-anta Kumponinge aruru'nung tee-pina' diikaang baakopo. Napo' komperiai tee Kumponing bakaang kara tee-pina' bainatu tavu'koong Tanuaang Meekung-etaing.

Tee' Tanuaang Meekunge pakururimana'koo ookara batei-koo kunsirarimatoai amutemurii' paku nka-koo baitorarima. Ee'noko tee' nkorarima muung ee'noko doong mantontariri eentaevurerereriai Kumponing bakaning meekupoong ootukunairu-koo.
Ning tee'ke kunsi-koo pakumeriai tenang ninge kara daankiama'naang nkomarako naumuaining-koo, tampara doorenang makempari otoko'nung noru'antavarampaina' amaiaa'moa'.
Temurii' kara nka-koo botomuu'nung deemarako entamemuriaing amorompa' daankiampaina' makosina' bane dai'mari o'noitaa'.
Enang tee ninge Tikikas dii'anko botoamaang tee mmaiko' masikung ee'noko Ovoring-koo mintoomparama mutekaro'arakoo'.
Teie naururiaing nii' o'norina' ee'noko ninge nkoamaing kapoo', ee'noko diikaang domang kuaa'antaruriaing.
Mooa ee'noko piaa tee ninka masika'anta tee dii'koo ntara'mainkaang-koo otoaing Kumponing Niuma-ita ee'noko tee Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo'keta.
Biraanke otoaing dii'koo niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' piaa o'paa'ke piaaverimaing-koo ookara-koo. Tee' nari'.

Aung ane' karavoto˜ ninge Paula'ke minkuanko Timoti'ke daarivuma nee' Karistoo' bakanaanka botovotonaa'kai dii'anko botoampemang nantoong Kumponing bakaning meekupoong Pilipai-navuntu'ke Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo kuunge otorimaing-anko, tanatanuka ee'noko pakupakunuka-anko nari'.
Biraanke ee'noko mooa dii'koo otoaing Kumponing Niuma-itaing ee'noko teieta Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo'.
Ninge tee dii' noru'dampima tee-koo nkaang Kumponing-koo tampa' tampamaung ookara batei-koo.

Ee'noko nkaang kunsi-koo dii' ookara pakurampima tee ning ookara batei-koo doturotu ninka kunsimaramaung, dii'ke tampa' pakumerimaung-koo tee doorenang tampara bereng-anta-koo, teketa tutung komperu'noo'keta bera e'munung doong-koo basinoo'koo.
Ninge masika' tasi'pansi o'nong teie Kumponinge tee nko-nko tampara dii'koo tutung-antavuu'nunge be'nu'antavui otoaing tee, bera te'mung tee Jiisuu' Karistoo' toroaravaina'mung-koo basi.

Bakei makosi ninge dii' ookara tee' noru'koo, ai' dii' teing ning-koo domang-koo otoring, dii' ni'ninka narung-pina' o'norimaing. Bane tenang ning kiimatanava-koo o'noi ee'noko napo' tenang ninge doorenang tampara pakuansi puring-antavamanang, dii' teing ni'ninka nari' tampa'nko Kumponing-etaing kompampimaing.
Kumponinge masika'antamupeu' naurampiko tee' ninge dii' piaarampimana' teie piaae Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo pankaruntoong-koong-eta pomaunge.
Ee' pina' kunsimaramaung dii'koo: tee diikaang piaa tee' nari' deto aa'na' dupui otoaing, tee ninka norunoru' masikung ee'noko tee matau tampara.
Aa'noaina', dii'ke ookara aarumonanka tampa' simpe'eri kiiroraa'dariri tuumpiropanuka otoriaing bera Karistoo' poainoo'ke basi.
Ee'noko teinge aarumo koonto' bakaninge sinanankai maanto'duri otoriaing Jiisuu' Karistoo'keta pomainge Kumponing pankaing-antavui daangang-kooninge.
Ee mmaikori', enang kiimatamainoo'koo dii'ke aung noru'erii'naang piamoing, teie kapoo'ke ning-koo nkoarinunge tee doorenang tampara tampa' aa'na' masika' beremparu'nung.

Bera tee ookarai amono-koo otoroininge aa'noko teing kiimatanuka ee'noko tanatanuka nari' tee ee' noru'aing: Ning tee tamung boturopa kiimatamaava', teka ning Karistoo'koo botovotonaa' deemarako kiimatamaing.
Ee'noko ning tee ee' dai'mari o'noko daping ookara nantoong mmaikori' Ovoring-koo purimpariri bia'oromaung bakaang kara aroo'keta sira'paama avoreaava'.
Masika' nii'ninge tee doorenang tampara mamairo ninka daankiaamaung ning Karistoo'ke siong-antamumana'koo mamairoarima.
Teka nii'ning tampara onou ee'noko piaa ninka daankiarimaung tee' tasi'mai a' kiimatanoo' si'mau'nung tee doorenang tampara puring-antavanko.

Teinge mamairo ninka daankiaamainge tee Karistoo' onou kiiroraa'keta daankiaava', teka aing aa'ning onou-koo otoko daankiaakoo': baka-noru', baka daangang, maroita ning aa'na' manki'antamaava'naang kiimata-koo o'noko.

Teka tee makosi, kapoo' otoa'. Tee kapoo' pankaing tee Karistoo' daankiaamaung bane teie teinge ookenge taunge, aa'noko daang noru'ariri ee'noko aarumo masikung ninka. Teka ning tee dotumari o'nomaung teinge Karistoo' daankiaamaung-koo.

Ee'noko tee' nari' dotumari o'noaing, ai' ninge tee noru'ansi o'nong dii'ke kunsi-koo ning pakumerimaung-koo ee'noko napo' Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaang tanuaange pakumumaung-koo botue tee unaa-anta kompampaing.

Ee'noko ning aa'na' dotumari nemari o'nong tee kapoo' tavo'kuaing-koo, maia'moauka'na' noru'mari, teka amanampa' monoi ookutununge Karistoo' pankaing-antavampaing tee' nari' uripo'keta nkomaramana', bane aa'noainge: domang o'noi o'noaing deeko', ee'noko dupisi'maavaing deeko'.
Ai' domamari o'noi Karistoo' tee ning nkaang domaang, ee'noko moomira deeko' tee dupeari otoko kompampaing.
Teka ning nkaang mono tee' nari' domamari o'noaing deeko' tee ee' oro'pari otong, nko-nko doma ninge tampara sinang-po'nung nkoampaing, teka tee ning meu' ke'me'mari o'nong kenaanka noru'koo.
Boo'koo pia o'nong Karistoo' ninka nari' o'noreaina'koo, tee' tee' bakei aa'na' tampa' masika'.
Teka kapoo' pankaing dau basi tee domamari anke kansi'koo oto'koong dii' iri'antarampima.
Ee'noko ninge enang to'biimari tee ee' tasi'pansing: ning doma dii' ninka nari' o'noi pakurampiri puring-antarampimatoaing diikaang masika'anta-koo ee'noko napo' tee-koo diikaang doturotu.
Tee'koo ning napo' dii'anko basimarako dii' ning-koo doturarima dii'ke tee Karistoo' daangamperiaing.

Otori tee' teie doorenang tamparai Karistoo' bakaange tampui otoina' nari' otorimaatoai, bane ninge moma beero'dampiko ee'noko beero'dampia' dii'keta taapo'ke o'noko deeko', ai' ninge dii' teing narung onou-koo purintariri otoriko taara-koo piamoi o'nong, ee'noko narung noru' ninka pakureeri iveka'doriai tee doorenang tampara masika'antaveri.

Diikaning kare-nupoonge bane arekee' tokoona' nkoraariko aroreria' otorimaatoai. Tee' taa'ni'antarariri otoriko teinge tasi'paavaing doong asi'na'mung kera'pariaing-koo dii' domantariko, Kumponinge ee'nunge pakururio'.
Ai' Kumponinge tampara otooto'koo bokururima Karistoo' masika'anta narung-koo miru'duria', teka ookeng-koo masika'anta ninka arikananka nari' kune'koo Jiisuu' bakaang miring-koo.
Ai' dii' ninge tasi'dampiri otong dii' teing arikananka kune'erima pore'dorimaing tee' ninge arikananka-koo pore' kompanko oomeriko'na' ee'noko enang napo' tee' nari' pore'moko taaramerimaang.

Ee aing, ning dotumari o'nong dii' aing aa'ning oto'derurimaung-koo: tee domang kuaa'anta Karistoo' ninka narung deentarira nkaveru'nung, ee'noko napo' tee bakaang piaae dunsirunsi˜anta-koong, ee'noko tee bakaang Tanuaang-koo kuunge navunavu, ee'noko napo' dii'ka pankaruntoong-eta piaareeri otorimaung-koo;
makosi, dii'ke nkaang doturotu dupe-antaveriaing narung noru'koo otori, nari' piaareeri, napo' nari' onourariri kapoo'nanka nari' nkoverima.
Deikoo'na' ee'noko baka daangana' nkorariauka', teka dii'ka boonko noru'dariri deto pankaing-antareerimatoai.
Dii' naruna' naruna' mintoontarima nii'ning nari' paku-koo mintoontariaing dii'ka dii' naing noru'daria'.
Diikaang aarumo tee' nari' Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaang-pina' noru'dariri otorimaatoai.
Bane Kumponing-pina' nari' oro'ke, teka baka etuarava' Kumponing-pina' nari' basi otoo'naang.
Baka naning tamunsi'nung deeng-antavaru', tee naning botovotonaa'pina' oto'antavarara.
Ee'noko bakei naning-pina' masika' oro'paru'noo'keta baka boonko noru'ari Kumponing meumpuitaa' boo'koo taura'paru', bane aa'barata'koo oroo'ke boo'koo.
Tee'koo Kumponinge kansi'keta deto a'dei' ookara-koo dau i'ampura teka tee miring pankaing deto basi ookara-koo mirinanka-koo avuu'.
Ee'noko ookara nantoong aa'noko paning-koo-nupoong ee'noko kansi'koo-nupoong, napo' kansi'koo boong-nameng-nupoong, teing tee-koo Jiisuu' bakaang miring-koo kinkinaavaing.
Ee'noko napo' teinge ookarai Jiisuu' Karistoo' tee Ovoring sirakura' tampaavaing, Bauma Kumponing meenasi oko-antavai.

Tee'koo, ee mmaikori', tee' nari' ookara batei-koo Karistoo' bakaang kara meumperiko'na' enang napo' tee' nari' meumperimaatoainge, tenang ning dii'ankoi o'noko naro' deea', teka baru'noo' tenang ning dii'ankoi o'noaruko tee' nkorariaing, monkeena'dariri tee diikaang domanturiaing tampa' dupe-antasiiriaina' aroo'eri mintoontarima.
Ai' tee dii'koo mintoompari otomaung tee Kumponing, dii' paku-antaruri tee aroo'erira bakaang pia siomperii'naang.

Ookara kapoo'nanka nkoverima minkuminkunanka nii'noo' tata'deerima nkoveriauka' tuumpiropanuka otoriaina' ee'noko kiiroraa'nuka, Kumponing baurukaa' kararopanuka anke kansi'koo oroo'ke koomparia'navitu ninka otorimaing.
Teing-koo ee'ning-koo meu'ke arakarariri otoriaing beento'nanka paning-kooning-pina' tee kara domantoo' deto komperi ookarai ooaavaina'.
Tee' nkoveriko dii'koo aa'na' dotumaravaing Karistoo' poaina'mung ee' noru'ama: dii'koo amari mintoomarakotaa' tamung pore'moaruu'nung.

Diikaang baito tee boontunang tampara makosi Kumponing-koo, ee'noko ning dupisi'maavaing deeko' nkaang ereng tee-koo boontunang-koo dau dakoaravainang ning tee dotumaravaing dii' ninka nari' dotumariaina' noru'ansitaa'.
Ee'noko napo' dii' teinge ni'ninka nari' doturariaining.
Ovoringe Jiisuu'ke taura'puko tee Timoti dii' Pilipai-nupoong-anko namu'ke botoama'naang, ning-koo dooreruriko doturarii'naang ee'noko toroarako diikaang doorenang taaravamira dotumaravaina' nari'.
Nii'nung naning noru'ampa' Timoti-pina' mantong, napo' dii'koo onou aa'na' otoing.
Nii'ning nantoong teing kapoo'nanka biikaning naing tanata-koo otoromaing, Karistoo' bakaning sipai.
Teka dii'ke Timoti bakaang aarumo tampa' noru'eri otoring tee teing pina' deea', ai' naninge bauma pakuvumaatopeu'na' nari' teie ning aa'na' pakumumaung tee doorenang tampaara bereng-anta-koo.
Enang tee dii'anko namu'ke botoama'naang piamomaang, tokoona' ning o'noaina' baakeenemarara.
Ee'noko ning tee'ke Ovoring-koo aroo'mari aa'pamaang, “Ning da'deng simpiri'antamaako dii'anko dama'ke moo'naang.”

Teka io' tutung tee Epaparodaitas dii'anko napo' botoama'naang tee ninge mmaiko', nari' mintoomaremaung ee'noko nari' ni'ninka nee' piatoorora˜ baito-koo kuunge. Teenoo' tee diikaang naning, kapoo'koo ning apuka'maramaing-koo pakumuu'naang botoveru'nung.
Ee'noko tee dii' aa'na' oo-koo piavoi otong. Ai' tee tee enang manki'antavari otong siipavou'na' taaraverira mi'miinki'doriko noru'durima.

Ee', masika', tee tee dapi' boo'paru'nung, teka tee Kumponinge piaavura domang-antavuu'nung. Teka tee narung deea', tee aa'noko ning piaamura Epaparodaitas domampuu', orarunsi ning-koo pau'eere'neeng-koo.
Tee'koo dau basina' dii'anko boto-koo piamoi o'nong dii'ke napo' ooverira doturoturariaina', ee'noko nkaang orarunsi birimpuai.
Emu' tee te' dii'anko basiarako bakei aa'na' onkeonke'eriaing Ovoring bakaang miring-koo aa'na' doturariri. Ee'noko nantoong tee-pina' oro'nuka pankaing-antaverererimaatoai.
Ai' tee tee dapi' boo'paru'nung tee-koo Karistoo' bakaang-koo nko-nko-koo kuunge; boo'koo taura'paru' ning pakumuma dii' isipo' otori makosiriaruko.
Asi'noo'ka ee mmaikori' aa'dampimang, Ovoring-koo doturoturarimatoaing.
Aung tee kara anaare napo' unampama daariamatomaung ninge daari-koo pore' deea' ee'noko dii' tampa' koono-koonge.

Tee' ee': Tarerariri otorimaatoai teing-koo nantoong-koo Ju' biikana' dootuu' koong taa'ni'anta kong-koo eturaarimaing-koo, ai' teing nkaunanka makosinanka, kapoo' oreng nkoaama mono-nameng-koong taa'ni'antai daang meeka'parimaing dopa' napu' dovang nkoarima.
Teka nii' ee'ning Kumponing bakaning masikeng-pina' taa'ni'antanii'nuka, bakaang Tanuaang ninka dootuu'marimaing Jiisuu' Karistoo' baitoampiri daangampampima, mono bakanameng-koo aroo' o'noria'.
Mono bakanameng-koo aroo' o'noi dei ning makosi avitoitoi-koo biivimarapeu', ee'noko napo' nii'nung naning mono-aapenameng-koo biivimparamaung deeko' ning puru'muarupeu'.

Ai' ning tee naning meekung taa'ni'antanii' dopa' toto'mau'nung-koo ˜beenang-taa doong tankinuio' ponto'maru'noo'keta. Ee'noko ning bakei Isireeli-nupoong-koo narung, Kumponing bakaning-koo, teing Bensimani bakanaving-koo kuunge ponto'marara. Napo' biikaang kara ee'noko aarumo kompansi o'nong, Iiburuna'. Ee'noko boto sionameng-koo ning tee Boto Keperuu'navitu-koo narung aa'nung.
Napo' toomo-nameng donkompansi ning tee iri'moi dootuu'nupoong manki'antavaranko'nunge. Ee'noko koompari oto'nairu-koo ning naninge tuumpimupeu'noo' otoa'.
Teka teing aing kapoo'nanka tero ning puring-antananka-pina' noru'anko'ning enang teing tamunsi'ning noru'ansira dua'arantu'ning ookara, Karistoo' narung-koo noru' sipamira.

Ee'noko teing naing deea', ookara kapoo'nanka daang-antavaramira opansi dua'arantu' nung tee kapoo' pankaing masikung kompama'naang. Tee nkaang Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' noru'koo piamora tee bakaang miring-koo ookara kapoo'nanka dama'duarantu' tamunsi'ning tampamira, tee Karistoo' nkateema'naang.

Ee'noko ning tee-koo kuung o'noi pinka'maravai Kumponinge ning naning koonto' tammuu'naang, boto siompama ninka koomario' deea', teka Karistoo' masika'antavansio'. Ai' Kumponing ninka koompari oto' tee Kumponing-eta nka-koo miru'nii', ee'na baito narunge nka-koo makosi.
Ning tee Karistoo' bakei aa'na' noru'koo piamoi o'nong ee'noko tee bakaang iri' tee domang-antavuu'nung; napo' tee baike teie kompuu'nung tee' nari' kompampainge;
Ee'noko boo'koo tee' moompai tee-pina', dama'ke boo'keta daa'maravaina' piamora tee' naumuru'na'.

Ning aa'maravaroo'nang, “Ning tee' Karistoo'pina' dupeario' kompansing ookara aarumo.” Otoa'. Ning mme' makotumpa'. Teka ning aa'na' kevi'maramatoaing temurii' aarumo okomuu'naang Jiisuu'ke ning okovui miru'muu'na'.

Ee mmaikori', ninge tee tero nkavantu'nung-pina' noru'ampa', teka aung kapoo' narung ninge nkoampaing: Teing kapoo'nanka dama'duaransining ampa'mora kapoo' uro'kanoo'ke otoing kevi'ama mintoomari o'noaing bera boo'ke basi, nkavama'naang tee moo'.
Tee moo' tee aung ee' oro': Kumponinge Jiisuu' Karistoo' karantavuko˜ a'dei' be'koo bokumuaing ning.
Enang tee nii' ookara tanuaang nameng-koo petaa'nuka tee tee' nari' noru'mariaing.
Ee'noko dii'koo nii'ninge oovuna' noru'eriko deeko', tee Kumponinge dii'koo siraka'antavuaing bakaang kara-koo noru'erimanoo' tampa' nari' siomperimatoaing deeko'.
Ee mmaikori', tee' nari' otoritaa' ning o'nomana' otoriaing ee'noko napo' teing ninge nauarantu'na' otoromaing-koo barerariri otorimaatoai.

Ai' aung tee mmau'namu'pie teroita naurampiko'na' ee'noko enang tee' nari' piaarampima ta'du ninka unampansi aa'dampimang: Mmau' nantoong dootuu'nupoong teing turani'nuka-pina' otorong tee' Karistoo' aa'barata'koo bou'na' siong-koo.

Ai' teing teing biikaang kumponing-pina' noru' tee biikaang mono bakaang pia narung, kapoo'nanka maimaia'arimaing, ee'noko biikaang noru' kapoo'nanka kansi'kooning-koo otokoo'. Tee' nkoarima mosianung-aape otorong.
Teka nii' niikanoo' osi te' paning. Ee'noko nii' teing tee niikaang Domang-anta tee Jiisuu' Karistoo' teketa poaing domange etuvuko nempampiri o'norining.

Ee'noko pora teie tee aung niikaang kansi'koong mononanka aruaru' paari-antamuriaing bakaang mono meenasi-po'nung-pina' oro'antamurima teie iri'ke ookara kapoo'nanka bakaang tanata-koo kuung si'koo makosi-antavuu'nunge.

Tee'koo bakei tee' nari' Ovoring-koo masika'antarariri otoriaing, ee mmaikori', ai' dii' teing ninge aa'na' piaarampimaing, ee'noko aa'na' oo-koo piamokoo' dii' nkaning doturotunuka ee'noko nkaang nko-nko-koo moo' makosinanka deentaririo'.
Dee' Iuodia naanka ee'noko da' Sintiki aa'dampemang, dee' tee-koo Ovoring-koo kuunge napo' navurareaing.

Napo' dake Sisikusie pakueresio' tenaanka manikumaara nari-antaveereai beekaang mankimanki'keta, ai' tenaanka tenaanka ni'ninka nari' manta'marimanaanka doorenang tampara bereng-anta-koo ee'noko tee Kelemeni nari' teing ninka nii'ning nari' mintoomarimaing, aa'ning niikaang miring tee tene'koo buukunane' domamariaining o'norinane'koo daariariri otong.
Doong kante Ovoring-koo doturoturariri otorimaatoai, napo' unampama aa'pamaang, Doturariri otorimaatoai!
Ookara kapoo' nkoveriaining-koo nantoong-koo dutakanoo'ke onou tampara oro'antaverimatoai, ee' noru'eri, Ovoring poainoo' tee due'ui otong.
Kapoo'nanka-koo baru' noru' otoriauka', teka ookara kapoo'nanka-koo tee Kumponing eentaveriai kunsirarima tampa' tamperima diikaang domang-eta.
Ee'noko teie Kumponing-nung mooai pankainge nantoong biikaang matau-koo dau basie mankimanki'keta unaa-anta aruriaing tee diikaang domang ee'noko diikaang onou Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo kuunge.

Ee mmaikori', asi'namoora'koo aa'dampimang, “Aing ee' oro'ning minkuama'naang dii'ke norunoru'eriaining aa'ning: tee kapoo' masikung, tee kapoo' pankaing-anta-koo makosi, tee koonto', tee kiiroraa', kapoo' piaa-koo makosi, tee miring tampara-po'nung. Nii'ning kapoo' tampeng daangang-koo makosining otoko deeko' makosie dii'ke teing norunoru'koo.

Ee'noko teing teing kapoo'nanka ninge naurampiko taaraverira noru'ke pinka'eru'ning ee'noko teing ning-koo ooverira barerariru'ning teing tee' nari' napo' dii'ke nko-koo paaraveriaining. Tee' nkoveriko tee Kumponing mooa-po'nung tee dii' ninka nari' otoaing.”

Bakei aa'na' dotumaring tee-koo Ovoring-koo diikaang piaa ning-koo napo' daa'antaverieeng-koo mmau' batei tamung tankinuio'. A'noo'koo tee dii'ke piaameri paararariko' diikaang avuavu' boto-koo, teka taung otoaruko ning-koo da'deng tavo'aravaruu'.
Teka aa'peri'neenga, “Tee pa bakei aa'na' papovura tee' minkuvuing.” A, ning aa' tee bakei datamoi o'nomaung bane aremurii' batei-koo.

Ai' ning tee kapoo'koo apuka'mari oto'na'koo datamou'nung ee'noko napo' mmau' oto'memui oto'na'koo. Ning baremaru'nung tee kapoo' makensi'nung amutemurii' batei-koo tampa' nari' datavoi oto'na'koong, aa'noko poomui deeko' nii'noo' peeramoi deeko', nii'na' mmau' oto'memui deeko' nii'noo' apuapuka'koo o'noi deeko'.
Ninge tee ookara kapoo'nanka Karistoo' bakaang purinto'koo kuunge nko-koo makosi.
Teka tee makosi tampara dii'ke nkaang arikananka-koo ning pakumerimaung-koo.

Napo' dii'ke Pilipai-nupoonge tee tampa' noru'eri otong, tenang urikamu' tutuna' ninge tee doorenang tampara daankianko'nang, Masedonia'keta tenkenansio' dii' nainge avuavu'nanka tankaamperima ning makosi-antameru'.
Napo' teie, bane osi pankamono Tesalonaika'namono-koo basimarako, mmau'namu'pie diikaang pakupaku be'antaveru' papoansi o'noko.
Teka ninge avuavu'nanka nkavampaina' besi'ampaung. Tee kapoo' pankaing ninge oo-koo piamoi o'noing tee sinang tampara, Kumponinge diikaang tampara nko-nkonanka-koo deeru-koo dau be'nu'umaung.

Tee diikaang avuavu' tee Epaparodaitas averio' nkavui pou'nung tee enang nkavansing. Tee bakei mmau' masikeng bono' divu'ui otong. Aa'na' maanto'muing. Tee avuavu' tee boontunang makosi tampa' nuuraa' Kumponing-koo, ai' Kumponing tee boontunang temurii'koo dotuaramaung.
Ee'noko teie nkaang Kumponinge teing ookara kapoo'nanka dii' apuka'dariaining aruriaing, mmau' aa'na' makotui otoko teieta bakaang paning-koong o'meeva-ita Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo kuunge.
Bakei daangang Niuma Kumponing-koo otoi otoaing ookara batei-koo. Ee'.
Nkaang tampa' tang nauereriai teing ookara meekupoong Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo kuunge. Ainge mmaikori'ke ni'ninka nari' o'norimainge dii'anko biikaang tampa' tang botoaamang.
Ookarai Kumponing bakaning meekupoonge anke Rooma'ke otoromainge tampara tampaamaang dii'koo, baru'noo' teinge botovotonaa'nukai tee daurarong˜ Siisa' bakanava'kooninge.
Tee biraanke tee Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaang diikaang tanuaang ninka nari' otomatoaing.
Masikung.

Ning tee Paula' Jiisuu' Karistoo'ke kara okomui nkavama'naang miru'muu'nung Kumponing piavou'na'. Aung Timoti mmaiko' nari' pakumui daarirerorompimang dii' nee'maikorori' teke Kolosi-navuntu'koo otorining, dii' Karistoo'koo mutekaro'dariri baitorarimaing, Kumponing bakaning meekupoong;
Biraanke ee'noko mooa dii'koo otoaing Kumponing Niuma-itaing.

Epaparasie naumuresio' taaravampetu' tee diikaang masika'anta Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo ee'noko napo' tee diikaang piaa nari' teing-koo nii'ning Kumponing bakaning meekupoong-koo ookara-koo. Tee'koo nee'ke tee neekaang kunsi-koo ookara batei-koo tampara tampampemaung tee-koo Kumponing tee niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' Bauma-koo.

Dii'ke nemperimaung nooruupieri tee biraanke Kumponinge te' paning-koo kinkonteruru'nung dama'ke komperiaing, ee'noko tee nooruupi te' okora'ario' dii' tee' baitorariri piaareerimaung tenang tee doorenang masikung ee'noko tampara tutung nauraario' taaraveru'nang-eta.

Ookara kansi'koo teie doorenang tamparai mmau' nantoong bere'antavurima biikaang aarumo paari-antavurimaung tee' nari' dii'koo mintoomparamaatomana' te'mung-eta doompeto tee Kumponing-nung piaa otoina' masika' punkaamperitaa' tutung taaraveru'na'mung-eta.

Tee tee aung doorenang tampara dii'ke teie Epaparasie, nii' ninka nari' narung botovotonaa'ke aa'na' piaavampimaunge, naururio' taaraveru'nung, tee nkaang noru' siompui dii'ankoi kake'iiari mintoomparamaung Karistoo'koo kuunge.
Teie napo' nee' naumuretu' tee' piaareerimana' Tanuaang Meekung-koo kuunge.

Tee'koo nee'ke dii'koo tutung taaravampetu'noo'keta kunsi-koo uaamoreaung dii'ke noru'erii'naang tee bakaang pia dii'ke dupe-anta-koo, ee'noko maanto'antararii'naang teie Tanuaang-aapenung noru'ke ee'noko mataue.

Tee' kunsimarekoo' dii'ke aa'noo'naang: tampa' Ovoring-koo makosina' otoriai ookamentai tee dotu-antaveriaina', sinang tampara nkaveriai tee-koo ookara nko-nko tampara-koo, ee'noko Kumponing aa'na' punkaamperi˜ noru'eriai.

Napo' tee'ke nee' kunsimaremaunge dii' puring-antarurii'naang teie iri'ke deto basie Kumponing-etainge meenasi-po'nunge tee kapoo' ivekeng tavo'kuaining-koo tampa' nari' purintariri dotu ninka mii'kiri otorii'naang.
Ee'noko doturariri Niuma-koo tampa' tamperimaatoai nii' ookara makosi-antamuru'nung-koo tee barenku nka-koo, teing ninka nii'ning Kumponing bakaning meekupoong ninka nari' araka-kooning ninka.
Ai' Kumponinge tee nii' Sietani' bakaang muu' mutaanang-eta moo'muru'nung ee'noko teie Bauring aa'na' piaavumaung bakaang muu'aape kuung po'antamuru'.
Teie bakaang erenge boorimurima orara aarumo bakaang iri'keta unaa-antamuru'.

Tee tee Karistoo' tee Kumponing oro'paravaung-koong siuraampi˜ tee Kumponing masika' otoina' oro'antavumaung, Karistoo', tee Ovoring, uro'mara' makosi, ookara kapoo'nanka Kumponinge nkovuru'ning-koo dau basi.

Ai' Karistoo'ke tee Kumponing-koo kuunge ookara kapoo'nanka nkovuru'nung kansi' kooning ee'noko paning-kooning, ooarampimaing ee'noko oo-paa'ning, teing tanuaananka ee'noko biikaang ovontunanka nari', piatooronuka˜ pina' avatevaatang-koo otoroining. Teing Karistoo'ke nkovuru'ning, ee'noko Kumponinge Karistoo'koo boong oto'koo miru'uru'ning.
Tee tee ookara kapoo'nanka nkoaravaruko otoko', ee'noko ookara kapoo'nanka teie kompuri otoko deeko' otoromaung.

Ee'noko tee tee bore' bakanavitu dootuu'nupoong-koo. Ee'noko bakanavitu teing tee-koong mono makosinuka. Ee'noko tee tee ookara-koo okora'. Tee tutuna'nung boo'keta daa'koo. Tee'koo tee tee ookara-koo bore' deempari otomaung.
Ai' Kumponinge tee bakaang tampara aarumo ookara Bauring-koo miru'ura tee-koo dupeario' oto'antavuu'.
Ee'noko tee-koo Jiisuu'koo kuunge Kumponinge ookara kapoo'nanka osikoimpuru', aa'noko kansi'kooning ee'noko paning-kooning, mooa tavo'ura bakaang erenge aa'barata'koo booma.
Ee'noko dii' tee'ke nari' osikointuru'ninge, tero tee Kumponing-eta isipo' otoriko'ning tee-koo kare-nupoong deentariri, diikaning norunoru'nanka siomperima ee'noko nko-nko oreng.
