Ee' dii' teing enang Kumponing ninka napo' navu-antanii'nuka bauring bakaang monoi naning-naumpario' boo'koo taura'puu'nung-koo, dii' kiiroraa'daririo' meeka'nisinuka baka-koo uro'kanoo' po'antarurii'naang.

Teka dii' teing enang be'nu'antarariri otoriaing diikaang masika'anta ninka, tampa' e'maniri pinka'dariri. Teieta nempampimaung-koong noorupi-eta diiri'dariauka' tenang tee doorenang tampara taaraveru'nang nkaveru'nung-eta. Ai' tee tee doorenang tampara ookara-koo nantoong Kumponinge paninga boonamenge nkovuru'ning-koo daankiampimaung. Ning Paula' teie tee doorenang nkavui nanu' deemaru'nung.

Ning tee enang dotumaramang teing manki'nanka kune'amaing-koo dii' pakurampima, ai' tee' nkomarama nkaang monoi dupe-antavamaung teing sisikeerananka Karistoo'ke miru'muu'ning tora'koo bakanavitu dootuu'nupoong pakuarama, bakaang mono makosinavitu.
Ning tee Kumponinge baka botomuio' dootuu'nupoong biikaang kara-pare' deemaru'nung dii' paku-koo, tee Kumponing bakaang kara opansi sira'panko dii'ke noru'erii'naang.
Tee kapoo' makensi'nung otomaung mare' mmau'koo ee'noko napo' teing-koo nantoong kansi'koo-nupoong-koo, teka enang asi'namu' sira'paring teing-koo bakaning meekupoong.

Kumponing bakaang pia tee teing ookara nantoong amutemurii' noru'anta-koo tee kapoo' makensi'nung tampara masikung, Ju' naing deea'. Tee kapoo' makensi'nung tee aung ee' oro', Karistoo' tee dii'koo kuung otong ee'noko dii'ke tee enang nemperi otong bokururira paning-koo be'antarurii'naang.
Nii'ke tee tee doorenang Karistoo'koong ookara nantoong sirakura' nau-antavarampimaung amutemurii' noru'nanka-koo pakuarampima, teing ookara Karistoo'koo petaa'oroaina' tautauarampima.
Tee'koo ning pore' kompamaung aa'na' mintoomarama Ovoring bakaang iri'koo e'manansi tukomuko mintoomaramaung-koo.
Ninge tee dii'ke noru'koo piamoing tee dii'koo ning pore'momana' dii' pakurampima ee'noko napo' teing-koo Leodesia'nupoong-koo nari', ee'noko napo' teing-koo nkaang oing mme' oomaavaing-koo.

Dii' diikaang domang kuaa'dori otorii'naang pore'momaung, teie piaae naro'ka dai'durii'naang ee'noko noru' dupenii' nkaverii'naang dii'ke Karistoo' kenkumperiaina' tero Kumponinge makempuko'nung pako'pari'uu'noo'keta.
Ai' tee ookara noru' ee'noko mataunanka aa'na' tamparananka Karistoo'koo kuunge otoko nkaveru'nung.
Ee'noko ninge tee' naurampimang naninge nii'nunge kara menaankai kanu'antarurira tosiruri'neeng-koo.

Ai' ning tee bane isipo' o'nong nkaang mono, teka tee nkaang domange punkaantampiri otong. Ee'noko bakei aa'na' dotumaramaung diikaang otooto' tampa' otori mintoontarimaung-koo, Karistoo'koo e'maniri baitorariritaa'.
Tee tee, dii'ke tee Jiisuu' Karistoo' diikaang Ovoring masika'antaveru'na'koo, tee' nari' tee-koo kuung otoriaing.

Ee'noko napo' tee-koo kuunge pinka'dariri ari'arurira du'duriai, ee'noko tee masika'antaveri pinka'dariri otoriai tee' ee'na' bare-antaraaru'na', ee'noko aa'na' dotu-eta tampa' tamperimaatoai Kumponing-koo.

Dii' tarerariri otoriai, nantoong-etaing daang-koong matau ninka aavaraarima kanu'antaraari'neenga, aa'ning ninka toomo ee'noko norunoru'nanka kanto'puaing kansi'aapening, Karistoo' bakana' nauraaria'.

Ai' Karistoo' tee nii'koo narung deempari otoi ookara aarumo Kumponing bakaang tee-koo dupeario' otoi otomaung, ee'noko tee tee ookara tanuaananka-koo ovontung-koo dau basi biikaning piatooronuka ninka nari';
Tee'koo dii' tee-koo Karistoo'koo kuung porimaing teing kapoo'koo apuka'daria' otorimaing Kumponinge dii' ba'maikori' tanturiaina'koong.

Aa'noko tenang dii' Karistoo'koo poru'nang teie tee dii' dopa' toto'nii'nuka pina' makosinuka deeng-antaruru' urikung onou orara mono-aapenung toto'antarurima, Ju'pina' birenge nkona' deea', teka teie Tanuaang-aapenung nko-nkoi.

Ee'noko tenang dii' teie ntong-koo minkie meeka'antaraaru'nang dii' teing Karistoo' ninka nari' Kumponinge dako'duru'ning tee urikung aarumo onoue komperiko'ning ninka. Ee'noko napo' tee Karistoo' ninka nari' daa'duru', Kumponing bakaang iri' tasi'peri masika'antaveriko, Jiisuu' boo'keta daa'uu'nung-koong.

Aa'noko tero mme' bere'daria' dii' teing tanuaang boo'nuka otoriko' urikung onou toto'daria' otoriko'nung-koo, diikaning oraka' nkonanka ninka dai'dariri, teka enang Kumponinge dii' teing Karistoo' ninka nari' domanturining ee'noko diikaning oraka' nkonanka tonta'deruri ookara.

Ee', Moosesi bakaang botoi nii' orara aarumo-po'ning boo'numpo'nuka tammuriko, Kumponinge piaamurira niikaang oraka' nkonanka-koong deeru kuivuu' kara tumpituumpi-koong ninka nari'. Bakei, taapo' tonta'ura aa'barata'koo taakavuu'.

Napo' teie teka ma'nari-koong ovontung biikaning piatooronuka ninka nari' orari-antavuru' ookara-koo dutakanoo'ka sira'antavui, ai' Karistoo'ke biikaang iri' kiru'urira tamunsi'nuka deeng-antavuru' aa'barata'koo boo'paru'noo'ke.

Tee'koo teinge aava nkonukai Ju' biikana'koo tuumpiraariko taaraverereriauka' taamang tovang ntong nai dovang-koo, nii'noo' doong pankeng-koo aa'ning-koo: dootuu'kooning doong pankeng, kaara neraku dupumanang, ee'noko Doong Uaana'mung.

Ai' aing teing tamunsi'ning uu'aa' makosining urikupoong nau-antavuriko'ning kapoo' tavo'kuaining-koong, teka enang teing ookara Karistoo'koo kuunge dupenii'nanka deemparirio' Karistoo' narung tee mono masikung nii'ke noru'koo makosi.

Napo' teinge aava nkonukai dii' dootuu'nupoong makosinuka deeaing tantaariko taaraverereriauka', aa'paako, “Dii' oki'nareka' Kumponinge taara-koo makosinuka deea', bakaning koosinunanka-anko kunsirariko deeko' makosi.” Teing tee' nauraarimaing daang noone-koo ooaamaing-koo e'manaama deravarimaung, ee'noko biikaange monoi noru' oraka' siong-antavurio' tamung boturopa daangamparikoo'.

Ee'noko teing nantoong tee' oro'nuka teing Karistoo'koo be'nu'aria', tee Bore' nii'koo ee'noko nii' bakaang mono makosinuka. Teie narunge bau'uma tanatavuio' bakaang mono panka'paramaung anairu-tenairu karu dovange be'nu'antavari tee Kumponing bakaang miru' siompario'.
Dii' teing Karistoo' ninka nari' dooru'ning deentariritaa' norunoru'nanka kanto'puaing kansi'aapening-koo enang dai'daria' otoring.
Tee'koo biikaning dootuu'koong botonanka-koo noru' kato siperiauka' taamang tovang bio' kereng-koong.
Teing aing kapoo'nanka teing tamung namu'ke paa'numpo' kompampiko, temurii' boto nantoong-etaning tamunsi'ning nau-antananka deemparako.

Masika', oo-koo tee matauna' oro'pari otong boto tampeng-pina', teka teinge nii' mono bakaang pia-ita unaa-anta-koo pakumaariarupeu'. Tamung daang dootuu' avutevu'anta-kooning, ee'noko baru' boonko noru'arama baka mono sisikeera-anta-kooning.

Dii' teing Kumponinge Karistoo' ninka nari' daa'antarurining nerakung domaang-koo. Tee'koo dii'ke kapoo'ning paning-aapening naing piarori otoriai te' ee'noo' Karistoo' otoinoo'ning, Kumponing-koo tampavine-koo daurarompari ba'nanui.
Diikaang noru'ke deto basina' kapoo' paning-kooning noru'eri otomatoai, kapoo' kansi'kooning noru'eria'.
Ai' dii' teing kansi'nameng-koo dooru'ning pina' oro'nuka, ee'noko diikaang domaang tee Karistoo' ninka baku'ari otong Kumponing-koo.
Karistoo' tee diikaang domaang okovenung, ee'noko tenang Karistoo' napo' oro'paravainang dii' tee' nari'ke tee ninka nari' oro'dariainge teke sirapo'ke Kumponing bakaang meenasi komperi.
Tee'koo kapoo' kansi'aapening dii'koo otoining boo'antaveriai aa'ning: kaukauro nko, noru' ku'mi', karakaraa', mamairo, ee'noko onou oko'oko-koong, tee' tee' kumponing daang-koong siona'.
Tee temurii' kapoo' nkoaamaung-koo tee Kumponinge teing taarapiikanuka kiimata-koo iira ninka poaing te'mung.
Aing teing aarumonanka dii'ke tero nkoveriko'ning tenang dii' temurii' aarumo-koo kuung otori.
Teka enang aing aarumo ee' oro' dii'keta tonta'eriai: iira, turang, oraka' mantong, poore' ee'noko deu'.
Tosireeria' otoai, ai' dii'ke tee, tee urikung onou tero tonta'eru'nung teing ninka bakaning aarumonanka ninka.
Enang tee dii' onou nerakung deentaririning Kumponinge nkovuing, ee'noko teie doong kante paari-antavumaung tee-pina' oro'paraa'naang tee masika' kenkumperiaina'.

Enang tee neraka'darira tankatankaang dii'koo meu'ke otoa'. Kiriki'nupoong, Ju'nupoong-eta tankaamparia', dopa' toto'nii'nuka toto'pariaing-eta tankaamparia'. Ee'noko nantoong amutemuu' namuu'pina' otorong. Botovotonaa'nuka ee'noko osikaiaang nari' otorong – ai' Karistoo' tee ookara-koo nari' otong ee'noko teie narunge nii' bakaning ookara komuri otomaung.

Dii' teing piaarurira Kumponinge bakaning meekupoong deentariri otorii'naang miru'durining. Tee'koo aing aa'ning aarumo kuruntariri otoriaing: domang-eta piaa bauko, tampa'nko, boonko oto', dooroonto', ee'noko mii'kui oto'.
Naruna' naruna' oraka' noru'deeria' otorimaatoai. Nii'nung ninka minkuminku otoko deeko' tonta'antareereai tee' Ovoringe tonta'antaruru'na', ee'noko dii'ka tee' nari' tonta'antareerimaatoai.
Ee'noko ookara-koo daua piaa oto'deruriai, dii' ookara naro'ka dupeari narung onou deeng-antaruriaina'.

Ee'noko tee Karistoo'ketaing mooa taura'periaing teie tanataruriaina' tee diikaang domang, dii' ee'ning Kumponinge bokururu'ning tee-koo mooa-koo kuunge narung mono makosinuka deentariri, ee'noko ookara batei-koo tampa' tamperimaatoai.

Napo' tee' Karistoo' bakaang karai maanto'duri otoriai, aa'noko dii' tee matauna' nau-antareeriai ee'noko tautaureeriai pakureerima, ee'noko kenararimatoai teinge aa'ninge: Daari Meekung-koo daarinii'nankai, nantoonge toroaamainge ee'noko Tanuaang Meekunge karantavuko˜ kenanankai tampara tamperima Kumponing-koo diikaang domange.
Ee'noko aming kapoo'nanka dii'ke nkoveriaining, karai ee'noko nko-nkoi, Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaang miring-koo nkoverima Kumponing tee bauma-koo tampa' tamperimaatoaing Jiisuu'koo kuunge.
Dii' manii' nampeesinii'nuka, dii'unkaampi biikaang kara aroo'erimaatoai tee' Ovoringe pia-antaruri otoina'.
Napo' dii' donkaang nampeesinii'nuka dii'ankaampi piaaverererimaatoai booni' antavereria'.
Napo' dii' biurukaa'ke diumaraang taaraverererimaatoai ookara kapoo'nanka-koo, ai' tee'koo tee Ovoring dotuaramaung.
Dii'ke biumaraange diurukaa' iirang-antaverereria' otoai konte-antavereri'neenga.

Napo' dii' botovotonaa'nuka diikaning kansi'kooning ovontung taaraverererimaatoai ookara kapoo'nanka-koo, tenang dutai ooraario' naro' deea' tampa' ooraariaina' noru'eri, teka aroo'dariri mintoontarimaatoai Ovoring-koo mintoona' nari', naning-koo deea'.
Kapoo' nko-nko nkoveriaing tampa' diikaang domang-eta nkoverimatoai Ovoring-koo mintoompevurimaung-pina' noru'eri, naning-koo deea', Ovoring-eta barenku nkaveriaina' noru'eri tee diikaang moo';
Ai' dii' teing tee-koo Ovoring Karistoo'koo dai'dariri mintoontarimaing.
Teie naninge kapoo' orara nkovumaatoainge tee maku'noo'koo tee orara nkavuaing, tee moo' tee kapoo' orara nkovumaung-koo ee'noko naninge baari'uauka'nung.
Dii' tanata nkonuka, teing diikaning dii'koo mintoomparimaing makosina' tampa' nkovererimaatoai, ee' noru'eri, “Nii' tee'ke niikaang Tanata-nko paning-koo oto'memuring.”
Kunsi-koo uaaroria' otoai onou tanterariri Kumponing-koo tampa' tamperima.

Ee'noko nii' kunsi-koo pakumererimaatoai, Kumponinge nii' karanaang daate'memurii'naang tee doorenang tampara Karistoo' bakaang tero baku'ari otoko'nung daankiampiaina', tee tenaare aa'naare ning anke kiimatamari o'nong.
Napo' ning kunsi-koo pakumeriai ninge tee kara tampa' siraka'antavampaina' tee' ninge minku-koo makosina' minkuama.
Teing ninka mutaanang-nupoong ninka otori mataurariri nanirimaatoai batei tamung kera'peria'.
Kara-koo mataurariri nari' karerima aroo'antana' karerimaatoai, ee'noko maku'erima to'biirariri karerimaatoaina'.

Tikikasie tampa' naururiaing dii' teing ookara kapoo' ninge nkoamaing. Tee aung Tikikas tee nii'maiko' masikung, tee nii' ninka nari' Ovoring bakaang botovotonaa' kake'iiari mintoomparamaung Ovoring-koo.
Ninge dii'anko botoamaang dii'ke nii' o'norina' noru'erii'naang ee'noko teie dii' napo' kuaa'antaruriai diikaang domang.
Napo' Onesimas nari' Tikikas ninka botoamaang, tee napo' tee'ke tee narung nii'maiko' kake'iinung, tee diikanavuntu'nung narung. Tenaankai nauraariaing kapoo' ookara anke nkoaramaing.

Aristakasie tampa' tang botovumaang dii'anko teie ni'ninka kiimatanava-koo nari' o'noremaunge, napo' teie Maaka'ke, Baanabas baara'ma'nunge, tampara tampumang dii'koo. Tee aung Maaka' tee dii'anko beko tee tampa' onkeonke'eriaing tee' naurampiru'na'.

Narung napo' teie Jiisuu' Jasitasie tampa' tang dii'anko botovumaang. Anaanka nanaanka Ju'koonaanka masikaanka teing-koo mintoong-koo pakumaarimaing-koo Kumponing bakaang muu' kani-anta-koo. Tenaanka mmarang-koonaanka deempareko nari' o'noritaa' tampa' mantomaramaung.

Napo' diikanavuntu'nunge Epaparasie dii'anko tampa' tang botovumaang, teie Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaang botovotonaa'ke. Teie tee dii' kunsi-koo aa'na' iri'oi pakururimaung, dii' purintariri otorii'naang petaa'dori, ee'noko Kumponing bakaang pia koonto' tasi'periai dii'ke.
Ninge tee tampa' masika' noru'ansi o'nong tee, tee'koo ninge ee' naurampimang: Tee tee bakei pore'omaung dii' Kolosi-nupoong tovang paku-koo, Leodesia'nupoong ee'noko Aiaapolis-nupoong.
Napo' teie Luuke'ke niikaang dokutai domang-eta aa'na' piaavampimaunge Dimas ninka nari' tampa' tampuremaang dii'koo.
Enang tee dii'ke nkaang tampa' tang teing nii'maikorori' Leodesia'ke otoromaing nauereriaing ee'noko teni Nimpa teing ninka nari' bakanava-koo dootuu'arimaing ninka.

Aung ane' karavoto deeruaako taareverirai'nange dii'ke napo' dootuu'nupoong Leodesia'ke otoromaing-aape botoveriai teinge napo' deeruaavaina', ee'noko napo' tene' Leodesia'aape botoantu'nane' tee'ke, dii'ke napo' deerueriai.
Ee'noko Akipas nauerima aa'periai, “Dake tee nko-nko Ovoringe aruu'nung tampa' dupe-antaveaing.”

Aung tee anairu karavoto-koo basinairu ninge ninka ane' kompansi nkaang birenge daariamang tampa' tang botoanko nkaang taa'ni'anta ooverira tasi'memurii'naang. Kunsi-koo norunoru'merimatoai, ai' ning tee kiimata-koo sieenai dai'mari o'nong.
Tee biraanke tee dii' ninka nari' otoaing. Ee', tee' nari'.

Tee ning Paula'. Sailas naankai Timoti pakumuresitaa' daarirerompimang dii' Niuma Kumponing ee'noko Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' beekaning dootuu'nupoong Tesalonaika'ke otorimaing. Biraanke ee'noko mooa dii'koo otoaing.
Kumponing tampara tampampimaung doong kante dii'koo ookara-koo ee'noko tantarampimaunge dii' niikaang kunsi-koo ookara-koo.

Tenang kunsimarima niikaang Kumponing-koo, tee Niuma-koo, nii' ampa'moriaung aa'nong: Kumponing masika'antana' otorii'naang pore' komperimaung-koo, nantoong piaaverererii'naang tu'dorimaung-koo, ee'noko niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' toroaravaina'mung bateinang-koo doong kante aa'na' noru'erimaung-koo.
Nii'maikorori' Kumponinge piaarurimaing, nii'ke noru'ampiri otong Kumponinge dii' miru'duru' bakaning deentarii'naang.

Aming-koo tee' noru'ampiri otong? Nna' tee doorenang tampara tampa' tavo'ario' ooampira dii'koo. Tee minkunaa dii'koo tavo'ampiru'nung tamunsi'nung deea', Tanuaang Meekung bakaang purinto' ninka tavo'aru'. Teie tee minkunaa masikung iri'oi tasi'antaruru'. Ee'noko tee dii'ke tasi'peri niikaang aarumo tampara, napo' tee minkunaa masikung tasi'peru'.
Tee'koo dii' nii'koo bi'antarariri siomperimang tee Ovoring, aa'nong bane pore'anta kune'erima niikaang minkunaa taaraveru' Tanuaang Meekunge doturotu-antaruriko.

Dii' aa' enang tee aa'na' masika'antaverimaung-koo nantoonge siontaariaining deentaririning ookavora'ka-kooninge masika'antavarimainge, aa'ninge diikanoo' Masedonia'nupoonge ee'noko Akaia'nupoonge napo'.
Ee'noko baru' Masedonia' naanka Akaia'kooning nainge taaravaava' tee Ovoring bakaang kara dii'keta, teka tee dii'ke Kumponing masika'antaverimana' doonaanka-koo beremparing-koo nii' kara o'noria'.
Teing bii'ka minkuarimaung kapoo'nanka tavo'aru'ning ooaama dii' beero'darampiko. Ee' minkuraarimaung: Dii'ke siperereru' teing diikaning ovontung tositosinanka;

ee'noko bere'dariru' tee Kumponing masikung-anko, tee-koo dai'dariri siomperii'naang, tee ee'nara domaang okovenung; ee'noko enang neng-antararimaung tee Kumponing Bauring paning-eta toroaravainoo'koo. Tee ee'nara boo'keta daa'antavuu'nung, Jiisuu', nii' domang-anta tee-koo Kumponing bakaang iira dama' tavo'aravaing-koo.
Dii' nii'maikorori' ooveriko, tee beroveero' nii'ke beero'darampiko'nung tamunsi'nung deea', teka teie tee sinang nkavuu'nung.

Dii'ke noru'eri otong nii' tee Pilipai-namono-koo bakei oraka' nkomaariko'; turamaaru' dii'anko mme' tavo'kampiaruko; aa'na' masika' tora'antamaaru' teka. Nka Kumponinge puring-antamurio' nanampira napo' dii' daankirarampiru' tee tampara doorenang, bane napo' aa'na' turamaariko.
Niikaang tautau tee boturopa deea'; napo' bakiaa' nko-koo minkuampia'; ee'noko aava nkoampia' nii'ke.

Teeo, Kumponinge tee makosinuka tammurira aroo'muri botomuru' tee doorenang tampara bereng-antavampii'naang. Tee'koo nii'ke enang sira'pampimang Kumponinge niikaang noru' paaramurimaung dotu-anta-koo, nii'nung naning dotu-anta-koo deea'.
Dii'ke tampa' noru'mereri otong nii'. Dii'koo kara menaanka minkuampia'. Ee'noko Kumponinge noru'ui otong dii' nii'ke diikaang kapoo' okomurii'naang navurarampia' niikaang minkunaa daka'puio'.

Ee'noko napo' nii'nung naninge daangamuriaroo'naang dii'koo, aing-koonge ee'noko nii'ning-koonge. Aunoo' masika' nii' Karistoo' bakaning kara okovuri nkanuka. Nii' pia-koo dei tee dii'ke nii' daangamerereripeu'. Nka nii'ke daangang besi'ampia'.
Tamung ka'duumariri o'noriko' dii' ninka, nani toire' tanatavurimai-pina'.

Tee'koo nii'ke dii' piaararampiri dii' tee doorenang tampara Kumponing-etaing arorompiru', ee'noko tee narung deea', nii' nii'ka napo' avu'koo makosi-antamariko', dii' bakei nii'maikorori' masikeng deentariru'nung-koo.

Ee mmaikori', dii'ke masikee-antameripeu', ai' noru'eri otong nii' tee bakei aa'na' pore'moriko' iri' o'marima, birenge mintoomarima doong ee'noko muung nii'ka bau'marii'naang dii' pore'antararampiaroo'naang taamang tovang-koo, tee doorenang tampara Kumponing-nung daankiampima.
Dii' teing nii' niikaning sirasira' nkonuka, Kumponing napo' tee'ke, niikaang tare dii'koo baito-nupoong-koo kiiroraa' ee'noko koonto', tuumpi otoa'.

Noru'eri otong dii'ke, nii'ke tee dii' nari' tarerarampiko' tee' biumai toire' tarevurimana', tautau ninka domang kuaa'antararampiri, dunsirunsi˜antararampiri, ee'noko to'bii-antararampiri dii' Kumponing dotu-antana' otorii'naang, tee ee'nara dii' bokururu'nung bakaang muu'koo ee'noko meenasi-koo kuunge otorii'naang.

Ee'noko nii'nung kapoo'koo Kumponing tampara minkuampimaung: Tenang dii'koo daankiampiko dii'ke tee kara niikaang-pina' noru'eriaruko'nung, teka tampa' taaraveriko' tee kapoo' minkuampiko Kumponing bakaang kara-pina', teie ee'nunge diikaang domang bere'antaruru' tenang dii'ke masika'antaveriko.

Ee'noko enang dii' teing nii'maikorori' masikeng otorimaing Kumponing bakaning dootuu'nupoong Judia'nameensi'koo otoromaing-pina' nari' Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo kuunge, ai' diikanoo'nupoonge pore'antaraarimaunge Ju'nupoonge pore'antavaariko'na' biikanoo'nupoong.
Teing ee'ning tavau'ning tee Ovoring Jiisuu' ee'noko nakaronuka˜, ee'noko nii' bata'maaru'.

Tee'koo Kumponing iira-antavau' ee'noko nantoong ookara too'dempaaru' nii' avo'avo'maarima kara nau-koo teing Ju' deeaing domamparipeu'nung. Tee' nari' nkoaakotaa' oraka'nkoi maanto'nuka deempariru'. Tee tee enang asi'namu' Kumponing bakaang iira kune'aavaing.
Nii'maikorori' ee, nii'ke tee oki'noo' si'darampira birontarampi-kotaa' taung besi'ampiru' oomeerii'naang, aa'na' piamorira. A'noo'koo tee noru'ke si'darampia', mono narunge.
Nii' tee dii'anko toro-koo piamori otong. Baru' ning Paula' aa'na' mmau'namu'pie dii' oo-koo paaravantu', nka Sietani'ke avo'avo'uko'.

Dii' beero'koo piamorimang dii' dua'dari'neeng-koo noru'ampiri, ai' dama'ke tee niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' toroarara aming-koo tampa' noru'muriaing? Aming-koo moo'murira dotu-antamuriaing-pina' noru'ampimaung nempampiri? Tee aa' dii'koo ee'ning-koo oorurira masika'antaveriko.
Dii'koo ee'ning-koo dotumariri o'norimaung.
Ee'noko tee'koo nii' baru' nemariaroo'naang; tee'koo nee'ke Sailas naankai aroo'ampesieeng teka Aateni-namono-koo si'muree'naang nee' nee'ka, ee'noko nee'ke botoampetu' tee Timoti dii'anko.
Timoti tee nee'maiko'pina', nee' ninka Kumponing-nung botovotonaa', tampara doorenang Jiisuu' Karistoo'koong nau-anta.

Tee botoampetu' puring-antarurii'naang, ee'noko unaunturii'naang dii'koo narung paapaa'ara'neeng-koo pore'anta kune'uma. Dii'ke dii'ka noru'eri otong tee' nari' pore'anta kune'ampii'naang Jiisuu'ke tero tampuu'na'.
Tenang dii' nii' ninka o'nori tee napo' nii'ke naurarampiko' mme' nkoaravaruko dama'ke tee nii' turamaariaining, enang ooveriko ee'na' nkomaarimaang.

Tee'koo, nemaravarui, nka namu'ke botoansieeng tee Timoti diikaang otooto' noru'koo piamora, aa'pamira, “Teing arekee' otorong: Sietani'ke paaravuriko mme' masika'antavai otong Karistoo'? Ai' dua'ariru'nunge?” – niikaang nko-nko daang deempara'neenga.

Teka tee Timoti toroarieeng nee'anko dii'ankoita. Ee'noko toroarara tampara minkunaa naumuresieeng diikaang baito-koo ee'noko diikaang piaa. Aa'muresieeng dii'ke nii' tampa' noru'mererima nee' napo' oo-koo aa'na' piarorimaung, tee' nari' nee' dii' oo-koo aa'na' piamoremana'.
Ee'noko ee nii'maikorori', tee' taaravampeta tee pore'anta ee'noko turang kune'ampimaung ampa'morema domang kuaa'moretu', diikaang baito purimpari otoko tasi'pampeta.
Dii' purintariri Kumponing-koo bi'dariri otoriko nii' Sailas dovang Timoti enang domamariri o'noring.
Enang tee nii'ke aa'na' tampara minkuampimaung Kumponing-koo dii'ke Kumponing tampa' siomperiko dotumarimaung-koo.
Aa'na' kunsimarimaung muung ee'noko doong dii' ninka ee'ning ninka oing oomeerii'naang. Ee'noko pakurarampiai dii' apuka'dariri otoing-koo diikaang baito-koo.
Enang tee Niuma Kumponinge ee'narai ee'noko Ovoring Jiisuu'ke koong-antavureaing niikaang taung dii' beero'koo nanampiainavung.
Ee'noko Ovoringe diikaang aarumo piaa-koong panka'antareruriaing bera aa'na' tampa' piaareeriaina' dii' dii'ka ee'noko ookara nantoong piaaverereriaina', tee' nari' nii'ke dii' piaararampimana'.

Ee'noko tee'koo puring-antaruriai tuumpi otoriaing deentariri otoriaina' meeka'dariri niikaang Kumponing ee'noko Niuma-koo uro'kanoo'ke tenang Ovoring Jiisuu' Toroaravainang teing ninka ookara bakaning meekupoong ninka.

Enang aa' dii' nii'maikorori' nii'ke dii' pia-antararampimaang unampampiri tee-koo Ovoring Jiisuu' napo' dii' nii'koo barerariaing tee' dii' tampa' otoriaina' Kumponing dotu-antaveri tee' ee'na' enang nkoverimang, nka baru' aa'na' nkoveriaing.
A'noo' tee noru'eri otong tee botonanka naurarampiru'nung tee-koong Ovoring Jiisuu'koo kuunge.
Tee tee ee'nara pia Ovoring bakaang, dii' poterariri meeka'antararii'naang tee-koo aarumo kaukauro nko-koong.
Tee'koo dii'ke tampa' noru'eriaing koonto' narunge baka ba'aang masikani nampuaina' meeka'antarariri toosirariri otoriaina'.
Tamung karaa'deerima siong-antareeriauka' Kumponing noru'aavaing-pina'.
Nii'nung naninge ba'maiko' pari'uauka'nunge aung kapoo'koo. Ovoringe tee temurii' kapoo' ootukunung maku'antavumaung, tee' tero koono-antararampiri naurarampiru'na'.
Ai' Kumponinge dii' ku'mi'koo miru'duria', teka kiiroraa'dariri oto'koo miru'duru'nung.
Tee'koo tee naning aung kara masikung dimpa'uaing deeko', naning dimpa'ua', Kumponing ee'nara dimpa'uing, tee Tanuaang Meekung arurimaung.
Tee-koo piaa, namaia' piaareerimaung-koo, Kumponinge tero bareruru'nung piaareerii'naang kapoo' daari-koo makosi otoa'.
Ee'na' ootukuning dii'maikori' Masedonia'nameensi'nupoong piaaverererimaung, masika'. Nka enang nii'ke iri'mori unantarampimaang ee': Diikaang aarumo piaa-koong panka'antaveriaing.

Ee'noko to'bii-antarariri ka'duuro'nuka otorii'naang nii'ning biikaang nko-nkonanka-koo papuraanka'antaverereriauka', teka dii'ka diikaang, kake'iirariri mintoontariai dii'ka diikaning birenge, botorarampiru'na'.
Tee' nari' akoviturie tee-koo masika'antaraariaing. Nii'nung-koo aroo'dari ata' naniauka'.
Enang tee dii' nii'maikorori' teing Karistoo' bakaning boorou'ning-koo tampa' naurarampii'naang piamorimang dii' orarun-sirariauka'na', tee' nii'ning nkoarimana' Karistoo'koo nemparia' otoromaing.
Nii'ke masika'antavampiri otong Jiisuu' tee boo'parara napo' daa'aru'. Tee'koo tee' noru'ampiri otong Kumponinge Jiisuu' bakaning boorou'ning napo' tee ninka nari' tavo'antavuriaing.
Ovoringe tutung naumuriko dii' nari' naurarampimaang: Nii' teing booroma si'maaru'ning Ovoring poaina'mung-koo dama'due bi'mariaing boorou'ning-koo.
Ai' Ovoring ee'nara paning-eta siarama aa'na' bokumuriaing koosinung pankaing-pina' bokuma, Kumponing-etaing tuuviri karoi otoko. Ee'noko Karistoo' bakaning boorou'ning ee'namu' daa'ariaing tutung.
Teka tenang nii' booroma si'maaru'ning deto baramuriaing teing ninka kamo'koo kune'koo tee Ovoring auvi'aua. Tee' nari' tapo'meerira Ovoring ninka o'noriaing.
Enang tee dunsirunsi˜antareeriaing aunge karai.
Nii'maikorori' ee, baru' bateinang poaina'mung naurarampii'naang nia'meriauka'nung dii'ke.
Ai' dii'ke tee tampa' noru'eri otong Ovoring poaina'mung makensi'na'mung, bakisipunuka biikaang bateinang-pina' tenang muunga.

Tenang nantoonge aa'pai otoko, “Nii' tampa' o'norimaang mooa-koo,” ee'namu' ta'ning-antana' biikaang otooto' mooa-po'nung turariaravaing. Tee' tee-pina' maniku' pareaava'naang ta'ning-antana' sisikeeravoromana'; baari'aavauka'nung.
Nka dii' nii'maikorori' mutaanang-kooning deea'. Te'mung doong basiarama ta'ning-antaruriauka'nung bakisipung-pina'.
Dii' ookara tee araka baurukaa' ee'noko doong baurukaa'ke. Nii' tee mutaanang ee'noko muung-kooning deea'.
Tee'koo enang aatumpiri otoauka' teing nii'ning-pina', teka tantemariri o'noriai taremariri.
Muung tee aasi' bakanang, tenang nantoong naikaama kanu'arimanang.

Teka nii' nantoong doong-kooning deemariritaa' tee taremariri o'noriaing. Ookara piaavarampiri, Kumponing-etaing kara masika'antavampiri, ee'noko moo'muriaina' aa'na' noru'ampiri, orara-ita nee'mariri o'noriaing naning tavutavu' nko-pina' bakaang mono nee'arapeu'na' mononopa' baakopo dovang ivekeng kurumparama.

Ai' Kumponinge tee nii' miru'muria' teie kiimatamurii'naang iiravoma, teka domamurii'naang niikaang Ovoringe, Jiisuu' Karistoo'ke, teie ee'narai nii'koo boo'paru'nunge nii' naro'murii'naang tee ninka toroaravaina'mung-koo, moompiaining ee'noko domamariaining.
Tasi'peri? Makosi, tampara aarumo nko-koo domang kuaa'antareerima otoriaing, ee'noko puring-antareerima tee'pina' nkorarimatomana'.
Nii'maikorori' ee, nii'ke enang ee' minkurarampimaang: Masika'antavereriaing teing nantoong Ovoring-koo kuunge dii' pakuraarimaing taung nau-antaraarima koong-antaraari.
Piaaverereriai, pankaing-antaverereri tee-koo ee'nung-koo mintoong-koo nkoaamato-maung-koo. Mooa-koo otoriaing.

Nii'maikorori', ee' nkoverii'naang botorarampimaang: Koono-antaverereriaing teing kontevoroma ata' nanu'nuka, ee'noko teing avoro'keta orarunsiarimaing dunsirunsi-antavereriaing. Pakuereriaing teing iri' oparimaing. Bointuri otoriaing ookara ninka.
Taura'periauka' orara orarai maku'koo, teka paku baukonuka deentariri otoriaing dii' dii'ka ee'noko ookara-koo.
Doturoturariri otorimaatoai.
Kunsi-koo uaaroriauka'.
Bane arekee' nkoarako tampara tamperiaing Kumponing-koo. Tee' ee'na' nkorarii'naang Kumponinge maroruri otong dii' Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo otoriko.
Tanuaang Meekung siri'eriauka'.
Daang tamperiauka' tee kara Tanuaang Meekunge karanta˜,
nka paaraveriaing ookara kapoo'nanka tasi'periainoo'ke basi, ee'noko tenang komperiaing kapoo'nanka masikeng.
Pote-antarariri otoriaing teing-eta kapoo' orarananka-ita.

Teie ee'narai Kumponinge mooa okovosi'ke meeka'antaruriaing, tampa' konturiaing dii' ootukunairue – tanuaang, tunsi, mono – bera Jiisuu' Karistoo' poaina'mung-koo, koonto' tuumpi otoriaing deentariaina'.
Kumponinge bokururu'nunge koonto' si'duriauka'nung. Tee' minkuansina' nari' nkoruriaing.
Nii'maikorori' ee, kunsi-koo pakumereriai.
Dii'ke teing nii'ning nii'maikorori' niikaang doturotu nauereriaing bireng batu'deeri Ovoring-koo kuunge.
Ninge aa'na' botorampimang, Ovoring bakaang miring-koo kuunge: Deerueriaing aung karavoto˜ ootukunung nii'maikorori'ankoi.
Tee biraanke niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaang dii' ninka nari' otomatoaing. Ee', tee' nari'.

Tee ning Paula'. Sailas naankai Timoti pakumuresitaa' daarirerompimang dii' Kumponing ee'noko Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' beekaning dootuu'nupoong Tesalonaika'ke otorimaing. Maikori' Kumponinge biraankeruri mooa ninka otorii'naang.
Biraanke ee'noko mooa dii'koo otoaing Kumponing Niuma-itaing ee'noko teieta Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo'.

Mmaikori' ee, nii'ke tee nau'ka tampara tampampimaung Kumponing dii'koo. Tee' nari' makosina' nko-koo, ai' diikaang masika'anta tampa' dupui otomaung-koo, ee'noko tee diikaang piaa dii'ka bereng-antaverimaung-koo.

Tee'koo nii' doturotumarimaung sira'anta-koo Kumponing bakaning dootuu'nupoong-koo osi kantena'. Nauarampimaung dii' purintariri ee'noko baitorariri otorimaung-koo tenang nantoonge turantaarima pore'antaraariko.
Aung ee'nara taa'ni'anta Kumponing aarumo koonto'koo simpe'anta-koong, aa'noko teie nerirurimang makosi-antarurii'naang tee-koo bakaang muu'koo kuung be'koo baike ninka kavi'erimaung-koo.
Teka teie enang kiimata makosina' maamu-antavui otong teing-koo nantoong dii' oraka' nkoraarimaing-koo, mero'anta-koo.
Tee taa'ni'anta napo' ee' oro': Teie aa' nii' oraka' nko-nko-ita unaa-anta amurima dii' napo' unaa-antaruriainge pore'anta tora'perimaing, te'mung Ovoring Jiisuu' tavo'aravaina'mung;

Teka tee tavo'aravaing paning-eta teing ninka bakaning koosinung˜ purinto'nanka ninka nta' aa'na' urumpari mero-anta-koo teing Kumponing noru'aavaing ee'noko teing Ovoring Jiisuu' bakaang kara tampara siompaavaing.
Kiimata avuriaing ee' oro': Ovoringe bakaang dutakanoo'keta bata'uriai, bakaang iirakuta-koong meenasi ooaavauka'nung ee'noko orari-anta kompaavaing oparavauka'nung.

Tee' nkoaravaing te'mung poaina'mung meenasi nkavuu'naang teing-eta' bakaning meekupoong-eta, deto basi-antavai masika'antavaamaing-eta. Dii' tee-pina' teing-koo meu' otoriainge ai' dii'ke tee masika'antaveru'nung tee, kara bakaang dii' naurarampirio' nii'ke.

Poaina'mung noru'ampima nii'ke niikaang Kumponing-koo kunsirerorompimaung dii' teie dupe-antarurii'naang miru'duru'na' ee'noko napo' dupe-antareruriaing bakaang iri'ke teing tampara aarumonanka ee'noko nko-nkonanka Kumponing masika'anta-itaning daruerimaing.

Tee' nari' tee miring niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' bakaang pankaimparaa'naang dii'koo kuunge, ee'noko dii' tee' nari' tee-koo, bakaang piaae makosina' niikaang Kumponing ee'noko Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo'.
Enang napo' dii' nii'maikorori' naurampimang niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' napo' toroaravaing-koo ee'noko tee niikaang naronaro' tee, kune'ampiaing-koong.

Aa'na' pia-antararampimaang dii' nii'maikorori' paapaa'darima domang puraaniriauka' nii'namurii' kara tavo'arako, Ovoring bakaang doong tavo'kuing, poing, tampaako, bane Tanuaang Meekunge karantanuka˜ tamparima ai' daankiarima minkuaako dootuu'koo ai' karavoto-koo˜ minkuaako ning-etaing tampaama.

Tee' avutevu'ai tosiraariko masika'antavereriauka'. Ee' noru'eriai, kenaanka kapoo' nkoaravaruko Ovoring bakaang doong tavo'kuauka'nung, aa'noko tutung mmau'ke Kumponing-eta bere'arima too'dempaavai ee'noko tee naning Kumponing-nung Boto Meekung daang-anta-koo piavoainung oro'paravaing, teenoo' tee mosianung kuuntu'uaing.

Tee ee'nara naning taarapiika deto basi tamparavaing ookara ovontung-koo nantoonge boontuaarimaing-koo. Ovontung turampuriainge bera dootuu'nava pankava Kumponing-nava koinurai'nange ba'namparara ee' minkuvuaing: “Ning tee Kumponing.”
Aung kara tero naurampiru' dii' ninka o'noritaa', ai' ampa'doru'nunge?
Dii'ke tee noru'eri otong tee doomo'ui otomaung. Teie doomo'ui otoo'naang bera tee bateinang Kumponinge taura'puko oro'paravaina'mung.
A'noo' tee taarapiika aarumo enang makensi'na' nko-nkoaramang doomo'uio' bera Kumponinge tee doomo'ui otomaung daate'uaina'mung.
Karistoo' ee'nara aa'na' araka-po'nung tavo'kura paro'uu'naang bakaang domaange karang-eta, ee'noko teka bake-antavuai bakaang aarumo.
Enang napo' naurampiaing tee-koo naning taarapiika Kumponing-nung Boto Meekung daang-anta-koo piavoainung-koo;

Sietani'ke ee'narai tee taarapiika tavo'antavuu'naang tee ninka bakaang iri' amutemurii' taa'ni'anta tositosi-koong, ta'nimpaarii', ee'noko amutemurii' aarumo orarananka tosi-koong dua'anta-koo teing paa'arimaing kasiaavaruma tee kara masikung domampuripeu'nung.

Tee'koo, kasiaavaruko Kumponinge taura'puaing tositosi pankaing teing-koo tavo'araa'naang, daang-koong masika'antavaako ookara kiimata-kooning tampuriaina', orara aarumo piavoroma kara masikung masika'antavaavaruko.

Nii'maikorori' ee, Ovoringe piaaruri otorining, teka nii'ke tampa' tampampiaing Kumponing-koo dii' ee'ning-koo. Ai' dii' teing Kumponinge tanturu'ning tutuna'noo'keta domantarii'naang Tanuaang Meekunge meeka'antarurio' ee'noko dii'ke kara masikung masika' antaverima.
Kumponinge temurii' otooto'koo bokururu' tee doorenang tampara daankiampiko dii'koo. Dii' bokururu'nung nkaverii'naang tee meenasi niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaang.
Tee'koo dii' nii'maikorori' purintariri tampa' donkoniri otoriai, komperi otoriaing tee kara masikung nii'ke naurarampiru' ookenge daankimarima ee'noko karavoto-koo daariampima.

Tee niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' ee'noko Niuma Kumponing piaamaarimanakang ee'noko biraanke-antamaari domang kuaa'anta boturopa amaarinakang, kapoo' tampara-koo neng-antamaarima – enang tee tekange ee'nakange domang kuaa'antaraariai.
Dii'ke ookara kapoo' tamparananka minku-koo ee'noko nko-koo iri'antaraariaing.
Nii'maikorori' ee, asi'nanaare anaare: Dii'ke kunsi-koo pakumereriai Ovoring bakaang kara iri'narung beremparara kuung deempuriaina' tee'pina' dii'koo meu'ke nkoaru'na'.
Ee'noko napo' kunsi-koo pakumereriai Kumponinge pakumuriaina' teing nantoonge oravoonge tamaari'neeng. Ai' ookarai tee masika'antavaavaung.
Ovoringe tee dii' si'duriauka'nung, puring-antaruriaing ee'noko ueeng-antaruriaing tee orara-koo.
Ee'noko tee nii'ke noru'darampiri otong dii'ke tampa' nkoverimaung ee'noko tee' nari' nkoverimatoaing tee' nari' naurarampiru'na', dii' Ovoring-koo kuung otorimaung-koo.
Ovoringe koonturiaing diikaang domang Kumponing bakaang piaa tasi'perira oro'antaveriaina' ee'noko Karistoo' bakaang pinkapinka' napo' tasi'perima nari' nkoverii'naang toroaravaina'mung nemperi.

Nii'maikorori' ee, enang nii'ke naurarampimaang dii' tee-koo Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaang miring-koo kuunge: Tonta'dariri otoriai teing-eta nii'ning dii'maikorori' kakapotonuka, kake'iirariri mintoontariaina' naurarampiru'nung-koo kanto'pariaing-eta.
Dii'ke tee noru'eri otong nii'koo bi'antarariaina'. Nii' teing kakapotonuka deea' dii' ninka o'noritaa'
Nii' teing nii'nunge tamung bau'muriaruko'ning moo'dopai, teka nii' aa'na' mintoomariko' doong ee'noko muung nii'ke dii' manki'antararampiaroo'naang.
Tee makosi dii'ke nii' tamung bau'koo, nka niikaang mintoong nii'ke nkoampiko'nung tee dii'ke ooveri nii'koo bi'antararii'naang.
Tenang dii' nii' ninka nari' o'noritaa' nii'ke tee tee' nari' napo' tautaurarampiru' ee'pina': Naning kakarua'oaing tee taamang-koo do'de'eriauka'.
Tee' naurarampimaang taarararampira dii'koo nii'ning teing kakapotonuka tamung nii'ning biikaning mintoong-koo papuraanka'antaverererimaing, diikaning mintoong nkosiiria'.
Enang tee temurii' nantoong nii'ke botorarampima tautaurarampimaang Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo kuunge mintoontarii'naang dooroontariri. Diikaang iri'keta' taamaniriaing.
Dii' nii'maikorori' iri' o'dariauka' tee-koo nko-nko tampara-koo.
Naning tee kupi'oko taara-koo aung kara nii'ke minkuampiring ane' karavotonane'koo noru'erira tonta'dariaing tee-ankoita, ee'noko maia'oaing tee.
Karenung pina' noru'eriauka'nung tee, teka tautaueriaing tee-pina' dii'maiko'.
Enang tee Ovoring mooa okovenung ee'narai mooa aruriaing uatepa ootukunung taung-koo. Tee dii' ookara ninka otoriaing.

Enang tee, ninge Paula'ke napo' tampara minkurampimang anaare ninge koonto' daariama nkaang birenge miring taa'ni'antamari. Tee taa'ni'anta ookara karavotonane'pi-koo taa'ni'antamaramaung nkana' daarimaramana'.
Tee biraanke niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaang dii' ninka nari' otomatoaing. Ee', tee' nari'.

Ning aung karavoto˜ daariamaung tee Paula', Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo kara-okomui-nka. Ning kara-okomui-nka deemaru' Kumponinge domamuru'nunge botomuio' ee'noko Jiisuu' Karistoo'ke botomuio' pankaruntoonge noru'ampimaunge ookara kapoo' nempampimaung basi-antamemuriainunge.

Da' Timoti daarireromaang; da' nnuring masikung-pina' noru'damaung Karistoo' masika'antavemaung-koo. Biraanke, piaa, ee'noko mooa da'koo otoaing Kumponing Neuma-itaing ee'noko teieta Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo'.

Enang ninge ee' botoramaang tero pia-antarantu'na' Masedonia'nameensi'aape mema: Da' teke Epeses-namonoi otomatoaing, ee'noko teke otoi teing nantoong miring naurantu'ning siisieri ee' naueriaing: Nii'namurii' kara koonto' deeaung nauaariauka'.

Ee'noko noru'aavauka' kumponaang-koong minkunaa ee'noko boorou'ning biikaang mirinanka depeto parapara boturopa noru'ui oto'koo. Ai' temurii' kara tamunung minkuminku basi-antavumaung, ee'noko tee' minkuaama Kumponing bakanamuiaang tampa' tanatavaariarupeu' ee'narai nauvuru'na'.

Teka nee' kake'iinaanka deemarema tee, tee' nauransina' botoveriaing nantoong piaavaariaina'. Ai' piaa masikung basi-antana' ee': Tampara narung nko-koo piavoroaing; domang kiiroraa'ariri otoaina' nari' nkoariaing; ee'noko tunsi naroompariri tee kara koonto' Kumponing-aapenung masika'antavaavaing.
Teing nantoong teing amurii' aarumo baari'au'ning. Tee'koo teing tamung pooarimaung daang-koong minkuminku-koo.
Bane Moosesi-nung boto nau-antanuka deemparii'naang piavoromaunge, nka tee minkuaamaing-koo kara-koo miru'noo' noru'aava' ee'noko teing botonanka nau-antavarimaing-koong miru' noru'aava'.
Enang tee nii'ke noru'ampiri otong tee Moosesi-nung boto tee tampara, naninge tampa' miru'ari otoina' kompui dei.

Naninge tampa' kompuaing deeko' ee' noru'uaing: Boto tee Kumponinge koonto'nanka-koo miru'ua', teka aing aa'ning-koo miru'uu': teing kara toto'paamaing kupi'oroma, Kumponing sipai orara aarumo nkonuka, dootuu' sipai Kumponing dotu-anta-koo makosi deeaing, biumaraang, biukorovoori ee'noko nantoong dupisi'aarimaing, nantoong maniku' ninka bakiaa'eemaing ee'noko nii'ning ninka nantoong ninka, nantoong tamung bakiaa'aarima baaveaarimaing, tosi baukonuka, ee'noko maraka toto'nuka;
Ee'noko Moosesi-nung botoi napo' teing nii'ning kapoo'nanka tee' nari' oro'ning Kumponing-etaing kara koonto' ninka naroompariaing ookara avo'uri otong.
Ee'noko tee kara koonto' Kumponing-etaing tee ee'nung tee doorenang tampara Kumponinge biraanke o'meevai araka-po'nunge sira'puma ning aroo'mui botomuu' bereng-antavama'naang.

Ninge tampara tampamang tee-koo Jiisuu' Karistoo' niikaang Ovoring ning kake'iinung noru'mura bakaang mintoong-koo bare-antamuu'nung-koo. Tee ee'nara ning puring-antamumaung tee-koo bakaang nko-nko nko-koo.
Bane ning tutung tee bakanamuiaang oraka' nkoaranko', barakosi'ama, poore'ama, nka tee Jiisuu' Karistoo'ke piaamuu'. Aming-koo? Nna' noru'ampa' nkoanko'nung tee, masika'antavamparuitaa';
Tee tee, niikaang Ovoring bakaang piaae nkaning oraka'nko daka'memura biraanke-antamuio', tee ee'nara bakei masika'antavansi domange dai'amaung ninge.

Aung kara masikung, masika'anta-koo makosi, aa'noko, “Jiisuu' Karistoo' kansi'koo pou' nantoong orarananka domampurii'naang.” Ninge masikee-antavampeu', ai' ning tee baru' aa'na' orara teing-koo nantoong-koo boonga.
Teka Kumponinge ning piaamuu' paara-anta deeng-antamuu'naang bakaang aarumo boinare-koong ninka, dama'nupoonge tampa' ooaava'naang, masika'antavaavaiaininge domaang isikung nka-koo.
Tee Kumponing tee' nari' otomaung Ovoring, boo'paa', naninge oovuarupeu' ee'noko tee narung masikung. Deto basi-antavampiaing, nepu'ampiaing tee' nari' botu otoa'. Ee', tee' nari'.

Timoti, da' nnuring-pina' noru'dansi manki' aronsing kara nauransina' botoverii'naang. Tero Tanuaang Meekunge karantavurimainge˜ minkurau'na' nkovema bakaang tavutavu' tampara orara aarumo-aape nkoveai.

Ee'noko tee nkovema kara koonto' masikung narung kompei Kumponing masika'antaveai, nko-nko tampara narung nkovema tunsie tasi'antarumana'. Nii'ninge nantoonge tee biikaang tunsi karomana' dimpa'aarai'nange tee enang kara tositosi masika'antavaamaung. Biikaang masika'anta turari-antavaako'.
Teing-koo nii'naanka Aimeneas naanka ee'noko Aleksanda' ninge be'antavampetu'naanka Sietani' bakaang bireng-koo naunauavareta siparee'naang napo' orara kara minku-koo Kumponing-aape.

Enang arekee' Kumponing bakanamuiaang tampa' oto'koo? Tee aa' tutuna'noo' tee aung nko-nko masikung nkoaava'naang deto aa'na' iri'moi nauaramaung ee': Apuka'arimainge eentavaavai Kumponing. Kunsiariai. Ookara nantoong pakuvurii'naang nia'aavaing Kumponing tampara tampaama.
Baru'noo' tee aa'ning koong-antavuriaing: ovontung ee'noko ookara deto basinuka nii' tampa' mooa-koo oto'antamaariaina' dooroong-antamaari Kumponing tampa' makosina' meumpampiko.
Temurii' nko-nko tee tampara;
Kumponinge nii' domamuru'nunge tampa' oovumaung, ee'narai nantoong ookara domamparii'naang piavomaunge kara masikung tasi'paava'naang.

Ookara masikeng miru'ari otong, ai' Kumponing tee narung masikung otong ookara nantoong-koo, ee'noko napo' narung masikung meu'nung naning otong Kumponing ee'noko ookara nantoong-koo meu', tee ee'nara naning Jiisuu' Karistoo'.

Teie ee'narai ookara nantoong orarai kuung deempuru'noo'keta moo'uru' bakaang mono taura'parama, ee'noko tee-koo bakaang batei masikung-koo taa'ni'pou'. Tee' nkoarama Kumponinge sira'puu' tee tee ookara nantoong domang-anta-koo piavomaung.

Ee'noko ning bakaang kara-okomui-nka miru'muu'nung bakaang minkunaa daankiama' naang. (Ning tosimarava'. Masika' minkuamaang.) Ning bamuu'nung teing Ju'deeaing biikaang nau-anta deemaraa'naang teinge aung kara masikung masika'antavaava'naang.

Tee'koo ookara donkaang ookara osi-kooning bireng deto tooniaitaa'nange kunsiariri otoromaatoo'naang piamomaang, aa'noma biikaang domang kiiroraa'ariri avariritaa' Kumponing-koo, nii'ning nantoong-aape orara mantomantong otoroa', iirarovang ee'noko turang.

Manii' tee teing tampa' naroompariri mononopa' makosining kurumpariaina'koo piamomaang. Avutevu'na' dapo tape'arima, biiri dovang kooro pamparima ee'noko baarong moo' maare-kooning duaanavarima ampirinumpariauka'.
Teka ee' otoroaing Kumponing baurukaa' tamparimaing: tampara nko-nko avutevu' nkoaamatoaing. Tee bakei koonto' biikaang nerang.
Nani manikuma tee tampa' barearavaing dooroomparitaa' koonto' taaravuma.
Ninge taura'pampa' nani manikumai donkaang nau-antavurii'naang nii'na' donkaang-koo deto basi oto'koo. Teni dooroompari otoaing.
Okora'noo' ee': Aadama tutuna' nkonii' ee'noko Iivi dama'ke.
Ee'noko Aadama tosinii'deea', tee teni manikuma Sietani'ke tosivuio' Kumponing-nung boto aarempuu'nani deemparu'.
Nka tee maniku' pareaama otoroitaa' domampariaing aa'noi deeko': Kumponing-koo masika'antavariri, nantoong piaavaari, ee'noko meeka'pariri ampirinumparia'.
Enang Kumponing bakanamuiaang oto'na' naurama aung kara masikung naurama'naang: Tee naning dootuu'nupoong tanata-koo piavora tee, tampara nko-nko nkovuu'naang tee piavoi otong.
Naning tee' nko-koo piavoko deeko' tutung aung tanatanung aarumo paaraverira taura'periaing aa'nomaung deeko':

Tuumpiaa-peu'na' otoa', nani ba'ung-pina' otomaung, naikuma deeko' naikuma basiaramanoo'ka bakearamaung, onou siraka'pari otomaung, ovontung-pina' ka'duuro', naning navunavuro', siraka'pui nau-anta-nko, purinto'naru'ke kanu'aravaung, da'deng iira deeaung teka banainge oto', ee'noko tata'arava' oko'oko deeaung.
Baurukaa' bautaranuka tampa' toosi-antavuri otomaung, toire' tampa' tarevuriko tampa' meumpaamaung, tampa' noru'ai ookara kapoo'koo.
Ai' naning tee baurukaa' tampa' tarevuriarura dei Kumponing bakaning dootuu' nupoong arekee' tarevuripeu'?
Ee'noko tee naning a'mung bere'arieenung makosi deea' dootuu'nupoong tare-koo. Baka daangamparara dua'ara'neenga, Sietani' kiimata-numpo' deempari dua'aru'na' baka daangamparakotaa'.
Ee'noko napo' tee, tee naning ookarai tampa' noru'aamaung makosi, Ju'deeainge. Tampa' noru'aavaruko maia'oi Sietani'nung baanka'koo taavi'arara dua'ara'neeng.
Enang napo' tee Kumponing bakanamuiaang pakupaku-nupoong tee' nari'ke, paaraverima taura'periaing temurii' nko-nko nko-koo, aa'nomaing deeko':

Biikaang nko-nko masika'antavaamaing, meneng paakanuka deea', purinto'naru'koo baru' kei'oroaing, oko'okonuka deeaing, ee'noko tee masikung kara Kumponinge sira'memuru'nung masika'antavaamaing domang kiiroraa'oroi.
Tutung baakeeneverereria' taura'perereriauka'. Tuumpi otoroaing-pina' oovererima deeko', pakupaku-nupoong deemparii'naang makosi-antaverereriaing.

Maniku', bii'ankaampi deeko' ai' pakupaku nkonuka deeko', napo' tee'ke, biikaang nko-nko masika'antavai otoroaing, miring orari-antananka deea', naiaama deekoro-antavariaing, kake'ii-nupoong ookara kapoo'koo.
Pakupaku nkonuka kemaimpariauka'. Biurukaa' tampa' tareaarimaatoai ee'noko biikaning bautarananka naro'ka.
Ai' pakupaku-nupoong biikaang nko-nko tampa' dupeaavaining teing nantoonge masika'antavaariaining, ee'noko maia'oroa' nantoong nauaaripeu'ning tee kara Jiisuu' Karistoo'koong masika'antavaamana'.
Due'ka dii'anko moo'naang noru'amaang, nka aing botonanka daariamang da'deng moaruko deeko' tee aung noru'eriaina' arekee' otoripeu'na' makosina' Kumponing-namuiaang-kooning deentariri.

Kumponing bakanamuiaang dootuu'nupoong teing ee'ning Kumponing Domantoo' bakanavitu. Ee'noko ee'navitue tee kara masikung Kumponing-etaing deto kompai otomaung natukue bakatutai pava kompui otopeu'na'.
Ee', masika' tee minkunaa Kumponinge dooremuru'nung bakanamuiaang o'noriaina' naumurima, pankaing doorenang masikung, naninge daang-antavuarupeu'. Okora'noo' tee Karistoo',
Ee'nara nii'koong naning deempari
mono ninka tavo'arama sira'paru';
Nantoonge tuumpiaako Tanuaang Meekunge tee
naning koonto' masikee-antavuko';
Koosinunankai ooaako';
Bakaninge daankiaako'
ookara nantoong-koo;
Nantoonge kansi'koo otoroi
masika'antavaako'nunge;
Ee'noko Kumponinge meenasi-koo
deto nkavuu'.

Enang tee Tanuaang Meekunge ee' koonto' naumurimaung: Asi'na'mung due'uko nii'ning tee bere'ariaing akovetei teieta kara masikung siompampimaung-eta teing ma'nari tositosinanka taaravaari-kotaa', ee'noko teing minkunaa Sietani' bakaning-koo bi'arikotaa'.
Aing minkunaananka tositosinanka nantoong-eta ampirinung-nupoong-eta tavo'aravaining. Teing nantoong tositosi-koo datavoroi biikaang domang-koo kuunga biikaang daang minku tasi'pariarupeu'.

Aa'paripeu'na': “Nanteeriauka' ee'noko taamang keremperiai tanuaang ku'mi'antarari'neeng.” Nka tee'paama daang minkuaamaung, ai' Kumponinge tee taamang tampa' nkomemuru' ee'nara tampara minkuampima nkavampii'naang nii'ke, tee kara masikung noru'ampiri otoininge, ee'noko masika'antavampimainge.
Ookara kapoo' Kumponinge nkovuru'nung tampara, kapoo' otoa' dimpa'ampiaing Kumponing tampara tampampima nkavampiaing deeko',
ai' temurii' taamang Kumponinge makosi-pina' oovumaung bakaang kara ee'noko niikaang kunsi siompui.

Dake aing nko-nkona' nau-antananka naueriaing-koo nii'maikorori' da' tee tampara pakupakunung Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaang deentaravaing maanto'antararara teinge karakarananka masikeng siompampimainge ee'noko tampara minkunaa tee ee'nara dake siompemaung.
Donta'dari otoai teing-eta kumponaang daang-koonanka Kumponing-etaning deeaing-eta. Nka daka tampa' bareraravai Kumponing bakaang naning makosina'pina' nkoraravaina'.
Ai' amurii' mirumiru' minkuaamaung masikung: “Mono bare-anta-koo tampa'ke, nka tanuaang bare-anta-koo baru' tampa' masika', enanung ee'noko dama'nung otooto'koo paku-antana'koo.”
Tee' masika'anta-koo makosi.
Tee'koo bakei pore'morimaung, iri' o'marikoo', niikaang noru' Kumponing domantoo'koo sipampiri otomaung-koo, ee'nara ookara-koo Domang-anta masika'antavaamaing-koo.
Aing kapoo'nanka aa'na' tuutuu'antaveri nau-antaveriai, ee'noko botoveriaing siompaavaina'.

Taura'daravauka' naninge da' oki'naa-anta-koo da' pankara deeaung deentarako, teka Kumponing baito-nupoonge ooraara dakaang kara-koo bi'antavariaing deentari otoai, ee'noko nko-nko-koo, piaa-koo, baito-koo ee'noko kiiroraa' aarumo-koo.
Moainoo'ke basi mataa'irari deeruevuriai tee Kumponing bakaang dariraari, daankierima ee'noko kara nau-antaverima.
Dakaang avuavu' da'koo otoing Tanuaang Meekung-etaing sipeauka', ee'nara karai tarampee˜koonge minkuvuko nkaveu'nung tenang teinge dootuu'koo urantanukai bireng pante'daako.
Aing kapoo' botoransing nkoemaatoai. Avu'antararavai teing-koo, da' panka'daramatomana' tasi'paavaina'.
Tareraravai dakaang nko-nko ee'noko nau-anta, tampa' nari' otoaina', ee'noko tee' nkovekotaa' ookara taararaamaing ninka nari' domantariaing.
Enang teing dootuu'nupoong ninka ee' tampa' otoriai: Pankareu' ioo'eria' otoai, teka tamung banainge tampa' nauerimatoai daumaraang-pina' noru'eri. Ee'noko nemaa' daara'mainkaang-pina' nkoverimatoai.
Napo' manii' pankareu' daukorovo-pina' nkoveriai, ee'noko nerai' da'marikaampi-pina' noru'eri pakueriai, oraka' noru'darava'.
Naaroonku ata'oinku masikeng piaaru'nuka-pina' noru'erimatoai.

Teing naaroonku biurukaa'po'nupoong, nii'noo' bii'dompenku, teing ninka siperiko pakuaariaing dootuu'nung aarumo bareariaina' nakantu paku-koong, biumaraang maku'aarima tampa' tareaaru'nung-koo. Kumponinge temurii' aarumo tampa' oovumaung.
Teni naaro masikani tampampimai teni baka otomai, sipuinani bakaang noru' Kumponing-koo narung-koo ee'noko baitoari otomai kunsiarama muunga ee'noko doonga.
Teka teni nii'nani mono baka noru'aramai teni boo', bane teie mono domantoo' otong.
Botoverima naueriai aing kapoo'nanka nii'ninge oraka' minkuaari'neenga.
Tee naning bakanamuiaang tarevuriaung ee'noko baru'noo' bakanava pava, tee ee'nara penkemparing bakaang masika'anta-koo, oraka' nkoaring Kumponing noru'aavaing-eta boong basinoo'ka.
Taura'periauka' naning naaro miring si'koo naaroonku biikanavitu-koong deeru-koo mare' ˜narung-taa kivora divu'uai, nii'noo' amutemu'ke nampeesiaramai.

Ee'noko miring si'koo makosi teni tampani, tampa' nkoaramai tampaamai, teni-pina' toire' panka'antavurimai-pina', onkeonke' bauko-pina', Kumponing bakaning meekupoong kau' duu'pevuriko'nani-pina' isipo'keta poroko, unaa-antavurimai-pina', tampa'nko narung-koo matauari otomai-pina'.
Teka taura'perereriauka' naro'ka deeru-koo teing naaroonku mare' makosiaavaing, nerai'ariri noru' nampeesi-koo oto'neeng Karistoo' sipai.
Tee' nkoarima maraka-anta-ita toto'parima kiimata-koo-nupoong deempari'neeng.

Temurii' naaroonku tee kakarua'nuka deemparimaing, pava kantenuka; ee'noko kakarua' narung deea', tee aa'nong: ukuusi baukonukai, papuraanka'anta nkonuka, ee'noko minku-koo makosi deeaing minkuaamaing.
Tee'koo naaroonku mme' nerai'ariri otoroining napo' nampeesiariaing maroamaang, toire' paravaariaina', biikanava pava tareaavai, ee'noko doona avompiauka' too'denunge barakosi'muri'neenga.
Nii'ninge Sietani' siompai tee' pooariru'nung-koo tee' naurampimang.

Nanie manikumai Karistoo' masika'antavumaie teemuiaang-koo nani manikuma naaro otoi dei tee, tenie tare-koo makosi teni naaro. Tee' nkovuaing deeko' tee teing-koo nii'ning dootuu'nupoong-koo baru' manki'oroauka' naaroonku masikeng tareaarima.
Teing dootuu'koo urantanuka dootuu' tampa' tareaarimaing nantoonge napo' moo'ke deto moo'aariaing makosi, baru'noo' teing pore'oromaing daankiaarima ee'noko nau-antavaarikoo'.
Daari Meekunge tee' nari' minkuvui otong, aa'pui otong,
“Boromaka'koong muring dai'eriauka' uite'koong˜ sinang kau'ke ke'dee'koo botoverima, tee-koo uite'koo maa'kuaina'.”
Napo' aa'pui otong,
“Naning mintoomparavainge mooni' nau'ka nkavuaing.”
Naninge nii'nung dootuu'koo urantanung tuumpivuko taaraveauka' baka, teka kenaankai deeko', nii'noo' beenaumoi koonto' ooaara makosi.
Ee'noko tee tautaueriko tee' nari' nkoariri otoroaing deeko' sirapo'ke naueriaing napo' tee' nkoaavauka'nung ookarai ooaara avoreaavaina'.

Kumponinge oomuresio', Jiisuu' Karistoo' naankai ee'noko koosinunanka miru'nii'nankai ninge da' koonto' nauramaang: Pankaing tuumpiaamana' minkunaa tampa' tasi'pea' deeko' da'deng maku'eauka', ee'noko oraka'nko da'marang-aapea daka'peauka'.

Ee'noko napo' tee naning dootuu'koo uranta deeng-anta-koo ta'nina' meeka'antaveauka' tanka' pante'ema. Tutung tasi'peaing arekee' oro' aung naning, orara deeko' da'koo pare'ara'neeng. Daka tanatararavai domang kiiroraa'dari otoaina'.
(Ee'noko daka tanata-koo minkuama aa'dama'naang: Baru' ntong narung naieauka', uaininaru' oki'naru'na' naikimaatoainge, ke'de pakuruaina' amutemu'ke siiparomaung-koo.)

Teka aa'dansina' naning masika' tampara tasi'pera deeko' meeka'anta-koo makosi, nka tampa' baakeenevera. Nii'ning biikaang oraka'nko a'noo' aa'na' oro'paramaung teing kiimata-kooning tasi'antamurima, teka nii'ning biikaang oraka'nko dama'ke oro'paramaung-koo tee'.
Ee'noko tampa' nkoning tee'ke, nii'ning aa'na' oro'ning ee'noko nii'ning baku'nii'ning, teka baku'ariri otorokotaa' teing napo' koonto' sira'pariaing dama'ke.

Teing ookara botovotonaa'nuka dai'nisinankai biikaning teing okovoroi otomaing tampa' nari' noru'aariai. Tee' naueriaing nii'ninge Kumponing oraka' minkuaa'neeng bakaang kara nau-antavarampimaung ninka.

Teinge botovotonaa'nukai okovoromaing Karistoo' masika'antavaamaing deeko' ee' noru'aavauka': “Nii'ke kara dimpa'evorompimatoai, ai' nii' tamung naro'ka namaia'.” Tee' noru'aavauka', teka teing mintoompevurimaing Karistoo' masika'antavaamaing, Kumponinge piaavurimaing deempariko bakei tampa' masika' biikaang kara siompaavaing. Aing ee' oro' nau-antaveriaing iri'narumperi.

Nii'nung naninge nii'namuau kara nauvuriaing deeko', ee'noko naroomparavaung tee ninka kara masikung niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo'ketaing deeko' ee'noko naroomparavaung Kumponing siona' aarumo-koong nau-anta ninka deeko' tee baka daangange poo-antavaramaung, kapoo' noru'uaung, tamung tata' tutung-koo oraka' piavomaung ee'noko minkuminku tamung karananka-koo;
Temurii' aarumoi mamairo tavo'umaung, pokaka, daang-koong tuumpi, oraka' noru' ee'noko oko'oko nantoong-koo.

Teing taaravarimaing tee' nkoarimaung. Aming-koo, nna' tunsi muunanka deempariri nii'ninge kara masikung nau-antavaariaruko. Daang ee' noru'aamaung, “Dootuu'mariaing kapoo'nanka mooni' dovang narung nkavampiaina'.”
Nka masika' a'noo' naning kapoo' avutevu' piavoaruko dei Kumponing-nung koonto' aarumo kompui tampara otooto' oovupeu'.
Nka ee' noru'ampiai: “Nii' aa' ponto'marima kapoo' kansi'koo nkavampiri moria', ee'noko moompima kapoo' nii'nung nkavampiring meriauka' kansi'keta.
Tee'koo enang taamang oto'memuri ee'noko baaronanka, teing ninka dotumariri o'noriaing.”

Teka teing nantoong kavo mmau' oto'evoroo'naang piavoromaing paara-anta meu'paako baanka'ke taavi'urimaung. Kanu'arima amutemurii' baike-antananka piavoromaung nantoong orari-anta-koo ee'noko kera'anta-koo basi-antavaarimaing.
Ai' orara aarumo amutemurii'koong okora' tee mooni' karaa'. Mooni' karaa'aama nii'ning nantoong tee kara masika'antavampimaung-eta kentaamparira domang-koo baike aa'na' tora'paamaung.
Nka da' tee Kumponing bakaang naning avo'daravaing tevete-ita; koong-antararavaing koonto'aape, Kumponing-nung masikung aarumo-aape, masika'anta-aape, piaa-aape, e'maniang-aape, dooroonto'aape.

Da' bakei iveka'doai Kumponing-aape masika'anta ninka deikoo'koo kua'daramatomaung-pina' tee domaang oparavauka'nung nkaveaina', ee'nara domaang kompee'naang miru'duu'nung Kumponinge, ee'na' tampa' sira'daru'na' nantoonge taararaio'.
Ninge ee' botoramaang Kumponinge oomuresio', teie ee'narai Domaang Okovenunge, ee'noko Jiisuu' Karistoo'ke napo' oomuresio' aa'nunge Poontiasi Pailati'ankoi avoroa' tampa' sira'paru' bakaang miru':
Nkoveaing ookara kapoo' Kumponinge nauruu'ning dake nko-koo botoramaang, domang ku'mi'doa'. Naninge da' tuumpiruarupeu'na' otoaing Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' tavo'aravainoo'ke basi.
Tee ee'nara sira'paravaing bakaang batei masikung-koo, Kumponinge tampuainoo'ka. Tee biraankenung, ookara-koo iirakuta, ankaankanuka biikaang ankaankang, ovontunanka-koo Ovoring.

Tee narung boo'paa' otooto' okovosi', aa'na' araka sisisiisi'po'nung ninka nari' otomaung, teroita naning otoa' oovuu'nung ai' oovupeu'nung. Ee'nara ookarai domange tampa' noru'aamatoai ee'noko bakaang tare oparavauka'nung otomatoai. Ee', tee' nari'.

Enang tee kansi'koo kavokavoro-po'nupoong tee ee' botoveriaing: Bii'ka daangampariauka'. Masika'antavariauka'nung biikaang kapoo'nanka oraru'kuaining-koo, teka Kumponing-koo masika'antavariri otoroaing ookara kapoo' mmau'antavui makosina' amurimaung-koo dotumarimana'.
Naueriaing tampara nko-nko nkoaavaing, tampara nko-nko-koo maneeoroaing, avusiro'ariai, biikaang kapoo'nanka tankee'eeaing nii'ning ninka.
Tee' nari' nkoarima tee oosisiiaamaung dama'ke opo' kompaavaining koonto' noru'aapeu'. Naueriaing tee' nkoariaing domaang ima'ai kompaavaina' temurii' domaang masikung.
Timoti ee, tareveai tee kapoo' Kumponinge masika'antarui aruu'nung tare-koo. Donta'dari otoai naampa Kumponing-nung deeaung-eta, avutevu'ui minku-eta, daang noru' pankaing tampaamaung-eta.
Ai' tee' minkuaama nii'ninge bekoi'aamaung tee minkunaa masikung siompampimaung.
Tee biraanke tee da'koo otomatoaing.
Masikung.

Ninge Paula'ke aung karavoto˜ daariamang, Jiisuu' Karistoo'koong kara-okomui-nkai Kumponinge maromuu'na' nantoong nauarama'naang maraka-antamuru'na' bakaang domaang amurii'naang Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo kuung o'noriko.
Da'anko, Timoti-anko daariamang, da' nnuring-pina' piaaramaung-anko. Biraanke ee'noko mooa da'koo otoaing Kumponing Neuma-itaing ee'noko teieta Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo'.
Ninge kunsimarama amutemu'koo noru'dama Kumponing-koo tampara tampamaung, tee ee'nara tampa' domange noru'marama ninge mintoompevomaung, tee' mmataraange nkoau'na'.
Bakei napo' aa'na' da' oo-koo piamomaung, ooramira dei tampa' dee'mopeu', ai' ninge tee norunoru'amaung dakaang ta'du tuuruu'nung tenang si'meeretu'nang.
Napo' noru'dankoo' da' koonto' baitorarako'na', tee ee'namurii' baito teni daite Lois oto'evuko' ee'noko teni dauko Iunes. Enang tasi'pansi o'nong da'koo ee'nung-koo otong tee temurii' baito.
Tee'koo enang ninge noru'antaramaang maia' sipei dakaang nko-nko aa'na' nkoveaing tee avuavu' Kumponinge aruu'nung kompei, ee'narai aruu'nung te'mung ninge tanka' pante'dantu'na'mung.
Ai' Kumponinge tee tanuaang avorompe'koong amuria', teka tee tanuaang purinto'koong amuru'nung, piaa-koong ee'noko toomoosiari oto'koong.

Tee tee maia'doauka'nung niikaang Ovoring sira'koo; ning-koo tee', bane ning bakaang dai'nisi o'noko. Makosi Kumponinge tee' nari' puring-antamureko da' tee' nari' ni'ninka sisikeera kompampeainge tee tampara doorenang-koo.

Teie ee'narai domamuru' ee'noko bokumuru' meeka'mariri oto'koo, kapoo' tampara nkoampiru'nung-koo deea', teka tamung biraankemurii'naang baka marovuu'nung-koo. Tero aung kansi' mme' nkoaravaruko-ita Kumponinge biraankemurii'naang bamuru' tee-koo Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo.

Ee'noko enang tee biraankemuriaina' sira'puing Jiisuu' Karistoo' niikaang domang-anta oro'antavura. Teie ee'narai boo' bakaang iri' opurai'nange boo' puru'navung ee'noko domaang nkanavung taung siraka'antamemuring tee doorenang tampara dooremurima.
Ee'noko teie napo' ning aung ee'nara doorenang tampara berempama'naang bamuu', ning kara-daanki, kara-okomui-nka ee'noko kara-nau deeng-antamui.

Tee'koo bamuu'na' tampa' nkomaramaung-koo ninge sisikeera kune'amaang. Nka tee maia'moaung, ai' bakei tampa' noru'ansi o'nong tee naning ninge masika'antavamaung, ee'noko napo' tampa' noru'ansi otong tee tee makosi ookaanka tare-koo bera doong asirana'mung, aa'ning: teing manki'nanka avontu'ning ee'noko napo' tee manki' ee'narai ning bamui amuu', tampara kara nau-anta-koo.
Enang dake tee tee kara nau-antavaramana' paaravei nari' nau-antaveriai, ee'noko Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo kuung otomatoai ee'nara masika'antavema ee'noko nantoong piaaverima.
Tareveaing tee kara masikung tee Tanuaang Meekunge nii'koo otomatomaunge masika'antaruma aruu'nung.
Dake noru'ei otong teing teing ookara Eesia-nameensi'nupoong ning-eta mmariau'ning. Teing-koo nii'nung Pisilas ee'noko nii'nung Emosenis.
Kumponinge piaavuriaing Onesiporas bakanava-kooning, teie amutemu'pie boira-antamuko' ning.
Tee tee maia'oa' ning io'mai dai'mario', teka tenang Rooma' porai'nange teie bakei aa'na' ning oo-koo piavora besi'mura pe'numuu'.
Ovoringe kong-antavuaing tee piaa bakaang te'mung doong asi'na'mung. Dake tampa' noru'ei otong avutevu'ari tampa' pakumuu'na' Epeses-namono-koo.
Aung ee da' nnuring, purintaravaing iri' nkavei, tee iri' Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo kuung otoko biraankerui arumaung.
Ee'noko tee minkunaa ning-koo taaraveru'nung mmau' ninka tee ee'nara masika'antaveri pare'eriai nantoong-koo kara tare baukonuka-koo botoverima napo' nii'ning nau-antavaarii'naang.
Kune'eaing nari' tee sisikeera ninge kune'amana' iri' o'darava' da' naning tampara kare-koo tavu'koo piikonung-pina' Jiisuu' Karistoo'nung deentari.
Naning piikonung noru' paakavaravaung, teka bakaang ovoring dotu-antavuaina' nari' otomaung.
Naning deikoo'koo kua'paramaung tee siompumaung tee deikoo' bakaang aarumo narung. Siompuarui dei makotuarupeu' moo' nka-koo.
Ee'noko napo' tee ee'nara naning mintoong bauko tee tutuna'ning-koo naikumaung pore'omaatoma.
Norunoru'eaing teing kapoo' ninge nauransining. Ovoringe tee tasi'antaruaing miru'noo' teing ookara-koo.
Ee'noko napo' norunoru'eaing tee Jiisuu' Karistoo' daa'aru'nung bou'noo'keta tee ee'nara Deevita' bakanamuiaang-koong pou'nung tee-pina' doorenang ninge sira'pamaunge minkuvui otoina'.
Tee ee'nara doorenang ninge sisikeera kune'ankoo' sira'pama, kakuu' dovang kaki-antamaakoo' bakiaa' nko-pina'. Nka tee karakara Ovoring bakaang kakuu' kaki-antavaavaung, beremparamaung.

Tee'koo amutemurii' sisikeera tora'koo taura'marama iri' o'maravaung teinge nantoonge Kumponinge miru'nii'nankai taaravaavaina' teing napo' Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo kuung otoroi domang-anta kompaava'naang meenasi otoi oto' manta'pai.
Aung kara kenavampimaung masikung:
Nii' tee ninka nari' moompira
Napo' tee ninka nari' domamariaing.
E'manampiri sisikeera tora'pampira
Tee ninka nari' nantoong tarearampiaing.
Nka nii' tee-koo penkemariko
Napo' tee nii'koo penkemparavaing.
Nka nii' e'manampiaruko tee-koo
Tee bakaang kara-koo e'manui otoaing,
Ai' bakaang aarumo tampara-koo
penkemparavarupeu'.
Dake noru'antaveriaing tee kara nauransina'. Ovoringe oorurio' botoveriaing ee': Donta'dariri otoriai kara-koo tata'nanka-ita. Tee' tata'koo tampa' deea'. Nantoonge taaravaama tee orari-antavaripeu'.

Paarararavai daka matauari oto'koo Kumponinge makosi-antaruaina', naning matau-pina', dakaang nko-nko-koo maia'koo makosi deeaung-pina'. Tee' kompeaing tee minkunaa Kumponing-etaing kara masikung makosina' miru' koonto' sira'pei.
Donta'dari otoaing temurii' Kumponing-nung deeaung naampa-ita. Teie tee nantoong barampuriaing tee-koo taung oovunavung-koo Kumponing-ankoita.
Teie biikaang kara tee dera'pina' maa'uriaing dera'ke naning domantoo' otoko maa'umana'. Teing tee' oro'ning-koonaanka nii'naanka Haimenias ee'noko Pailitas.
Tenaanka taung masikavung bekoi'uretu'naanka aa'purema, “Kumponinge ookara nantoong boo'keta daa'uru' tero.” Tee' minkuvurema nii'ning biikaang masika'anta orari-antavuretu'.

Nka tee aung kara masikung teing-koo nantoong-koo Kumponing masika'antavaamaing-koo aa'na' date'pari otomaung natuku tankanung-pina' ivekung teka'paama ee' daariaapeu'nung-pina', “Ovoringe noru'ui otong teing bakaning, ee'noko ookara Kumponing bakaang miring tampaama masika'antavaamaing koonto' bere'ariaing orara aarumo-ita.”

Tee tee aarumonanka tee ee'pina' otong: Naning bakanava-koo aretereng otorong, nii'ning kapang-koo aa'na' sisisiisi-koo nkonii', ee'noko nii'ning koi'koo ee'noko kansi'koo nkonii'. Teing-koo nii'ning kapoo' tampara masikung banto'ning ee'noko nii'ning tamunsi'ning.

Ee'pina': Naning tee tampareng-pina' baka kiiroraa'ari dei tamunsi'nung aarumo-ita enang tee kapoo' tampara banto'nareng-pina' deemparapeu'; napo' meeka'pari otopeu', bakaang pankaing pakuvupeu'na' maamuari otopeu' tampamuriau nko-nko nko-koo.

Tee tee enang donta'dari otoai nemaa' biikaang karakaraa'keta. To'bii-antarari otoai te'aape: nariari oto', masika'anta, piaa ee'noko mooa, teing Ovoring-koo baitoarimaing ninka nari' otoritaa' tampa' nari' nko-koo piavoromaing ninka.
Nau'ka pakuraravauka' tee-koo minkuminku-koo daang-koonanka-koo kanu'aapenung-koo. Noru'ei otong temurii' aarumoi turang-anta basi-antavumaung.

Ovoring bakaning botovotonaa'nuka turang nkonuka deeauka'. Teing nau'ka navunavuro'nuka otoroaing ootukunung-koo, tampa' siraka'antanuka, iira noru'aavaing, napo' biikaning kare-nupoong koong-antavaarimaatoai domang boimporoi.
Ai' pa Kumponinge napo' toro-antavuriai ee'noko noru'aavai tee kara masikung.
Ee'noko tee'koo mmariaavaing teieta Sietani' bakaang baanka'keta bi'antavurimaung-eta bakaang noru' siong-koo.
Nka enang tasi'peai aung: Doong asiraning-koo tavo'kuaing batei arikananka.

A'noo' ee' oro'nanka otoroaing: nantoong bii'ka piaavarimaing, mooni' piaavaamaing, bii'ka daangamparimaing, daang pankaing-pina' noru'nanka, kara oreng minkunuka, taarapii-kananka biumaraang-koo, kapoo'koo tampara minkuaavaing, meeka'pariaing,
nantoong baa'pina' noru'aarimaing, pinau noru'aavaing, miring orari-antananka, tooreerenuka, irinsianuka, tampara aarumo tavaamaing,

too'de-nupoong, tutung tampara noru' uraantavaavaing, kirokainuka-pina' noru'arimaing, bii'ka tampa' dee'anta-koo nari' piavoroma Kumponing tampa' dee'anta-koo piavoroaing, tang dootuu'arimaing nka Kumponing daang-antavaakoo';
Temurii' nantoong-eta tonta'dari otoaing.

Teing-koo nii'nariong tee pavanankai tamung koinaamaung maniku' aruaru'nanka biikaang kara-koo bi'antavaarii'naang, maniku' orara aarumo ninka manki'oromaing, noru' avitoitoi eearimaing kapoo'nanka amutemurii' karaa'aama.
Bane arera naning arekee' oro' poko tee taaravaapeu', nka tasi'paavarupeu' kapoo' masikung.

Tero tee Janis naankai Jampiris turampureko' tee Moosesi, ee'noko tee' nari' teinge too'dempaamaung ookara kapoo' masikananka. Teing donkaang tunsi dera'nukai ee'noko baito tosiro'koong oto'evoroining.
Ee'noko Janis naanka Jampiris namu'ke dua'aretu'na' tee' nari' napo' teing tamung apupo' basiarira dua'ariaing nantoong ookarai ooaario'.

Enang tee dake ning noru'meing ape': kara nauaranko'na', nkomaramana', nkaang domang to'bii-antamaramana', nkaang masika'anta, kapuumari o'nomana', nkaang piaa, e'manansi o'nomana', arikananka kune'amana', sisikeera kune'amana', napo' oraka' nkomau'na' teka Antioki'ka ee'noko napo' Aikoniami'ka ee'noko Liisira'ka, aremuriau turanturang e'manansi tora'pantu'na';
Ee'noko noru'ei otong ookara teing-eta Ovoringe moo'muu' domamuu'naang.
Tee' nari' masika' ookara Kumponinge marovurimana' oto'koo piavoromaing nantoonge oraka'nko kune'aavaing, teing Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo otoromaing.
Tenang ee'nang oreng nantoong daang Kumponinge botonisinuka tamparimaing aa'na' baru'noo' oraru'kiaavaing nantoong tosiaarima ee'noko bii'ka tositosi masika'anta-vaama.
Teka dake siompeaing tee kapoo' da' bareraru'nung ee'noko iveka'doi masika'antaveu'nung. Dake nii' tampa' noru'meri otong kara naurampiru'ning.
Ee'noko da' tooto'noo'keta noru'eu' Dariraari Meekananka teing da' tampa' nau-anta-kooning noru'antarupeu'ning Jiisuu' Karistoo'ke domantuaina' baitorarako.

Ootukunung Daari Meekung Kumponinge amuru'nung, Kumponinge uaampuriko daariau'nung, ee'noko tee makosi nau-anta-koo, orara aarumo tasi'anta-koo, domang koong-anta-koo, ee'noko tampara aarumo siong-koo kake'iiari.
Kumponinge tee' karantavuriko' aa'noo'naang: Bakaning meekupoong makosininge maanto'antavarira amutemurii' nko-nko tamparananka tavo'antavaava'naang.

Kumponinge oomuresio' ee'noko Jiisuu' Karistoo'ke, teie ookara nantoong simpe'uriainge, domantoo'nuka ee'noko boorou'ning, ninge ee' botoramaang da', noru'ampiritaa' Karistoo' tee napo' ovorimpari oro'paravaing:
Iri'antavei sira'peaing tee kara ootukunung batei-koo, oranang ee'noko tampanang. Aroo'antaveriai, tautaueriai ee'noko tampa' mantomperitaa' nau-antaveriai.

Tee' nari' bointui uaaroauka' ee' noru'ei: Bateinang tee due'umaang nantoong kontekontevoroainoo' kara masikung taara-koo. Nii'namurii' kara taara-koo tarii'oroma mmau' kara-naunuka bokuaarii'naang teing ninka nari' karaa'eemaing.
Tee'koo kara masikung-eta akovetei bere'arii'naang ee'noko pooarii'naang kumponaananka-koo bi'ariri.
Nka tee da' pinka'dari otoaing, baike noru'eauka', kara nkavei nanu'koo purintaravai, tampa' dupeveai dakaang nko-nko pakupaku-koong, ninge nkaang dupeansina'.
Ai' ninge dupeamira tee makosi tamaavaing due'ka, nka tee Ovoring-koo pareka-pina' noru'mari otong. Tee doong ning tenkenampaina'mung due'umaang.
Ning piikonung deeko' orara aarumo ninka tameerema puru'muaru'. Deikoo'koo kua'maru'nung-pina' iri'moi tampa' botu basimaring, kara masikung masika'antavampimaung pinka'ansi.

Enang-eta deto nkaang moo' nerang-koong tee maamuari otomatoaing, ee'noko tee taa'ni'anta Kumponinge koonto'nuka tammurimaing-koong. Tee ee'nara tee teie Ovoringe koonto'ke bire'urimaunge kong-antamuainung te'mung ee'na'mung makosina'mung, ee'noko ning narung deea', teka napo' tee avuriaing teing ookara karaa'ai ooaava'naang nempaamaing.
Paaraveaing ning-anko po'koo da'deng.

Aming-koo, nna' Deemasie tee aung kapoo'nanka kansi'koong aa'na' karaa'ura si'muieeng; si'murai'nang Tesalonaika' beieenung. Napo' Keresen Kalesia-nameensi'aape beiee; Taitas napo' Damesia-nameensi'aape beiee;
Tikikas Epeses-aape botoansinung; Luuke' narung ni'ninka o'noreng;
Tee'koo Maaka' bokuera da'ninka poreai; tee ee'nara nkaang pakupaku tampara.
Mononopa' nkavei poai nkaang, Kaapas-anko sipantu' Toroasi-navuntu'ka, ee'noko buukunanka, nka baru'noo' teing ivekeng boromaka'koong dopa'kooning.
Aleksanda'ke, teie koopa' ta'nampumaunge, orari-antamuu'. Ovoringe maku'evuaing tee bakaang nko-nko orara-koong.
Nka tee-koo da' tareraravaing, ai' teie aa'na' too'devumang niikaang minkunaa kara simpe'nupoong˜ anko.
Tero tuumpimaako tutuna'nang kara dimpa'anko naninge pakumua' ning. Ookarai si'mau'. Oraka' nkomau'na'koo Kumponinge piaavuri tonta'evuriaing ninge tonta'evoronsina'.

Nka bane si'maio' Ovoring tee ning-koo due' otou', ee'noko puring-antamuu' tampa' sira'pama'naang tee kara ookara, ootukununge avotevora'nupoonge taaravaava'naang. Tee'koo domamuu' tee-pina' laioni-koo karang-eta pasi'mupeu'nung-pina'.

Ovoringe tee ning moo'muaing teieta ootukunung orarananka-ita, ning tampa' domang-antamuaina' paning-koo o'noo'naang teie tarevumanoo'. Bakaang meenasi tee' nari' otoaing ootukunung doong-koo. Ee, tee' nari'.
Tampa' tamperiaing Pirisika'daring-koo ee'noko Akuila ba'ung, ee'noko Onesiporas bakanava-kooning.
Irasitas Koorin-navuntu' otoko sipantu'. Ee'noko Toropimas siipavoko Mailitas-navuntu'ka sipantu'.

Paaraveaing ning-anko po'koo da'deng narung, doving orara bakaang batei tavo'kuma avo'du'neeng. Iubiulas dovange Piudenis, Lainas ee'noko Kolodia ee'noko ookara niira'mainkaange tampara tampaing da'koo.
Tee Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' dakaang tanuaang ninka otoremaatoaing. Tee biraanke tee da'koo otomatoaing.
Masikung.

Ning Paula' tee Kumponing bakaang botovotonaa' ee'noko kara-okomui-nka Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaang. Kumponinge botomuu'nung bakaning teie miru'uru'ning tampa' masika'anta-koo pakuarama'naang ee'noko tee kara masikung koompari otoko kato nau-antavaranko tampa' tasi'pai siompaama Kumponing dotu-antana' otoroaing, domampariri ookara batei-koo otoroaina' nooruupiariaina';
Aa'noko teie Kumponinge tosiaravaunge tee domaang oparavaung amurii'naang maraka-antavuu' tero urikamu', kansi' pupu'aravaruko.

Ee'noko bakaang bateinang miru'uu'nung masikung-koo teie Kumponinge niikaang Domang-antai tee-koong domaang oparavaung amuriaing-koong kara sira'puu' bakaang doorenang tampara-koo, ee'noko ning tee aroo'mui botomuu'nung tee daankiama'naang.

Da' Taitas nnuring masikung tee-koo kara-koo nari' masika'antavampimaung-koo daarireromaang. Biraanke ee'noko mooa da'koo otoaing Kumponing Niuma-itaing ee'noko teieta Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo', niikaang Domang-anta.

Ninge da' Kiriti'namui'keta tenkenama ee' nkovee'naang si'dantu'nung: Dake koong-antavee'naang teing kapoo'nanka koonto' deeaing teka, ee'noko napo' dootuu'koo urantanuka miru'eriai ookara osinanka-koo tee' naurantu'na'.

Teing urantanuka tuumpi otoroauka'na' otoroai. Nampeesi-koo narunge nani nampui otoai. Napo' biurukaa' Karistoo'koo baito-nupoong otoroai, ee'noko nii'ninge tuumpiaaripeu'noo' otoroauka' aa'ning-koo: tooreere ee'noko meumeeva.

Tee naning Kumponing bakanavitu tanatavurimaung tee tuumpinoo' dopa, ai' tee tee Kumponing bakaang tarenara. Aing aa'ning nkovua' otoai: bore'ke deere, da'deng iira, nainai purinto' nai-koo kei', tavu' bauko, ee'noko oko'oko.
Teka aing ee' oro'nanka oro'antavumaatoai: Damisimainku bakaang pava-koo bokuvurimatoai, tampenanka-koo dotuaramaung, matauari oto', koompari oto', ee'noko baka meeka'pari oto' tareari otomatoai.

Napo' teie tee kara tosinoo'dopa pinka'ui otomatoai tee' nari' barearu'na'. Tee' otoi minkunaa koonto' nau-antavurima nantoong puring-antavurimatoai, ee'noko teing tee kara penkempaamaing okora' nenke'ui daang tampaamanoo' sira'pumaatoai.
Ai' teke Kiriti'ke dootuu'koo kuunge nantoong karinga taarapiikanuka otorong, daang minkunuka ee'noko tosi baukonukai, baru'noo' teing Ju'nupoong dopa' toto'navitu tee' oro'nuka.
Bake-antaveriai, ai' teinge tee akatekang karika'daantu naro'ka orari-antavaarimaung kapoo' makosi deeaing nau-antavaarima mooni' tamung barang-koo makotua'na'.
Tee' nari' Kiriti'namui'koong nakaronunge˜ nii'nung nauvuma aa'puu'na', “Kiriti'namui'nupoong doong kante tosi baukonuka, biikoori oreng, taamang-koo oko'okonuka kavuroonku.”

Tee aung kara teie sira'puu'nung teing daang minkunuka otoromana' masikung. Tee'koo teing tee daang minku siompaamaing karai aa'na' naaramperiaing tee minkunaa masika'antavampimaung siong-koo purimpariaina'.
Ju'nupoong biikaang kumponaang sipaavai! Teing biikaang botonanka tamung nantoong-etaning siompaama kara masikung-eta bere'ariauka'.

Baa naning Karistoo'koo kuunge domang kiiroraa'ari otoi tee ookara kapoo' teie makosina' nko-koo noru'umaing teing makosining. Teka baa-koo naning domang orara-koo, masika'anta otoaung-koo, tee kansi'koo kapoo' otoa' bakaang domang kiiroraa'antavupeu'nung, bane arekee' oro' toomo siompuma. Kumponinge tee bakaang domang ee'noko noru' naro'ka oraka' nari' oovui otoo'naang.

Tee' oro'nuka teing bii'ka Kumponing noru'ai otoining sirakura' tampaarimaing, teka teinge oraka' nkoaama penkempaakoo' tee. Bakei Kumponing-koo maremaare nkonuka, meumeevanuka, ee'noko kapoo' tampara nko-koo makosinuka deea'.
Teka dake deeko' otooto'koo makosina' Karistoo' bakana' masika' nau-antaveriai.

Aa'noko teing donkaang pankareu' kapoo'koo baru' kei'oroi kanu'ariauka', teka to'biivui noru' ninka matauariri otoroai, tuumpiaariarupeu'na' biikaang masika'anta-koo, piaa-koo ee'noko kato purimpari oto'koo.
Napo' maniku' pankareu' tee' nari' Kumponing bakaning-pina' neriariri otoromaatoai, ukuusiaria' ee'noko nainai purinto'koo bi'aria'.

Napo' teinge maniku' pankareu'ke teing nerai' nampeesinii'nuka tampeng naing nau-antavaarimaatoai, aing aa'ning: Bii'unkaampi biurukaa' ninka nari' piaa, matauariri oto'koo, meeka'pariri, kake'ii-nupoong tampa'nko, ee'noko bii'unkaampi-koo boong deempariri otoromaatoai, Kumponing bakaang kara oovuninge dimpa'aavauka'na'.
Napo' tee' nari' naueriai teing nemaa' matauariri otoroaina'.

Ee'noko mintoontarama ookara batei-koo kapoo' tampeng naing nkovemaatoaing teinge siontaavaina', ee'noko dakaang naunau-koo aing ee' oro' oro'antavemaatoai: kara pitumeeva, aarumo aa'na' aroo'dari minkuna', ee'noko noru' to'biivui otomaung nantoonge poore'koo makosi deeaung.
Ee'noko dake tee' nari' nkoveko nii' minkuminkurumaarimaing maia'oroaing, kapoo' orara nii' minkumaaripeu'nung otoaruko.

Napo' teing botovotonaa'nuka tee' nari' naueriai biikaning ovontunanka-koo boong deempariri otoroaina', ee'noko dotu-antavaarimaatoai ookara kapoo'nanka nkoaavaining-koo, kara bari'aava' ee'noko bakiaa' nkoaava'.

Ee' naueriaing, “Tampa' nari' nkorarimatoai diikaning ovontunge tampa' noru'daarira aroo'daariaina' ookara kapoo' nko-koo.” Tee' naueriaing, ai' teing botovotonaa' koonto'na' otoroko deeko' ookara nantoonge tampa' taaravaavaing tee kara nauarampimaung Kumponing niikaang domang-anta-koong.
Ai' Kumponing bakaang piaa nantoong domang-anta-koong tee tero oro'antavuu'nung ookara nantoong-koo.

Ee'noko teie bakaang piaae nii' kake'ii-antamurimaung a' kansi'koo o'noritaa' aa'noo'naang: Kumponing piavoa'na' aarumo dimpa'koo, kansi'aapening karakaraa' nari', ee'noko mataumariri oto'koo, koomariri, Kumponing dotu-antana'.
Ee'noko tee' nari' o'norimaatoai tee biraanke nempampimaung noru'ampima aa'noaing: tee Jiisuu' Karistoo' niikaang Kumponing ee'noko Domang-anta nerampari tenang oro'paravai.

Tee baka nii'koo avaru'nung nii' boorimurira teing-eta orara aarumonanka-ita unaa-antamurii'naang ee'noko kiiroraa'antamurira bakaning nantoong meekupoong deemuriai tampa'nko narung-koo dompirompi'nuka.
Tee' nari' koonto' botoveri nau-antaverimatoaing aing kapoo'nanka, tautauerima kontevoroa' siompaava'naang. Naninge nii'nunge daang-antaruauka'.
Nau-antaveriaing teing dakaning nantoong ovontung-koo boong otoroaina', siompaarima teing, amutemurii' tampeng nko-nko nko-koo maamuariri.
Naning oraka' minkuaava' otoroai, turanturang baari'ai, banainge otoroai, ee'noko nantoong ookara-koo navurariri otorimaatoai.

Ai' nii' Karistoo' bakaning teing tero o'noriko'na' sipampiru'ning aa'ning-eta: kanu'marima taarapiikamariko' ako'ke nii'ning ninka poo-antamaariko, amutemurii' karakaraa'koo bi'mariri doturotu besi'ampima. Niikaang batei tamung kera'pampiko' aa'ning-koo: oraka' noru' ee'noko mamairo, nantoonge munte'maariko napo' nii'ka munte'meerima.
Teka tenang bakaang piaa ee'noko avusiro'ari oto' aarumo sira'puu'nang tee-koo batei-koo Kumponinge domamuru'.

Teie domamuru'noo' nii' tee koonto'nuka o'nori kapoo' tampara nii'ka nkoampiru'nung-koo deea', teka baka bakaang piaa-eta duu'muri meeka'antamurima domamuru'nung, aa'noma napo' ponto'antamurima tee ninka Tanuaang Meekung neraka'antamuru'.

Ee', tee Tanuaang Meekung nii'koo dau mmau'antavui piampuu'nung tee-koo niikaang domang-anta Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo kuunge nii' Kumponing ninka naroong-antamurii'naang teie piaamurira, ee'noko barenku domaang oparavauka'nung-koong nempampimaung okomurii'naang.

Tee-koo kapoo'koo nauansing-koo aroo'daravaing makosi da' Taitas. Da' tee teing-koo aing-koo kapoo'koo derarari otoo'naang piamomaang, dakaning nantoong Kumponing masika'antavaamaing kake'iiariri otoroo'naang tampara nko-nko-koo. Aing teing kapoo' boo'anta, nantoong ookara paku-antaning.

Teka aing aa'ning-eta donta'dariri otoriai: niania' maku'paa'koo, pokapoka', boorou'ning biikaning mirinanka depeto parapara-koong minkunaa, ee'noko karakarai turang, Ju' biikaang toomonanka tata'eema. Ai' aing teing tamunsi'ning ee'noko naning pakuvuarupeu'.
Naning tee nantoong-koo pokapoka' nkovuaing deeko' tautaueai ee'noko kemu'kai nkovuko deeko' napo' tautaueai;
Teketa beemu'pinamu'koo tamung doonko sipeai tee, ee' noru'ei: Aung tee naning koompaa', oreng aarumoi maanto', baka tuutunamparing.
Tenang ninge tenaanka Atemasi naanka ee'noko Tikikas da'anko botoampeko tampa' aa'na' paarararavaing ning kune'koo teka Nikopolisia, ai' ning tee tenang kamaari bakanang teke oto'koo darumari o'nong.

Napo' aa'na' pia-antaveriaing dakanavitu teinge tampa' neriaareaing tenaanka aa'noko tee boto nau-anta Siinasi ee'noko Apolos paku-koo beekaang nanunanu'koo. Ee'noko kokoiravererima beekaang nanunanu'koo makosining mooni' averereriaing.
Ee'noko tee' pakuaarema noru' nkavaavai kake'iiariaina' tampara nko-nko nko-koo, baata teing aa'na' piaaru'nuka pakuaarimaatoaina', ee'noko biikaang otooto' sinampo'nung deempari otoaing.

Aing ookara nii' ninka nari' o'norimainge biikaang tampa' tang dii'anko botoaamang. Niikaang tampa' tang nauereriaing teing nii'marang baito-koo kuunge. Tee biraanke tee dii' ookara ninka otomatoaing. Ee', tee' nari'.
Aung ane' karavoto˜ ninge Paula'ke daariamang anke Karistoo' bakaang doorenang sira'pamaunge kiimatamau'noo'ke o'noi.
