Eliasi tee naning tee' oro' nii'pina' bakaang aarumo, nii'na'mung tee aa'na' kunsiaru' apo'uaroo'naang beenaumo mare'koo bera ˜nau-taa kaara, ee'noko tee' nari' apo'uaruu' kansi'.
Teketa napo' dama'ke kunsiario' paning-eta apo' pou', ee'noko kansi'ke bakaning sinananka tavo'antavuru'.
Ee mmaikori', dii'koo narung tampara aarumo sipui pooarako deeko', narunge koong-antavuaing tee.
Noru'eriaing, baa tee naninge tee pooaru'nung koong-antavuaing teie tee bakaang tanuaang boo'parapeu'noo'keta domampuing. Bakaning mmau' orananka tonta'aravaing deeng-antavuing.
Basi te'.

Ninge Piitai teie Jiisuu' Karistoo'koong kara-okomui-nkai daarirerompimang dii' Kumponing bakaning miru'nisinuka-anko, damisimainku deentariri otorimaing anke kansi'koo, Jerusalema'keta bata'daariko aa'nairu-koo otori: Poontusi, Kalesia, Kapadosia', Eesia ee'noko Bitinia.

Dii' teing Kumponinge Niumai temu'keta tasi'durira miru'ruru'ning, ee'noko teie Tanuaang Meekunge meeka'antaruru', Jiisuu' Karistoo' meumperii'naang, ee'noko bakaang erenge kiiroraa' antarurii'naang. Biraanke ee'noko mooa dii'koo beremparavaing.

Biraankeampiai tee Kumponing, Bauma teie niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo'. Teie aa'na' piaamurira baurukaa' deeng-antamuri ponto'antamuru' nerakung domaang-koo domang purimariri nooruupiampii'naang maneena' o'noriaina'.

Teie tee, Jiisuu' boo'keta daa'antavuu'noo'ka tee' nkomuru', baurukaa'koong barenku kompampiaina' tasi'antamurima, tee ee'nung dera'paa', orariaravaung ee'noko paa'aravaunge. Kumponinge tee tampa' tarereruri otokoo' teka paning-koo.

Ee'noko masika'antaveriko teie bakaang iri'ke dii' napo' tarerurimatoo'naang bera tee domaang otoi-oto' oko-antaruriainoo'ke basi. Aa'nung neriari otomaung Kumponinge sira'koo te'mung asi'na'mung sirakura' oko-antamurira.
Tee'koo doturoturariri otoriaing tee doturotu pankaing dama'nung noru'eri bane parapaara arikananka kune'erima anke kansi'koo.

Teing arikananka teing diikaang masika'anta paara-kooning, dii' diikaang baito taa'ni'poi otoaing deeko'. Kooro tee paa'koo makosi bane nta'ke ivai'uma paara-antavaamaunge tee taa'ni'anta-koo, teka diikaang masika'anta kooro-koo dau basinoo' tampara Kumponing-koo, ee'noko tee'koo teie parapaarai nta'pina' paararuriko diikaang baito taa'ni'poi otoaing deeko' tee aa'noaing: daangang, meenasi ee'noko miring pankaing aruriaing Jiisuu' Karistoo' toroaravaina'mung.
Dii'ke tee, bane ooveriaruko'nunge, nka pankaruntomperimaung tee. Napo' tee'ke enang ooveria' otoring tee, teka masika'antaveri otong ee'noko karange minku-paa'na' deto doturarima doturoturarimaung.
Ai' dii' teing tee kapoo' Jiisuu'koo baitorarima piarorimaung nkaverimaing, tee tee diikaang uraang˜koong domang-anta.
Tee domang-anta tee, teinge nakaro-nupoonge˜ urikupoonge Kumponinge avusiro'ari biraankemuriaina' naumaariko'ninge tampa' tasi'koo eentavarima besi'aako'.
Tanuaang Meekunge Karistoo'ketainge ee'nara baikearara ee'noko dama'ke meenasi nkavuaina' sira'puma karantavuriko˜ bateinang ee'noko naninoo' noru'koo piavoroko'.

Teka Kumponinge nauvuru' tavo'kuaroo'naang tenang teing otoroko, teka dama'ke, enang-pina' dii' otorimaatomanang makosinang. Ee'noko enang Kumponinge tee Tanuaang Meekung paning-eta botovuio' pakuvuriko nii'ninge tee doorenang tampara sira'paama nauraarieeng, teing nakaro-nupoong biikaang minkunaa ninka manta'pai. Aing teing, bakei, koosinunankai aa'na' tampa' oo-koo piavorokoo'.

Tee'koo diikaang onou maamurariri otoriaing Kumponing dotu-antaveriaina' besi'eri, tarerariritaa', te'mung Jiisuu' Karistoo' sira'pari poaina'mung Kumponinge avusiro'ari biraankemuriaing tee narung nooruupieri.
Ee'noko Kumponing baurukaa' kara sionuka deentariri tee aarumo mono bakaang pia siong tero amakorariri nkorariko'nung nkoveriauka'.
Teka tee' ee'na' tee ee'nara dii' bokururu'nung meeka'pari otomana' nari' dii' meeka'dariri otoriaing ookara nkoveriaining-koo.
Tee' Daari Meekung-koo Kumponinge aa'pumana'koo,
“Dii' meeka'dariri otoriaing, ai' ning tee meekung.”

Kumponing Diuma tamperima tee tanatarariaing, ai' tee tee ee'nara Kumponing Simpe'nko˜ ookara-koo biikaang nko-nkonanka-koo makosina', bane aremurii' naning. Aing batei-koo ootukuning-koo damisimainoo'ke otorimaing-koo diikaang aarumo koontariri otoriaing tee-koo meerupirariri.

Dii'ke noru'eriaing dii' teing napo' moo'duru'ning tevung-eta tampoo' be'koo kaari'dariko'navung-eta diikakatauro biikaang minkunaa sintokosintoi-koong siomperiko, ee'noko tamung moo'duria' kapoo'ke orariaramaing-pina' oro'ke, aa'noko kooro ee'noko siliva'.
Teka teie erenge maku'paa' Jiisuu' Karistoo'koonge moo'duru' teu kampianu oroo'dopanu kiiroraa'nu ereng parekavaako'nu-pina' nari' miru'ari.
Tee tee temu'keta miru'nii' kansi' pupu'aravaruko-ita, teka teie Kumponinge oro'antavuu' tenang tee-koo batei-koo asi'noo'ke dii' paku-koo.
Tee-koo ee'nung-koo dii'ke Kumponing masika'antaverimaung, tee aa'nung tee Jiisuu' boo'keta daa'antavura meenasi avuu'. Tee'koo diikaang masika'anta ee'noko nenneng Kumponing-koo otoaing.

Enang tee dii' tee kara masikung siomperira diikaang domang tee kiiroraa'dariring ee'noko dii' piaa masikung ninka piaareeri otoring. Tee'koo naruna' naruna' aa'na' piaareeriai diikaang domang-eta namaia'pina'.
Dii' teing neraka'daririning, tee booauka'nung-eta ponto'dariru'ning, booaing-eta deea', teka teieta Kumponing bakaang kara-ita domampari oto'keta.
Daari Meekunge aa'pumana',
“Ookara nantoong biikaang domaang tee baa' pina' namu'ke boo', ee'noko biikaang meenasi tee iioo' pina' namu'ke mara'oma tankavarakoo', teka tee Kumponing bakaang kara tee tee' nari' otomatoaing.”
Tee aung kara tee ee'nung doorenang tampara dii'koo daankiampimaung.
Tee'koo dii'ke taapo' tonta'eriaing teing aing aa'ning: too'deng, tositosi, kara narunge navu, mamairo ee'noko amutemurii' miring orari-anta.
Teka dii' aa'na' peera-antarariaing tee-koo kara-koo pituaravaung-koo nerakau'nuka noonoo'koo narung-koo peeravoromana', tee dii' panka'antaruriaing diikaang nerakung domaang-koo makosina'.
Ai' teie domang-antaruriko dii'ke tee Ovoring tampa' mantomperu'nung.
Tee-anko pori otomatoaing tee ee'nara boia' domantoo'anko nantoonge tompimpau'nung-anko, teka Kumponing-koo dutakanoo'ka tee miru'nisi ee'noko domange dai'.

Ee'noko dii' tee'ke tee-pina' kapang domantoo'nuka otoriaininge tanuaang-aapenava pava-koo tee ninka nari' kanirariri meeka'nisinuka piristi'navitu deentariri tee' tanuaang-aapena' boontunantarima Kumponing dotu-antaveriaina' Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo kuunge.
Ai' Daari Meekunge ee' minkuvui otong,

“Ee aing, Saioni-namono-koo tee boia' domantoo' e'maniang tumanung bempansing, tere' ee'nare' kunku'doi'koo miru'nisi-nare' ee'noko maku'paa'nare'ke, ee'noko baa tee naning tee masika'antavuaing tee maia'anta-koong deea'.”

Dii'koo ee'ning-koo tee, Jiisuu' Karistoo', masika'antaverimaing-koo tee ee'nara domange dai' ee'noko maku'paa', teka teing-koo tee masika'antavaavaing-koo tee tee maia'anta, tee' Daari Meekunge aa'pumana',
“Tere' ee'nare' kapanare' pava kaninukai poore'aama dua'au'nare' ookutunava-koo e'manianare' tumanare' deempario' tasi'pau' dama'ke.”
Ee'noko
“Tere' tere' ee'nare' nantoong tupang-antavurira dua'antavuriainare' teing.”
Teing tupampariainoo' tee teinge kara meumpaavaung-koo tee', teing tee' oro'nuka dua'koo miru'uru'na'.

Teka dii' teing ee'ning Dauraronge˜ miru'nii'nuka piristi'koo, meekavitu, Kumponing baka bakanupoong, dii'ke kapoo' bakaang nko-nkonanka tampeng sira'antaevurimatoaining, tee ee'nara dii' mutaanang-eta bokururira bakaang araka ta'nimpaarii'aape si'duru'.
Tero tee dii' nantoong deeaing, teka enang tee dii' teing Kumponing bakaning nantoong deentaririning. Tenang ee'nang tee Kumponing bakaang piaa komperiaruko'ning, teka enang komperi otong tee piaa.

Ee mmaikori', dii' teing tavora-nupoong ee'noko damisimainku-pina' anke kansi'koo otoriko ninge eturampiri aa'dampimang: Donta'dariri otoriai mono-aapening piananka-ita teing dii' domang turanturi otorimaing-eta.

Mutaanang-nupoong-ankoi tampa' mataurariri otorimaatoai ee'noko oraka' nkonuka tantaariaing deeko' tenang Kumponinge kansi' beero'uainang diikaang nko-nko tampara tasi'paara Kumponing daangampaavaing teinge.
Ookara-koo teing-koo nantoong-koo pankenanka-koo boong otorimaatoai Kumponing dotu-antaverii'naang, aa'noko tee daurarong, ee'noko teing ovo'ma'nuka,
ai' teing teing Kumponinge botovuru'ning oreng mero'aarima ee'noko tampeng daangampaarii'naang.
Ai' Kumponing bakaang pia tee ee' otong': Dii'ke tampa'nkoi dooroong-antavereriaing teing mutaanang-nupoong kara tamunsi'nung minkuaamaing.

Masika' dii' Moosesi bakaang botoi dai'daria' otong, teka ninge aa'dampimang dii'ke kapoo' orara nkoveriauka' dakaraka'peri aa'perima, “Karistoo'ke Moosesi bakaang boto-ita unaa-antamuio' ning taura'mari o'nong.” A, tee' deea'. Karistoo'ke unaa-antamuru'nung nii'ke kapoo' tampeng naing nkoampii'naang. Kumponing bakaning botovotonaa'nuka makosina' otorimaatoaing.

Nantoong ookara makosina' deto basi-antavererimaatoai. Teing Karistoo'koo dii'marang piaaverererimaatoai. Kumponing-koo aa'na' amaiaa'dori otoriai, ee'noko kansi'koong daurarong deto basi-antaverimatoai.
Dii' bautaranuka diikaning pankeng tanataraarimaing-ankoi boong-koo otorimaatoai teing pankaing-antaverereri, tampa' nkoraarimaing naing-koo deea', teka teing oraka' nkoraarimaing-koo nari'.
Naning tamung sisikeera-antavaako taura'paravaing deeko' Kumponing dotu-anta-koo noru'ui, Kumponinge tee biraankevuaing tee.

Moo' aming nkaveriaing kapoo' orara nkoveriko mura'daariko taura'dariaing deeko'? Teka kapoo' tampara nkoverima baike kune'erii'naang dooroontariri otoriaing deeko' Kumponinge biraankeruriaing tee-koo.
Ai' dii' teing tee'koo Kumponinge bokururu'ning. Karistoo' tee dii'koo baike kune'uu'nung dii' tee' nari' tee siomperi nkorarii'naang nau-antarurima.
Teie tee oraka'nko nkovua', bakaang be'duu'koo tosi minkuvuko taaravaava'.
Tenang teinge tee poore'aako teie tee teing poore'uria' maku'koo. Sisikeera napo' tora'pura mau'uria' teing, teka tee Kumponing-koo baka aroo'aru' koonto'na' simpe'nko˜ noru'ui.

Teie tee baka bakaang monoi ookara oraka' nkonanka nkavuu' teka aa'barata'koo, nii' tee-koo oraka' nko-koo moompira tee-koo aarumo koonto' narung-koo domamariri o'norii'naang. Dii' teing teie dato'nankai tee-koonge unaa-antarurining.
Ai' dii' teing poorariru'ning sipisipi'pina', teka enang tororaririning tee-anko diikaang tanuaang sipisipi'pina' tanatarurimaung-anko.

Dii' maniku' tee'ke, dii'unkaampi-koo boong otorimaatoainge ee'noko teing-koo nii'ning Kumponing bakaang kara siompaavaing deeko' teie tampara aarumoi dii' bii'ankaampi diikaange Kumponing-aape barampereriaing, karai deea'.
Tenang teinge ooaama tee diikaang mee'du'piari nari' oto' teing bere'ariaing.
Diikaang tampa' oro'na' mono-koo dama'dunoo' deemparavauka' tampa' simpi'dovantarima diikaning dapo ee'noko kapoo' tampeng kooro dovang-kooning si'darima napo' mononopa' tampa' oro' kuruntarima.

Teka nepunepu' diikaang tee tee-koo naning-koo domang-koo kuung otoai teing ninka kapoo' aarumo tampeng paa'koo makosi deeaing ninka aa'ning ninka: banainge oto' ee'noko domang dooroonto'. Aing teing ee'ning Kumponing-koo dutakanoo'ke bakei dakausi' masikeng.
Tee' nari' otorimaatoaing teing temu'nupoong maniku' meekupoong Kumponing-koo baitoariko'ning nepu'ariko'na' bii'unkaampi-koo boong otoroi.
Tee' ee'na' Seera'ke Eebaraami' kara taaravuma siompuko'na' ovoring tampuma tee. Ee'noko dii' teing ee'ning teni baurukaa' dii'ke tampa' nkorarimatoaing deeko' baru' aroreria' otori.

Napo' tee' nari' dii' bii'unkaampi teing ninka dii'ankaampi ninka mataurariri otorimaatoai makosina' deto deeng-antavereri teing baru' iri'oroaing deempariko, ai' teing teinge dii' ninka nari' tee barenku okovuriaining biraankerurira domang-antaruriaing-koo. Tee' nkorariaing diikaang kunsi avo'aravaroo'naang.
Tee-koo asi'noo'ke aa'dampimang: Dii' ookara nari' marireeri otorimaatoaing, nari' mantonteeri namaia'pina' mantontariri tampa' domang piaareerima ee'noko doonko noru'dariri.
Orara orarai maku'eriauka', barakosi' barakosi'ke maku'eriauka', teka aampari'eri biraanke-antareerimaatoai, ai' dii' teing tee' nko-koo bokururu'ning dii'ke bakaang biraanke nkaverii'naang.
Tee' Daari Meekunge aa'pumana',
“Baa tee naning domampari oto'koo piavoi otoing doong tampeng oovuu'naang piavora, tee oraka' karoauka' ee'noko teie tee daang minkuvuauka'.
Ee'noko oraka' nko-eta bere'arara tampa'nko nkovuaing, ee'noko teie tee mooa besi'uma siompui otoaing.

Ai' teie Ovoringe teing koonto'nuka tampa' oovuri tarevurimaung ee'noko bakaang punkaa' tee daate'ari otomaung teing biikaang kunsi tampa' taara-koo. Teka Ovoring bakaang oing tee teing-eta kapoo' orara nkoaamaing-eta munte'uri ako' toroari otong.”
Dii' enang baie baikerurii'naang dii' kapoo' tampara narung siomperimaing deeko'?
Teka bane kapoo' tampara nkoverima baike kune'eriaing deeko' dii' teing Kumponinge tee-koo biraankeruriaining. Tee' Daari Meekunge aa'pumana',
“Nantoonge mau'daariko arorerima domang manki'doriauka'.”

Teka diikaang domange Karistoo' pankaing-antaveri otorimaatoai diikaang Ovoring deeng-antaveri. Ookara batei-koo maamurariri otorimaatoai nantoong nia'daariaining nauereriaina' okora'noo' dii'ke tee Ovoring bokururiaing nemperi otorimaung-koo, teka dooroontariri doonko noru'dariri tee' nauereriai.
Ee'noko tarerariri otoriai diikaang domang kiiroraa'ari oto'koo teing diikaang tampara aarumo Karistoo'koo kuunge nkoverimaung oraka' minkuaamaing maia'oroaina' tee' nkoraarimaung-koo.
Kapoo' tampara nkoverima baike Kumponinge taura'puing kune'koo tee tampa', teka kapoo' orara nkoverima deeko' oraka'.

Ai' Karistoo' tee tee' nari' bou' nantoong biikaang oraka' nkonanka-koo. Terong-koo ookara daka'pui namu'ke pareka bakevuu', tee ee'nara koonto' deemparitaa' nii' koonto'nuka deeaing Kumponing-koo tavo'murii'naang teie. Mono nameng dupisi'aio' tee' boo'paru', teka Kumponing bakaang Tanuaange daa'uio' domampari otong.
Tenang bakaang mono boo'pari otoko tanuaang-naung tee boo'nuka-koo daankiaru' kiimatanoo'ke.

Aing teing ee'ning tanuaananka nantoong urikupoong-kooning Kumponing taaravaavaruko' ning, teing bere'arii'naang Kumponinge pankaroong nempuriko'ning tenang Nooa'ke tee aaka'nareng ta'nampuko'nang. Teka oki'ning nantoong ˜beenaumo-taa naing aareri˜koo ntong-koo daue otorou'ning domampariru'.

Ntonge aareri-koo kuung otoroko tampoo'aape domampariainoo' taa'bakavuru'na' nii' tee' nari' kompampima Karistoo'koo kuung o'nori domamariainoo' basimarii'naang bakaang iri'ke boo'keta daa'antavuu'nunge pakumuriko. Tee tee ntong-koo minkie meeka'anta nkavampimaung ku'mi' mono-ita kui-anta-koong deea' Kumponinge tampeng-pina' oomurii'naang, teka tee domang kiiroraa'keta maraka-anta Kumponing-koo Karistoo' baitoampiri nari' oto'koong teie domang-antamurii'naang.
Tee tee ee'nara boo'keta daa'arara paning-koo deto bera Kumponing-koo tampavine-koo otomaung, ookara kapoo'koo dau, aa'ning-koo: koosinunanka, arekee' oro'ning ovontung ee'noko iri'po'nupoong.

Enang tee, Karistoo'ke bakaang monoi baike tora'puu'nung-koo dii' tee' nari' uro'kanoo'ka purintariri aroo'dariaing temurii' baike kune'koo, ai' baa tee naning baike kune'uma tee tee enang oraka' nko-ita bakearing.
Tee tee enang bakaang mono ninka domampari otoi emu'keta deto mono bakaang pia siompuauka', teka Kumponing bakaang pia siompuaing.

Tee tee dii'ke teing-pina' nari' mutaanang-nupoong piavoromana' aing aa'ning nkoveriauka' temu' nkoveriko'na': maimaia'na' oto', mono bakaang pia siong, purinto' naru'ke kanu'anta, taamang tovang nainai nai-koo deikoo', ee'noko daang-koong dootuu', tee maarekusi'. Batei temurii' nko-koo tero tankinuing botu te'.
Teing teing enang ta'nimparirining dii' teing ninka nari' tapo'dariaruio' tamung iri' o'anta-koo, ee'noko oraka' minkuraarikoo'.
Teka teinge tee teka dama' toosiaavaing Kumponing ninka ookara nantoong simpe'koo maamuari otoing ninka: boo'nuka ee'noko domantoo'nuka nari'.

Ai' teie Kumponinge teing temu' boorou'ning tee' nari' tampara doorenang taara-antavuru' teing teing biikaang tanuaang domampariri otoroo'naang Kumponing domampari otomana' nari'. Ookara nantoong ninka nari' biikaang mono boo'koo barakosi'nii'nuka deempariko teie tee daankinang taara-antavuru'nung.
Ookara kapoo'nanka aung kansi'koonanka o'doma due'umaang. Tee'koo mataurariri tarerariri otoriaing tampa' kunsirariaina'.
Ookara-koo daua naruna' naruna' diikaang domang-eta tampa' piaareeri otorimaatoai, ai' nii'ke nantoong piaavarampima deeko' biikaang oraka' nkonanka mmau' daka'pampipeu'.
Diikaning pavananka-koo tampa' onkeonke'deerimaatoaing baru' pore'pina' noru'erima munkumunkureeria'.
Kumponinge avuavu' naruna' naruna' aruru'na' makosina' komperi pakureerimaatoai. Tee'koo dii' teing kapoo' amutemurii' Kumponinge aruru'ning tampeng tare-nupoong deentariaing.

Kara sira'perima deeko' tee' Kumponinge naururiaina' masika' sira'periai. Nantoong pakuererima deeko' Kumponinge iri' arurimana' siomperi pakuereriai, ookara-koo kapoo' nanka-koo Kumponing pankaimparavaina' Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo kuunge. Miring ee'noko meenasi pankaing okovui otomatoaing ookutunung batei-koo o'domaropa-koo. Ee', masikung.
Ee maikori', ta'niniriauka' dii' tee-koo nta'pina' mantong-koo parapaara-koo dii'koo poing-koo paararurima. Tee kapoo' ta'nimpaarii'pina' noru'eriauka'.
Teka baru'noo' doturariaing dii'ke Karistoo' siomperima arikung kune'uu'na' nari', ee' noru'erima tee' nkomarimaung-koo dotumariaing tenang tee bakaang meenasi oro'paravainang.
Karistoo'nung miring komperimaung-koo oraka' minkuraariko tee doturariaing, ai' tee' minkuraarima sira'paamaung tee Tanuaang Meekung Kumponing bakaang meenasi-po'nung dii'koo otomaung.
Teka dii' orara aarumo siomperi sisikeerang-antarariko taara-koo bakei piamoa' aing ee' oro' nkoverima: dupisi'anta, bakiaa'nko, oraka'nko, nii'noo' kakarua'dorima.
Teka Karistoo'koo kuung otoritaa' baike kune'erima maia'doria' Kumponing pankaing-anta-veriaing Karistoo' bakaang miring komperimaung-koo.
Ai' batei tee poi otong teie bakanava'kooning paara-anta-koong. Ee'noko nii'keta tutumparavaing deeko' teing Kumponing bakaang doorenang tampara siompaava' otomaing are'ke botu deempariaing?
Tee' Daari Meekunge aa'pumana',
“Teing koonto'nuka kakaue domampariaing deeko', teing nantoong oreng Kumponing piavoroaing are'ke oro'pariaing?”

Tee'koo teing nantoong Kumponing bakaang pia-koo otoroi baike kune'aavaining, makosi tampa' nari' nkoaamatoaing bii'ka avariri tee-koo teing nkovuru'nung bakaang tare-koo, biikaang tarenara mutekaro' masika'antavai.

Tee'koo dii' dootuu'koo urantanuka tasi'antarampimang nkorariaina' ninge dii' ninka nari' oro'ke dootuu'koo urantai, ninge ee'nara Karistoo' bakaang baike koonto' ooamira sira'pamaunge, ee'noko napo' tee' nari' dii' ninka kompampainge tee meenasi Karistoo' bakaang oro'antavuainang.

Aa'dampimang: Kumponing bakanavitu tampa' tanataverererimaatoai teing dii'ke tanata-koo si'duru'ning, tamung konteroritaa' deea', teka pia-ita nkoveriai Kumponinge piavomana'. Moo' narung noru'eri tanataverereriauka', teka aroo'keta tanataverereriai.
Apoapoo'erereriauka' teing tanataverererimaing teka tampa' ooraari siontaariaina' nkorariai.
Ee'noko tenang tee Tanatanara Pankaing oro'paravainang dii'ke moo' tee meenasi-po'nung paa'aravauka'nung nkaveriaing.
Ee'noko dii' napo' nemaa' teie diikaning urantanuka-koo boong otorimaatoai amaiaa'dori dii'ka-koo meu'ke, ai' Daari Meekunge ee' minkuvui otong:
Kumponinge tee teing bii'ka daangamparimaing too'dempurima teing boonko noru'arimaing avusiro'ari pakuvurikoo'.
Boonkorariri otorimaatoai dii'ka-koo tee-koo Kumponing-koo tanka' purinto'koo kuung otori, tee batei makotuko tee deto si'duriaing dii'.
Diikaang ookara manki'nanka tee narung-koo siperimaatoai, ai' dii' teing teie piaaruri tanataruri otong.
Teka tanatarariri ee'noko tarerariri otorimaatoai. Tee diikaang karenung Sietani' tee laioni-pina' kururuu'kuma avitoitoi nanumaung besi'uma naning avoro'antavura dunkumpuaing.
Tanka'ni'periai tee diikaang masika'anta-koo e'maniri, ee' noru'erima Karistoo'koo nii'maikorori' tee' nari' sisikeera kune'aama Sietani' bakaang avoro'anta dimpa'aakoo'.

A'noo' oki'ning batei-koo sisikeera tora'periaing. Teketa teie Kumponinge piaa baukoi baka unaa-antarurira ee'noko e'mang-antarurira puring-antaruriaing dii', ai' teie tero bokururu'nung dii'ke domaang oparavaung meenasi-po'nung nkaverii'naang Karistoo'koo kuunge.
Tee tee tee' nari' tanatavari otoaing ootukunung batei-koo o'domaropa-koo. Masikung.

Aung ane' karavoto˜ apukane' ninge minkuanko Sivanusie pakumui daarivuing, teie mmaiko'ke ninge masika'antavamaunge, dii' puring-anta-koo ee'noko aung tee Kumponing bakaang piaa dii'koo sira'anta-koo. Ee'nung-koo purintariri otoriaing.

Aing dootuu'nupoong Karistoo'navitu anke Babiloni'ke o'norimanavitue, Kumponinge dii'pina' nari' miru'muru'navitue tampara tampampimaang dii'koo, tee ninka nnuring tampamaung ninka Maaka' ninka nari'. Onkeonke'deeriai dii' naruna' naruna' piaa taa'ni'antaveri.
Mooa tee dii'koo ookara-koo tee' nari' otoaing dii'koo Karistoo'koo otorining-koo. Tee' nari'.

Aung tee ane' karavoto˜ ninge Saimoni' Piitai daariamang Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaang botovotonaa'ke, ee'noko tee bakaang kara-okomui-nka ning. Dii' ee'ning daarirerompimang tee aung amurii' masika'anta nii'pina' nari' oto'derurining Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaang aarumo koonto'koo kuunge oko-antamuru'nung, ee'nara niikaang Kumponing ee'noko Domang-anta.
Tee biraanke ee'noko mooa dii'koo beremparavaing Kumponing tampa' kenkumperi otoriko ee'noko tee niikaang ovoring Jiisuu'.

Ai' tee tee nii'ke tee tampa' kenkumpampiko teie tee teieta bakaang iri' pankaing-eta ookara kapoo'nanka makosina' amuriaing tampa' domamariri siompampiaing-koo. Ai' teie bakaang meenasi ee'noko bakaang tampara aarumo nii' ninka nari' oro'anta-koo bokumuru'.

Ee'noko tee' nkomurima teing bakei pankeng avuavu'nanka moo'dopa amuru' tero maraka-antamuru'ning. Kansi' bakaang dera'keta mmarumpia'naang amuru', tero karaa'ampiko doomamuriko'nung-eta bera Kumponing-pina' nari' datamori o'noriai.
Tee'koo ee'na'koo dii' aa'na' paararariaing diikaang masika'anta ninka tampa' oto'koo, ee'noko tee' tampa' otori Kumponing tampa' kenkumperi otoriaing.
Ee'noko tee' noru'eritaa' diikaang mono bakaang pia daka'peri tanatarariai. Ee'noko teieta napo' tee' nari' nko-koo pinka'dariri otorimaatoai, ee'noko pinka'darima Kumponing-koo arariri otoriaing.
Ee'noko Kumponing-koo arariri otori teing dii'maikorori'koo napo' navurariri otoriai, ee'noko tee' navurariri otoritaa' piaa oro'antaverimatoai.

Ee'koo, teing aing aarumo oro'antaveri otoaing deeko' ee'noko dii'koo berempari otoai, teinge tee dii' tanataruriaing tamung sinangropanuka iri' o'dari'neeng-koo tee Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' noru'eri.
Ai' tee naning aing ee'ning oto'evuauka'nung tee kaputu', noru' apukung, ee'noko noru'ua' otong teie tee urikeng oreng aarumonanka-ita kiiroraa'antavuu'na'.
Tee'koo, dii' mmaikori', oko'okoruriaing tee Kumponinge miru'duri bokururu'nung taa'ni'antarariri. Tee' ee'na' nkorariaining deeko' dii' teing dua'dariauka'ning.
Ee'noko dii' teing maneena' onkeonke'duriaing teka ee'noo'ka paning-koo niikaang Ovoring Domang-antai Jiisuu' Karistoo'ke tee' nari' taremurimato-ainoo'ka.
Tee'koo ninge maroita uatepa noru'antarampimatoaing dii' teing aing ookara kapoo'nanka naurampimaing, bane dii'ke noru'erio' ee'noko tee kara masikung oto'derurimaung-koo ima'dariri otorikoo'.
Ee' noru'amaang, makosi ninge dii' enang ning aung mono ninka o'noitaa' tee ninge dii' tante-antarampimatoai napo' noru'antarampima.
Ninge ee' noru'ansitaa': Batei tee nkaang mono tonta'uaina'mung due'ari otong tee' nari' niikaange Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo'ke naumuu'na'.
Tee'koo ninge aa'na' tautaurampimang ning tenkenanko tee dii' makosiri otoriaina' aing kapoo'nanka napo' noru'koo batei piaroriaining-koo.

Niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' iri' ninka pou'na'koong minkunaa naurampiru'nung kumponaang-koo bi'arava', nantoonge aavamaari minkuaapeu'ning-koo, teka nii'ke tee niikaange dutai ooampiru'nung minkuampimaung tee' meenasi ninka daurarong˜ otomanoo'keta neramparu'na'.
Ai' tenang teie tee pankaing-anta ee'noko meenasi Bauma Kumponing-eta nkavuko teie auronge narunge karavuu' teketa paning-eta daurarompari bakaang meenasi oro'antavumanoo'keta ee' minkuvuma,
“Aung tee nnuring ninge piaavamaung. Ee'nara-koo ning tampa' dotumaramaung.”
Aung kara anaare nii'ke paning-eta poko taaravampiru', ai' nii' teing tee ninka nari' o'noru'ning teke meekamii-koo.

Ee'noko nakaro-nupoong˜ urikupoong biikaang kara Jiisuu'ke dupe-antavuio' aa'na' masikung oro'pario' kompampiri otong niikaang kara puring-anta-koo. Dii' tee noru' e'maniri otoriaing tee-koo biikaang kara-koo tee-pina' araka mutaananoo'ke arakavaramaung-pina' noru'eritaa' bera tane'puko tee maatara daa'aravainoo'ke basi diikaang domang-koo.
Tutuna' tee aung tasi'perira e'maniriaing Daari Meekung-koo: Ookara kara Daari Meekung-koo nakaro-nupoonge tarampeeaako'ning˜ teing nantoonge bii'ka sira'koo makosi deeaing.
Ai' nanaare otoa' naninung pia-ita tavo'kuu'naare Daari Meekung-koo, teka Tanuaang Meekunge karantavuriko˜ Kumponing-eta nantoonge minkuaama daariaako'.

Teka nii'ning nakaro-nupoong daang Kumponing-etaining tamparima daa'ariko' Ju'nupoong-koo meu'ke, ee'noko napo' tee' nari' daang-koonanka nau-antanuka daa'ariainge dii'koo meu'ke. Tee' nkoarima nantoong makenge orari-antavaariaing biikaning noru'keta daang nau-antavaarima, biikaang Ovoring teing moo'uru'nung sipai. Tee'koo bii'ka namu'ke orari-anta kune'aavaing.
A'noo' tee mmau'ke siompaariaing biikaang aarumo amutemurii' maimaia'nanka-po'nung. Teketa' teing tee' nkoariko tevung Karistoo'nung kara masikung sionavung nii'ninge oraka' minkuaavaing.
Ee'noko tee' nkoarima mooni' barang-koo okovuriai kara menaankavarima. Nka tee teie Simpe'nkoi˜ tuutunang˜ miru'evuru'nung nempari otong. Teing orari-antavuriainge keeroorovuri otong.

Nii'ke noru'ampiri otong tee' nkoaravainoo' aa'nung-koo: Nii'ning koosinunanka oraka' nkoariko tamung oovuriaruu', teka kansi'koo tumang dua'uru' isipo' masipo' mutaananoo' doonko teke dai'ariri otoroo'naang bera simpe'uriaina'mung-koo basi.

Napo' urikavarang orara aarumo ninka nari' kansi' maanto'aako'ning tamung oovuriaruu', teka doua-koo minki-antavurira opuru', Nooa' narung deeko' aarumo koonto' daankivuko'nung domampuu', nii'ning nantoong ˜kenaanka-taa ninka nari'.
Napo' osi pankeng kevuntu'ka Sodom ee'noko Komora' sipung deeng-antavuretu' otorearoo'naang tampureta dama'navarange Kumponing siompaavauka'ninge nkovuriaina' ooaava'naang.
Ee'noko teka napo' naning koonto', Loote', domang-antavuu', tee ee'nara oraka' dee'oko'nung teing oreng Sodom-nupoong maimaia'na' nkoariko.
Tee ee'nara naning koonto' deempari domang manki'oko'nung teing tee ninka otoroko'ning boto-koo kuung otoroa'pina' noru'ai nkoariko'ning ninka doong kante oovurima ee'noko teing-koo taaravuma.

Tee' nkovuru'na'koo tee sira'pari otong tee Ovoring noru'kui otong nantoong tee siompaamaing parapaara arikung-eta domang-antana'koo ee'noko napo' teing siompaavauka'ning kiimatavurii'naang pinka'uri oto'na'koo bera te'mung simpe'uriaina'mung-koo basi.
Deepo' masipo' bakei kiimatavuriaing teing nau-antanuka daang Kumponing-etaining tamparimaing. Mono bakaang pia orara dera' siompaamaing Ovoring tompimpai.

Aing amurii' nantoong derareranuka, bore' kapanuka, anutua avoreaava' avutevu'ari dauraronanka oraka' minkuaarimaing, teka teing ookara noru'po'nupoong, bane koosinunanka deeko', tee' nkoariaung. Bane teing koosinunanka nantoong-koo dau basina' iri' ee'noko iirakutapo'nupoonge oraka' minkuaarima tuumpiaariaung biikaning kare-nupoong Ovoring-koo uro'kanoo'ke.

Teka aing tosi nkonuka kau' karenaumonanka-pina' oro'nuka, noru' papaaravari oto'nuka, matauropanuka, tamung doonko tavu'koo makosinanka-pina' oro'nuka. Noru'aava' poore' nkoaamaing. Biikaang dera'ke boo'antavuriko kera'pariaining.

Tee tee ee'nara biikaang moo' orara oraka' nkoariko'nung-koo, aa'noma: doong ookutuna'mung maia'oroa' tamung sirakura' mono bakaang pia orara siong-koo kei'orokoo'. Teing teing dii' ninka nari' otori diikaang miring orari-antaraarimaung ee'noko diikaang navunavu daang deeng-antavaakoo'. Dii' ninka nari' Ovoring bakaang taamang naierima aavaraarikoo' moru-pina' noru'ai.

Biikaang duta tee karakaraa'ke maanto'nuka maniku'koo, orara aarumo besi'ui oto'nuka, aruaru'nuka da'deng dua'antavaarimaing, ee'noko biikaang domang aarumo oko'oko-koo bareari oto'nukai. Kumponinge barakosi'nii'nuka teing.
Koonto'navung sipaara pooariru'ning. Tee nakaronara Baalamu, Beeoo bauring, bakanavung siompaamaing, mooni' nka-koo piavora oraka' nkoaru'nung.
Teka tee bakaang doonkii'ke amakoi naning-pina' karoma orokovuu'nung danto nari' oraka' nkoara'neeng-koo, tee nakaronara bakaang aarumo kanukanu' potevui.

Teing daang-koong nau-antanuka tee tee-pina' ntong dakau-pina' oro'nuka, ee'noko napo' tee kamo' dovinge avitoitoi nkavui nanumaung-pina' oro'nukai, Kumponinge mutaananoo' tumang masipo' miru'evuru'ning teke oto'koo.

Ai' teing daang pankaing-antavarima buia'arimaing maimaia'na' nkoarima, ee'noko baanka' nempaama mono bakaang piai beana-antavaakoo' nii'ning nantoong teing-eta oraru'kiai otoromanavitu-eta koo'ariko bi'anta-koo.

Opampaarima tuumpi-eta unaavoroi otoroaining tampaarimaung, teka teing bii'ka dera'antanameng-koo dai'ariri otoroi, ai' aming kapoo' tee naning kuung deempui otoing-koo, tee tee, tee-koo ee'nung-koo dai'ari otong.

Ee'noko enang teing aa'na' dai'ariri otorong, io' teieta kansi' bakaang aarumo orara-ita mmariaara, tee niikaang Ovoring ee'noko Domang-anta Jiisuu' Karistoo' siompaakotaa', teketa napo' enang kuung dua'arira dai'aririnamu' oramu'. Tutuna'namu' divu'ui otong.

Baru' tampa'na' deea' tee teing koonto'navung-koo noru'kaavarupeu'nung-koo, ee'noko bakei oraka' tutung noru'aara napo' bere'ariring-koo teieta doorenang aa'na' tampara, Karistoo'ketaing boto meekung tutung taaravau'nung-eta.

Tee tee' teing-koo nkoaramaung tee niikaang mirumiru' tampui otoina', aa'pumana', “Mosi'ke tee napo' bakaang kurina'koo toroarama maa'umaung,” nii'na' ee', “Pooro' duu'paako napo' meto'koo novuuaramaung.”
Aung ane' karavoto kene'ka-nane' dii' mmaikori' masikupoong daarirerompimang. Ee'noko aing-koo ookane'ka-koo ninge diikaang noru' tante-antarampimang nari' pituraria' otorii'naang.

Tee'koo aing kapoo' unampansi naurampimang teinge urikupoonge nakaro-nupoonge Kumponing-etaininge miru'ai minkuau'ning napo' norunoru'eriai ee'noko niikaang Ovoring Domang-anta bakaang boto nari' tero nii'ke kara okomuri nkanukai naurarampiru'na'.
Aming-koo tee' naurampimang? Nna' doong asi' due'uko teing nantoonge tee bakei benkentaariaining dii', biikaang mono-koong pia siompai.
Aa'paavaing, “Tee napo' toroaravaing tamparu'nung arerai? Ai' teing niikakatauro tee' nari' naumaariko'ning boorou'noo'keta ookara kapoo' nari' otong kansi' pupu'aru'noo'keta otomana'.”
Teka tee' minkuaama narung kapoo' maroita bei'bei'aamaung aa'nou'nung: Kumponinge karoko paning tavo'aru' tero, ee'noko kansi' pirung-eta bakoarara ta'namparu'.
Napo' Kumponing karoko tee kansi' tero otoko'nung douai pirung-pina' dunkumpura orarivuu' Nooa' bakaang batei-koo.

Ee'noko tenaarei ee'naarei napo' paning ee'noko kansi' enang otomatomaing nta'ke paro'koo miru'ura sipuu', ee'noko teka pinka'ui otong bera te'mung doong nantoong oreng simpe'urira kera'antavuriaina'mung-koo basi.
Teka ee mmaikori', bei'bei'eriauka' aung kapoo': Ovoring-koo tee mare' kivora daaku' na'mung doong-pina' otong, ee'noko na'mung doong tee mare' kivora daaku'pina' otong.

Ovoringe tee bakaang maraka-anta dupe-koo tamung ana'aravaung nii'ninge tampaamana'. Teka teie piaavuri nempuri otong teing bei'bei'arimaing-koo naning narung kera'para'neeng-koo, teka ookara bere'arii'naang piavorora batei makosinoo' avurii'naang.

Ai' te'mung Ovoring bakana'mung bateinana'mung te'mung bakiaa' nko-pina' poaina'mung, ee'noko tenang paning kurunkurunkaanang paa'aravai ee'noko ookara kapoo' paning-koonanka nta'ke taivurira ta'da'purira ntong deeng-antavuriaing, ee'noko kansi' teing ninka bakaning nko-nkonanka naro'ka parosinampurira opuriaing.
Enang tee dii' aing-koo ookara kapoo'nanka-koo bakei oki'noo' bi'dariauka' taivurira tara'puriaining noru'eritaa', ee'noko meeka'dariri Kumponing-koo arariri otoriai.
Tee' nari' nemperi Kumponing poaina'mung duerue'antaveri otoriai, te'mung ee'na'mung Kumponinge paning paro'uko tara'pura tuuvuaina'mung, teing ookara kapoo'nanka teke otoromaing nari'.
Teka tee kapoo' masikung nempampiri o'norimaung tee paning ee'noko kansi' nerakeng tavo'kureaing maraka-antamuru'na', te' aarumo koonto' narung otoainoo'.

Tee'koo dii' mmaikori' masikupoong, te'mung nemperimaing deentariko ee' naurampimang, purintariri otoriaing ku'mi'dopanuka, nii'noo' tuumpi otoriaing, Kumponinge tee ninka mooa-koo oto'nuka meu'duriaina'.

Ee'noko noru'eriaing aming-koo tee' pankaroong nemurimaunge. Tee aa' batei amurima bakaang doorenang domang-anta-koong noru'anta-koo tee' nemurimaung. Tee' ee'na' nii'maiko' piaavampimaunge, Paula'ke daarirerurima naururu'na' Kumponinge onou avuio'.

Ookara karavoto bakaning-koo tee' nari' daarivukoo'. A'noo' tee nii'ning kapoo' teing-koo karavotonanka-koo ivekeng otong noru'koo, ee'noko teinge noru'dopanukai teing mare'aama bii'ka orari-antavarimaung tee' napo' nii'ning Daari Meekung-kooning kara mare'aamana' nari'.

Tee'koo dii'ke mmaikori' masikupoonge tutung aing ee' oro' kapoo'nanka tasi'perira tarerariri otoriaing boto siompaavaininge taapo'ke barantaari'neenga kara koonto' deeaung nauraarima e'mantoma dekopi'antaraari.

Teka deto du'duriaing Karistoo' noru'koo, tee niikaang Ovoring Domang-anta, ee'noko bakaang piaa nka-koo. Tee ee'nara meenasi ookara okovui otoaing enang-eta deto bera te'mung doong oparavauka'na'mung. Ee', tee' nari'.
Nii' teing kara sira'nuka tee-koo kapoo' tutuna' masipo'keta otoi otomaung-koo, ee'nung naning-naumpura poko ooampiring, tee Kumponing Bakaang Kara Domang-anta-koong Okovenung.

Ee', tee Domaang Otoi-oto' tampa' sira'pario' niikaang dutai ooampima taaravampiko', ee'noko birenge kompampiri keerooroampiru'. Tee'koo dii' naurarampima daankiampimaung tee Karistoo' Domang-anta tee' nari' otoi otomaung. Bauma ninka otoko' ee'noko depeto nii'anko siarara sira'paru'.

Tee nii'ke ooampira ee'noko taaravampiru'nung daankiampimaung dii'koo, dii' nii' ninka nari' tapo'meerira tampa' masika' onkeonke'meerii'naang, ee'noko Niuma ninka ee'noko Bauring Jiisuu' Karistoo'daang ninka nari'.
Tee aung ane' karavoto˜ ninge daariansing nii' ookara tee' nari' minkuamaatomana' nkomarira doturotue maanto'murii'naang.
Aung tee doorenang nii'ke taaravampiru'nung teieta Bauring-eta dii' naurarampimaung: Kumponing tee araka ee'noko tee tee-koo oki'noo' mutaanang otoa' bakei.
Nii'koo baata aa'parimaing, “Nii' tee ninka miirunanka,” nka mutaanang-koo otoroitaa' teing teing tosiarimaing ee'noko kapoo' masikung narung siona' otoroa'.

Teka baata teing araka-koo otoromaing tee Jiisuu' araka-koo otoina' nari' teing teing oovuning ninka miirumpei otoromaung, ee'noko teie erenge Kumponing Bauring Jiisuu' Karistoo'koonge tee tonta'urima biikaning oraka' nkonanka-ita kiiroraa'antavuripeu'.
Tee'koo aa'mariri dei, “Nii' oraka' nkonanka oto'memuria',” nii' nii'ka tosimaripeu' ee'noko kara masikung nii'koo otoarupeu'.

Nii' niikaning oraka' nkonanka sira'mariko deeko' teie tee bakaang maraka-anta siompui tampa' makosina' nkomuriaing ee'noko oraka' nkonanka tonta'memurira kiiroraa'antamuriai ookara kapoo'nanka koonto' deeaing-eta.
Nii' oraka' nkonanka oto'memuriaung tammariri dei nii' teing tosimaripeu' ee'noko Kumponing tosi-bauko tampampipeu', ee'noko bakaang kara nii'koo otoarupeu'.

Ee aing nkaning toirekaa', aung kara tee ninge dii' daarirerompimang dii'ke oraka'nko nkoveriaroo'naang, teka dii'koo narunge orara nkovuko deeko', nii' teing tee meeroo'nara oto'memuring Bauma-anko tampo-antamurimaung, tee naning koonto' tee Jiisuu' Karistoo'.
Tee ee'nara niikaning oraka' nkonanka-koo Kumponing-nung iira o'antavuu'naang tonta'memurima boo'paru'nung. Ee'noko nii' naing deea' tee' o'antamemuru', teeo ookara kansi'nupoong tee'ke.
Nii'ke teing bakaning botonanka siompampima nii' teing ee' noru'ampimatoaing: Nii'ke doma tee Kumponing noru'ampiri otong.
Baie teie naninge aa'pumaung, “Ninge tee noru'ansi o'nong,” teka teie tee bakaang botonanka siompua', tee tee tosi-bauko ee'noko tee kara masikung tee-koo otoa'.
Teka tee naning bakaang kara pinka'umaung, teie tee tee-koo tee Kumponing bakaang piaa dupearamaung. Ee'noko tee'koo nii' Kumponing-koo o'norining noru'marimaung.
Baa tee naning aa'puaing, “Ning Kumponing-koo o'nomaung,” tee' ee'na' nari' Jiisuu'pina' koonto' otoaing.

Ee dii' mmaikori', ninge tee dii'anko nerakung boto naurampima daariampa', teka tee urikung boto narung tee dii'ke Karistoo' komperira tutuntoma-ita oto'derurimaung, tee urikung botonoo' tero tareveru'nung.

Teka tee aung boto ninge enang daarirerompimatomaung tee deeka'pari nerakung boto bakaang masikeenoo' tee tee tee-koo Karistoo'koo ooampiru'nung ee'noko napo' dii'koo ooampimaunge. Ai' tee mutaanang tee tankinumaang ee'noko tee araka masikung tero arakavaring.
Baa tee naning aa'puaing, “Ning araka-koo o'nong,” ee'noko ba'maiko' munte'uma, tee tee mme' mutaanang-koo otong.
Teka tee naning ba'maiko' piaavumaung tee araka-koo otong, ee'noko tee tee te' araka-koo otoko kapoo'ke dua'antavuarupeu'.
Teka tee naning ba'maiko' munte'uaing tee tee mutaanang-koo otong, ee'noko teie mutaanange nanumang tokoo nanumatomanoo' noru'ua', teie mutaanange kaputu'antavuio' tee bakaang duta.
Ee aing nkaning toire', Kumponinge tee diikaang oraka' nkonanka tonta'deruring-koo Karistoo' bakaang miring-koo; tee'koo ninge tee aung kara dii'anko daariamang.

Dii'ke biumatakaampie noru'eri otong tee ee'nara naning uripo'keta otomaung. Tee'koo ninge tee aung kara dii'anko daariamang. Napo' dii'anko nemaa'anko daariamang dii'ke tee orara naning puru'eru'nung-koo.
Napo' dii'anko toirekaa'anko daariamang, dii'ke Niuma Kumponing noru'eri otomaung-koo.

Dii'ke biumatakaampie noru'eri otong tee ee'nara naning uripo'keta otomaung; tee'koo ninge dii'anko daariamang. Ee'noko napo' dii'anko nemaa'anko daariamang, ai' dii' teing purintariri otoring, ee'noko Kumponing bakaang kara tee dii'koo otomaunge ee'noko dii'ke puru'eru' tee naning orara.
Aung kansi' teing ninka bakaning kapoo'nanka ninka karaa'eriauka'. Baa tee naning aung kansi' karaa'uainge tee Niuma Kumponing piaavua' otong ee'noko Kumponing bakaang piaa tee-koo otoa'.
Aing teing ookara aarumonanka kansi'kooning aa'ning: mono bakaang pia siong ee'noko dutai karaa' ee'noko naning baka daangang. Aing teing Kumponing-etaining deea', teka tee tee kansi' bakaang.
Ee'noko tee kansi' teing ninka bakaning karakaraa'nanka tee paa'aravaing, teka tee naning Kumponing bakaang pia siompuaing tee, tee' nari' domampari otoaing ookara batei-koo.

Ee aing nkaning toire', batei due'umaang tee Karistoo' bakaang karenung pankaing poo'naang tee' ee'na' taaraveru'na'. Enang tee'ke mmau' Karistoo' bakaning kare-nupoong porora otorong. Tee'koo nii'ke noru'ampimaung aung tee asi'nung batei.
Aing teing nantoong nii'kooning deemparia' tero si'maaru'ning. Nii'kooning dei teing nii' ninka nari' otoropeu', teka teing tero tenkenau'noo'koo tasi'parampiri otong teing nii'kooning deeaing.
Teka dii' Tanuaang Meekung nkaveru'ning ee'noko dii'ke tee kara masikung noru'eri otong.

Dii'ke tee kara masikung noru'eriaung tampama daariampa', teeo dii'ke noru'eri otomaung-koo tee', dii' pinka'antarampima, ai' tee kapoo' tositosi tee ninka kara masikung ninka nari' otoreaung noru'eri otong dii'ke.

Tee tosi-nko baie? Tee ee'nara naning aa'pumaung, “Jiisuu' tee Kumponinge Tero Pako'pari'nii' deea' nii' domamurira taremurianoo'koo.” Tee tee ee'nara naning Karistoo'koo karenung. Teie tee tekang ookakang Bauma ee'noko Bauring daang-antavuremaung.

Naning otoa' Jiisuu' Kumponinge Baurinoo' penkempuma Kumponing baurukaa'koong deempari otopeu'nung, teka baa tee naning aa'pumaung, “Jiisuu' tee Kumponing Bauring,” tee ee'nara Kumponing baurukaa'koong deempari otomaung.

Tee tampara doorenang dii'ke tutuntoma-ita taaraveru'nung tee Jiisuu' tee teroita Kumponinge Pako'pari'nii'koong tee tampa' pinka'eriaing ee'noko tee'koo dii' teing Bauring-koo ee'noko Bauma tekang-koo otori otoriaing.
Ee'noko tee tee kapoo' nii'koo maraka-antavuu'nung kompampiaing, tee ee'nara domaang oparavaung.
Aung tee dii'anko daariamatomaung teing ee'ning dii' tosiraarimaing biikaning aarumo nau-antarampima tee'.

Teka tee Tanuaang Meekung Karistoo'ke aruru'nung tee dii' ninka nari' otomatoaing, ee'noko dii' teing nii'nung naninge kapoo' nau-anta-koo kevi'dariaung. Tee Tanuaang Meekung narung makosi dii' nau-anta-koo ookara kapoo'nanka ee'noko tee bakaang kara masikung, daang deea'. Tee' ee'na' Tanuaang Meekunge nau-antaruru'na' Karistoo'koo pinka'dariri otoriai.
Ee'noko enang tee dii' nkaning toire' tee ninka nari' otoriaing, tenang tee oro'paravainang dotumariaina' ee'noko maia'ke daka'muriauka' tee poko.
Dii'ke noru'eri otong Karistoo' tee koonto' ee'noko tee'koo ee' masika' noru'eriaing ookara tampa' koonto'na' otoromaing teing Kumponinge paravuru'ning.

Ooveriko arekee' Niumai Kumponinge aa'na' masika' piaamurira baurukaa' marimuru'nung. Nka tee nii' tamung baurukaa' deeaing, teka baurukaa' masikeng. Nantoonge kansi'koo-nupoonge tee' tasi'maaria', ai' teinge tee Karistoo' noru'aava'.

Ee mmaikori', nii' teing enang Kumponing baurukaa', ee'noko tee dama'ke nii' o'noriaina' mme' sira'paravaruko noru'ampia'. Teka ee' noru'ampiri otong nii'ke: Tee toroarako nii' teing tee-pina' nari' oro'mariainge, ai' meena'poi otoina' ooampira paarimariaing.
Ee'noko teing ookara nantoong aing kapoo'nanka nkoaravaina' nooruupiai nempaamaing teing domang kiiroraa'antavarimaing tee Karistoo' tee' kiiroraa'ari otomana' nari' otoroo'naang.
Teing nantoong oraka'nko nkoaamainge tee boto toto'paamaung, ai' oraka'nko tee boto-toto'.
Teka dii'ke noru'eri otong tee Karistoo' tee sira'paru' niikaning oraka' nkonanka tonta'ua'naang, ee'noko tee-koo tee oraka'nko otoaung.
Naning tee Karistoo'koo kuung otomaung tee oraka'nko danto nari' nkovui otoaung, ee'noko teie naninge oraka' nko-koo bakearavaunge tee Karistoo' tasi'puaung ee'noko noru'ua' tee.
Ee aing dii' nkaning toire' oki'nareka', naninge dii' aava-koo taura'dariauka'. Baa tee naning aarumo koonto' nkovumaung tee koonto' tee-pina' Karistoo' koonto' otomana'.

Ee'noko baa tee naning orara aarumo nkovumaung tee Sietani' bakaang, ai' tee tee ee'nara Sietani' tutuntoma-ita oraka'nko nkovui otomaung. Tee Kumponing Bauring sira'paru'noo' tee tee-koo nko-nko Sietani' bakaang orari-anta-koo.

Baa tee naning Kumponing-koo neraka'pari ponto'aravainge tee orara nko-nko nkovua' otoaing, ai' tee-koo tee Kumponing bakaang domaang otong. Tee'koo teie orara nko-nko nko-koo makosi deea' Kumponinge neraka'antavui ponto'antavuu'nung-koo, bakaang aarumo tee-koo kuung sipuma.

Enang tee, ee' nii'ke tasi'pampiaing baata teing Kumponing baurukaa' ee'noko baata teing Sietani' baurukaa': baa tee naning koonto'na' nkovuaung ee'noko ba'maiko' piaavuaung, tee tee Kumponing bakaang naning deea'.
Aung tee naunau dii'ke tutuntoma-ita taaraveru'nung, nii' naruna' naruna' piaameerimatoaing.

Ee'noko nii' tee-pina' Keini' nkomariauka' Sietani' bakaang naning-pina', tee baara'ma'nung dupisi'uu'nung. Aming-koo dupisi'uu' tee? Tee aa' bakaang nko-nko orara deempario', tee baara'ma'nung munte'uu' bakaang nko-nko tampara deemparako.
Ta'niniriauka' dii' mmaikori' nantoonge kansi'koo-nupoonge munte'daariko.
Nii'ke tee nii'maikorori' piaavarampimaung-koo ee' tasi'marimaung: nii' tanuaang boo'nameng-eta domamaririning. Baa tee naning ba'maiko' piaavuaung tee boo'aapenameng-koo mme' otong.
Tee naning ba'maiko' munte'umaung tee ee'nara dupisi'nko ee'noko tee dii'ke noru'eri otong teing nantoong dupisi' nkonuka teing ookara domaang oparavaung okovuria'.
Ee'noko piaa masikung nii'ke tasi'pampimaung Karistoo'ke nii'koo boo'parara naumurio', ee'noko napo' nii' tee'ke nii'maikorori' paku-koo moompiainge.
Teka naning narung kapoo'nanka aung kansi'koong oto'evui deeko', ee'noko ba'maiko' ata'kuko teie tamung dutai oovumatopeu', arekee' Kumponing bakaang piaa tee-koo kuung otoing tamparapeu'? Makotua'.
Ee aing dii' nkaning toire' oki'nareka', kara narunge karompima piaavarampiauka', teka nko-nko ninka nari' masika' piaavarampiaing.

Nii' masika' piaameerima nii'ka tasi'mariri o'noriaing nii' teing kara masikung okonara bakaning, ee'noko bane teie niikaang domange tokoona' tuutunamuriko deeko', niikaang domang kuaa'moriaing Kumponing-koo uro'kanoo'ke.
Ai' bakaang kara
Ee mmaikori', enang niikaang domange tuutunamuriaruko nii' teing avoro' o'noria' Kumponing-koo dutakanoo'ke.
Ee'noko tee nii'ke teing kapoo'nanka, aremurii' eentavampimaatopeu'ning teing nkavampimatopeu' tee bakaang boto siompampimaung-koo, tee dotu-antaning kapoo'nanka nkoampima.

Ee'noko bakaang boto tee aung: Nii'ke tee Bauring Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaang miring tasi'pampira masika'antavampiaing tee tee Kumponinge teroita Pako'pari'nii' domamuri taremuriainoo'koo, ee'noko naruna' naruna' piaameerimatoai tee' ee'na' botomuru'na' nko-koo.

Ookara teing bakaang boto siompaamatomaing teing tee-koo kuung otoromaing ee'noko tee teing-koo kuung otomaunge. Ee'noko nii'ke tee noru'ampiri otong tee nii'koo kuung otomaung teie Tanuaang Meekunge amuru'nunge noru'antamuriko.

Ee aing mmaikori' piaarampimaing, ookara tanuaananka naro'keta masika'antaverereria' otoai, teka io' nantoong karantavaariko˜ paaraverererimaatoai teing tanuaananka tasi'koo teing Kumponing-etaning deeko', ai' aung-koo kansi'koo tee mmau' oreng tanuaananka otorong nakaro-nupoong˜ karantavurimaing, ee'noko teing nakaro-nupoong tosiarima Kumponing-etaining tamparimaung.

Tee ee'pina' tasi'periaing tee tanuaang kara okora' Kumponing bakaang deeko': ookara tanuaananka Kumponing-etaining teing tana'eriko aroo'aara sira'pariri aa'paavaining, “Ee', tee Jiisuu', tee Kumponinge teroita Pako'pari'nii' nantoong domampurira tarevuriainoo' koo masika' pou'nung koonto' naning-naumpui.”

Teka ookara tanuaananka Jiisuu'koo tee' minku-koo makosi deeaing teing Kumponing-etaning deea'. Teing tee Karistoo'koo karenung pankaing bakaning, tee ee'nara tero dii'ke poaing taaraveru'nung, ee'noko tee bakaang tanuaang tee enang anke kansi'koo tero pora otong.

Ee aing mmaikori', toirekaa', dii' teing Kumponing bakaning ee'noko dii'ke tee teing nakaro-nupoong tositosinanka boong deempereru', ai' tee Kumponing dii'koo otoing tee aa'na' purinto' tee-koo teing kansi'nupoong-koo otomaung-koo.
Teing nakaro-nupoong tositosinanka teing kansi'koo-nupoong, tee'koo kapoo' teinge minkuaamaing teing kansi'aapening ee'noko ookarai kansi'koo-nupoonge teing taaravaarima siompaarimaung.

Nii' teing Kumponing bakaning. Baa tee naning Kumponing noru'ui otomaung teie tee nii' taaramurimaung ee'noko teie naninge Kumponing bakaang deeaunge tee nii' taaramuriaung, ee'noko tee'koo nii'ke tasi'pampimaung tee Tanuaang kara masikung minkuvumaung ee'noko tee tanuaang tosi minkuvumaung.

Ee mmaikori' piaarampimaing, naruna' naruna' piaameeri o'norimaatoai, ai' tee aarumo piaa-koong tee Kumponing-etaing, ee'noko tee naning piaa bauko tee Kumponing-koo neraka'pari ponto'aru'nung, ee'noko teie Kumponing noru'ui otong.
Teie naninge piaa noru'uaunge tee Kumponing noru'ua', ai' Kumponing tee piaa okonara.
Kumponinge tee bakaang piaa nii'koo ee'pina' nau-antamuru': Teie tee Bauring narung masikung kirokai botovuu' a' nii'anko kansi'koo nii' tee-koo domamarii'naang.

Tee'koo ee'na'koo piaa masikung nii'ke oo-koo makosi, nii'ke Kumponing piaavampi-ru'nung-koo deea', teka teie nii' tutung piaamurira Bauring botovuu'nung-koo tee iira Kumponing-etaing niikaning oraka' nkonanka-koo o'antamemurii'naang.
Ee mmaikori', tee' nari' Kumponinge piaamuru'nung deemparako nii' tee'ke naruna' naruna' piaameeriainge.
Naninge tee Kumponing nii'na'mung oovua'; teka nii' naruna' naruna' piaameerimaing deemarima nii'ka tasi'mariai Kumponing tee nii'koo otomaung ee'noko bakaang piaa tee nii'koo dupeari otong.
Ai' teie tee bakaang Tanuaang Meekung nii' tankaang-antamurio' nii'ke tasi'pampimaung nii' tee ninka nari' o'norimaung ee'noko tee nii'koo otokoo'.
Ee'noko nii'ke tee ooampiru' ee'noko sira'pampima daankiampima ee' nauarampikoo', “Baumai tee Bauring botovuu' nantoong kansi'nupoong ootukuning moo'urii'naang.”
Baa tee naning Jiisuu' sira'pui Kumponing Bauring tampumaung, Kumponing tee tee-koo kuung otomaung ee'noko tee Kumponing-koo kuung otokoo'.

Tee'koo nii' bakaang piaa naumuriko nii'ke tasi'pampima aroo'ampimaung, ai' Kumponing tee piaa okora', ee'noko baa tee piaa-koo otomaung tee tee' nari' Kumponing-koo otomaung ee'noko Kumponing tee-koo otokoo'.

Kumponing bakaang piaa tee nii'koo dupearamaung nii' maia'moria' ee'noko papaaramaria' o'noria'naang te'mung tuutunan-na'mung tee-koo uro'kanoo'ke donkonampira, Karistoo'pina' oro'mariritaa' anke kansi'koo o'noru'nung-koo.

Piaa-koo tee avoro' otoa', teka teie piaae dupe-antanii'ke tee avoro' bata'umaung. Ai' avoro' tee nantoonge kiimata noru'ai avoreaamaung. Ee'noko baa-koo tee-koo avoromaung-koo piaa tee dupe-antanii' otoa'.
Nii'ke tee Kumponing piaavampimaung nii' tutung teie piaamuru'nung-koo.

Naning narunge aa'pupeu', “Ninge tee Kumponing piaavansi o'nong,” teka ba'maiko' munte'uma tee tee tosi bauko. Baa tee naning tee ba'maiko' oovui nari' otoremaung piaavuaung teie tee Kumponing piaavuarupeu' tee teie dutai oovuaung.
Ee'noko aung tee boto nii' teie amuru'nung, “Baie tee Kumponing piaavuainge tee ba'maiko' tee' nari' piaavuainge.”

Baata teing ookara nantoong tee Jiisuu' tee ee'nara Kumponinge uripo'keta Pako'pari'nii' nii' domamuri taremuriainoo'koo masika'antavaamaing teing ee'ning Kumponing baurukaa', ee'noko baa tee naning tee Bauma piaavuainge teie teing baurukaa' nari' piaavuriainge.
Nii'ke tee Kumponing piaavampima ee'noko bakaang boto siompampima ee' noru'ampipeu', nii'ke teing baurukaa' nari' piaavarampiri otong.
Ai' tee Kumponing piaa tee miru'noo' tee nii'ke Kumponing bakaning boto siompampimatoaing. Ee'noko teing bakaning boto teing pore' deeaing nii'koo.

Ai' baata teing Kumponing baurukaa' teing tee tee siong-koo makosinuka bakaang aarumo kompaamaung-koo, ee'noko teing tee kansi' bakaang aarumo tee puru'ai otorong. Tee-koo ee'nung-koo Karistoo'koo baitomariri puru'ampimaung tee kansi' bakaang aarumo.
Baie aung kansi' bakaang aarumo puru'upeu'? Tee aa' teie naninge deeko' Jiisuu' tee Kumponing Bauring masika'antavuainge puru'koo makosi.
Tee ee'nara Jiisuu' tee Pako'pari'nii' Kumponing Bauring taa'ni'antavari pou'nung, aa'noko: auronge paning-eta kemu'kana' karoma taa'ni'antavuu'
Ee'noko teie Tanuaang Meekunge tee' nari' masika'antavui taa'ni'antavumaunge,

Ee', teinge ee'ninge beenaumoi sira'paamaung aa'ninge tee Tanuaang Meekung, tee aurong ntong-koo karou'nung, ee'noko tee aurong ereng tuuvuu'noo'ke karou'nung. Aing teing beenaumo biikaang noru' narung ee' oro' minkuai otong Jiisuu' tee Kumponing bauring.

Nantoonge kapoo' sira'paako masika'antavampimaung, teka Kumponing bakaang kara sira' tee deto basina' masika'anta-koo makosi, ee'noko aung kapoo' ninge naurampimatomaung Kumponinge ee'narai sira'puu'nung Jiisuu' Bauring tampuma.

Baa tee naning Kumponing Bauring masika'antavumaunge tee ee' noru'ui otong bakaang domange, Jiisuu' tee Kumponing Bauring Kumponinge naumuru'na'. Ee'noko teie masika'antavuaunge tee Kumponing tee daang minku tampumaung, ai' teie tee daang-antavumaung masika'antavuaruma tee kara Kumponinge sira'puu'nung bauring-koong.
Ee'noko tee kara Kumponinge sira'puu'nung tee aung: Kumponinge tee nii' domaang oparavauka'nung amuru', ee'noko tee domaang tee Bauring-koo otong.
Baa tee naning Bauring oto'evumaung tee-koo tee domaang otong, ee'noko baa tee naning Bauring oto'evuaung tee-koo tee domaang otoa'.
Aung tee ninge dii'koo daariamang tee Kumponing Bauring bakaang miring masika'antaverimaung-koo dii'ke noru'erii'naang dii' teing tee domaang oparavaung oto'deruring.
Ee'noko nii' ee' noru'ampima to'biimariri o'noring: Nii'ke kapoo' eentavampiko bakaang pia siompampiri deeko' teie tee taaramuriaing.
Ee'noko nii'ke ee' noru'ampira deeko', “Teie tee taaramurimaung tenang eentamariko,” nii'ke tee napo' ee' noru'ampiaing, “Nii'ke masika' nkavampiaing teing eentavampimananka tee.”

Dii'koo narunge ba'maiko' tee oraka'nko koonto' boo'koo makosinamurii' deeaung nkovuko oovura deeko' teie tee kunsi-koo pakuvuaing, ee'noko Kumponinge tee domampuai. Aung tee teing nantoong oraka'nko, koonto' boo'koo makosinamurii' deeaung-nko nkoaavaining-koo nkoaravaing. Namurii' oraka'nko koonto' boo'koo makosi masika' otomang, ee'noko ninge aa'pampa' temurii'koo kunsirariai.
Ookara amutemurii' nko-nkonanka koonto' deeaing teing oreng, teka temurii'koo oraka'nko koonto' boo'koo makosinamurii' deeaung-koo kunsirarii'naang tampamang.
Nii'ke tee noru'ampiri o'noring teie naninge Kumponing-koo ponto'nii'ke tee orara aarumo danto nari' nkovuaung teie Kumponing Bauringe tampa' tarevuio'. Ee'noko teie Sietani'ke tee tee kompuaung.
Nii' nii'ka tee noru'mariri o'noring, nii' teing Kumponing Baurukaa', ee'noko ootukunung kansi'koo-nupoong teing tee naning orara bakaang iri'koo kuung otorong.

Ee'noko nii'ke tee noru'ampiri o'noring teie Kumponing Bauringe tee tero porai'nange noru' amuru', nii'ke tee Kumponing Masikung tasi'pampii'naang ee'noko nii' teing enang tee-koo masikung-koo kuung o'norimaung Bauring-koo Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo kuung o'nori, tee aung tee ee'nara Masikung Kumponing, domaang oparavaung okora'.
Dii' ee'ning toirekaa' oki'nareka' teieta kumponinanka daang-koong-eta tonta'dariri otoriai. Ee', ee'na'.
Aung ane' karavoto˜ ninge dootuu'koo urantai daariamang da' ee'nani ovorinaang Kumponinge miru'duu'nani-anko ee'noko teing daurukaa'.

Dii'dovo tevo ninge aa'na' masika' piaarampimanavo ee'noko ning narunge deea', teka teing nari' tee kara masikung noru'aining, ai' tee kara masikung nii' ookara-koo dupui otomaung ee'noko tee' nari' nii' ninka otomatoai ookara doong-koo.
Teie Kumponing Niumai tee ninka Bauring Jiisuu' Karistoo' ninka aa'ning oko-antamaariaing: biraanke moo'dopa, piaa unaa-anta, ee'noko mooa, tee ninka kara masikung ee'noko tee aarumo piaa.
Ning tee bakei dotumaramang ninge ooaramira nii'ning teing-koo daurukaa'koo tampa' siompaako tee kara masikung, tee' ee'na' nari' Niumai botomuru'na'.

Ee'noko enang tee aa'damaang da' ee'nani, nii' ookara naruna' naruna' piaameerimatoai. Aung tee nerakung boto deea' da' daarireromaatomaung, teka tee aung tee boto tutuntoma-ita oto'memurimaung: Naruna' naruna' piaameeriaing.
Kumponing-koo piaa ee' sira'koo makosi: Nii'ke tee' nkoampiaing tee kapoo' naumurimaung. Ee'noko teie tee nii' tutuntoma-ita naruna' naruna' piaameerimatoo'naang naumuru'.

Bakei, mmau' nantoong tosi nkonuka aunge kansi'ke avitoitoi nanaamaung, teing tana'eriko penkemparima aa'paamaing, “A, tee Jiisuu' Karistoo' naning-naumpui poaruu'nung.” Teing teing ee'ning tosi nkonuka ee'noko Karistoo'koo too'de-nupoonge teing.
Tarerariri otoriai tee kapoo' pore'dorimaung nkaveriaru'neenga, aa'na' teka ootukuario' tee moo' nkaveriai.

Baa tee naning Karistoo' bakaang naunau divu'ui nii'nung siompumaung tee Kumponing bakaning-koo narung deea', teka baa tee naning tee kara pinka'ui otoing tee, tee tekang ookakang beekaning-koo narung deempari otong aa'noko Bauma ee'noko tee Bauring.
Nii'nung naning oovunamurii' naunau ninka dii'anko poko deeko' diikanoo' pava-koo bokueriauka', ee'noko onkeonke'eriauka'.
Baa tee naning tee onkeonke'uaing tee, tee bakaang oraka' nko-koo kanto'paramaung.

Ning tee kapoo'nanka mmau' dii' daarirerompipeu'ning oto'memung, teka ninge teing ookara ane'koo daari-koo piamoa'. Teka ee' noru'amaang dii'anko pa due'ka mora oing oomeeri karompiaing doturotue maanto'muriaina'.
Teinge toire'ke teni da'maiko' Kumponinge miru'uu'nani baurukaa'ke tampa' tang da'anko botoaamang. Otoko, ee.
Aung ane' karavoto˜ ninge dootuu'koo urantai daarireromaang da' mmaiko' Kaiasi, ninge aa'na' masika' piaaramaung.
Ee mmaiko', kunsimaramaung ning teing ookara kapoo'nanka dake nkovemaing tampa' nkovemaatoo'naang ee'noko da' tampa' domantari otoai, da' tee' Tanuaang-aapei tampa' otomana'.
Ning bakei aa'na' dotumaru'nung tenang nii'ning nii'maikorori' poroma naumaama minkuraako tee dake kara masikung tampa' siompemaung temu'keta siompemana' nari'.
Tenang ninge taaravama, nkaning toire'ke tee kara masikung tampa' siompaamaung-koo ning tee bakei aa'na' dotumaramaung dau basinoo'.
Ee mmaiko', dake bakei tampa' nari' nkovemaung tenang dake teing nii'ning Karistoo'koonavitu pakuerima, baru'noo' teing damisimainku tampara doorenang osi kanteai berempaamaing dake pakuerimaung-koo.

Teinge tee dakaang piaa teing piaaverimaung tee sira'pau' ookara Karistoo' bakanavitu-koo anke o'norimaing-koo. Teka tenang temurii' nantoong dii'ankoita tenkenaako nii'noo'ke daankiarii'naang, tenang napo' dake pakueriai nanu'koo Kumponing dotuaravaina'.
Ai' teing teing osi sipau'nung Karistoo'koong miring berempaava'naang mutaanang-nupoong-eta paku piavoroa'.
Ee'noko nii'ke teing ee'ning tee' oro'nuka nantoong pakuarampiaing teing ninka nari' pakumeeriaina' tee kara masikung nau-anta-koo.

Ninge tee karavotonane' temu' daariantu'nung nii'ning kara minkuama dii' Karistoo' bakanavitu teke otorimaing-koo. Teka tee naning Dioterepisi tevitu-koo baka pankaing-koo piavomaunge teing-koo, tee nkaang kara minkuantu'nung taaramuaruu'.

Tee'koo ning dii'anko meaing deeko' mera tee sira'pampaing tee temurii' aarumo teie nkovumaung nii' oraka' minkumurima daang-koong tuumpimurima. Ee'noko tee narung deea', nii'nung tee teie teing nii'maikorori' daankiaama nanaamaing diikanoo' basiariko bakanava-koo bokuvuriaung, ee'noko dii' dootuu'nupoong-koo nii'ning orokovurikoo' teing damisimainku pava-koo kuung boku-koo piavoroko, ee'noko orokovurima kato bata'urikoo' Karistoo'navitu-eta.

Ee mmaiko', Kaiasi, naning oraka' nkoarako tee bakaang aarumo siong-koo paaraveauka', tampa' nkoarako deeko' siong-koo paaraveai. Baa tee naning kapoo' tampara nkovumaung tee tee naning Kumponing-etaing ee'noko baa tee naning orara aarumo nkovumaung tee Kumponing tasi'pua'.

Ookarai nantoonge tee Demitereasi tee tampa' minkuaamaung ee'noko Ovoring bakaang kara masikung siompuko nari' sira'paramaung. Napo' nii'ke tee' nari' minkuampimaunge ee'noko tee dake noru'ei otong tee nii' niikaang kara tee masikung.
Ning tee kapoo'nanka mmau' oto'memung da' daarirerompeu'ning, teka ninge teing ookara ane'koo daari-koo piamoa'.
Teka ee' noru'amaang, ning pa due'ka da'anko moo'naang, ee'noko nari' oing oomeeresi karompeaing.
Mooa tee da'koo otoaing. Ainge da'maikori'ke tampara tampaamaang da'koo. Dake napo' tee' tampara tampema naueriai teing ookara mmaikori' miring tamperima.
Basi te'.

Ning tee Juude', tee Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaang botovotonaa' ee'noko Jeemisi baara'ma'nung. Ninge aung karavoto˜ daariamang dii'anko dii' Kumponinge piaarurira bokururu'ning, teie Jiisuu' Karistoo'ke tarerurimaing.
Tee piaa unaa-anta, mooa, ee'noko piaa Kumponing-etaing maneena' okoruriaing.

Ee mmaikori', tero tee ninge Jiisuu'ke nii' ookara nari' domamuru'na' daarirerompii'naang noru'anko', teka enang noru' paarimarara nii'nung kapoo'koo daarirerompimang dii' puring-antarampii'naang Kumponing bakaang kara nii'ninge pituaa'neeng-koo orokoverererii'naang, ai' naro'ka bakevui amuru'nung nii'ke tare-koo, ee'noko paari-koo makotua'.

Ninge tee' naurampimang nii'ning nau-antanuka Kumponing noru'aavaing dii'koo makenge tumpariko, aa'paama, “Tenang nii' Karistoo'navitu deemarira nii' makosi tamung kato piamoriaina' nko-koo, Kumponinge kiimata-koo amorompia', teie piaamurimaung-koo.” Teing tee' minkuaama Karistoo' penkempaamaung tee ee'nara daurarong˜ masikung, niikaang Ovoring makosi, nii'nung otoa'. Kumponinge tero sira'puu'nung Daari Meekung-koo kuunge tee' teinge temurii' nantoonge barakosi' kompaavaina' botu basiarima.

Teie Kumponinge naumurimaung aa'nou'nunge: Iisipi'keta nantoong domang-antavurira napo' teing-koo nii'ning tee masika'antavaavaruu'ning dama'ke boo'antavuru'. Tee' ee'na' tero tampa' noru'eru'na' napo' nauramping tasi'perii'naang.

Napo' teing koosinunanka naumurimaunge. Tero bono' Kumponinge sipevuru'noo' dintu'aara bii'ka taura'paririo' Kumponinge te' biikanoo' oto'doma masipo'keta bata'uru'. Ee'noko Kumponinge taavi'urio' doong kante-koo tunumparava'noo'ke doonko otoromaung bera te'mung panka'mung simpe'uriaina'mung-koo basiariaing.

Napo' tee' nari' teing osi pankeng Sodom, Komora', ee'noko nii'ning teke due'ke otoroko'ning oraka' nkoarikotaa' kera'pariru'. Kaukauro nkoaama bakiaa'eema donkaang donkaang ninka nari' oraka' nkoariko'. Tee'koo Kumponinge kiimata-koo nta'ke tai-antavurira o'antavuru' nii'ke noru'koo.

Teka bane temurii'koong kiimata sira'pari otoko, teing aing nantoong tamung noone narung nau-antaraarima tee' nari' bii'ka biikaang mono orari-antavarimaung teing Sodom-nupoong nkoariko'na'. Teinge dimpa'aamaung tee Ovoring, ee'noko poore'aarikoo' teing koosinunanka˜ Kumponinge nerampurima nkovuru'ning.

Teka tee tero koosinung pankaing Maikol tee' nkoarava'. Tenang Sietani' ninka Moosesi bakaang mono boo'pario' nka-koo tata'eerema, bane pankainge, teka boonkoaritaa' teie Sietani' poore'uma kiimata-koo tampua' tee, teka aa'puu', “Ovoringe orokorui bake-antaruaing da'.”

Teka teinge ainge nau-antanukai aming kapoo' noru'aavaung tamung kato poore'aakoo'. Ee'noko teing kau' karenaumonanka matauropananka-pina' onouaamana' onouaakoo'. Ee'noko kapoo' mono-aapenung onoue narunge noru'aamaing tamung kato nkoaama orariarikoo'.

Piaaru'nuka teing, ai' teing teing Keini' bakanavung siompaamaing baara'ma'nung dupisi'ura barakosi' nkavuu'nung. Napo' Beelamu mooni' nka-koo daanameng-koo baka avario' dupisi'au'na' avarikoo'. Ee'noko Koora bakaning-pina' nari' Kumponing-koo bei'bei'arikoo', ee'noko nari' orari-anta kune'aakoo' tee' urikamu' Koora dovang doonko tumpariru'na' kansi' kamaankuio'.

Ookara batei-koo Ovoring bakaang taamang dii'ke navurariri nkoverimaung-koo domang orara ninka poroma tee orari-antavaamaung tee diikaang navunavu. Dii' ninka nari' taamanirima amaiaa'oroa' bii'ka toonaakoo' duuku'arima. Teing aa'ning-pina' oro'nuka: kamo' kovere-pina', pionge avitoitoi nkavuko apo'uarukoo'. Napo' tee koi' sinang bi'uaruio' bita'au'nung bakei boo'.

Napo' boo'a pirung-koong ta'da'parama koikoiri nkavuma avitoitoi sipuko oraka' oro'paramana' biikaang orara aarumo ninka tee' oro'nuka. Napo' teu-pina' beento'nu-pina' koonto'navunge nanuau-pina' oro'nuka tero miru'uru'ning tunumparava'noo'ke doong kante oto'koo.
Napo' tee' nari' Iinokei tarampeearama˜ teing aing minkuvuru' tenang Aadama-ita depeto parapara ˜kenaanka-taa navarang-koo basiarako aa'puu'noo'ka,
“Ooveriko, Ovoring tee bakaning koosinunanka karinga ninka nari' poroaing.

Teie nantoong ookara simpe'urii'naang ee'noko teing Kumponing-koo kupi'nuka oreng tampurira tora'antavuriai tee-koo biikaang ookara oraka' nkonanka-koo bakei Kumponing too'dena' nkoaamaing-koo, napo' ookara kara ari'ariri'nanka Kumponing-koo minkuaakoo' ee'ninge bakaning kare-nupoonge.”
Aing teing minkuminkuru ee'noko naro'keta tuumpi nkonuka, biikaang noru' karakaraa'koong pia narung sionuka, ampirinumpariri kareaamaing, ee'noko auraiarima bauta' tamung eentanuka.
Teka ee mmaikori', dii'ke norunoru'eriaing tee kapoo'nanka niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaninge kara okovuri nkanukai dama'ke nkoaravaing sira'pau'na'.
Aa'daaru',
“Dama'ke asi'namu' poroaing teing Kumponing daang-antavai benkempaavaining Kumponing-koo kupi'oroitaa' biikaang noru' karakaraa'koong pia narung siompai.”
Teing aing ee'ning tankatankaang nkoaamaing, kansi' bakaang onou-koo otoromaing, Tanuaang Meekung otoroaing.
Teka dii', mmaikori', dii'ka deto kanirariaing diikaang masika'anta aa'na' meekung-koo. Kunsirariri tee ninka iri' ninka Tanuaang Meekung-etaing ninka.
Otori te' otoriai Kumponing bakaang piaae kuung deempui otoinoo'ke, banainge nemperi tee Domang-anta niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' piaarurira domaang oparavauka'noo' basi-antaruriaina'.
Teing daang-koong nau-antanuka taaravaarima papaaravarimaing piaaverereri onou koong-antavererimaatoai.

Nii'ning tampa' taararaariaining namu'ke mosianung-koong nta'keta batusi'erererima domang-antavereriai. Ee'noko napo' nii'ning Ovoring-anko bokuereriai tampa' nkoverererima, teka biikaang aarumo mono bakaang pia siona'koo maarerori pinka'dariaing, baaro'duriko teing pina' nari' dua'dari'neenga.
Enang si'noora'dampima tee Piikonara bakaang tanata-koo napo' si'damping dii' dua'dariaroo'naang. Ee'noko teie dii' kiiroraa'antarurira bakanoo' osi meenasi-po'noo' basi-antaruriai doturotu ninka.

Tee tee narung Kumponing masikung, niikaang domang-anta, tee ninka niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' ninka. Otoaing tee meenasi tee Kumponing-koo, tee daurarong anka-ankang deempari, teing ookara kapoo' tanata tee, iri' okora' – urikamu', enang, ee'noko dama'ke ookara batei-koo. Ee', tee' nari'.

Aung tee Jiisuu' Karistoo'ke sira'puu'nung Kumponinge nauvuio' kapoo' da'deng tavo'kuaing-koong bakaning botovotonaa'nuka nau-anta-koo. Ee'noko bakaang koosinung˜ botovuio' siraka'antamuu'naang ning-koo Jooni-koo bakaang botovotonaa' deemarako.
Ee'noko teing kapoo'nanka ning-koo siraka'antavuio' ooamira tee Kumponing bakaang kara masika'antavantu'. Tee'koo sira'pamaang ninge, tee kara masikung Jiisuu' Karistoo'ke siraka'antavuu'nanka.

Baa tee naning aung kara tarampee-koong˜ deeruvuaing dootuu'domai tee biraanke nkavuaing, ee'noko teing taaravaara pinka'aavaining teing biraankeariainge teing kapoo' daariari otoining pinka'aara, ai' batei tee due'umaang.

Aung kara ninge Joonie daariamang dii'koo ˜kevuntu'ka-taa osi-koo dootuu'nupoong otorimaing Eesia-nameensi'kooning-koo. Kumponinge teie aa'nunge, teroita otou'nunge, e'mung tee' otong, ee'noko dama'ke tee' nari' otoi poainge, teie piaaruri mooaruriaing. Napo' teinge ˜kenaanka-taae Tanuaange Kumponing ba'nanumanoo' uro'kanoo'ke otoromainge piaaraari mooaraariainge.

Napo' Karistoo'ke tee' nari' piaaruri mooaruriai. Teie ee'narai motekaro'ari kara masikung sira'puu'nunge bera boo'paru'noo'ke basi. Tee tutuna'nung boo'keta daa'aru'na'koo, napo' Ovoringe dauraronuka tanatavurimaung kansi'nupoong. Tee Jiisuu' Karistoo' tee ee'nara nii' piaamurira bakaang erenge simpiri'antamuru' niikaning oraka' nkonanka-ita.
Ee'noko nii' bakanamuiaang deeng-antamurira napo' Bauma Kumponing bakanavitu pirisiti'nuka deeng-antamuru' tee-koo ookara meenasi ee'noko purinto' doong kante okovui otoi otoaing. Ee', masikung.
Ooveriaing tee tee poo'naang ka'mo' ninka nari' ookarai tee ooaava'naang. Teing tee too'pau'ning ee'noko ookara nantoong kansi'nupoong teing biromparii'naang tee poko ooaara. Ee', tee' ee'na'.

“Ning tee tutuna'naare ee'noko napo' asiranaare, napo' uro'nunge ee'noko dama'nunge.” Tee'pumaung teie Ovoring Kumponinge. “Teroita o'nou'nung, e'mung tee' o'nong, ee'noko dama'ke tee' nari' o'noi moainge. Ning tee Piikonara, ookara kapoo' nko-koo makosi.”

Ning tee Jooni dii'maiko' dii' ninka nari' baike kompampiru'nung mii'kampiritaa' Karistoo' bakaang muu'koo. Ee'noko mui' miring Patimos-koo si'mau' tee kara Kumponing bakaang daankianko Jiisuu' sira'pama.
Tee-koo doong Ovoring bakaang-koo ning tee teie Tanuaang Meekunge korimuio' ning-koo dama'dua aurong pankaing taaravantu' tuuviri-pina' karoma aa'puko,

“Kapoo' dake ooveing buuku-koo daariera teing dootuu'nupoong-anko botoveai, teing ˜kevuntu'ka-taa osi-koo otoromaing aa'ning-anko: Epeses, Simeena, Peekamami', Taiataira, Saadis, Piladelepia', ee'noko Leodesia'.”
Tenang tee aurong ning karamuko'nung ooama'naang tee-aape bere'maru', ee'noko bere'marama ˜kenaanka-taa daamu ba'nang-kooning kooro-koo nkonii' ooantu'.
Ee'noko teenanka daamu ba'nananka-koo meeroo'ke narung naning-naumpo' teke otoko, mononopa' isikung kau'koo basi kurumpari, ee'noko tokonii'koo kooronanka na'nanii' murukeue kapeto keemoomparitaa'.
Bakaang bore' ee'noko dapo aa'na' kakaara sipisipi'koong dapo-pina' ee'noko ka'mo'koo tu'betu'be-pina' oro'. Bakaang duta nta'pina' urung.
Bakaang kau' baraasi˜ nta'ke ivai'nii'pina' oro', ee'noko bakaang aurong ntonanka uutuaramana' taara.
Bakaang bireng tampanaange beento' ˜keura-taa kompuri otoko', ee'noko karang-eta bainatu ookamenta irinto' basiaru', ee'noko bakaang oing duaa'pina' aa'na' sisisiisi.
Tenang ninge ooamira tee, ning tee-koo kau'kanoo' dua'maru' boo'pina' mantomari. Teka teie ning-koo bireng tampanaang pante'mura, aa'muu', “Aroreauka'. Ning tee tutuntoma ee'noko napo' o'domai.

Ee'noko ning tee napo' Domantoo'. Ning tee moomira napo' daa'maru'nung. Ee'noko tee' nari' domamari o'noi o'nomaa'noaing ookara batei-koo. Ee'noko ninge tee kii'nanka kompansi o'nong aa'noko: boo'koong ee'noko tutueu-aapenung.
Enang tee kapoo'nanka dake ooveining daarieaing enang otoining ee'noko dama'ke tavo'kuaining nari'.

Aung tee mirumiru' aing aa'ning oovemaatomaing-koong: ˜keura-taa beento' ning-koo tampanaang-koo otoining ee'noko napo' ˜kenaanka-taa daamu ba'nananka kooro-koo nkonii' otoining. Aing ˜keura-taa beento' teing teing koosinunanka makosining, teing dootuu'nupoong ˜kevuntu'ka-taa osi-koo otoromaing tanatanuka. Ee'noko teing napo' ˜kenaanka-taa daamu ba'nananka kooro-koo nkonii' oovemaatomaing teing nkaning ˜kevitura-taa dootuu'nupoong.”

Ee'noko aa'muu' ning Jooni, “Narung karavoto daarieai tee-anko koosinung Epesesie dootuu'nupoong tanatavurimaung-anko. Aa'peaing, ‘Aung kara tee ˜keura-taa beento' tampanaange kompuri otomaung bakaang ee'noko teing-koo ˜kenaanka-taa araka ba'nang kooro-kooning-koo meu'ke nanukoo'. Teie aa'puing,

“Ninge tee dakaang nko-nkonanka noru'ansi o'nong pore' kompemana' aa'na' mintoontarama iirau'darava'. Ee'noko orenanka ninka otori domang aa'na' manki'doma dake baakeeneveri sira'perikoo' teing bii'ka daang kara okovuri nkanuka tamparimaing.
Ninge noru'ansi o'nong pankaroong banainge manki' kompeu'na' mintoontarama iirau'darava' pore' kompema nkaang miring-koo, ee'noko tee' nkorarama tee konteroaung.
Teka da' narung kapoo' ning-koo oraka' apuka'dari otong, dake ning tee piaameko'na' enang piaamea' otong.

Norunoru'eai tee' tero otoko'na' enang dua'darara otoinoo'keta ee'noko enang napo' bere'darara teing nko-nko tero nkoveko'ning nkoveai. Tee tee bere'daravaruko ning mera tee dakaang daamu ba'nang tonta'ampaing otomanoo'keta.
Aung tampara aarumo da'koo otong, dake tee munte'emaung teing nko-nko oreng Nikolas-nupoonge nkoaamaing, tee aarumo tee ninge munte'amaunge.

Baa tee naning punkang-po'nunge tee tampa' taaravuaing tee kapoo' Tanuaang Meekunge minkuvumaung dootuu'nupoong-koo osi kante-koo. Baata teing parapaara puru'aavaining tee taura' avorompaing tee koi' domang-anta-koong sinang maa'aava'naang teke Kumponing bakanamono-koo meeroo'ke otomaung-koong.” ’”

“Napo' narung karavoto daarieai tee-anko koosinung Simeenai dootuu'nupoong tanatavurimaung-anko. Aa'peaing, ‘Teie ookara kapoo'koo tutuntoma ee'noko o'doma otomaunge, ee'noko boora napo' domamparu' aa'nunge aa'puing,

“Ninge tee dakaang nko-nkonanka, arikananka ee'noko ata'oi'dari otomana' noru'ansi o'nong, teka da' tee tanuaang-aape maneenara. Napo' teinge Ju'nupoong tamparimainge oraka' minkuraamana' noru'ansi o'nong, teka teinoo' Ju'nupoong masikeng deea'. Teing teing Sietani' bakanavitu-kooning.

Aroreauka' teing-koo kapoo' arikananka dake kune'eaining-koo. Ee aung, Sietani'ke tee paara-anta-koo dii'koo nii'ning kiimatanava-koo sipurii'naang, kivora doong-koo arikung-koo otorii'naang, teka tee aroo'dariri motekaro'nuka otoriaing bane boo' dovang-koo, ee'noko maku'koo ninge tee dii' piiko-nupoong avuavu' tampara arompima tee baakopo domampari oto'koong kuruntampiaing.

Baa tee naning punkang-po'nunge tee tampa' taaravuaing tee kapoo' Tanuaang Meekunge minkuvumaung dootuu'nupoong-koo osi kante-koo. Baata teing parapaara puru'aavaining teinge tee kemu'kanung boo'pari oto' tora'paavauka'nung.” ’”
“Napo' narung karavoto daarieai tee-anko koosinung Peekamami'ke dootuu'nupoong tanatavurimaung-anko. Aa'peaing, ‘Teie bainatu ookamenta irinto' kompui otomaunge aa'puing,

“Ninge dakaang nko-nkonanka ee'noko te' da' otoinoo' noru'ansi o'nong, te' ee'noo' Sietani' daurarong˜ deempari otomanoo'. Teka dake tee nkaang miring pinka'ei otomaung ee'noko dakaang masika'anta ning-koo tee' nari' pinka'ari otomaunge, bane tee Antipas ning-koo aroo'ari motekaro'ari kara tampa' sira'puko'nung dii'koo meu'ka tavaio' teka ee'noo'ka Sietani' otomanoo'ka.

Teka da'koo kapoo' ninge nii'ning oki'ning aarumo oreng otoko ooamaang, aa'noko dii'koo nii'ninge tee Beelamu bakaang nau-anta kompai otorong, teie ee'narai Baalaka' Isireeli-nupoong dua'antana' nau-antavuu'nung. Aa'noko tee taamang kumponing daang-koong-koo darinii' naiaava'naang aavavuru', ee'noko napo' kaukauro-koong aarumo nkoaava'naang siong-antavuru'.
Napo' nii'ninge dii'koo Nikolas-nupoong biikaang nau-anta kompai otorong, tee ninge munte'amaung.
Temurii'keta bere'dariai. Bere'dariaruko deeko' tee ning namu'ke dii'anko mora turamparama'naang teing teie bainatue nkaang karang-etainge.

Baa tee naning punkang-po'nunge tee tampa' taaravuaing tee kapoo' Tanuaang Meekunge minkuvumaung dootuu'nupoong-koo osi kante-koo. Baata teing parapaara puru'aavaining ninge tee taamang kore'nang paninung avorompaing kansi'nupoong-eta baku'nii', napo' tee kapang kakaara avorompainge naruna' naruna', nkanoo' kuung tung-koo taura'nii' taa'ni'anta, tee miring nerakung biikaang daarinii' tere'koo. Naninge noru'ua' tee miring, teka teie tere' nkavuainge baka noru'ui otong.” ’”

“Napo' narung karavoto daarieai tee-anko koosinung Taiatairai dootuu'nupoong tanatavurimaung-anko. Aa'peaing, ‘Teie Kumponing Bauringe duta nta'pina' urung naning tupu'ui ooe, ee'noko bakaang kau' baraasi˜pina' nta'ke iivai'nii' pina' oro'na' aa'pumaang,

“Ninge tee dakaang nko-nkonanka noru'ansi o'nong, napo' tee dakaang piaa ee'noko tee masika'anta ee'noko napo' teing nantoong pakuerimana'. Ee'noko parapaara-koo iirau'daravarukoo', ee'noko enang noru'ansi o'nong aa'na' masika' mintoontaramaang tutuna'noo' divu'antavei.

Teka aung kapoo' ninge da'koo ooamaang, dake teni manikuma Jesabel baka nakaronani˜ tamparamai taura'peio' nau-antavarama nkaning botovotonaa'nuka ako'ke be'antavurimaung. Ee'noko aa'ning-koo barevurikoo': kaukauro nko ee'noko kumponing daang-koong-koo darimpaamaung taamang nai-koo.
Ninge tee teni batei avonsing bere'araa'naang, teka teni piavoaruing bere'koo, teieta bakaang aarumo kaukauro nko-ita.

Ee aung, teni teni ninge enang sisikeera pankaing-koo sipama'naang ee'noko teing teni ninka nari' nampeesi orariaamaing kiimata pankaing-koo siparama'naang, teing biikaang orara nko-nko-ita bere'ariaruko deeko'.

Ee'noko tenie baurukaa' dupisi'arampainge, ookara dootuu'nupoonge osi kante-koo noru'maavaina' ning tee ee'nara nantoong biikaang onou domang-koo noru'ansi o'noing. Ee'noko ninge ee'narai nantoong naruna' naruna' kante nkoverimana'koo bari'dampiaing.

Teka dii' nii'ning Taiataira-nupoong tee temurii' nau-anta siomperiaung, napo' barerariarukoo' tee-koo nii'ninge Sietani' bakaang makensi'nung tampaamaung-koo. Ninge aa'dampimang dii'koo tee nii'ning kapoo' manki' pante'ampauka'nung.
Teka tee kapoo' enang komperi otoing tee tampa' pinka'eri otoaing bera ning moainoo'ke basi.
Baata teing parapaara puru'aama nkaang nko-nko kompai otoroaining bera botu basinoo'ke, ninge tee teing iri'po'nupoong deeng-antavarampaing ookara nantoong-koo amutemuu'koo daua teing tanata-koo.
Ning tee Mma'ke temurii' iri' amuu'nung Daari Meekunge aa'pumana',
‘Teie tanatavuriaing aini-koong ninka donsi' ninka. Ee'noko teie kansi'koong utau-pina' putura'uriaing.’
Napo' tee ninge avorompainge teing tee maatara.
Baa tee naning punkang-po'nunge tee tampa' taaravuaing tee kapoo' Tanuaang Meekunge minkuvumaung dootuu'nupoong-koo osi kante-koo.” ’”

Ee'noko aa'muu' ning Jooni, “Napo' narung karavoto daarieai tee-anko koosinung Saadisie dootuu'nupoong tanatavurimaung-anko. Aa'peaing, ‘Aung tee kara teie ˜kenaanka-taa Kumponing bakaning tanuaang-po'nunge ee'noko napo' ˜keura-taa beento' tampanaange kompui otomaunge aa'pumaang, “Ninge tee dakaang nko-nkonanka noru'ansi o'nong ee'noko nantoonge domantoo' tantaamana' noru'ansi o'nong, teka da' boo'pina' ooramaang.
Deto tanteraravai! Teing kapoo' otoining puring-antaveai mme' boo'paravaruko, ai' dakaang nko-nko koomparavaung ooreronsing nkaang Kumponing-koo dutakanoo'ke.

Norunoru'eai dake tee kapoo' taaravera nkaveu'nung, ee'noko pinka'eai tee. Bere'daravai dakaning orarananka-ita. Da' tanterari otoauka'nung deeko' tee ning da'anko tee bakiaa' nko-pina' tavo'kampaing dake noru'eauka'nung batei-koo.
Dii'koo nii'ning Saadisie otorining-koo biikaning mononopa'nanka ku'mi'antavaava' otoroining. Ee'noko teing ee'ning teing makosinuka ni'ninka nari' nanampiaining mononopa' kakaara kurumpariri.

Baata teing parapaara puru'aavaining teing teing-pina' nari' kurumpariaining mononopa' kakaara, ee'noko ninge biikaang miring tee piu'ampauka'nung teieta buuku domantoo' domampariaining biikaang miring daarinii'keta. Ee'noko ninge tee biikaang miring Mma'koo ee'noko koosinunanka-koo dutaka-noo'ke sira'pampaing nkaning tamparama.
Baa tee naning punkang-po'nunge tee tampa' taaravuaing tee kapoo' Tanuaang Meekunge minkuvumaung dootuu'nupoong-koo osi kante-koo.” ’”

“Napo' narung karavoto daarieai tee-anko koosinung Piladelepia'ke dootuu'nupoong tanatavurimaung-anko. Aa'peaing, ‘Aung kara tee tee Naning Meekung ee'noko Paariaravaung bakaang, tee Deevita' bakaang kii' kompui otomaung teri'ke daate'uko nii'nung naninge napo' da'puarupeu', napo' da'puko deeko' nii'nung naninge daate'uarupeu'.

Teie aa'pumaang, “Ninge tee dakaang nko-nkonanka noru'ansi o'nong da' iri'navu oto'deruko nkaang kara pinka'ei siompemaung. Ee'noko nkaang miring penkempeaunge. Tee'koo ninge karanaang daate'deromira sipansing da' tung-koo nii'nung naninge kumpi'koo makotua'.

Ee aung, nii'ning teke Sietani' bakanavitu otorong daang Ju'nupoong tamparimaing nka Ju'nupoong deea', tosi baukonuka. Ee aung, teing teing ee'ning da'anko botoaranko da'koo kau'kanoo' kinkinaara pankaing-antaraava'naang, ee'noko da' ninge piaaramana' noru'aavai.

Ee'noko dake tee nkaang kara boonko mii'kii pinka'emanoo'koo da' tee ninge tampa' tarerampaing tee-koo batei parapaara arikung-koo ookara nantoong kansi'nupoong-koo tavo'kuaing-koo, paaravurima ookara.
Ning tee da'deng moo'naang, tee kapoo' kompei otoing tee pinka'ei otoko, naninge pari'du'neenga tee dakaang baakopo.

Baata teing parapaara puru'aavaining tee ninge pava pankava-koo natuku pina' keeng-antavarampaing nkaang Kumponing bakanava-koo. Ee'noko teketa tee tee tenkenuauka'nung, ee'noko ninge tee tee-koo nkaang Kumponing-koong miring daariampaing. Napo' tee nkaang Kumponing bakaang osi pankamono-koong miring tee-koo daariampai, tee nerakung Jerusalema' paning-eta depeto poaing ee'noko nkaang Kumponing-eta poainge. Ee'noko napo' koonto' nkaang miring nerakung tee-koo daariampainge.
Baa tee naninge punkang-po'nunge tee tampa' taaravuaing tee kapoo' Tanuaang Meekunge minkuvumaung dootuu'nupoong-koo osi kante-koo.” ’”

“Napo' narung karavoto daarieai tee-anko koosinung Leodesia'ke dootuu'nupoong tanatavurimaung-anko. Aa'peaing, ‘Teie Miru' Paariaravaunge, Motekaro'ari Kara Masikung Tampa' Sira'ke Kumponinge nkovuru'ning-koo okonarai aa'pumaang,

“Ninge tee dakaang nko-nkonanka noru'ansi o'nong, da' tee baru' ka'matoong deea' ee'noko baru' uipaarii' deea'. Tee'koo ning piamomaang da' tokoona' nari' deentari oto'koo, aa'noko uipaarii' deeko' nii'noo' ka'matoong.
Teka da' mantong-koo meu' basi, baru' uipaarii' deea' ee'noko baru' ka'matoong deea', tee'koo ninge da' nkaang karang-eta kuripiorampaing.

Dake enang aa'pemaang, ‘Ning tee enang ookara-koo kavo-koo makotunsi o'nong; enang kapoo'koo pia o'noa'.’ Teka dake noru'ea' tanuaang-aape da' tee piaaru' papovuru', ata'oi', kaputu', ee'noko simpenoi'.

Ninge koonto' nauramaang da', ning-koo tee kooro nta'ke simpe'ura kiiroraa'antavuu'nung moo'siiaing, tanuaang kavo-po'nung deentaraa'naang. Napo' mononopa' kakaara ning-koo moo'eai simpenoi' ooraamaung nopa'daravaina'. Ee'noko napo' marasini moo'eainge ning-koo, duta-koo si'darara tampa' oomeaina'.
